Chess Pieces.name: 棋子 Chess Pieces
Chess Pieces.description:
雕刻棋子是一项复杂的任务，需要精确的工艺才能在整套棋子中保持一致的风格。每一种棋类变体，如 Courier 或 Tamerlane，都需要不同的棋子，为制作过程增加了另一层复杂性与技能要求。

Carving chess pieces is a complex task, requiring precise craftsmanship to maintain a consistent style across the set. Each variant of chess, like Courier or Tamerlane, calls for different pieces, adding another layer of complexity and skill to the creation process.

Smoked Meats.name: 熏肉 Smoked Meats
Smoked Meats.description:
最常见的熏制肉类方法是使用橡木、山核桃木、樱桃木或金合欢木等硬木，既可以单独使用，也可以混合使用。这些木材会赋予肉类独特的风味，同时也有助于保存。在熏房内，肉被挂在滴油盘上方的挂钩上。常见的熏制产品包括培根、鱼、火腿、香肠、萨拉米和熏牛肉，每一种都提供独特的口感与风味。

The most common method of smoking meats involves using hardwoods like oak, hickory, cherry, or acacia, either individually or in combination. These woods impart distinct flavors to the meat while also aiding in its preservation. Inside the smokehouse, the meat is hung on hooks above a drip tray. Common smoked products include bacon, fish, ham, sausages, salami, and pastrami, each offering a unique taste and flavor.

Chromite Pigment.name: 铬铁矿颜料 Chromite Pigment
Chromite Pigment.description:
当矿石被冶炼后，残留下来的细粉末会作为颜料用于玻璃器皿。大多数宗教建筑会将其用于窗户，呈现精巧的多色调与玻璃壁画，描绘场景或神祇。它也有一些军事用途，特别是在伪装方面，当被制成玻璃塔盾牌时尤为如此。若使用得当，这些盾牌反射的光线能让佩戴者几乎隐形。

When the Ore is smelted, the fine powder that remains behind is used for glassware as a pigment. Most religious buildings use it on their windows for intricate multi-hued hues and glass murals, representing scenes or deities. It also has some military applications, specifically in camouflage, when made into glass tower shields. If wielded properly, the light reflection off these shields can make the wearer nearly invisible.

Fight Beneath the Surface Ch. 1.name: 地表之下的战斗 第1章 Fight Beneath the Surface Ch. 1
Fight Beneath the Surface Ch. 1.description:
“北诺里亚曾是该地区受卡赫·尤尔影响而饱受折磨的中心。

作为回应，红曜石的首领——牧师阿尼莉西亚——试图栽种一株幼年维拉瑟林树苗，这是一棵据说能将凡人世界与卡赫·尤尔领域连接起来的圣树。她将其种在地上洞室之中，相信它向天空生长会铸就她所需的连接。

然而，她那些并不友善、反对她计划的姐妹们早已抢先一步，暗中在土壤中下了毒。

数日后，持异议者的领袖牧师蒂莱娜嘲弄了阿尼莉西亚的努力。在一场残酷的示威中，蒂莱娜把手伸进被腐化的泥土里，挖出那枚发黑的维拉瑟林种子，并在掌心将其捏碎。惧怕阿尼莉西亚的怒火，蒂莱娜施放强大的幻术掩护自己逃离，并逃入荒野。”

本章至此结束。这部编年史余下的章节似乎已遗失于时代，其秘密也随之被埋葬。

"North Noria was once the epicenter of the region plagued by Kah'Yul’s influence.

In response, Cleric Anilisia, chief of the Red Obsidian, sought to plant a Young Virathryn sapling, a sacred tree said to bridge the mortal world to Kah'Yul's realm. She planted it within the overground chambers, believing that its growth toward the sky would forge the connection she needed.

However, her not-so-friendly sisters, who opposed her plan, had already made their move, poisoning the soil in secret.

Days later, Cleric Tilena, chief among the dissenters, mocked Anilisia’s efforts. In a cruel display, Tilena reached into the corrupted earth, unearthed the blackened Virathryn seed, and crushed it in her hand. Fearing Anilisia’s wrath, Tilena cast powerful illusions to mask her escape and fled into the wilds."

The chapter ends here. The remaining chapters of this chronicle seem lost to time, their secrets buried with them.

Fruit Vulcano Lava Pie.name: 水果火山熔岩派 Fruit Vulcano Lava Pie
Fruit Vulcano Lava Pie.description:
从第一口到最后一口，这个派都令人愉悦。当你用勺子戳破外皮时，滚烫的水果果酱像熔岩一样渗出，这也是它名字的由来。

From the first bite to the last, this pie is a delight. As you pierce the crust with a spoon, the hot fruit jam oozes out, resembling lava, from which it gets its name.

Spicebush.name: 香料灌木 Spicebush
Spicebush.description:
北方林德拉因其作为入侵物种而臭名昭著，草药师们为保护当地生态系统而迅速将其处理掉。然而，它的果实却流入厨房，被人们欣赏为用于肉类、汤品和丰盛菜肴的风味调味料，这令草药师们颇为不满。

The Northern Lindera, infamous as an invasive species, is swiftly dealt with by herbalists who seek to protect local ecosystems. Yet, its fruit finds its way into kitchens, where it is appreciated as a flavorful seasoning for meats, soups, and hearty dishes, to the discontent of the herbalists.

Balista.name: 弩炮 Balista
Balista.description:
弩炮是一种主要用于堡垒与聚落防御的武器。它依赖于与普通弩不同的机械结构，使用带有扭力弹簧的两根杠杆，而非张力弩臂。据传有一种更先进的武器存在，名为连发弩炮（polybolos），然而这些传闻仍未得到证实。

Ballista is a weapon that is used mainly for fort and settlement defense. It relies on different mechanics than a regular crossbow, using two levers with torsion springs instead of a tension prod. There are some rumors that a more advanced weapon exists called a polybolos, however, these rumors remain unfounded.

Chamomile.name: 洋甘菊 Chamomile
Chamomile.description:
大多数平民在外出时往往会留意洋甘菊，因为它生长在野外。它的用途主要是在制成药用茶时用作病人的镇静剂。 

Most common folk, when out and about, tend to keep an eye out for Chamomiles, as it grows in the wild. Its use is mainly as a sedative for patients when made into medicinal tea.

Contract.name: 契约 Contract
Contract.description:
两方之间的书面契约，概述工作、交易或其他安排的具体内容。由双方签署，并由第三方作为见证加盖印章。契约可以包含当前请求所需的任意数量的细节。通常提供三份副本，参与的各方各持一份。

A written contract between two parties that outlines the specifics for a job, trade, or other arrangement. It is signed by both parties and stamped with a seal by a third party as a witness. The contract can include as many details as required for the request at hand. It is typically provided in three copies, one for each party involved.

Chili Pepper.name: 辣椒 Chili Pepper
Chili Pepper.description:
通常在大多数温暖气候中采收，主要用作烹饪中的香料，为菜肴增添一些“温暖”感。

Harvested usually in most warm climates, it is used mainly as a spice in cuisines to add some "warmth" to the dish.

Tourmaline.name: 碧玺 Tourmaline
Tourmaline.description:
它是最珍贵的矿物之一，其精美的晶体可以成为矿物王国中最美丽的范例之一。许多优质的电气石晶体不会被切割成刻面，而是因其美丽而被保存下来。人们也相信它们能够吸收施放在其上的任何法术，并将其转化为闪电。 

It is one of the most prized minerals, and its fine crystals can be among the most beautiful examples in the mineral kingdom. Instead of being faceted, many fine Tourmaline crystals are preserved for their beauty. It is also believed that they can absorb any spell cast upon them, and convert it into lightning.

Carved Wooden Toy.name: 雕刻木制玩具 Carved Wooden Toy
Carved Wooden Toy.description:
雕刻是旅行商人或冒险者在长途航行中打发时代最喜欢的活动之一。它很容易学习，也便于在旅途中练习，而且只需要一把小雕刻刀。用它制作的玩具或小饰品要么卖给商店，要么送给亲近的家人。

Carving is one of the favorite activities for traveling merchants or adventurers on long voyages to pass the time. It is easy to learn and practice on the go, and it only requires a small carving knife. The toys or trinkets made from it are either sold to stores or given to close family members.
Carved Wooden Toy.gmnote:
该模组的文件夹中存在替代图标

Alternative icons exist in the module's folder

Grain Leather.name: 粒纹皮革 Grain Leather
Grain Leather.description:
通常指全粒面皮革，这是最高品质的皮革，由动物皮的最上层制成，保留其天然纹理和瑕疵，如疤痕、皱纹或毛囊，使其极其耐用、坚韧，并且能够随着时代形成美丽的包浆，不同于那些经过打磨或抛光的低等级皮革。

Usually referring to full-grain leather, it is the highest quality leather, made from the top layer of the animal skin with its natural grain and imperfections, like scars, wrinkles, or hair follicles, left intact, making it incredibly durable, strong, and capable of developing a beautiful patina over time, unlike lower-grade leathers that are sanded or buffed.

Opal.name: 蛋白石 Opal
Opal.description:
"在一个魔法实验仍然存在的时代，两位法师决定将附魔的火焰与闪电蛋白石结合起来。发生了一场巨大的爆炸，而那两位再也无人听闻其下落。对魔法有所共鸣的人，时不时能在骨头里感受到那次爆炸的回响。在某些地方，如今依法禁止将两者结合。"

作为色彩最为绚丽的宝石之一，当这块石头被切割得如此精确，并以能够呈现出美丽的色彩光谱的方式切割时，它有时甚至比钻石更有价值。主要用于珠宝首饰，如吊坠和戒指的主石。

"In a time when magical experimentation was still a thing, two mages decided to combine fire and lightning enchanted opals. A massive explosion occurred, and the two were never heard from again. Those attuned to magic, from time to time, can feel the reverberation of that explosion in their bones. In some places, it is now forbidden by law to combine the two." 

Being one of the most colorful gems, when the stone is cut so precisely, and in such a way that it provides a beautiful array of colors, it can sometimes be worth more than a Diamond. Mainly used in jewelry, like pendants and ring centerpieces.

Timpani.name: 定音鼓 Timpani
Timpani.description:
定音鼓，通常也被称为釜鼓，是以其强烈音色为特征的打击乐器。使用称为槌的专用鼓槌演奏，成对握持。音乐家往往会随身备有一套定音鼓槌，因为每一副槌都能产生独特的音色与声音。多样性增强了它们在管弦乐中的作用，为音乐提供独一无二的节奏体验。

Timpani, frequently referred to as kettledrums, are percussion instruments characterized by their striking sound. Played with specialized drumsticks known as mallets, held in pairs. Musicians often have a collection of timpani mallets on hand, as each mallet produces a unique timbre and sound. The variety enhances their role in orchestral music, where they provide a one-of-a-kind rhythmic experience.

Siltstone.name: 粉砂岩 Siltstone
Siltstone.description:
粉砂岩是一种泥质岩，由压实的黏土和粉砂组成。它具有良好的吸水性，使其适用于含水层和储水，但由于其多孔性而不适合大多数建筑；而在确有使用时，主要用于没有其他岩石材料可用的地区。

Siltstone, a type of mudrock, is made of compressed clay and silt. It absorbs water well, making it useful for aquifers and water storage but unsuitable for most construction due to its porous nature, and when it is, it is primarily used in areas where no other type of rock material is available.

Assaying Tool.name: 鉴定工具 Assaying Tool
Assaying Tool.description:
它通常被称为试金石，这是一种由板岩制成的工具，表面具有细密颗粒，金属会在其上留下微小痕迹。商人和银行出纳员会使用试金石，并配合等效的金属薄片来鉴定钱币、金条或珠宝的纯度。这些金属薄片由黄金、白银、铂金或琥珀金制成，具有不同的纯度等级，会与即将收购的金属一同在试金石上划擦，以确定其纯度或判断其是否为伪造品。

It is commonly known as a Touchstone, a tool made from slate with a finely-grained surface on which metals leave a small trace. The touchstone is used by merchants and bank tellers along with equivalent metal leaves to identify the purity of coins, bars, or jewelry. The metal leaves, made of gold, silver, platinum, or electrum with various purity levels, are scratched on the touchstone along with the soon-to-be-acquired metal to determine its purity or whether it is a counterfeit.

Broccoli.name: 西兰花 Broccoli
Broccoli.description:
一种十字花科植物，通常呈绿色、紫色或白色。主要以水煮烹调，但蒸、烤和快炒也是美味的选择。

A plant from the cabbage family, it usually comes in green, purple, or white hues. Mainly cooked boiled, however, steaming, roasting and stir-frying are also tasty options.

Palladium.name: 钯 Palladium
Palladium.description:
钯以其光泽的白色外观而著称，作为一种珍贵金属，因其稀有度和独特特性而备受珍视。它在珠宝中的用途尤为显著，尤其作为一种合金用于制作白金。

Palladium, with its lustrous white appearance, stands as a precious metal highly prized for its rarity and distinctive characteristics. Its notable usage in jewelry, especially as an alloy for crafting white gold.

Spinach.name: 菠菜 Spinach
Spinach.description:
它的叶子是一种常见的可食用蔬菜，可生食、炒食或蒸食。草药师会使用加入菠菜汁的强化酒给伤者饮用，旨在减少或止住出血。

Its leaves are a common edible vegetable consumed fresh, stir-fried, or steamed. Herbalists use wine fortified with spinach juice to give to the injured with the intent of reducing or stopping bleeding.

Green Gauntlet.name: 绿色护手 Green Gauntlet
Green Gauntlet.description:
绿护手的大胆风味映照着它所致敬的骑士们的勇气。其锐利、振奋人心的味道唤醒感官，每一口都带来一阵勇气。酿造中使用的草药与香料的组合创造出一种复杂的风味，余味悠长，正如坚定守护者的英勇一般。

The boldness of Green Gauntlet mirrors the bravery of the knights it honors. Its sharp, invigorating flavors awaken the senses, providing a burst of courage with every sip. The combination of herbs and spices used in the brew creates a complex taste that lingers, much like the valor of a steadfast protector.

Gabbro.name: 辉长岩 Gabbro
Gabbro.description:
辉长岩在建筑术语中被称为黑色花岗岩，因其耐久性而主要用于建造石质围栏，尽管它的加工性较差。它主要因同一岩石中所含的其他矿物而被开采，包括铬、镍、钴、铜、金、银和铂。

Gabbro, known as black granite in construction terms, serves primarily in building stone fences due to its durability despite its challenging workability. It is mainly extracted for the other minerals found within the same rock, including chromium, nickel, cobalt, copper, gold, silver, and platinum.

Calendar.name: 日历 Calendar
Calendar.description:
用于追踪多个季节天数的简易记录器，以符号或图画清晰标示，使普通平民也能轻松追踪当前季节的具体日期以及距离季节结束还剩多久。这可用于追踪特定事件，如收获季、春季或任何其他节庆。

Simple tracker for the days of multiple seasons, clearly indicated by symbols or drawings, allows regular commoners to easily track what specific date it is in the current season and how long is left until the end. This can be used to track specific events like harvest, spring, or any other festivals.

Fly potion.name: 飞行药水 Fly potion
Fly potion.description:
与普遍看法相反，这种药水并不提供任何飞行的能力。它是其对应物的某种不太平衡的产物，而其对应物确实能提供上述能力。这种药水确实提供在短时间内以完整细节看清最远 400 ft 距离的能力，不过，使用者需要专注于特定位置，并且需要一点适应时间，就像眼睛在黑暗中适应一样。这种药水可以让远处的影像更清晰，不过，不会获得任何察觉提升。

Contrary to popular belief this potion does not provide any ability to fly. It is the somewhat unbalanced product of its counterpart that does indeed provide the said ability. This potion does provide the ability to see temporarily up to a distance of 400 ft in full detail, however, the user needs to focus on the specific location and takes a bit of adaption, like the eyes adapting in the dark. This potion can provide a clearer picture of the distance, however, no perception increases are applied.

Chalcedony.name: 玉髓 Chalcedony
Chalcedony.description:
据推测，它有时用于死灵术，主要用来替代人类骨骼，为不死生物提供保护或对其施加控制。它也被用来在上锁的吊坠中雕刻小型浮雕或半身像，主要用于珠宝首饰。

It is speculated that it's sometimes used in Necromancy, mainly a replacement for the human bone, to provide either protection or control over the undead creature. It is also used to carve small cameos or busts in locked pendants, mainly in jewelry

Vertebrae.name: 椎骨 Vertebrae
Vertebrae.description:
椎骨是多个相互嵌合的独立骨骼，组成大多数生物的脊柱。最狡猾的工匠可以制造柔韧的工具，比如坚固的钩索线，能够固定多个生物，或制造先进的武器，比如骨鞭，能对它们接触到的一切造成沉重的伤害。

Vertebrae are the multiple individual bones that interlock with each other to form the spinal column of most creatures. The most crafty craftsmen can create either flexible tools, like sturdy hook lines that can hold multiple creatures, or advanced weaponry, like bone whips that can do heavy damage to everything they touch.

Walnut Lumber.name: 胡桃木木材 Walnut Lumber
Walnut Lumber.description:
一旦采伐后，胡桃木材因其浓郁的色泽和良好的加工性，常用于制作家具、地板、橱柜和装饰品。并且由于其价格低廉，受到大多数木匠和木工的高度需求。

Once harvested, walnut lumber is commonly used for furniture, flooring, cabinetry, and decorative items due to its rich color and workability. and due to it being a low price, it is in high demand by most carpenters and woodworkers.

Painite.name: 帕因石 Painite
Painite.description:
帕因石是诸界中最稀有的宝石。没有人能为其定出具体的价格，有人说它足以买下整个王国，也有人说它毫无价值。迄今为止，除了用于珠宝饰品的装饰外，尚未发现其他用途。研究者确实在研究这些特定宝石更为奥秘的应用；然而，至今仍未有任何发现。

Painite is the rarest gem in the realms. Nobody has a specific price for it and some say it can buy entire kingdoms, while others say it has no value. So far, besides the ornamentation of jewelry pieces, no other uses have been found. Researchers do study these specific gems for their more arcane applications; however, no discoveries have been made as of yet.

Platinum Ore.name: 铂矿石 Platinum Ore
Platinum Ore.description:
铂矿石是一种极其稀有的金属，仅能通过地下采矿获得。它具有卓越的抗力以抵御腐蚀，即使在高温冶炼下也是如此，使其成为最惰性的金属之一。铂主要被珠宝匠用于与黄金制成合金，以制作复杂的戒指和项链，并以相当高的溢价价格出售。

Platinum Ore is an extremely rare metal, found exclusively through underground mining. It possesses remarkable resistance to corrosion, even under high-temperature smelting, making it one of the most noble metals. Platinum is primarily used to create alloys with gold by jewelers for making intricate rings and necklaces sold at a quite high premium price.

Watermelon.name: 西瓜 Watermelon
Watermelon.description:
西瓜是一种甜美、夏季常见的水果，通常以新鲜切片、混合水果沙拉中的丁块或果汁的形式食用。西瓜汁可以与其他果汁混合，或酿造成葡萄酒。

Watermelon is a sweet, commonly consumed summer fruit, usually, as fresh slices, diced in mixed fruit salads, or as juice. Watermelon juice can be blended with other fruit juices or made into wine.

Chicken and Rice.name: 鸡肉饭 Chicken and Rice
Chicken and Rice.description:
大多数旅店和酒馆的主食，因为它易于准备、便宜，而且是一顿丰盛的餐食。

A staple food in most inns and taverns, as it is easy to prepare, cheap, and it is a hearty meal.

Mechanized Key.name: 机械钥匙 Mechanized Key
Mechanized Key.description:
这类钥匙更像是复杂工程结构中缺失的部件。它们之所以被称为钥匙，是因为当它们被放入指定的插槽时，就会启动该结构的机制。这些钥匙通常用于金库，而只有极少数人有能力制作它们。

These types of keys are more like missing pieces in a complex engineered structure. They are called keys because when they are placed into their designated slots, they activate the mechanism of the structure. These keys are typically used for vaults, and only a very few are capable of crafting them.

Spinning Wheel.name: 纺车 Spinning Wheel
Spinning Wheel.description:
纺车或纺锤是一种机械装置，用于将纤维纺成线或纱。它通过捻合与卷绕的过程，将羊毛或棉花等原材料转化为可用的线，这是织物制作中不可或缺的一环。

A spinning wheel, or spindle, is a mechanical device used for spinning thread or yarn from fibers. It converts raw materials such as wool or cotton into usable thread through a process of twisting and winding, which is integral to fabric creation.

Quartz.name: 石英 Quartz
Quartz.description:
这颗宝石呈深天蓝色，较为稀有，没有太多用途，通常用作装饰。当法术需要未附带价值的宝石时，由于价格低廉，石英是施法者的首选宝石。

The deep sky blue color of this gem, somewhat rare, doesn't have many uses and it's used for ornamentation. When spells require gems that are not attached to a value, Quartz is the go-to gemstone for casters, as it has low price.

Ramie.name: 苎麻 Ramie
Ramie.description:
苎麻，也称为草麻布，是一种源自荨麻类植物的纤维。它以强度和光泽著称，是制作适合温暖气候的织物的理想材料。除了纺织品之外，它也用于制作渔网、滤布，偶尔还用于造纸。

Ramie, also called grass linen, is a fiber derived from a type of nettle. Known for its strength and luster, it is an ideal material for creating fabrics suited to warm climates. Beyond textiles, it is also used in making fishing nets, filter cloths, and occasionally, paper.

Nickel Ore.name: 镍矿石 Nickel Ore
Nickel Ore.description:
镍矿石是一种稀有且珍贵的矿物，只能在地底深处找到。据说它极其坚固耐用，因此成为铁匠和工匠们都高度需求的金属

Nickel ore is a rare and prized mineral that can only be found deep within the earth.  It is said to be incredibly strong and durable, making it highly demanded metal by blacksmiths and craftsmen alike

Rhubarb Pie.name: 大黄派 Rhubarb Pie
Rhubarb Pie.description:
大黄派以甜中带酸的风味令人愉悦，果味馅料使其口感更佳且能很好地凝聚成型。由于大黄是一种季节性蔬菜，这种派仅在寒冷季节过后的一段有限时代内供应。

Rhubarb Pie delights with its sweet and tangy taste, accentuated by a fruity filling that holds together nicely. Since rhubarb is a seasonal vegetable, this pie is only available for a limited time after the cold seasons.

Dictionary.name: 词典 Dictionary
Dictionary.description:
这本书包含某种语言中的所有词汇及其具体定义。它对于那些试图学习该语言、发掘古语或地域用语，以及解决复杂谜题的人来说尤其有帮助。

This book contains all the words in a language along with their specific definitions. It is especially helpful for those attempting to learn the language, uncover archaic terms or regionalisms, and to also resolve complex puzzles.

Dark-Bat Remains.name: 暗蝠遗骸 Dark-Bat Remains
Dark-Bat Remains.description:
当夜之生物变形为更具兽性的形态时，追猎它们的猎人只有一种解决狩猎的选择。斩首。这样做会将该生物的血肉与皮肤烧尽，只留下它的头骨。头骨通常被作为战利品保留，并被十分珍视，因为能从这些生物手下活下来是罕见的专长。

When the creatures of the night transform into their more animalistic parts, hunters chasing them only have one alternative to resolve their hunts. Decapitation. Doing so burns the flesh and skin off the creature leaving behind only its skull. The skull is usually kept as a trophy, and quite cherished, as surviving one of these creatures is a rare feat.

Monster Pie.name: 怪物派 Monster Pie
Monster Pie.description:
别让名字骗你，以为这是什么骇人的东西，比如食人魔或巨魔的肾。不是的，这只是点心，而且还是节庆点心。金黄的外皮，刷上黄油直到闪闪发亮，里面塞满红色莓果，鼓胀得快要撑破。厨师和面包师会在外皮上随手划出粗糙的眼睛和参差不齐的嘴巴，让它带着邪恶的欢快冲你咧嘴一笑。有些脸做出来很滑稽，有些则真是阴森可怖，而我敢发誓，最好吃的那些看起来就像马上要反咬你一口。

Don’t let the name fool you into thinking it’s something grisly like ogre or troll kidney. No, it’s just a pastry, and a festive one at that. A golden crust, brushed with butter till it gleams, filled to bursting with red berries. Cooks and bakers slice crude eyes and a jagged mouth into the crust so it grins at you with wicked cheer. Some faces come out goofy, some downright ghastly, and I swear the best tasting ones look like they’re about to bite back.

Blacksmith's Ring.name: 铁匠戒指 Blacksmith's Ring
Blacksmith's Ring.description:
在完成最后的训练后，新任命的铁匠还要面对最后一项挑战：打造铁匠之戒。这项任务不仅仅是仪式性的，因为它标志着从新学徒到熟练工匠的转变。戒指本身是一枚坚实的铁制指环，上面镌刻着铁匠家族的印记。所选材料为铁，是刻意为之，因为它难以进行精细塑形与细致雕刻。这也作为最后一课：即便是最顽固的材料，也能被塑造成精准、个人化且经久耐用之物。

After finalizing their training, newly appointed blacksmiths face one final challenge, the creation of the Blacksmith’s Ring. This task is more than ceremonial, as it marks the transition from a new apprentice to a skilled artisan. The ring itself is a solid iron band, engraved with the blacksmith’s family seal. The material, iron, chosen deliberately for its difficulty in delicate shaping and detailed engraving. It serves as one final lesson, as even the most unyielding material can be shaped into something precise, personal, and enduring.

Hot Punch.name: 热拳 Hot Punch
Hot Punch.description:
这种工具被称为锻造冲头或热冲头，主要用于切割或冲穿金属以进行成形并将其固定。此外，它也适用于压制出印痕或图案，因此更讲究的顾客会选择它。

Referred to either as a forging punch or hot punch, this tool is primarily utilized for cutting or punching through metal to shape and secure it. Moreover, it lends itself to forming impressions or designs, making it a choice for the more discerning customers.

Olives.name: 橄榄 Olives
Olives.description:
绿色橄榄与任何其他类型的橄榄之间唯一的区别在于成熟度。除了用作沙拉的点缀或作为小零食之外，橄榄还被制成橄榄油。它们先被烘烤，然后放在阳光下晒干，之后再送到磨坊进行加工。

The only difference between green and any other type of olives is the ripeness. Aside from being used as a garnish for salads or as a small snack, olives are turned into olive oil. They are first roasted and then left to dry in the sun before being taken to the mill for processing.

Belladonna Fruit.name: 颠茄果实 Belladonna Fruit
Belladonna Fruit.description:
颠茄果是诸界已知最具毒性的果实之一。因此，只有最娴熟的采集者才会种植与采收它。若缺乏适当的专长与知识，缺乏经验的人可能会被这种樱桃般的果实所欺骗而误食。经过加工后，它有时会用于化妆品，因为其效果被认为具有迷人与诱惑的特质。当溶液滴入眼中时，会使瞳孔扩张。这种植物有多种用途，不过其主要用途是制造极其强力的毒药。据推测，甚至连皇帝都曾因此殒命。

Belladonna Fruit is one of the most toxic fruits known throughout the realms. As such, it is only farmed and harvested by the most skilled Gatherers. Without the proper expertise and knowledge, inexperienced folks might be fooled into eating the cherry-like fruit. After being processed, it is sometimes used in cosmetics as its effects are considered to have an attractive and seductive quality. When a solution is dropped in the eyes it dilates the pupils. The plant has multiple applications, however, its main usage is to create very potent poisons. It is speculated even Emperors have fallen to it.

Morganite.name: 摩根石 Morganite
Morganite.description:
摩根石因其多方面的用途而脱颖而出，蕴含着一种让人联想到祖母绿与海蓝宝石的奥术特质的混合。这种独特的组合使其在宝石爱好者中备受珍视。

Morganite stands out for its multifaceted utility, harnessing a blend of arcane attributes reminiscent of both emerald and aquamarine. This distinctive combination makes it highly prized among gem enthusiasts.

Monkey Paw.name: 猴爪 Monkey Paw
Monkey Paw.description:
猴爪……这只爪子能实现愿望。每一根手指代表一个愿望，而一旦愿望用掉，那根手指就会紧紧锁住，硬得像骨头。它确实会给你所求的东西，没错，但它会夺走你话语的神髓，把它像绳索一样扭曲。我认识一位商队头领，他乞求无尽的黄金。他得到了，但那是熔化的钱币从天而降，烧得他的营地化为灰烬。等你用到最后一根手指时，大多数人宁可乞求死亡，也不愿再求一个恩赐。

Monkey Paw... this paw grants wishes. Each finger stands for one, and once a wish is spent, the finger locks tight, stiff as bone. It gives you what you asked for, aye, but it takes the spirit of your words and twists it like a rope. I knew a caravan master who begged for endless gold. He got it, but it rained from the skies as molten coins, burning his camp to ash. By the time you’re on the last finger, most folk would sooner beg for death than ask another boon.

Spider Beetle.name: 蜘蛛甲虫 Spider Beetle
Spider Beetle.description:
虽然蛛形甲虫对人无害，但在粮仓附近发现它们就很成问题。它们以干燥的食物储备为食，尤其是谷物和水果；通常看到它，就表明储存的给养已经变质。

While the Spider Beetle is harmless to people, spotting it near granaries are problematic. They feed on the dried food supplies, particularly grains and fruits, seeing it, usually, it shows that stored provisions have gone bad.

Nippers.name: 小钳子 Nippers
Nippers.description:
主要由钢制成，也被称为马蹄钳，外观类似一把巨大的指甲剪。它们的主要用途是拆除先前钉上的马蹄铁。除此之外，这些工具也擅长剪断螺栓或钉子的扁平末端，从而使护甲、家具，甚至墙壁的收口更加平整光滑。

Crafted mainly from steel, also referred to as farrier nippers, mirror the appearance of a giant pair of nail clippers. Their primary function involves removing a previously placed horseshoe. Beyond that, these tools prove adept at cutting the flat end of bolts or nails, resulting in a smoother finish for armor, furniture, or even walls.

Darkness Eye.name: 黑暗之眼 Darkness Eye
Darkness Eye.description:
我第一次见到黑暗之眼，是在髓门城一个街头小贩那只布满裂纹的掌心里，我发誓那东西看起来像是在把光整块吞下去。的确是一颗宝石，但不是那种闪闪发亮或对你眨眼、色彩跳跃的宝石。它的表面暗哑，黑得像沥青，却不知怎的比任何深坑都更深。盯得太久，你的胃会绷紧，仿佛你正坠落进其中。有人说它根本不是石头，而是夜本身的一块碎片，被造作成一个轮的形状。

The first time I saw a Darkness Eye, it was in the cracked palm of a street vendor in Marrowgate, and I swear the thing looked like it was swallowing the light whole. A gem, indeed, but not one that glitters or winks at you, with it's jumping colors. Its surface is dull and black as pitch, yet somehow deeper than any pit. Stare too long, and your stomach tightens as though you’re falling into it. Some say it’s not stone at all, but a fragment of night itself created into a round shape.

Mimic Sandwich.name: 拟形怪三明治 Mimic Sandwich
Mimic Sandwich.description:
我第一次见到这种东西是在——我想——红色收获期间，瓦斯卢伊河畔的一家酒馆里，我笑得差点把麦酒洒出来。想象一下：一个三明治，上面摆着煮鸡蛋正“瞪”着你，蛋上插着几根芹菜梗，蛋白里嵌着绿橄榄和黑橄榄当作“眼睛”，让那“目光”带着饥饿的寒光。老板还在旁边垂下一片黄瓜，像耷拉着的舌头；奶酪融化后淌在面包上，像歪斜的牙齿。这当然是要做成拟形怪的样子，而在你喝下几大杯之后、房间开始旋转时，它看起来就会诡异得仿佛活了一样。

The first time I saw one of these was, I think, in a riverside tavern in Vaslui during Red Harvest, I nearly spilled my ale laughing. Picture this, a sandwich with boiled eggs glaring up at you, stuck with sticks of celery on top, green and black olives set in the whites to give the “eyes” a hungry gleam. The tavernkeep had draped a slice of cucumber out the side like a lolling tongue, and the cheese, melted and oozed over the bread like crooked teeth. It’s meant to resemble a mimic, of course, and after a few tankards, when the room starts spinning, it’ll start looking unnervingly alive.

Cow.name: 牛 Cow
Cow.description:
牛被认为是最常被饲养的动物之一，它们对农场工人而言十分珍贵，因为它们的材料没有一样会被浪费。从肉类或乳制品等主食产品，到用于制皮革的皮革、从皮革与骨骼中提取的胶水，再到制作餐具、别针、鱼钩、长笛或骨针，牛被采收的每个性相都被充分利用。

Cows are considered one of the most farmed animals, they are precious to farmhands as none of their materials go to waste. From staple products like meat or dairy to hides for leather, glue extracted from the hide and bones, to the crafting of silverware, pins, fishhooks, flutes, or bone needles, every aspect of a cow's harvesting is utilized to its fullest.

Bread.name: 面包 Bread
Bread.description:
面包是一种由面团烘烤制成的主食。它有各种形状、大小和口味。它通常作为配菜在大多数酒馆和旅店中出售，可搭配他们提供的任何一顿正餐。

Bread is a staple food made from dough that has been baked. It comes in a variety of shapes, sizes, and flavors. It is often sold as a side in most taverns and inns for any of the main meals they serve.

Codex of Hatred & Love.name: 憎恨与爱之法典 Codex of Hatred & Love
Codex of Hatred & Love.description:
这本小日记由瓦伦丁·沃尔夫维如此命名，记载了他关于爱与恨如何在艺术与研究等各个领域各司其职的个人沉思，而他则完全否定悔恨。若干摘录暗示，透过所爱之人的眼睛，人类历史上最美的肖像得以创作；而透过仇恨，最深入的研究也只是为了贬损对立的事业。至于悔恨，他只是写道：“有一件你无法改变的事，就是已经发生的事。”

Small journal titled this way by Valentin Wolfve contains his personal musings on how both love and hatred serve distinct purposes across various fields such as art and research, while he entirely dismisses regret. Several excerpts suggest that through the eyes of a loved one, the most beautiful portraits in history were created, while through hatred, the most in-depth research was pursued solely to discredit opposing causes. As for regret, he simply notes: "One thing you cannot change is what is already done."

Rutile.name: 金红石 Rutile
Rutile.description:
金红石在其天然晶体状态下有两种主要且截然不同的用途：用精美的图案装饰陶器，以及为已镶嵌的宝石增添装饰点缀。它常以大型矿藏形式被发现，有时用于制作整件陶器，或作为家具上醒目的装饰点缀。

Rutile, in its natural crystal state, serves two main distinct purposes, decorating pottery with intricate designs and adding ornamentation to already placed gemstones. Found in large deposits, it is sometimes used in crafting entire pottery pieces or as striking ornamental accents on furniture.

Pancakes.name: 煎饼 Pancakes
Pancakes.description:
鸡蛋、牛奶、糖和面粉就足以制作出美味的煎饼。淋上糖浆或搭配水果后，它们便成为酒馆所供应的最令人满足且甜美的早餐之一。

Eggs, milk, sugar, and flour are all it takes to make delicious pancakes. When topped with syrup or fruit, they become one of the most satisfying and sweet breakfasts offered by taverns.

Hog.name: 猪 Hog
Hog.description:
这种动物被称为“hog”，在畜牧业中更常被称为猪或母猪，作为最常被饲养以获取肉类的动物之一，占据着重要地位。它是生产香肠、腌猪腿、培根、火腿以及各种其他食品的重要资源。

Referred to as the hog, more commonly known as pig or sow in husbandry, this animal holds a prominent position as one of the most farmed for its meat. It serves as a vital resource in the production of sausages, gammon, bacon, ham, and various other food items.

Chlorastrolite.name: 绿星石 Chlorastrolite
Chlorastrolite.description:
绿星石是一种观赏性宝石，常被打磨成椭圆形，并经常用于护身符。当与金属接触时，它具有一种独特的能力，能在较长的时间内将金属变为浅绿色。这一特性使得这种宝石在一些地区被称为“绿石”。

Chlorastrolite is an ornamental gemstone often polished into an oval shape and commonly used in amulets. When in contact with metal, it has the unique ability to turn the metal pale green over extended periods of time. This property has led to the gemstone being referred to as 'Green stone' in some regions.

Burger.name: 汉堡 Burger
Burger.description:
汉堡是将一块碎牛肉饼烤熟后，夹在面包胚的上下两半之间制成的。还可以加入生洋葱片、生菜、培根和蛋黄酱等额外配料来提升风味。

A burger is made by grilling a patty of ground beef and placing it between two halves of a bun. Additional ingredients like raw onion slices, lettuce, bacon, and mayonnaise can be added to enhance the flavor.

Moonshine.name: 月光酒 Moonshine
Moonshine.description:
私酿酒是一种自制的、未陈年的烈酒。据推测，私酿酒要么能让你拥有完美的视力，要么会导致你彻底失明。然而，所有记录往往都不准确，因为这些信息是在饮用该酒之后才收集到的。

Moonshine is a homemade, unaged strong liquor. It is speculated that moonshine can either give you perfect eyesight or cause you to lose it entirely. However, all records tend to be inaccurate as this information is gathered after the consumption of the drink.

Maram.name: 玛拉姆 Maram
Maram.description:
马兰鼓是一种在各个地区都能见到的打击乐器。它由一个木制圆筒构成，两端各有一张皮膜鼓面，并用皮革系带绷紧以发声。这种结构使马兰鼓在演奏时能够产生饱满而共鸣的音色，可用于多种音乐场合，例如传统仪式与舞蹈表演。

The maram is a percussion instrument found in various regions. It features a wooden cylinder with two skin heads on either end, which are tensioned with skin laces to create sound. This construction allows the maram to produce a rich, resonant tone when played to be used in a variety of musical situations such as traditional ceremonies to dance performances.

Draconic Staters.name: 龙族斯塔特金币 Draconic Staters
Draconic Staters.description:
这些钱币，在历史上被称为最早被使用的第一批钱币，贯穿整个时代几乎没有经过什么改动。它们通常由巨龙的仆从铸造，并且总是刻有巨龙的翅膀或头部图案。巨龙的宝藏中往往包含品质不一的贵金属，导致这些钱币在铸造时的黄金价格相较市场上的其他钱币更低。根据地区不同，它们也可能因其符号而被称为“翅膀”。

These coins, historically known as the first coins ever used, have undergone little modification throughout time. They are typically crafted by the minions of dragons, and always feature a carving of a dragon's wing or head. The dragons' hoards often contain varying qualities of precious metals, resulting in the coins being minted with a lower gold price compared to others on the market. Depending on the region, they may also be referred to as "wings" based on their symbol.

Cornet.name: 短号 Cornet
Cornet.description:
短号有时被称为圆形小号或自然短号，主要由技艺精湛的铁匠在专门的锻炉中以黄铜打造。其独特的活塞系统确保音色清澈且共鸣饱满，使得制造过程中的精确度对熟练的铁匠而言至关重要。

The cornet sometimes called the circular trumpet or natural cornet, is primarily crafted from brass by master blacksmiths in specialized forges. Its unique valve system ensures a clear and resonant sound, making precision in its manufacturing essential for skilled smiths.

Almond.name: 杏仁 Almond
Almond.description:
它们以生的或烤制的形式出售。它们也用于生产杏仁奶、油、黄油、面粉、糊状物或杏仁膏等产品。

They are sold either raw or roasted. They are also used to produce products like almond milk, oil, butter, flour, paste, or marzipan.

Abjurating Abjuratives in Abjuration.name: 防护学派中的防护者驱逐术 Abjurating Abjuratives in Abjuration
Abjurating Abjuratives in Abjuration.description:
“防护学派是通过誓言作出的庄严否认、抛弃或放弃，通常是放弃公民身份或其他权利或特权，”似乎以粗体字写在第一页上。接下来的页面包含所使用的材料示例以及由此产生的法术变体。这似乎是一本由吟游诗人撰写的书，旨在更深入地理解防护学派及其在奥术知识中的具体应用。

"Abjuration is the solemn repudiation, abandonment, or renunciation by or upon oath, often the renunciation of citizenship or some other right or privilege," appears to be written in bold letters on the first page. The following pages contain examples of materials used and the resulting variations of spells. This seems to be a book written by a minstrel, intended to provide a deeper understanding of abjuration and its specific applications in arcane knowledge.

Avocado.name: 鳄梨 Avocado
Avocado.description:
牛油果果实已被发现有许多用途，从治疗疾病到烹饪用途不一而足。有时它会被切成薄片或制成糊状，据说能让你的皮肤焕发光泽。草药师对其美容用途有些不确定；不过，据他们所言，食用相当安全。

There have been found many uses for the avocado fruit, ranging from treating ailments to culinary purposes. Sometimes it is cut into thin slices or made into a paste, which is said it provides a glow to your skin. Herbalists are a bit uncertain about its cosmetic use, however, according to them, consumption is rather safe.

Corn.name: 玉米 Corn
Corn.description:
玉米是种植最多的谷物之一，因为它可以制成油和面粉。玉米本身在诸国度中是所有消费者及其牲畜的主食。这种植物本身称为“Maize”，通常在温暖季节开始时种植，因为它不耐寒。

Corn is one of the most farmed grains, as it can be turned into oil and flour. Corn itself is a staple food throughout the realms for all consumers and their livestock. The plant in itself is called Maize and it is usually planted as the warmer seasons begin because it is not resistant to the cold.

Malachite.name: 孔雀石 Malachite
Malachite.description:
一种受欢迎的矿物，主要用于颜料，或在制造铁条时将金属染成绿色色调。白铁匠和珠宝匠通常会为他们的行业需求大量孔雀石。据传，在过去的时代，孔雀石曾被用来防止使用者坠落，然而施展该法术所需的魔法技能已随着时代而失传。

A popular mineral, mainly used for pigments, or to dye metals in a green tint while creating iron bars. Whitesmiths and Jewelers usually request high amounts of Malachite for their trade. It is rumored that Malachite in the ages past was used to prevent users from falling, however, the magical skill needed for the spell has been lost to time.

Pine Plank.name: 松木木板 Pine Plank
Pine Plank.description:
这种木材颜色较浅，主要用于建筑施工，因为它相当柔韧且富有韧性。它可用于窗框和门框、栏杆，以及建筑模板。

The lumber is a light color, and it's mainly used in construction since it's quite flexible and resilient. It can be used for window and door frames, rails, and construction mold.

Popcorn Kennels.name: 爆米花犬舍 Popcorn Kennels
Popcorn Kennels.description:
爆米花是一种玉米籽粒，在加热时会膨胀并爆开。“爆米花”一词也指通过加热这些籽粒制成的零食。它们可以撒上糖、盐、黄油、焦糖或奶酪作为配料。

Popcorn is a variety of corn kernels that expands and puffs up when heated. The term also refers to the snack food made by heating these kernels. They can be topped with sugar, salt, butter, caramel, or cheese.

Raspberry.name: 覆盆子 Raspberry
Raspberry.description:
树莓主要种植用于鲜果市场，其中大多数最终会被制成各种果汁或水果泥。烘焙师们也很青睐它，因为树莓派是年轻人最喜爱的甜点之一。

Raspberries are grown for the fresh fruit market, and most of them end up made either in a variety of juices or as a fruit puree. They are also sought after by bakers as the raspberry pie is one of the most favorite sweets of the young folk.

Currants.name: 醋栗 Currants
Currants.description:
红、白与粉红醋栗可以直接食用，但通常会制成果酱、果冻与甜点。大多数黑醋栗种植用于其酸性的果汁，但也会被制成美味的蜜饯与甜点。

Red, white, and pink currants can be eaten out of hand but are commonly turned into jams, jellies, and desserts. Most blackcurrants are grown for their acidic juice but are also made into delicious preserves and desserts.

Mulled Wine.name: 热红酒 Mulled Wine
Mulled Wine.description:
随着寒冷季节的开始，香料热红酒成为一种常备饮品。红酒先被煮沸，然后加入糖、黑胡椒、肉桂、丁香和橙皮浸泡调味。热饮时，据说能治愈普通感冒，不过人们主要是为了其暖身效果而享用。

Mulled wine becomes a staple drink as the colder seasons begin. The wine is boiled and then infused with sugar, black pepper, cinnamon, cloves, and orange peels. Served hot, it is rumored to cure the common cold, though it is primarily enjoyed for its warming effect.

Strudel.name: 斯特鲁德尔 Strudel
Strudel.description:
果馅卷是一种经典的酥点，呈长条形，内馅为水果馅料，例如苹果、梨、桃子、浆果等等。表面可撒上糖粉、甜可可粉或蜂蜜。这种点心很快就会成为各年龄层人们的最爱，并且很适合搭配早晨的饮品，例如咖啡或茶。

The strudel is a classic pastry, oblong in shape, with a fruit filling inside, such as apples, pears, peaches, berries, and many more. It can be topped with powdered sugar, sweet cocoa, or honey. This pastry is a quick favorite among people of all ages and pairs well with morning beverages, such as coffee or teas.

Blue-White Diamond.name: 蓝白钻石 Blue-White Diamond
Blue-White Diamond.description:
在钻石的各种变种中，最引人注目的通常是无色的一种，它带有蓝白色的色调。钻石主要用于珠宝市场。由于其璀璨、硬度和稀有度，它是所有宝石中最著名的一种。

The most notable gem from the Diamond variations is usually the colorless one which does have a blue white tint. The use of diamond is mainly on the jewelry market. Due to its brilliance, hardness, and rarity, it is the most famous of all gemstones.

Embalming Fluid.name: 防腐液 Embalming Fluid
Embalming Fluid.description:
这种液体专门用于保存死者，以便日后用于解剖或葬礼习俗，甚至死灵术。这种液体本身对可能考虑饮用它的普通人来说被视为毒药。经防腐处理的尸体比未防腐处理的同类腐烂速度更慢。

This fluid is specifically made to preserve the dead for later use either for dissections or burial practices, or even necromancy. The fluid in itself is considered poison for regular people that might be considering consuming it. The embalmed corpse has a lower decaying rate than their non-embalmed counterparts.

Brain.name: 大脑 Brain
Brain.description:
据说它们来自……嗯，这就麻烦了。有些商人声称它们是在事故或战斗之后采集的，另一些人则发誓这是某个工匠的骇人手艺，用秘密油料压制并保存。我说不准哪种是真的，但不管怎样，它们都很脆弱。让它远离阳光和粗暴的手。

They’re said to come from… well, that’s the tricky part. A few merchants claim they’re harvested after accidents or battles, yet others swear it’s some artisan’s grisly craft, pressed and preserved with secret oils. I can’t say which is true, but either way, they’re fragile. Keep it away from sunlight and rough hands.

Myrica Gale.name: 米里卡·盖尔 Myrica Gale
Myrica Gale.description:
或更常被称为香桃木。它能在一些最严酷的环境中生存，是一种非常知名且被采收的植物。它的用途范围很广，从当地用于缓解胃痛的家庭疗法和驱虫剂，到制作风味十足的茶，甚至甜艾尔啤酒。

Or more commonly known as Sweet gale. It can live in some of the most challenging conditions and is a very well-known and harvested plant. Its uses can range from local home remedies for stomach aches, and insect repellent, to creating flavorful teas, or even sweet ales.

Artichoke.name: 洋蓟 Artichoke
Artichoke.description:
朝鲜蓟的叶子通常会一片一片地剥下，然后将肥厚的基部蘸着油醋汁、醋、黄油、蛋黄酱、蒜味蛋黄酱、柠檬汁或其他酱汁享用。填馅或水煮的朝鲜蓟有许多不同的变化，常见的馅料包括面包屑、大蒜、牛至、欧芹、磨碎的奶酪和香肠。

The leaves of the artichoke are typically removed one by one, and the fleshy base is enjoyed with vinaigrette, vinegar, butter, mayonnaise, aioli, lemon juice, or other sauces. Stuffed or boiled artichokes come in numerous variations, with a common stuffing featuring breadcrumbs, garlic, oregano, parsley, grated cheese, and sausage.

Cumin.name: 孜然 Cumin
Cumin.description:
孜然种子作为香料使用，因其独特的风味与香气而备受青睐。它可见于一些奶酪中，例如莱顿奶酪，也可以在制作面包时加入。这种香料是许多领域菜系中的主食香料，以其温暖、泥土般的味道提升菜肴风味。

Cumin seed is used as a spice for its distinctive flavor and aroma. It can be found in some cheeses, such as Leyden cheese, and can be added while making bread. This spice is a staple in many realm cuisines, enhancing dishes with its warm, earthy taste.

Tambourine.name: 铃鼓 Tambourine
Tambourine.description:
铃鼓是一种用途广泛的打击乐器，具有木制框架，配有成对的小金属铃片，称为“zills”。它有许多演奏方式，例如手持、安装在支架上、摇动以发出活泼的声音，或用手或鼓槌清脆地敲击。音乐家也可以将铃鼓固定在腿部或髋部，以增添节奏。

The tambourine is a versatile percussion instrument featuring a wooden frame with pairs of small metal jingles known as zills. It can be played in many ways such as held in the hand, mounted on a stand, shaken to produce a lively sound, or struck sharply with the hand or a stick. Musicians can also use the tambourine attached to their leg or hip for added rhythm.

Grilled Steak.name: 烤牛排 Grilled Steak
Grilled Steak.description:
一片精心烹制的优质肉类切片，通常为牛肉，精准烹调，通常配有你选择的新鲜蔬菜或柔软的土豆泥作为配菜。

A meticulously cooked slice of premium meat, often beef, cooked with precision and often with a side by your choice of fresh greens or soft mashed potatoes.

Mashed Potatoes.name: 土豆泥 Mashed Potatoes
Mashed Potatoes.description:
土豆泥是许多菜系中的经典主食。制作过程包括将土豆煮熟，然后捣成柔软的泥状糊，通常作为配菜与各种肉类一同食用。

Mashed potatoes represent a classic staple in many cuisines. The process involves boiling potatoes and then mashing them into a soft paste often served as a side dish alongside various meats.

Turqoise.name: 绿松石色 Turqoise
Turqoise.description:
无论是雕刻而成还是用作装饰品，绿松石在历史上一直被视为珍贵的宝石。它常见于古老的墓葬中，以小型动物雕像的形式出现，或作为王室门上的装饰品。它也是常见的好运护符，骑手和商人在旅途中会佩戴它，以在未来的行程中避开伏击或失足。

Carved or used as ornaments, turquoise has been considered a precious gem throughout history. Found in old tombs in the form of small animal statuettes or as an ornaments on doors for royalty. It is a common good luck charm, used by horsemen and traders while traveling to ward off any ambushes or missteps in their future travels.

Chocolate Chip Cookie.name: 巧克力豆曲奇 Chocolate Chip Cookie
Chocolate Chip Cookie.description:
巧克力豆曲奇是一种甜味烘焙点心，以其黄油风味以及加入巧克力豆而闻名；巧克力豆可依个人喜好选用黑巧克力、牛奶巧克力或白巧克力。这是一款适合各个年龄层的经典最爱，并不只受年轻人欢迎，而且常与一杯冰牛奶或一杯热咖啡一同享用。烘焙师也可能尝试不同种类的巧克力或可可粉，加入坚果或其他配料，甚至替换部分原料，为经典配方带来独特变化。

The chocolate chip cookie is a sweet baked treat that is recognized by its buttery flavor and the inclusion of chocolate chips, which can be dark, milk, or white chocolate depending on personal preference. It's a classic favorite for people of all ages, not just young folk, and is often enjoyed with a cold glass of milk or a warm cup of coffee. Bakers may also experiment with different types of chocolate or cocoa, add nuts or other mix-ins, or even substitute some of the ingredients to create a unique twist on the classic recipe.

The Flirt.name: 调情 The Flirt
The Flirt.description:
可食红菇（Russula Vesca），或称“调情者”，是一种可食用的蘑菇；事实上，许多人认为它是最上等的野生蘑菇之一。这种蘑菇本身带有温和的坚果风味，甚至可以生吃；不过，当它与肉类菜肴或炖菜一同端上时，才最能大放异彩。

Russula Vesca, or The Flirt, is an edible mushroom, in fact, many people consider this to be one of the very finest wild mushrooms. The mushroom itself does come with a mild nutty flavor and could be eaten even raw, however, they do shine when they are served with meat dishes or stews.

Herring.name: 鲱鱼 Herring
Herring.description:
鲱鱼可以用多种方式捕捞，从直接在水中放置诱饵并使用渔网成批捕获，到更传统的鱼竿钓法。捕获后，鲱鱼有多种储存方式，各地食谱包括生食、发酵、腌渍或盐渍等种类，也可以熏制或通过其他方法保存。

Herrings can be fished in a variety of ways, from setting bait directly in the water and using nets to capture them in large batches, to more traditional rod fishing. Once caught, herrings are stored in numerous ways, with regional recipes that include raw, fermented, pickled, or salted varieties, as well as smoked or preserved through other methods.

Skull Candle.name: 骷髅蜡烛 Skull Candle
Skull Candle.description:
酒馆老板和旅店主人是他们的主要顾客。它们买起来便宜，维护起来更便宜，而且能给一个地方增添某种……特色。我还得说，他们特别喜欢它们，声称那阴森的面容能让闹事的码头工人老老实实坐在座位上。我发现它们更多时候是在第七轮麦酒之后被当作飞刀的目标，但每年就那么一晚，我想这些老板还是能应付得来。

Tavern-keeps and innholders are their primary patrons. They are cheap to buy and cheaper to maintain, and they give a place a certain... character. I also must say, they are particularly fond of them, claiming the grim visage keeps rowdy dockhands in their seats. I find they are more often used as a target for throwing knives after the seventh round of ale, but for one night a year, I think the keeps can manage.

Green Grapes.name: 青葡萄 Green Grapes
Green Grapes.description:
这种水果是一种很受欢迎的零食，既因为它甜美的味道，也因为你可以整颗食用而不会弄得一团糟。葡萄园会使用最高品质的青葡萄来酿造最纯净的白葡萄酒。 

The fruit makes a popular snack, both because of its sweet flavor and because you can eat it whole without making a mess. Vineyards use the highest quality form of the green grape to make the most pristine white wines.

Ladder.name: 梯子 Ladder
Ladder.description:
梯子是一种简单却必不可少的工具，用于到达高处区域。无论是在图书馆、住宅、农场、谷仓，还是由消防员用来从高处营救人们，梯子都在各种环境中用于完成关键任务。

The ladder is a simple yet essential tool for reaching elevated areas. Whether in libraries, homes, farms, barns, or used by firefighters to rescue people from high places, ladders are used in various environments for essential tasks.

Silver Earings.name: 银耳环 Silver Earings
Silver Earings.description:
为了避免镶嵌宝石的器具的高昂价格，人们也会制作纯银耳环。除了作为一种贵金属之外，银还有一个额外的优点：更容易塑形，使工匠能够创造复杂的纹样和精细的设计，同时让价格保持在普通平民也能负担的范围内。

To avoid the high prices of gem-inlaid implements, earrings made solely from silver are also crafted. Aside from being a precious metal, silver offers the added benefit of being easier to mold, allowing artisans to create intricate patterns and detailed designs, while keeping the cost accessible to the average commoner.

Honeycomb Cake.name: 蜂巢蛋糕 Honeycomb Cake
Honeycomb Cake.description:
尽管名字如此，蜂巢蛋糕并不含任何蜂蜜。然而，大多数面包师会将其塑造成蜂巢图案以增强其吸引力。由于其异域食材，这种蛋糕对许多平民来说仍然很陌生。它需要香兰叶、椰奶和椰子油，而这些材料根据地区不同可能很难找到。

Despite its name, the Honeycomb Cake does not contain any honey. However, most bakers shape it into a honeycomb pattern to enhance its appeal. Due to its exotic ingredients, this cake remains unfamiliar to many commoners. It requires pandan, coconut milk, and coconut oil, which can be difficult to find depending on the region.

Scorpion.name: Scorpion
Scorpion.description:
蝎子是夜行猎手，主要分布在干燥地区，白天会躲在岩石下和洞穴里。它们标志性的尾巴带有有毒的螫针，用来制服猎物并抵御威胁。虽然它们的螫刺对普通人来说很疼，但很少致命，而炼金术士会寻求它们的毒液，用于调制各种强效的药物混合剂。

Scorpions are nocturnal hunters that can be found mainly in dry regions, hiding under rocks and within burrows during the day. Their iconic tail carries a venomous stinger used to subdue prey and defend against threats. While their sting is painful to common folk, it is rarely fatal, and alchemists seek their venom for use in various potent medicine concoctions.

Deep Green Spinel.name: 深绿尖晶石 Deep Green Spinel
Deep Green Spinel.description:
深受森林居民喜爱，这种尖晶石用于装饰护甲和武器，也用于吊坠、戒指或手镯。

Beloved by the forest folk, this type of spinel is used to adorn armor and weaponry, also used in pendants, rings, or bracelets.

Chocolate Navel Orange.name: 巧克力脐橙 Chocolate Navel Orange
Chocolate Navel Orange.description:
巧克力脐橙，也简称为巧克力橙。巧克力橙具有独特而浓郁的香气，常让人联想到香草或蜂蜜，能提升大多数烘焙或烹调菜肴的风味。其独特香气尤其适合搭配深色叶菜、坚果及其他水果，使其成为大多数沙拉中的最爱。它们可以拌入沙拉，作为帕菲和燕麦等早餐菜肴的配料，或混入果汁中。

Chocolate Navel Orange, also called simply the chocolate orange. The chocolate orange has a distinctively rich aroma, often reminiscent of vanilla or honey, which enhances most dishes baked or cooked. Its unique aroma goes especially well with dark leafy greens, nuts, and other fruits, making it a favorite in most salads. They can be tossed into salads, used as topping over breakfast dishes such as parfaits and oats or mixed into fruit juices.

Aventurine.name: 砂金 Aventurine
Aventurine.description:
虽然绿色是东陵石最常见的颜色，但它也可能呈现橙色、棕色、黄色、蓝色或灰色的色调。东陵石用于多种用途，例如景观与建筑石材、水族箱装饰、纪念碑和珠宝。

While green is the most common color of aventurine, it can also appear in shades of orange, brown, yellow, blue, or grey. Aventurine finds use in diverse applications such as landscape and building stones, aquarium decorations, monuments, and jewelry.

Hand Cart.name: 手推车 Hand Cart
Hand Cart.description:
用于将物品运送到所需地点的全能工具。它可用于运输动物饲料、木板等大型物件，或从果园搬运水果，同时仍保持轻便，使其成为大多数农场必备的工具。

The all-round tool for transporting items where they are needed. It can be used to transport feed for animals, large objects like planks, or carry fruits from orchards, all while remaining lightweight, making it a must-have tool on most farms.

Sanguine Cocktail.name: 血腥鸡尾酒 Sanguine Cocktail
Sanguine Cocktail.description:
我第一次见到它是在“镀金海马”，一家藏在码头附近隐秘后巷里的酒馆，那里一切都散发着腐烂与陈年海盐的气味。酒馆老板玛泰尔把酒杯推过柜台，脸上挂着她所能挤出的最得意的坏笑。在摇曳欲灭的光里，它看起来像新鲜的血液——深沉、黏稠的红色，紧贴着杯壁缓缓流下，慢得足以让你焦躁不安。我的心跳漏了一拍，而后我的舌头说出了别的话。起初它很甜，像掌心里温热的蜜渍荆棘莓；接着一丝柠檬的酸意猛地穿透而来，让你一下子清醒。所有味道的底下，是产自伊泰什提后方寒冷丘陵、蒸馏得干净利落的高地金酒的清冽辛口。

I first saw this in The Gilded Sea Horse, a tavern tucked away in a hidden back alley close to the docks, where everything smells of rot and old salt. Matel, the tavern owner, pushed the glass across the counter with the largest smirk her face could muster. In the guttering light it looks like fresh blood, a deep, viscous red that clings to the glass and runs slow enough to make you anxious. My heart skipped, then my tongue said other things. It’s sweet at first, like honeyed brambles warmed in your palm, then a pinch of lemon snaps through so you wake up. Underneath it all you get the clean bite of a highland gin distilled up in the cold hills behind Iteshti.

Leerfish.name: 利尔鱼 Leerfish
Leerfish.description:
鲹鱼，也在某些地区被称为加里克，是一种生活在温暖近海水域、游速极快的掠食者。与许多其他鱼类不同，它不需要专门的钓鱼道具，因为它很容易去咬各种各样的拟饵和鱼饵。这种易得性使它成为当地渔民和商业捕捞船队都常见的渔获。它修长的体型能提供鲜嫩的鱼片，常被制作为烤鱼排，或在浓郁辛香的炖汤中慢炖。

Leerfish, also known as Garrick in certain regions, is a fast-swimming predator found in warm coastal waters. Unlike many other fish species, it does not require specialized fishing gear, as it readily bites at a wide variety of lures and bait. This accessibility makes it a common catch among local fishers and commercial fishing fleets alike. Its slender frame provides tender fillets, which are often prepared as grilled steaks or simmered in rich, spiced stews.

Nutmeg.name: 肉豆蔻 Nutmeg
Nutmeg.description:
肉豆蔻是多种树种的种子，或由其种子研磨而成的香料。肉豆蔻以及肉豆蔻种子的红色掩蔽——肉豆蔻衣，用于为烘焙食品、肉类、鱼类和蔬菜调味，也用于腌藏与腌渍，或用于蛋酒、热苹果酒和热红酒等季节性饮品。草药师使用肉豆蔻，因为它可能有助于缓解因食物不耐受或过敏导致的腹胀、痉挛和胃部不适。

Nutmeg is the seed or the ground spice derived from the seed, of several tree species. Nutmeg and Mace the red cover of the nutmeg seed, is used to flavor baked goods, meat, fish, and vegetables, and in preserving and pickling or for seasonal beverages such as eggnog, mulled cider, and mulled wine. Herbalists use Nutmeg as it may help relieve bloating, cramps, and upset stomachs due to food intolerance or allergies.

Cranesbill.name: 老鹳草 Cranesbill
Cranesbill.description:
老鹳草是一种庭院植物，具有多种药用用途。大多数平民都会在自家房屋周围种植它们来泡茶。老鹳草是一种草药，可以用作漱口水来缓解口腔溃疡的疼痛，也可以煮成热饮，用于舒缓剧烈的胃痛。

Cranesbill is a garden plant, that has multiple medicinal uses. Most commoners keep them around their houses to make tea. Cranesbill is an herb that can be used as a mouth rinse to soothe the pain of canker sores, and also made as a hot brew, to soothe stringent stomach aches.

Worm.name: 蠕虫 Worm
Worm.description:
蠕虫在健康的土壤中很常见，主要是在大雨过后。它们会吃腐烂的根系，因此在任何花园或农场里都是令人欣喜的景象，也是丰收的希望。它们也被平民和渔民广泛用作可靠的钓鱼鱼饵。

Worms are an common sight in healthy soil, mainly after heavy rains. They consume decaying roots making them a good sight, and a hope of good harvest, in any garden or farm. They are also widely used by commoners and fishermen as reliable bait for fishing.

Bean Stew with Meat.name: 肉豆炖汤 Bean Stew with Meat
Bean Stew with Meat.description:
大量的熏肉会提前准备好，因为它们是大多数豆类炖菜中的关键食材。在火上架着的铸铁烤炉里，所有食材（包括熏肉）都会加入并用小火慢慢烹煮，食用时还会配上一种辛辣的辣椒作为配菜。

Large quantities of smoked meats are prepared in advance, as they are a key ingredient in most bean stews. In a cast iron oven over a fire, all the ingredients, including the smoked meat, are added and cooked over a slow flame, and they are served with a spicy pepper as a side.

Nephrite.name: 碧玉 Nephrite
Nephrite.description:
软玉在颜色、外形和形状上与硬玉相似，主要用于石雕，并且偶尔在雕塑中作为大理石的替代品。历史上被开采了很长时间，如今常见于古老、废弃的墓穴中。

Nephrite, similar in color, form, and shape to Jadeite, is predominantly utilized for stone carving and occasionally serves as a marble substitute in sculptures. Historically mined for ages, it is now frequently discovered in ancient, abandoned tombs.

Silver Blue Spinel Ring.name: 银蓝色尖晶石戒指 Silver Blue Spinel Ring
Silver Blue Spinel Ring.description:
深蓝色尖晶石是一种美丽的宝石，由技艺娴熟的宝石切割师切割并镶嵌在银或铁戒指中。尽管它镶嵌在更实惠的金属上，尖晶石本身仍将戒指的价值提升到与由更珍贵材料制成的戒指相当的等级。宝石浓郁的色泽使这枚戒指深受贵族追捧。

Dark blue spinel, a beautiful gem, is cut by skilled gemcutters and embedded into a silver or iron ring. Even though it is set in more affordable metals, the spinel itself elevates the ring's value to a level comparable with those made of more precious materials. Its rich hue of the gem, makes the ring highly desirable by nobility.

White Gold.name: 白金 White Gold
White Gold.description:
白金是一种由黄金和白银制成的合金，不应与铂金混淆。在一些地区被称为灰金，由于其高价格以及在珠宝中呈现出的纯净银色外观，深受贵族珍视。

White gold, an alloy of gold and silver, should not be mistaken for platinum. Known as gray gold in some regions, it is highly valued by the nobility for its high price and pristine silver look in their jewelry.

Palo Verde.name: 帕洛维德 Palo Verde
Palo Verde.description:
帕洛韦尔德树很容易通过其绿色树皮辨认出来。这种树通常会采收其树皮，用途多样。内层树皮可以编织成绳索或篮子，或用于制作椅座底。此外，它还用于制作独木舟、衣物，并作为绘画和地图的载体表面。树皮也可用作木瓦和墙面覆盖物。

The Palo Verde tree can be easily recognized by its green-colored bark. This tree is typically harvested for its bark, which can be used for multiple purposes. The inner bark can be woven into rope or baskets, or used for making chair bottoms. Additionally, it is utilized for making canoes, and clothing, and as a surface for paintings and maps. The bark can also be used as shingles and wall coverings.

Aluminum Ore.name: 铝矿石 Aluminum Ore
Aluminum Ore.description:
铝矿石是一种轻质金属，用作合金的材料。由于其质地柔软，铁匠会将其与银矿石结合用于制作餐具或容器，而炼金术士则将其用于制作某些独特药剂。

Aluminum Ore is a lightweight metal used as a material in alloys. Due to its soft nature, blacksmiths use it in combination with silver ore to craft cutlery or containers, while alchemists incorporate it into the creation of certain unique potions.

Wine.name: 葡萄酒 Wine
Wine.description:
尽管葡萄酒仍然是最常见的种类，但也有其他变种可供选择，包括蓝莓、荨麻、苹果、接骨木莓和红醋栗酒。这些酒的价格会因所用水果及其年代而有显著差异。

While grape wine remains the most common variety, there are also other variants available, including blueberry, nettle, apple, elderberry, and red currant wines. Prices for these wines can vary significantly based on the fruit used and its age.

Anorthite.name: 灰长石 Anorthite
Anorthite.description:
尽管灰长石本身通常不被用作宝石，但某些具有迷人色彩或光学特性的品种可能会被切割和抛光，用于珠宝制作，作为其他更昂贵宝石的替代品。只有未经训练的商人才无法看出灰长石与珍贵宝石之间的差异，而购买珍贵石料也只会由经验丰富的商人进行。

Although anorthite itself is not typically used as a gemstone, some varieties with attractive colors or optical properties may be cut and polished for use in jewelry as a substitute for other, more expensive gemstones. Only the untrained merchant is unable to see the difference between Anorthite and a precious gem, and the purchase of precious rocks is only made by experienced merchants.

Hydrophane.name: 水蛋白石 Hydrophane
Hydrophane.description:
这种半宝石常用于镶嵌工艺，或切割成弧面形用于珠宝。在干燥状态下，它看起来朴素且不透明，通常呈象牙色或霜白色。然而，当浸入水中时，它会发生显著变化，变得透明，并展现出如同棱镜般的彩虹虹彩。

This semi-precious stone was commonly employed in inlay work or cut into cabochons for jewelry. In its dry state, it appeared plain and opaque, typically displaying an ivory or frosty-white color. However, when submerged in water, it underwent a remarkable transformation, becoming transparent and exhibiting a rainbow-like iridescence akin to a prism.

Hand Axe.name: 手斧 Hand Axe
Hand Axe.description:
这把斧头适用于多种用途，作为露营工具，它在砍伐小树、劈开引火柴以及准备柴火方面展现出其实用性。工匠们则欣赏它在将木材切割至合适尺寸并在家具上制作复杂纹样时的精细表现。

The go-to axe for various applications, it proves its usefulness as a camping tool for felling small trees, splitting kindling, and preparing firewood. Craftsmen appreciate its finesse in cutting wood to size and creating intricate patterns on furniture.

Iris Agate.name: 虹膜玛瑙 Iris Agate
Iris Agate.description:
这块石头是一种带有精细条带、通常无色的玛瑙；然而，当被恰当地切割时，它会在其表面展现出令人惊叹的色彩效果，有时也被称为“彩虹玛瑙”

This stone is a finely-banded and usually colorless agate, however, when cut properly, it displays an amazing show of colors on its surface, sometimes also referred to as "Rainbow Agate"

Cassiterite.name: 锡石 Cassiterite
Cassiterite.description:
锡石正处于珠宝匠与铁匠之间的争论之中，他们争论它究竟应被归类为宝石，还是如同锡一般的矿石。尽管如此，两派都一致认为它延展性极高且易于加工。

Cassiterite finds itself in a debate between jewelers and blacksmiths, who debate whether it should be classified as a gemstone or an ore akin to tin. Nonetheless, both groups concur that it is highly malleable and easy to work with.

Iron Ore.name: 铁矿石 Iron Ore
Iron Ore.description:
铁矿石是较为丰富的矿石之一，可在地下和山地地区发现。铁的品质会因其所在位置而有极大差异。大部分铁会被转化为生铁，这是锻炉中用于制造钢铁的主要材料。铁矿石是一种至关重要的贸易品，甚至比黄金更重要，各王国利用其矿藏来主宰商业。

Iron Ore is one of the more abundant ores that can be found in both underground and mountainous regions. The quality of the iron can vary wildly depending on where it is located. Most of the iron gets transformed into pig iron which is the main material that goes into the forges to manufacture steel. Iron ore is a vital trade good, even more so than gold, with kingdoms leveraging their deposits to dominate commerce.

Alabaster.name: 雪花石膏 Alabaster
Alabaster.description:
雪花石膏的柔软性使其能够轻松雕刻成精致的形状，使其成为雕刻雕塑的常用材料。它也常用于装饰性建筑工程，例如雕像、花瓶以及小型装饰雕刻品。

Alabaster's softness enables it to be carved readily into elaborate forms making it a popular material for carved sculpture. It is also often used for ornamental building work, such as for sculptures, vases, and small decorative carvings.

Amethyst.name: 紫水晶 Amethyst
Amethyst.description:
“据说第一颗紫水晶曾是一位年轻美丽的女祭司，然而，两位女神为争夺她的效忠而争斗，不幸将她毁灭。当女神们为失去她而哀悼哭泣时，她们的泪水交融，落地时化作这颗宝石。我不确定这个故事是否属实，因为我也听说其中还涉及一瞥与葡萄酒。”

是一种非常常见的矿物，遍布诸界各地。它色泽美丽，常被切磨成珠宝用的刻面形制，使其成为收藏家最受欢迎的宝石之一。

"It is said the first Amethyst was a young and beautiful priestess, however, two goddesses fought over her allegiance and unfortunately destroyed her. As the goddesses mourned and wept their loss, their tears combined and created the gem as it fell to the ground. I'm not certain if this tale holds any truth, as I have also heard that an glances and wine was involved." 

Is a very common mineral and is found throughout the realms. It has a beautiful color and is faceted into jewelry cuts, making it one of the most popular gems for collectors.

Sled.name: Sled
Sled.description:
雪橇被设计成各种形状和尺寸，以适应各种情境。它们的种类从儿童雪橇（非常适合从大山坡上竞速滑下）到由雪橇犬牵引、用于穿越广阔冬季景观的坚固旅行雪橇不等。

Sleds are designed in various shapes and sizes to accommodate various scenarios. They range from children's sleds, perfect for racing down large hills, to sturdy traveling sleds used by sled dogs to traverse vast winter landscapes.

Leather Bedroll.name: 皮革铺盖 Leather Bedroll
Leather Bedroll.description:
标准配发的铺盖卷，制作出来可在旅行时用于各种常见或极端天气。它通常能相当有效地隔绝寒冷与雨水。在大多数常见情况下，它们实际上是用许多拼补布片制成的，很少由一整块专门的皮革制作而成。

The standard issue bedroll, made to be used in all types of regular or extreme weathers while traveling. It is usually fairly well isolated from the cold and rain. Under most common scenarios, a lot of patchwork is used to actually make them, and they are quite rarely made from one dedicated piece of leather.

Dark Red Diamond.name: 深红钻石 Dark Red Diamond
Dark Red Diamond.description:
这颗宝石被切割成圆形，当它折射光线时，看起来仿佛有火焰嵌在其中。在合适的光线下，这些抛光过的宝石类似血滴。它们通常呈深红色到棕红色。它也被称为钻石中最昂贵的变种。据推测，当借助它施放法术时，施法者的灵魂会有一部分与钻石一同被消耗。

The gem is cut in a round shape, and when it refracts light it looks as if fire is embedded in it.  In the right light, these polished gems resemble droplets of blood. They usually come in dark red to brownish-red colors. The are also know as the most expensive variant of a diamond. It is speculated that when a spell is cast with its help, part of the caster's soul gets consumed along with the diamond.

Flax.name: 亚麻 Flax
Flax.description:
它有时也被称为亚麻籽。亚麻主要有两种特定用途：从亚麻种子中提取植物油，或通过收割茎秆来制作纺织材料。 

It is sometimes referred to as linseed. The flax mainly has two specific uses, to create vegetable oil from the flax seed, or to create textile material from the harvesting of the stem.

Spessartite.name: 斯佩萨廷石 Spessartite
Spessartite.description:
锰铝榴石常见于与烟晶伴生的矿床中，且通常以相当可观的数量出现。古老传说记载，它曾被用于锻造整套护甲——这一专长被归功于掌握奥秘知识的娴熟宝石切割师

Spessartine is commonly found in deposits alongside Morion, often occurring in substantial quantities. Ancient lore recounts its use in forging full suits of armor, a feat attributed to skilled gem cutters with arcane knowledge

Purple Emperor.name: 紫帝 Purple Emperor
Purple Emperor.description:
紫帝蝶是一种壮丽的蝴蝶，飞行于极为茂密森林的树冠高处。炼金术师通常会在蝴蝶屋里饲养几只用于繁殖，因为它们是某些最为稀有的药剂中一种稀有的试剂。

Purple Emperor is an magnificent butterfly which flies high in the treetops of very dense forests. Alchemists, usually keep a few in a butterfly house for breeding, as they are an rare reagent in some of the most rare potions.

Cayenne Pepper.name: 卡宴辣椒 Cayenne Pepper
Cayenne Pepper.description:
卡宴辣椒通常被研磨成细粉，可能是不同辣椒的混合物，以其强烈的辣度和鲜明的风味而闻名。它可以新鲜使用或作为干粉使用，用于为海鲜、蛋类菜肴、肉类、炖菜、奶酪菜肴以及辣酱增添辛辣风味。

Cayenne pepper is usually ground into a fine powder, which may be a blend of different chili peppers and is known for its intense heat and vibrant flavor. It is used fresh or as a dried powder to spice up seafood, egg dishes, meats, stews, cheese dishes, and hot sauces.

Pouch.name: 小袋 Pouch
Pouch.description:
这种简易袋主要由普通布料、结实的皮革或精细的丝绸制成，并配有一条抽绳，以环绕的方式穿过加固的孔洞。它主要用于携带钱币，不过也可以根据需要装载材料或小物件。

The simple is mainly made from simple cloth, sturdy leather, or fine silk and features a drawstring that threads through reinforced holes in a looping pattern. It is mainly intended to carry coins, though it can also hold materials or small objects depending on the need.

Living Book.name: 活书 Living Book
Living Book.description:
寓言中说，它算是一种日志，据说曾属于一位被时代遗忘的女巫。每到至日，书页就会被抹去，并且可以添加新的条目。当添加新的条目时，如果特意以日记的形式书写，一旦写下了什么尴尬的内容，这本书本身就会立刻翻白眼。

The fable goes that it is a journal of sorts, said to be owned by a forgotten by time witch. At every solstice, the pages get erased, and new entries can be added. When new entries are added, and if specifically written as a journal, the book itself rolls its eyes as soon as something embarrassing is written in it.

Skull Ring.name: 颅骨戒指 Skull Ring
Skull Ring.description:
虽然这是红收割者的标配，但戴得够久，人们就会以为你干过什么阴沉的事——就像我忘了摘下来戴了几天那样。我在旅途中经过一个破落的小村子时，故意戴了整整两周，只是想看看会怎样；结果不管是码头工还是农夫，都离我远远的，嘟囔着我肯定在深海里失去过一船人，或者我身上发生过什么可怕的事。

While a staple for the Red Harvest, wear one long enough and folk assume you’ve done something grim, as I forgot to take it of for a few. I wore one for a fortnight on the in a runty village while traveling, just to see, and the dockhands and farmers alike, gave me a wide berth, muttering that I must’ve lost a crew to the deep, or that something horrible has happened to me.

Salty Cocoa Nut Bars.name: 咸味可可坚果能量棒 Salty Cocoa Nut Bars
Salty Cocoa Nut Bars.description:
咸味可可坚果棒是一种零食棒，通常由坚果、种子与干果混合组成，并用甜咸混合物将其黏合在一起，该混合物包含可可、蜂蜜或枫糖浆，以及一撮盐。这些对年轻人可能没什么吸引力，但在漫长的一天工作之后，前往旅店的路上，一名平民可能会选择吃上两根，把它们当作替代的一餐。

Salty cocoa nut bars are a type of snack bar that typically consists of a mixture of nuts, seeds, and dried fruits that are bound together with a sweet and salty mixture of cocoa, honey or maple syrup, and a pinch of salt. These may not have much appeal to younger folk, but after a long day at work and heading towards the inn, a commoner might choose to have a couple of these as a replacement meal.

Green Breeze Ear Piece.name: 绿风耳饰 Green Breeze Ear Piece
Green Breeze Ear Piece.description:
这件镶有祖母绿宝石的耳饰专为希望彰显自己在上流阶层地位的人而设计。它是一件极其昂贵的时尚配饰，尽管许多人觉得佩戴起来不舒适。此饰品必须放置在耳朵的特定部位，对于一些耳形无法适配其特定设计贴合度的人来说，甚至可能会非常疼痛。

This emerald-gemmed earpiece is designed for those who wish to convey their place among the upper class. It is an exceptionally expensive fashion accessory, though many find it uncomfortable to wear. The piece must be positioned on specific parts of the ear, which can be outright painful for some individuals whose ear shape does not accommodate its specific design fit.

Scythe.name: 长柄镰刀 Scythe
Scythe.description:
长柄镰刀主要是农民用来割草、谷物或其他作物的工具，它由一片长而弯曲的刀刃以一定角度连接在一根加长的柄上。在某些地区，它与死亡有所关联，这种信念尤其为最迷信的平民所持。

The scythe is a tool predominantly utilized by farmers for mowing grass, grain, or other crops, the scythe consists of a long, curving blade attached at an angle to an extended handle. In certain regions, it carries an association with death, a belief particularly held by the most superstitious commoners.

Coal.name: 煤 Coal
Coal.description:
“这就是我所谓的铁匠最喜欢的那种矿石。没有高品质的煤，他们就无法做他们该做的事。在一个小型的锻造工位上，只用一些煤和木头也能凑合，但一旦涉及铸造厂，就必须要有大量的煤。”

 

金属工匠最钟爱的工具，煤主要产自地下，使其成为采矿时最常见的出土物之一。煤既能在接近地表的地方找到，也能在地下深处找到，这也使矮人成为最普遍的出口者之一。 

"It is what I would call the Blacksmith's favorite type of ore. Without good quality coal, they will not be able to do what they do. On a small blacksmithing station you can get away with just some coal and wood, but when it comes to foundries, coal in high quantities is a must."

 

The favorite tool of the metalworker, coal can be found mainly underground, making it one of the most common items uncovered  while mining. Coal can be found close to the surface as well as underground, making dwarfs one of the most prevalent exporters.

Carambola.name: 杨桃 Carambola
Carambola.description:
杨桃果肉厚实、爽脆、多汁，味道略酸、酸性强并带甜味。其外形呈星形、色泽金黄，常用于制作水果沙拉与水果拼盘，也可作为鸡尾酒与饮品的装饰，或榨成果汁作为功能性饮料饮用。

Carambola is fleshy, crunchy, juicy, slightly tart, acidic, and sweet in taste. It is star-shaped and golden-yellow in appearance and is frequently used in the preparation of fruit salads and fruit platters, as a garnish in cocktails and beverages, or squeezed into a juice and served as a functional beverage.

Common Ling.name: 通用语言 Common Ling
Common Ling.description:
普通鳕鱼，或白鳕鱼，是一种稀有美味，仅能在热带岛屿周围纯净的海域中发现。尽管也存在蓝鳕鱼和粉鳕鱼等变种，但捕获它十分困难。其地区专属性与稀有度使其成为令人垂涎的奢侈品，只在国王主持的高等宫廷奢华盛宴与贵族宴会上供应。

Common Ling, or White Ling, is a rare delicacy found only in the pristine waters surrounding tropical islands. Though variations such as Blue Ling and Pink Ling exist, catching one is a difficult task. Its region exclusivity and rarity make it a coveted luxury, served only at the king-run high court opulent feasts and noble banquets.

Basil.name: 罗勒 Basil
Basil.description:
一种在各王国各地烹饪中常用的香料。据推测，食用后能安抚并治愈心脏。然而，没有任何草药师证实罗勒具有任何治愈特性。它常被平民使用。

A common spice used in cuisines throughout the realms. It's speculated that it soothes and cures the heart when consumed. However, no herbalists have confirmed any curing proprieties of basil. It is often used by commoners.

Stibiotantalite.name: 锑钽铁矿 Stibiotantalite
Stibiotantalite.description:
锑钽矿主要作为宝石而被珍视，以其鲜艳、闪亮的金棕色外观而闻名。商人和中级廷臣常佩戴它，作为更昂贵宝石的经济替代品。

Stibiotantalite is primarily valued as a gemstone, known for its vivid, shiny, golden-brown appearance. It was commonly worn by merchants and mid-level courtiers as an affordable alternative to more expensive gemstones.

Wolf Bane's Leaves.name: 狼祸之叶 Wolf Bane's Leaves
Wolf Bane's Leaves.description:
被称为颠茄，人们通常认为它在与神祇沟通时有所助益，因为众所周知它能引发与任何位面的强烈连接。炼金术师通常以极度谨慎的态度采收它，因为它被用于制造市面上最致命的植物性毒药之一。草药师用它来治疗早期的狼化病，并作为一种疗法来控制并延缓该疾病更为晚期的阶段。

Referred to as Belladonna, it is usually believed to be of aid when communing with deities, as it is known that it can bring forth a strong connection to any plane. Alchemists usually harvest it with utmost caution as it is used in the creation of one of the deadliest plant-derived poisons on the market. Herbalists use it as a cure for early forms of Lycanthropy and as a treatment to manage and delay the more advanced stages of the disease.

Longstraw.name: 长稻草 Longstraw
Longstraw.description:
长秸草是指专门为屋顶茅草覆盖而种植的秸草。长秸草由水芦苇茅草或梳理过的小麦制成，这两者都常用于屋顶茅草覆盖。与传统的木质屋顶材料相比，它们因使用寿命更长而更适合用于屋顶。 

Longstraw is referred to the straw specifically grown for roof thatching. Longstraw is made from either water reed thatch or combed wheat, both of which are commonly used in roof thatching. They are preferred for roofing due to its extended life compared to traditional wood-based roofing materials.

Fig.name: 无花果 Fig
Fig.description:
无花果可以鲜食、干制，或加工成果酱，用于面包卷、饼干和其他类型的甜点。由于无花果有些难以保存，通常会在它们落下时采摘，并放在托盘上晾干；根据不同地区，它们也可以在旅行时加入口粮中。

Figs can be eaten fresh, dried or processed into jam for rolls, biscuits, and other types of desserts. Since they are somewhat hard to preserve figs are gathered when they fall and placed on trays for drying, added depending on the region they can be added to rations when traveling.

Vegetable Soup.name: 蔬菜汤 Vegetable Soup
Vegetable Soup.description:
蔬菜汤通常由当地可获得的食材烹制而成。土豆、南瓜、豆类，以及莳萝、百里香、欧芹等各种香草和番茄常被加入其中，为各地区的变体带来独特风味。在某些地区，还会加入水果以增添更为异域的味道。

Vegetable soups are typically crafted from locally available ingredients. Potatoes, squash, beans, and a variety of herbs such as dill, thyme, parsley, and tomatoes are commonly incorporated, providing a unique taste to each region's variation. In some areas, fruits are also added to lend a more exotic flavor.

Brined Cheese.name: 盐渍奶酪 Brined Cheese
Brined Cheese.description:
这种奶酪通常被称为 akkawi、halloumi、feta 或 telemea，在不同地区都很常见且受欢迎。其盐水腌制工艺使其非常适合用于沙拉、烧烤，以及诸界各地的传统菜肴。

Commonly known as akkawi, halloumi, feta, or telemea, this cheese is common and popular across different regions. Its brined process makes it perfect for salads, grilling, and traditional dishes throughout the realms.

Fool's Gold.name: 愚者之金 Fool's Gold
Fool's Gold.description:
“几十年前，当地盗贼公会控制着一座石英矿。某个时候，他们挖到了一条巨大的黄铁矿矿脉，也被称为‘愚人金’。起初，他们和所有人一样，确实以为那是黄金，但区域里的铁匠很快评估后发现并不是。不幸的是，那名铁匠从此再也没有人听到过他的消息。几年后快进，盗贼公会设法替换了该地区所有的珠宝和所有钱币。最终，这事传到了领主那里，他派了一个营前往城镇……我不确定它是否还存在，因为被派去的那个营再也没有回来，那片地区也从未再传出过盗贼公会的消息。”

 

黄铁矿，也被称为愚人金，用途有限，主要用作火器中的点火物，产生小火花以点燃火药。它也可以与燧石一起用作生火的方法。

"A few decades ago, there was a quartz mine controlled by its local Thieves’ Guild, at a certain point it struck a huge vein of Iron Pyrite, also known as Fool's Gold. Initially, like everyone else, they did believe it to be gold, but a quick assessment by the blacksmith from the area revealed it wasn’t. Unfortunately, that blacksmith was never to be heard from again. Fast-forward a couple of years, The Thieves Guild manages to replace all jewelry and all coins in the region. Eventually, it reached the lordship, and he sent a battalion to the town... I'm unsure if it still exists, as neither the battalion that was sent nor word of the Thieves’ Guild ever came from that region."

 

Iron Pyrite also known as the Fool's Gold, has limited uses, it is mainly used as a form of ignition in firearms, creating a small spark to ignite the gunpowder. It can also be used with flint as a method of starting fires.

Samarskite.name: 钐砷钾石 Samarskite
Samarskite.description:
萨马斯凯石是一种稀有的半宝石，尽管其价格较低，仍备受追捧。它很少被佩戴，传统上仅用于纪念挚爱之人逝去的仪式。

Samarskite, a scarce semi-precious gemstone, is sought after despite its lower price. It is rarely worn and traditionally reserved for ceremonies honoring the loss of a loved one.

Mallet.name: 槌子 Mallet
Mallet.description:
木槌是木工中不可或缺的工具，用于将木制部件敲合在一起、敲入木销、操控凿子以及对接缝施加压力。值得注意的是，它们与大多数金属锤不同，因为它们能够防止金属工具的打击端发生变形。

Wooden mallets are a staple in carpentry, serving to knock wooden pieces together, drive dowels, manipulate chisels, and apply pressure on joints. Notably, they stand apart from most metal hammers by preventing the deformation of the striking end of a metal tool.

Chromite Ore.name: 铬铁矿石 Chromite Ore
Chromite Ore.description:
铬铁矿石主要用于制造高品质钢材，有时可替代铁，但更多情况下会与铁结合使用。根据使用量的不同，它能赋予金属美丽的绿色与红色色调，使由其制造的护甲或武器装备的佩戴者十分赏心悦目。

The Chromite Ore is used primarily in the manufacturing of high-quality steel, sometimes as a replacement for iron but more often combined with it. Depending on the amount used, it can provide metals with beautiful hues of green and red, making the wearers of armor or weaponry manufactured with it quite pleasing to the eye.

Mutton Snapper.name: 羊肉鲷鱼 Mutton Snapper
Mutton Snapper.description:
捕捉羊肉鲷不只是靠运气，也要有合适的道具。由于它们强劲且突然的爆发力，需要一根耐用的鱼竿，通常会用金属加固。不过总体来说，只要工具得当，它们是很容易钓到的鱼。羊肉鲷可以平底煎、烘烤、裹粉油炸、炙烤、烧烤、烤架烤、烤箱油炸，甚至清蒸，能满足各种口味。渔夫们常常开玩笑说，烹饪羊肉鲷的方法比捕捉它的方法还多。

Mutton Snapper capture isn’t just about luck, it’s also about having the right gear. Due to their strong, sudden bursts of energy, they require a durable rod, usually reinforced with metal. However, they are overall easy fish to catch with the proper tools. The Snapper fish can be pan-fried, baked, crumbed, broiled, barbequed, grilled, oven-fried, and even steamed, matching every taste. Fishermen often joke that there are more ways to cook a Mutton Snapper than there are ways to catch one.

Poplar Lumber.name: 白杨木材 Poplar Lumber
Poplar Lumber.description:
它非常适合托盘、箱子和板条箱等物品，但也适用于工匠碗、木盘以及其他精细木工制品。由于其相对适中的价格，杨木是商业用途的绝佳选择。然而，它很容易凹陷或被刮伤，使其不适合高磨损物品，而且随着时代推移，其颜色会在数月内褪成中等棕色。

It is perfect for items like pallets, boxes, and crates, but also, artisan bowls, wooden plates, and other fine carpentry. Due to its relatively modest price point, poplar is a great choice for commercial uses. However, it can dent or scratch easily, making it undesirable for high-wear items, as well as, over time its color fades to a medium brown within months.

Soot.name: 煤烟 Soot
Soot.description:
由燃烧材料产生的深黑色粉末或片状物质。炼金术士和草药师将其用作黏合剂，织工则将其用作多种纺织品的染料。

Deep black powder or flaky substance, produced by burning material. Used by alchemists and herbalists as a binding agent, and by the weavers as dyes for a plethora of textiles.

Sea Daric.name: 海·达里克 Sea Daric
Sea Daric.description:
一枚闪亮的金色圆盘，上面饰有高度精细雕刻的骷髅。这些钱币通常由从各种来源掠夺得来的黄金铸造而成，例如金币、珠宝和金条。钱币本身分量沉重，作为对公海财富与危险的切实提醒。在整个铸造过程中，制作者确保黄金尽可能接近100%纯度，使其成为流通中最有价值的钱币之一。

A gleaming gold disc, emblazoned with a highly detailed carved skull. These coins are often crafted from pillaged gold obtained from various sources such as gold coins, jewelry, and gold bars. The weight of the coin itself is heavy, serving as a tangible reminder of the riches and dangers of the high seas. Throughout the minting process, the crafter ensures that the gold is as close to 100% pure as possible, making it one of the most valuable coins in circulation.

Piano.name: Piano
Piano.description:
钢琴是一种键盘乐器，当按下琴键时，会用木槌击打琴弦来产生声音。由于需要高超的工艺，其制作成本相当高昂，涉及经验丰富的木匠、技艺精湛的铁匠以及娴熟的机械师。钢琴在各种音乐流派中扮演着重要角色，既可作为独奏乐器，也是在管弦乐队与合奏团中为上流社会人士服务的重要组成部分。

The piano is a keyboard instrument that generates sound by striking strings with wooden hammers when its keys are pressed. Its production is quite expensive due to the need for skilled craftsmanship, involving experienced carpenters, skilled blacksmiths, and adept machinists. The piano plays a significant role in various musical genres, serving as both a solo instrument and an essential component in orchestras and ensembles for high-class citizens.

Cured Hide.name: 治愈兽皮 Cured Hide
Cured Hide.description:
一种普通的鞣制皮革，皮匠通常以批量出售，通常用于其他行业。铁匠通常用它们制作武器的握柄，而裁缝则用它们制作精致的连衣裙或漂亮的包袋，平民则用它们制作各种用途的皮条。

An regular cured hide that is sold in bulk by the leatherworkers, which is usually used in the other trades. Blacksmiths usually use them for the weapon hilts, while tailors use them for intricate dresses or beautiful bags, and the commoners use them to make leather strips for various uses.

Lyre.name: 里拉琴 Lyre
Lyre.description:
竖琴是最古老的弦乐器之一，其特点是有一个轭架，由两条臂和一根从琴身水平伸出的横梁组成。虽然大多数竖琴是通过拨弦来发声，但也有少数竖琴被设计为用弓拉奏，从而增加了它们在音乐中的多样性。

The lyre is one of the oldest string instruments, characterized by its yoke, which consists of two arms and a crossbar that projects horizontally from the body. While most lyres are plucked to produce sound, rarely, a number of them are designed to be bowed, adding to their versatility in music.

Fae Bon.name: 妖精祝福 Fae Bon
Fae Bon.description:
“这是第一次由一个微小的生物向我展示的。它说话有困难，当他把这些特定的骨头呈给我时，我想他本意是想说‘骨头’，但我现在不确定了。”

妖精骨烛来自生活在地下石质洞穴系统中的生物。它们也可以兼作蜡烛，能发出一些光，尽管很有限。它们可以呈现多种色调的光辉，包括红、蓝、青、绿、紫，甚至粉红。尽管名字与奇幻生物有关，它们并不来自任何类似妖精的生物，而是来自地下的怪物。

"This was first shown to me by a tiny creature. It had difficulty speaking, and when he presented me with these specific bones, I think he meant to say 'bones,' but I am unsure now."

Fae Bons come from creatures that live within underground stone cave systems. They can double as candles, emitting some light, albeit limited. They can glow in multiple hues, including red, blue, cyan, green, purple, or even pink. Despite having a name associated with fantastical creatures, they do not come from any Fae-like creatures but from underground monstrosities.

Gold Key.name: 金钥匙 Gold Key
Gold Key.description:
为了在各地保管箱的持有人心中树立更多信任，一些银行会委托为其保管箱打造黄金钥匙，以此投射出威望与财富的形象。然而，这些所谓的黄金钥匙往往是由黄铁矿制成，这是一种耐久性差得多的材料。随着时代推移并在经常使用下，这些黄铁矿钥匙往往会折断或崩碎，而银行则在削减成本。

To instill additional trust in the owners of safety deposit boxes across the realms, some banks commission keys for their boxes to be crafted from gold, projecting an image of prestige and wealth. However, these so-called gold keys are often fashioned from pyrite, a far less durable material. Over time and with regular use, these pyrite keys tend to snap or crumble, while the banks cutting costs.

Pearl Earrings.name: 珍珠耳环 Pearl Earrings
Pearl Earrings.description:
这些耳环通常是按订单制作的，使用普通与珍稀的珍珠，例如淡水、黑色、白色或银色。委托的费用会因所选用的材料而有极大差异。在某些地区，它们具有仪式用途，由高级神职人员作为其圣礼服的一部分佩戴。

These earrings are typically made to order, using both common and exotic pearls such as freshwater, black, white, or silver. The cost of a commission vary wildly depending on the materials chosen. In some regions, they serve a ceremonial purpose, worn by senior clergy as part of their sacred vestments.

Wild Mint.name: 野生薄荷 Wild Mint
Wild Mint.description:
这些叶子是为一些饮料和甜点作点缀的热门选择。采集者大量种植野薄荷，因为它们也可以制成茶来治疗感冒并帮助消化。 

The leaves are a popular choice to garnish some beverages and desserts. Gatherers farm huge quantities of Wild Mint as they can also be made into teas to treat colds and to aid digestion.

Aspen Log.name: 白杨木原木 Aspen Log
Aspen Log.description:
白杨木呈白色、质软、重量轻且相当坚固，用途多样。主要生长于较寒冷的气候，使其成为分布更广泛的树种之一。其树皮被草药师用于多种药用敷剂，主要因其抗氧化或抗炎特性。

Aspen wood is white, soft, lightweight, and fairly strong and has a multitude of uses. Mainly found in colder climates, making it one of the more widespread trees. Its bark is used in multiple medicinal poultices by herbalists mainly for its antioxidants or anti-inflammatory properties.

Bread Buns.name: 面包卷 Bread Buns
Bread Buns.description:
面包圆面包也被称为面包卷，通常会切开并填入馅料，用来制作各式各样的三明治。大多数地方会把它们作为炖菜或汤的配菜提供。

Bread buns are also referred to as bread rolls, commonly cut and filled to make a wide array of sandwiches. Most places offer them as a side for stews or soups.

Letter From a Loved One.name: 来自挚爱之人的信件 Letter From a Loved One
Letter From a Loved One.description:
亲爱的，

很高兴听到你一切都好，你寄回来的最后一枚硬币，我们终于把厨房茅草屋顶上的那个洞补好了。

最小的孩子终于到了成年年代，可以送去修道院院长那里学习读写，以及如何更高效地做到这一点；可我们的老大，他的眼睛随着时代流逝变得越来越深暗，如今像深海一般，是一种看起来不自然的深蓝色。若你盯得够久，就会看见一些东西……可怕的东西。

我很害怕……你什么时候回来？求你快点回来吧。

爱你的，

你的蒲公英

Hello dear,

We are happy to hear you are doing well, and the last coin you send back we finally we were able to fix the hole we had in the thatch in our kitchen.

The youngest finally came of age to be sent to the abbott to learn to read and write, and how to do so efficently, but our oldest, his eyes are getting darker as time goes, now they are like the deep sea, a deep blue that looks unnatural. If you look long enough you see things... Horrible things.

I am scared... When are you coming back? Please let it be soon.

With love,

Your Dandelion

Dusk Warning.name: 暮色警告 Dusk Warning
Dusk Warning.description:
暮色警告是一款散发着职业气质的优质威士忌，口感顺滑却又鲜明，以泥炭藓的浓郁烟熏味为亮点。每一口都展现出层层风味，带着泥土气息、辛香，以及恰到好处的一丝甜味。它是高雅酒馆中的宠儿，常与糖渍水果或奶油浓汤一同供应。

Dusk Warning is a fine whiskey that exudes class, with a smooth yet pronounced profile highlighted by the rich smokiness of peat moss. Each sip reveals layers of character, earthy, spicy, and just a touch sweet. It's a favorite in refined taverns, often served with glazed fruits or creamy soups.

Cordovan Cut.name: 科多万切割 Cordovan Cut
Cordovan Cut.description:
最精良的皮革工匠裁制品，以山腰上的一座城市命名；那座城市有数位工匠能够以一种方式鞣制皮革，使其洁净无瑕，因此很快便声名远播。虽然这张皮确实来自牛皮，但其鞣制、晾干与加工的成果使它在诸界之间闻名。

The finest leatherworker cut, named after a city from the mountainside, which had several crafters that were able to cure the leather in such a way that it was so pristine that it became renowned quite quickly. While the pelt does come from cowhide, the curing, drying, and processing result made it famous among the realms.

Rutabaga.name: 芜菁 Rutabaga
Rutabaga.description:
芜菁甘蓝常被视为万不得已的食物，与战时的粮食短缺联系在一起。在重大冲突期间，仅用芜菁甘蓝和水煮成的炖菜是一道常见菜肴。芜菁甘蓝的根和叶可作为冬季牲畜饲料的重要饲用作物。

Rutabaga is often seen as a food of last resort, linked to food shortages in wartime. Boiled stew made solely from rutabaga and water is a common dish during major conflicts. Rutabaga roots and tops serve as a valuable forage crop for winter livestock feed.

Liquid Malachite.name: 液态孔雀石 Liquid Malachite
Liquid Malachite.description:
液态孔雀石通常储存在木制容器中。当从其容器中取出并接触金属时，它会迅速扩散、附着并硬化，但只会暂时如此。从历史上看，它主要被尚武的部落社群所使用，因为他们通常不穿护甲，而是使用一种薄的编织金属布。然而，不应低估它的潜力，因为即使与锡结合，液态孔雀石也能将材料的强度和耐久性提升到可与钢相当的等级。

Liquid Malachite is generally stored in a wooden container. When taken out of its container and coming in contact with metal, it quickly spreads, attaches, and hardens, but only temporarily. Historically, it was primarily utilized by militaristic tribal communities, as they didn't typically wear armor but rather used a thin woven metal cloth. However, its potential should not be underestimated, as even when combined with tin, the liquid malachite increases the strength and durability of materials to a level comparable to steel.

Golden Deer.name: 金鹿 Golden Deer
Golden Deer.description:
当森林族人完成他们的德鲁伊仪式圈后，他们会用所创造的贵金属合金来铸造钱币，这些合金包括铂与银，以及金与铜。金与铜的合金被称为 tumbaga，而在更大的城市中，它们通常被称为 Tumbaga 钱币。它们的价值大约相当于金币价值的 25%。它们被称为“Deers”或“Elk”，因为这是这些钱币上最常见的印记。

When the forest folk finishes their druidic circles, a lot of precious metals they create coins from the alloys, from platinum and silver, as well gold and copper. The gold and copper alloy is named tumbaga, and in the bigger cities, they are commonly referred to as Tumbaga coins. They are worth roughly 25% of the gold's value. They are referred to as Deers or Elk, as it is the most common imprint on these coins.

Clover.name: 三叶草 Clover
Clover.description:
三叶草长期以来一直被大多数草药师用作药用草本，据说能帮助缓解从痉挛到哮喘等各种症状。然而，三叶草的主要用途主要是用作牲畜饲料或作为肥料添加。在一些地区，人们相信如果你找到一株四叶三叶草，幸运女神会对你微笑。然而，大多数人会把四叶三叶草误认为是酢浆草。

Clover has long been used as a medicinal herb, by most herbalists, reputed to help everything from cramps to asthma. However, the clover's primary use is mainly used as feed for livestock or added as a fertilizer. In some regions, it is believed that if you find a four-leaf clover, Lady Luck will smile at you. However, most mistake the four-leaf clover with the Wood Sorrel.

Taffeta.name: 塔夫绸 Taffeta
Taffeta.description:
一种由丝绸制成的平纹织物，裁缝师和女裁缝主要将其用于舞会礼服、婚纱和束身衣，但它也用于室内装饰，如窗帘和墙面覆饰。

A plain woven fabric made from silk, dressmakers, and seamstress mainly use it in ball gowns, wedding dresses, and corsets but it is also used in interior decoration as curtains and wall covers.

Snapping Death Worm.name: 猝死巨蠕虫 Snapping Death Worm
Snapping Death Worm.description:
咬断死亡蠕虫，或简称为博比特，是一种地下小生物，主要在海滩上掘洞生活，然而，关于它的每一段回忆都像是一则恐怖故事。它通过感官察觉地表的震动来伏击猎物，猛然向上扑出，用咬合的颚将生物拖入地下。
