Snapping Death Worm, or simply called Bobbit, is an subterranean critter that burrows mostly on beaches, however, every recolection of him resembles a horror story. It senses vibrations on the surface to ambush prey, launching itself upward to drag creatures underground with its snapping jaws.

Pietra Serena.name: 宁静石材 Pietra Serena
Pietra Serena.description:
Pietra Serena 是一种精炼的大理石品种，以其特有的蓝灰色调而闻名。也存在其他色调，包括深蓝和黑色。它深受艺术家推崇，常用于雕塑和建筑装饰，如壁柱、檐部以及装饰性元素。

Pietra Serena is a refined marble variety, known for its characteristic blue-gray tones. Other shades, including deep blue and black, also exist. Highly valued by artists, it is commonly used in sculptures and architectural embellishments such as pilasters, entablatures, and decorative elements.

Essonite.name: 埃索奈特 Essonite
Essonite.description:
钙铝榴石，常被称为“肉桂石”，之所以获得这个绰号，是因为它曾经像这种香料一样，比一块金条还要更有价值。然而，与过去备受推崇的地位相比，它的购买力已经下降了。

Essonite, often known as the "Cinnamon Stone", earned this nickname because, like the spice, it was once more valuable than a bar of gold. However, its purchasing power has diminished compared to its esteemed position in the past.

Whole Poultry.name: 整只家禽 Whole Poultry
Whole Poultry.description:
许多酒馆提供各种各样的酿馅禽类菜肴，既适合特殊活动，也适合想要分享一大盘丰盛餐点的人。这些菜肴通常会搭配烤土豆或绿叶蔬菜等配菜，以满足不同口味。

Many taverns offer a variety of stuffed poultry dishes, ideal for both special events and those seeking to share a hearty platter. These dishes are typically accompanied by sides such as roasted potatoes or greens, catering to diverse tastes.

Timer.name: 计时器 Timer
Timer.description:
通常与爆炸物相关，用于需要多次爆炸同时发生的情况，是一项惊人的工程杰作，无论是用于拆除城门墙还是坚固的矿井墙。计时器是计划好的连锁反应所必需的。然而，它也用于体育赛事中，以清晰指示获胜者。

Usually associated with explosives, for situations where multiple explosions need to happen simultaneously, an amazing piece of engineering, whether for the demolition of a gate wall or a sturdy mine wall. The timer is a necessity for a planned chained reaction. However, it is also used in sporting events to provide a clear indication of a winner.

Hematite.name: 赤铁矿 Hematite
Hematite.description:
它通常与铁矿脉一同被发现。根据其开采时的颜色，它主要用于制作红色和棕色颜料。在少数情况下，它也用于魔法用途，因为人们认为这种宝石与血液和生命力有关。用于治疗技艺和死灵术

It is usually found with iron veins. Depending on its color when mined, it's mainly used to make red and brown pigments. On rare occasions, it is used for magical purposes, as it is assumed that this gem is linked to blood and life force. Used in the healing arts and necromancy

Small Cabbage Sprouts.name: 小卷心菜芽 Small Cabbage Sprouts
Small Cabbage Sprouts.description:
不同地区对小卷心菜芽有各自的称呼，通常基于它们的产地。小餐馆的厨师和当地酒馆的厨子常常会特别费心去寻找这些芽。由于它们相当稀有，用它们做的菜通常要贵得多。一些不错的例子包括混合卷心菜沙拉或焦糖化卷心菜芽。

Different regions have their own names for small cabbage sprouts, usually based on where they are found. Chefs in small restaurants and cooks in local taverns often make a special effort to find these sprouts. Because they are somewhat rare, dishes made with them are typically way more expensive. Some good examples include mixed cabbage salads or caramelized cabbage sprouts.

Shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
Shapeshifter.description:
像我这样的商人会看到初秋时，一箱箱苹果果酱被运来运去，从果园管事那里交易到奶牛场又再交易回来，只为了在屈指可数的几个夜晚里调制出这一种混合物。它很不耐存放，到第二天早晨就会凝结并变酸，这也是为什么没人把它运得太远，也是它得了那个古怪名字的原因之一，但孩子们很喜欢它。

Traders like me see jars of apple jam moving by the crate in early autumn, traded from orchard stewards to dairy farms and back again, all so this one concoction can be made for a handful of nights. It doesn’t hold very well, by following morning it clots and sours, which is why no one ships it far, one of it's reasons that it got its weird name, but kids love it.

Vegetable Box.name: 蔬菜箱 Vegetable Box
Vegetable Box.description:
该箱体用于储存和运输蔬菜和水果。其可堆叠设计使其在运输时非常方便。

The box is designed for storing and transporting vegetables and fruits. Its stackable design makes it quite convenient for easy transport.

Purple Brittlegill.name: 紫色脆鳃菌 Purple Brittlegill
Purple Brittlegill.description:
紫色红菇体型较大，菌盖呈深葡萄紫或紫色，菌褶为白色或乳白色，是一种可食用的蘑菇。草药师建议，由于某些红菇有毒，只食用你能辨认的蘑菇很重要。如果不确定，最好避免食用。

The Purple Brittlegill is large, with a dark vinaceous or purple cap, and white or cream-colored gills, a mushroom that is edible. Herbalists recommend that due to some brittlegills being toxic, it's important to only eat mushrooms that you can recognize. If unsure, better avoid it.

Toy Horse.name: 玩具马 Toy Horse
Toy Horse.description:
这匹玩具马为年幼的孩子带来冒险的感觉，主要由木头制成，并且常常配有木制玩具剑和盾牌。它能激发想象力，是新晋有志冒险者的必备之物。

The toy horse provides a sense of adventure for young children, crafted primarily from wood and often accompanied by wooden toy swords and shields. It sparks the imagination and is a must for the new aspiring adventurers.

Agni Manitite.name: 阿格尼玛尼石 Agni Manitite
Agni Manitite.description:
阿格尼曼尼泰石，在市场上也被称为火焰珍珠，是一种仅在少数岛屿上发现的极其稀有的玻陨石。这些石头源自陨石撞击大型水体后迅速冷却而成。这一独特的形成过程使它们极难被采集。

Agni Manitite, also known on the market as Pearl of Fire, is an extremely rare tektite found on select islands. These stones originated from meteorites that collided with large bodies of water, cooling rapidly. This unique formation process makes them exceedingly difficult to recover.

Malakim's Touch.name: 玛拉基姆的接触 Malakim's Touch
Malakim's Touch.description:
玛拉基姆的接触是一种由多种类型的烈酒混合调制而成的鸡尾酒，性质相当甜美，会诱使饮用者喝得比他们应当喝的更多。结果他们会在第二天早晨发现自己痛苦地呻吟着，乞求诸天与诸狱的怜悯。由于大量使用樱桃与草莓利口酒，它通常呈现红色。

Malakim's Touch is a cocktail made with a blend of multiple types of liquor, quite sweet in nature, it tempts drinkers into having more than they should. Only for them to find themselves the next morning, groaning in pain and begging the heavens and hells for mercy. It usually bears a red color due to the cherry and strawberry liquor that are used in high quantities.

Cold Feet.name: 脚底发凉 Cold Feet
Cold Feet.description:
“冷脚”已成为粗犷平民们夏日里的一种常见主打饮品。这是一种由混合葡萄酒与采集来的香料调制而成的有趣混合物，因能在四肢引发一阵寒意而闻名。尽管它的医疗益处值得怀疑，但几乎没人质疑这饮品的烈度，因为它确实能在带来微醺的同时带来一阵凉风。然而，随后袭来的宿醉也令人印象深刻。

Cold Feet has become a summer staple among the rugged commoners. An interesting concoction of mixed wines and foraged spices, it’s famed for inducing a chilling sensation in the limbs. Though its medical benefits are questionable, few question the strongness of the drink, as it does give a buzz and a cool breeze at the same time. Yet, the hangover that comes after is quite memorable.

Crimson Noble Slab.name: 猩红贵族石板 Crimson Noble Slab
Crimson Noble Slab.description:
这些特定的金条由100%纯金制成，重量约为2.2磅，在很长一段时代里，它们仅被称为贵族金条。随着人们开始更频繁地将这些金条用于不法行径，其名称便从贵族金条改为猩红贵族金条。贵族阶层往往用它们来付款，因为它们没有标注家族印玺，以帮助处理各种形式的纷争，从政变、颠覆到暗杀。这些金条被绝大多数商人广泛接受，他们明白这代表一笔已完成的交易。拒收它们可能会让他们以及所爱之人陷入危险。

These specific slabs are made of 100% pure gold, weighing around 2.2 lbs, and for the longest time, they were simply known as Noble Gold Slabs. As people started using the slabs more frequently for nefarious deeds, they changed the name from Noble Gold Slabs to Crimson Noble Slabs. Nobility tends to use these for payment, as they are not marked with their family seals, to help sort out any forms of rivalry, from coups, and subversions to assassinations. These slabs are widely accepted by the majority merchants, who understand that they represent a completed transaction. Refusing them could potentially put them and their loved ones in danger.

Fox Hide.name: 狐皮 Fox Hide
Fox Hide.description:
这种兽皮在森林地区相当常见，通常会被鞣制或出售，用于制作服装、配饰或手工艺品；其中红狐、银狐和北极狐等品种因其厚实柔软的毛皮而备受珍视，可用于制作外套、帽子、手套或靴子。通常由平民或贵族在有些闲暇用于娱乐的时代带给皮革工匠，或由专门的猎人送来。

Being quite common in the forested areas, the hide is usually tanned or sold for making clothing, accessories, or crafts, with varieties like red, silver, and arctic fox prized for their thick, soft fur used in coats, hats, gloves, or boots. This is usually brought to the leatherworkers by either commoners or nobles, while having some time for recreation, or by dedicated hunters.

Truffle.name: 松露 Truffle
Truffle.description:
松露是一种地下生长的蘑菇，通常借助嗅觉灵敏的猪来寻找。由于其高昂的价格与浓郁的香气，松露在美食烹饪中通常会少量使用。市面上可购买到未掺杂的新鲜松露，或经过保存处理的松露，通常以清淡的盐水腌渍。由于其易挥发的香气在加热时会迅速散失，松露一般生吃，并刨成薄片撒在温热、朴素的菜肴上，以凸显其独特风味。

The truffle is a subterranean mushroom, they are often located with the help of hogs possessing a refined sense of smell. Due to their high price and strong aroma, truffles are used sparingly in gourmet cooking. Supplies are available commercially as unadulterated fresh produce or preserved, typically in a light brine. Since their volatile aromas dissipate quickly when heated, truffles are generally served raw and shaved over warm, simple dishes to highlight their unique flavor.

Pyrope.name: 镁铝榴石 Pyrope
Pyrope.description:
镁铝榴石是一种以其精致美丽而闻名的石榴石，同时也具有军事意义。人们相信，用这种石榴石装饰武器能在奥术力量的协助下刺穿最厚的皮革或摧毁最坚固的门。

Pyrope, a type of garnet known for its exquisite beauty, also holds military significance. It is believed that adorning weaponry with this garnet allows it to penetrate the thickest hides or demolish the strongest doors, aided by arcane forces.

Hurdy-Gurdy.name: 手摇风琴 Hurdy-Gurdy
Hurdy-Gurdy.description:
手摇风琴是一种弦乐器，通过手摇曲柄带动一个涂有松香的圆形轮子旋转，使其摩擦琴弦来发声。旋律由键盘演奏，键盘按下切音器顶住一根或多根琴弦以改变其音高。这种独特的机制使得在演奏音符时能够持续发出旋律，赋予该乐器其标志性的音色。

The hurdy-gurdy is a string instrument that creates sound by using a hand-crank-turned, round rosined wheel that rubs against the strings. Melodies are produced on a keyboard, that presses tangents against one or more strings to alter their pitch. This unique mechanism allows for a continuous melody while notes are played, giving the instrument its characteristic sound.

Coffee Beans.name: 咖啡豆 Coffee Beans
Coffee Beans.description:
烘焙后，豆子可以被研磨成细粉，并冲煮成一种浓烈芳香的饮品。饮用后，它能让你撑过漫长的夜晚，或在清晨最早的时候为你提供能量提升。 

After roasting, the beans can be grounded into a fine powder and brewed into a strong aromatic drink. When consumed it lets you power through long nights, or provides you a boost of energy in the earliest of mornings.

Retama.name: 瑞塔玛 Retama
Retama.description:
瑞塔玛通常是一种不会被采伐取木材的树，然而，它的叶子和种子荚对大多数食草动物来说是极好的食物。草药师会用瑞塔玛树的叶子和幼枝制成茶，用于治疗疼痛、发烧或感染。 

Retama is usually a tree that is not harvested for its wood, however, the leaves and the seed pods make excellent food for most grazing animals. Herbalists make from the leaves and young branches of the Retama tree teas to treat pain, fevers, or infections.

Lifeline.name: 生命线 Lifeline
Lifeline.description:
生命线戒指是由最隐居的地下族群打造的戒指，通常成对制作，不过更大套装也并非闻所未闻。其用途是与朋友或家人保持联系。它主要由铁或钢锻造而成，内侧的铭文刻有挚爱之人的名字。在奥术知识的帮助下，戒指会与其他戒指形成连接。当文字发光时，便表示那位亲近的家人或朋友仍然活着。

Lifeline is a ring crafted by the most secluded underground folk, usually made in pairs, though larger sets are not unheard of. Its purpose is to keep in contact with friends or family. Primarily forged from iron or steel, the inscription on the inside contains the names of loved ones. With the aid of arcane knowledge, the ring forms a link to the others. When the text glows, it signals that the close family member or friend is still alive.

Seeds - Sunflower.name: 种子 - 向日葵 Seeds - Sunflower
Seeds - Sunflower.description:
葵花籽是来自向日葵植物的小而坚硬的种子。它们常被烘烤后作为零食食用，或用于生产油和其他产品。

Sunflower seeds are small, hard seeds that come from the sunflower plant. They are often roasted and eaten as a snack or used to produce oil and other products.

Mistletoe.name: 槲寄生 Mistletoe
Mistletoe.description:
槲寄生在文化上被称为“接吻植物”，既因为它的生长方式，也因为它与一些冬季节日有关。槲寄生象征浪漫、生育力与生命力。它们附着在寄主树木或灌木上生长，并通过寄主植物汲取水分与养分。世界各地的草药师都会使用它来治疗血液方面的症状，例如关节炎，或用于那些在家中有夫妻房事问题的人。

Mistletoe is culturally referred to as the kissing plant, for the way it grows as well as being associated with some winter holidays. Mistletoe represents romance, fertility, and vitality. They grow attached to their host tree or shrub through which they extract water and nutrients from the host plant. Used by herbalists everywhere, for blood conditions, such as arthritis, or for those who have conjugal issues in their homes.

Utility Acid.name: 实用 酸液 Utility Acid
Utility Acid.description:
一种常见的强酸，强到足以腐蚀铁和青铜，但还不足以溶解更坚硬的金属。它通常是锁匠的必备品，因为它对大多数类型的锁都相当有效，而且从长远来看往往能省下一些钱，毕竟普通的铁钳在反复使用后会受损。

A regular strong acid, strong enough to corrode iron and bronze, however, not strong enough to dissolve stronger metals. It is usually a must-have for a locksmith, as it is quite efficient against most forms of locks and tends to save some money in the long term, given how regular iron pliers get damaged with repeated use.

Chrysocolla.name: 硅孔雀石 Chrysocolla
Chrysocolla.description:
硅孔雀石比绿松石更容易获得，拥有鲜艳的蓝色与蓝绿色，自古以来便因适用于雕刻与装饰用途而广受欢迎。由于易于塑形并便于与金属加工，它常在银器与金器制作中作为绿松石的多用途替代品。

Chrysocolla, more readily available than turquoise, boasts vivid blue and blue-green colors that have made it popular for carvings and ornamental purposes since ancient times. It is frequently used in silversmithing and goldsmithing as a versatile substitute for turquoise, thanks to its ease of shaping and working with metals.

Gong.name: 龚 Gong
Gong.description:
锣是一种扁平的圆形金属圆盘，通常用槌敲击。它由青铜、黄铜或铁制成，并悬挂在支架上。锣的体型各不相同，从小到大不等，可以是预先调音的，也可以需要手动调音。作为一种乐器，锣有多种用途，从歌剧演出到在各种场合用作信号装置，例如在斗殴或赛跑等活动中，甚至可作为警报。

The gong is a flat, circular metal disc typically struck with a mallet. It is prudced out of bronze, brass, or iron and is suspended on a stand. Gongs do vary in size, from small to large, and can either be pre-tuned or require manual tuning. As an instrument, the gong has multiple uses, ranging from opera performances to serving as a signal device in various settings, such as for events like fights or races, or even as alarms.

Ale.name: 艾尔 Ale
Ale.description:
一种与啤酒相似但不含啤酒花的饮料，艾尔酒含有类似的原料。由于艾尔酒的高消费量，酿酒师这一职业备受追捧。一些贵族家族每天购买并饮用近90加仑的艾尔酒，更不用说当地酒馆和旅店的需求了。

A beverage similar to beer but without hops, ale contains similar ingredients. The profession of brewster is highly sought after due to the high consumption of ale. Some noble houses purchase and consume nearly 90 gallons of ale daily, not to mention the demand from local taverns and inns.

Red Revenant's Refresher.name: 赤红亡灵的提神剂 Red Revenant's Refresher
Red Revenant's Refresher.description:
这种独特混合饮品的基础配方几乎与传统的康波特配方完全相同，但有一项主要原料的变化使其与众不同。它不用水，而是以生物的血液作为替代品。这是为了给夜之生灵提供一些口味上的变化。血液取自各种生物，从小型啮齿动物到大型野兽不等，取决于所需的风味。然而，由于其主要原料的禁忌性质，它通常在秘密且谨慎的情况下制作与饮用。

The base recipe for this unique concoction is almost identical to the traditional Kompot recipe, with one major ingredient change that sets it apart. Instead of water, the sanguine fluid of creatures is used as a replacement. This is to provide some variation in taste for the night beings. The sanguine fluid is harvested from various creatures, ranging from small rodents to large beasts, depending on the desired flavor. However, due to the taboo nature of its primary ingredient, it is often created and consumed in secrecy and with caution.

Lobster.name: 龙虾 Lobster
Lobster.description:
龙虾生活在所有海洋中，栖息于从海岸线到深海的岩石、沙质或泥质海底。龙虾和一些蜗牛与蜘蛛一样拥有蓝色血液，炼金术士会提取这些血液，用于对抗一些更常见的疾病，并治疗被烧伤损坏的皮肤。

Lobsters live in all oceans, on rocky, sandy, or muddy bottoms from the shoreline to the deep sea. Lobsters, like some snails and spiders, have blue blood, which alchemists extract for use against some of the more common illnesses and to heal skin damaged by burns.

Rhodizite.name: 罗多泽石 Rhodizite
Rhodizite.description:
这种宝石外观半透明，颜色从浅黄色到绿色不等，通常以细小、破碎的晶体形式被发现。由于其解理性有限，它主要用于雕刻而非刻面。宝石切割师将精力集中在那些可以加工成刻面宝石的晶体上。

This precious stone, with its translucent appearance ranging from pale yellow to green, was commonly found in small, fragmented crystals. Due to its limited cleavage, it was primarily utilized for carving rather than faceting. Gem cutters focused their efforts on crystals that could be fashioned into faceted gems.

Oyster.name: 牡蛎 Oyster
Oyster.description:
它们通常被采集作为食物以及为了它们稀有的珍珠。法师偶尔会把它们的贝壳用作魔法材料，然而，它被用于哪种法术一直被保密。在很久以前，曾有传闻说也存在稀有的绿色翡翠牡蛎，不过，最近没有人见过。某些酒馆会根据地区把牡蛎作为珍馐提供。

They are usually harvested for food and for their rare pearls. Wizards on occasion use their shells as magical components, however, the spell it is used for has been kept a secret. In times long past, there was word that rare green emerald oysters had existed as well, however, no one has seen one lately. Some Taverns offer Oysters as a delicacy depending on the region.

Mussel.name: 贻贝 Mussel
Mussel.description:
在大多数地区，贻贝被认为是一种美味佳肴，通常从淡水与咸水水域中采收，主要在寒冷的季节进行，因为那时它们最为肥美。它们被用于各式各样的食谱之中，其中最著名的之一便是海滩边的西班牙海鲜饭。

Mussels are considered a delicacy in most regions, and they tend to be harvested from both freshwater and saltwater sources, primarily during the cold seasons, as they are at their prime at that time. They end up in a plethora of recipes, one of the most famous being beachside paella.

Granite.name: 花岗岩 Granite
Granite.description:
花岗岩是一种常见的岩石，具有多种颜色，例如白色、深灰色和棕色。由于其颜色范围广，它经常被切割成各种形状，用于墓碑、纪念碑和铺路。其耐久性以及较低的维护需求，使其成为这些用途的合适选择。

Granite is a common rock that comes in various colors, such as white, dark-gray, and brown. Because of its range of colors, it's often cut into shapes for gravestones, memorials, and pavement. Its durability and low maintenance needs make it a suitable choice for these uses.

Hand Saw.name: 手锯 Hand Saw
Hand Saw.description:
手锯用途广泛，是进行诸如粗略切割木材和原木，以及在木材上进行精细的曲线切割等任务的首选工具。无论是在专业行业中使用，还是平民在家中或花园里进行项目时使用，它们都被证明是不可或缺的工具。

With a wide range of applications, hand saws are the go-to tools for tasks like roughly cutting wood and logs, as well as making intricate curved cuts in wood. Whether used in professional trades or by the commoner for projects at home or in the garden, they prove to be indispensable tools.

Fat Candle.name: 肥蜡烛 Fat Candle
Fat Candle.description:
脂肪蜡烛由熬炼的动物脂肪制成，例如鲸脂或羊和牛的牛脂。尽管蜂蜡蜡烛更耐烧，但这些蜡烛燃烧更明亮且价格显著更低。缺点是它们在燃烧时会散发令人不快的恶臭。

Fat candles are crafted from rendered animal fat, such as whale blubber or tallow from sheep and cows. Although beeswax candles last longer, these candles burn more brightly and cost significantly less. The downside is that they release an unpleasant foul odor while burning.

Fried Dumplings.name: 煎饺 Fried Dumplings
Fried Dumplings.description:
饺子是一种受欢迎的菜肴，由面粉和鸡蛋制成，内馅可填入肉类、水果、米饭或这些的组合。烘焙坊每天早晨都会准备大量饺子，为前往田间劳作的工人或休息片刻的平民提供一顿快捷而饱腹的餐食。

Dumplings are a popular dish made from flour and egg, and filled with meat, fruit, rice, or a combination of these. Bakeries prepare large quantities of dumplings each morning, providing a quick and filling meal for workers heading to the fields or for commoners taking a break.

Lemongrass.name: 柠檬草 Lemongrass
Lemongrass.description:
柠檬草主要用作药用草药和香水的制作原料，但它也有许多烹饪用途。其柑橘风味与鱼类及大多数海鲜菜肴相得益彰。柠檬草也常用于汤品、腌料、沙拉以及蔬菜腌渍。

Lemongrass is primarily used as a medicinal herb and in the production of perfumes, but it also has many culinary applications. Its citrusy flavor complements fish and most seafood dishes perfectly. Lemongrass is also commonly used in soups, marinades, salads, and vegetable pickling.

Pumpkin.name: 南瓜 Pumpkin
Pumpkin.description:
它被认为是最具节庆气息的蔬菜之一。南瓜被用于大多数节庆活动，用于南瓜雕刻、装饰，或是南瓜投掷（pumpkin chunking），在这种活动中，队伍会借助投石机、配重投石机或弩炮，尝试将南瓜尽可能投得更远，这些器械在这类游戏中很常见。南瓜有时也与当地传说相关，其中南瓜被用来代替生物的头。酒馆会保存南瓜籽并将其烤制，作为零食提供给客人；而在南瓜果肉的帮助下，还能制作出最美味的派之一，不过这可能需要慢慢培养口味。

It is assumed to be one of the most festive vegetables out there. Pumpkins are used in most festival events for Pumpkin carving, decorations or pumpkin chunking in which teams attempt to throw pumpkins as far as possible with the help of catapults, trebuchets or ballistas are often common in these games. Pumpkins sometimes are also associated with local legends where the pumpkin is a stand-in for a creature's head. Taverns keep the seeds and roast them to provide to their guests as a snack, and with the help of the pulp, one of the most delicious forms of pie is created, however, it can be an acquired taste.

Chocolate.name: 巧克力 Chocolate
Chocolate.description:
巧克力有许多形状、大小和风味。它是一种主要由可可豆、糖和牛奶制成的经典甜食。也是许多甜点（如布丁、蛋糕和糖果）中使用的重要原料。它既可以像巧克力棒那样以固体形式存在，也可以像热巧克力那样以液体形式存在，以满足各种需求和口味。

Chocolate comes in many shapes, sizes, and tastes. It is a staple sweet primarily made from cocoa beans, sugar, and milk. A major ingredient used in many desserts such as pudding, cakes, and candy. It can be in a solid form like a candy bar or in a liquid form like hot chocolate, to fit various needs and tastes.

Kinnor.name: 金诺尔 Kinnor
Kinnor.description:
琴诺尔在外形上类似里拉琴，但通常从一端握持，并像鲁特琴一样拨弦。不同于里拉琴常见的指弹，琴诺尔使用金属杆作为拨片，从而能够产生延长的音符和独特的音色。

The kinnor resembles the lyre in shape, but it is typically held from the end and strummed like a lute. Unlike the lyre, where fingerpicking is common, the kinnor uses a metal rod as a pick, allowing for the production of prolonged notes and a distinct sound.

Wolf Jaw Tongs.name: 狼颚夹钳 Wolf Jaw Tongs
Wolf Jaw Tongs.description:
被认为是适用于不同尺寸通用工作的最通用夹钳，狼颚夹钳的上部拥有光滑、狭窄的钳口，内侧沿其长度有一条V形缺口。这使它们成为任何铁匠工具腰带中最不可或缺的工具之一。

Considered the most universal tongs for general work of varying sizes, wolf jaw tongs feature smooth, narrow jaws on top with a V-notch on the inside running its length. This makes them one of the most essential tools in the tool belt of any blacksmith.

Ghast.name: Ghast
Ghast.description:
Ghast作为一种饮品具有文化意义，其灵感源自当地民间传说与幽灵（特征）故事。它不仅仅是一种饮料，也是一种讲故事的媒介，将人们与夜里低语的诡异传闻连接起来。其独特的色泽来自炼金术士的协助，他们加入了蝶豆花，这种花会随酸度变化而变色。这种饮品本身用途十分多样：既可单独饮用，也可作为鸡尾酒基底使用，或作为收藏物品保存。

Ghast holds cultural significance as a beverage that draws inspiration from local folklore and ghost stories. It serves not only as a drink but also as a storytelling device, connecting people to the eerie tales whispered during the night. The unique coloring comes from the help of alchemists which add butterfly pea flower that shifts color in acidity. The drink itself is quite versatile as it can be drunk standalone, used as a cocktail base, or kept as a collector's item.

Clinozoisite.name: 斜黝帘石 Clinozoisite
Clinozoisite.description:
斜黝帘石，被称为蜜酒石，据说能保护佩戴者免受酒精中毒。然而，由于围绕其据称能够防止此类事件的不同信念，它也被称为“断片石”。

Clinozoisite, known as the Meadstone, is reputed to shield wearers from alcohol poisoning. However, it is also referred to as the 'Blackout stone' due to differing beliefs surrounding its supposed ability to prevent such incidents.

Beans.name: 豆子 Beans
Beans.description:
它们有各种颜色；从绿色到红色，从黑色到白色。平民和酒馆老板都偏爱它们，因为煮熟后相当饱腹，而且与其他蔬菜相比，种植它们并没有那么费力。

They come in all colors; from green to red, to black to white, preferred by commoners and tavern keeps as they are quite filling when cooked, as well as, the fact that farming them is not as demanding as other vegetables.

Teak Plank.name: 柚木木板 Teak Plank
Teak Plank.description:
由于柚木耐腐烂与腐朽，也能抵御昆虫及其他害虫，因此它是户外应用的热门选择，例如甲板、露台和围栏。柚木也可用于建造船舶及其他水上交通工具，因为它能抵抗水致伤害和翘曲。

Because Teak wood is resistant to rot and decay, as well as insects and other pests, it is a popular choice for outdoor applications, such as decks, patios, and fencing. Teak can also be used in the construction of ships and other watercraft, as it is resistant to water damage and warping.

Lettuce.name: 生菜 Lettuce
Lettuce.description:
生菜最常用于沙拉，尽管它也会出现在其他种类的食物中，例如汤和三明治。

Lettuce is most often used for salads, although it is also found in other kinds of food, such as soups and sandwiches.

Sandalwood Oil.name: 檀香油 Sandalwood Oil
Sandalwood Oil.description:
从檀香树采集而来，主要被草药师用来制作敷药，主要用于皮肤刺激和疾病；然而，这种油也可以用于烹饪，为大多数食谱增添淡淡的檀香风味。 

Harvested from the Sandalwood tree it is mainly used by herbalists to create poultices, mainly for skin irritation and diseases, however, the oil can be also used in cooking to add a mild sandalwood flavor to most recipes.

Coral.name: 珊瑚 Coral
Coral.description:
珊瑚粉末曾是制作治疗药水时非常抢手的成分，因为它能保证这些治疗药剂具有更高的最低效力。目前仅用于制作稀有的红色染料。 

Powdered Coral was a very desirable ingredient in creating potions of healing because it guaranteed greater minimum effectiveness for those healing droughts. Currently used only to create rare red dye.

Coffee.name: 咖啡 Coffee
Coffee.description:
咖啡，一种广受欢迎的热饮，主要在清晨由酒馆供应，为平民提供迎接一天所需的急需能量提振。制作过程包括将咖啡豆研磨成细粉，然后与水一同加入水壶中。一旦混合物开始起泡并沸腾，便可端上，通常会搭配额外的糖或牛奶。

Coffee, a popular hot beverage, is primarily served by taverns in the early mornings, offering commoners a much needed energy boost for the day ahead. The process involves grinding coffee beans into a fine powder, which is then added to a kettle with water. Once the mixture begins to foam and boil, it is served, often accompanied by additional sugar or milk.

Evernight.name: 永夜 Evernight
Evernight.description:
永夜被视为收藏家的佳酿，部分原因在于其神秘的行为。据说饮用后，另一瓶会出现在诸界中某个随机的架子上，夹在其他饮品之间。纵观岁月，炼金术士、草药师、酿造师与酿造师都曾试图复刻它，但都未获成功。其独特的性质与未知的成分使其真正价值连城。一则经久不衰的传闻声称，当它与晨风和纯日结合时，能赐予不朽。然而，由于其消失无踪的特性，从未有人成功将这三者合而为一调成混合物。

Evernight is considered a collector's brew, due in part to its mysterious behavior. When drunk, another bottle is said to appear on a random shelf, anywhere in the realms, among other drinks. Over the ages, alchemists, herbalists, brewers, and brewers have all tried to recreate it, but with no success. Its unique properties and unknown ingredients have rendered it truly priceless. One persistent rumor claims that when combined with Morning Breeze and Pure Day, it grants immortality. However, due to its vanishing nature, no one has ever managed to unite the three into a mixture.

Harunite.name: 哈鲁尼特 Harunite
Harunite.description:
汉堡石通常为无色或淡蓝色。尽管被归类为半宝石，但它更因其在照明方面的应用而更受重视。它常用于灯具中，以增强蜡烛和其他光源的亮度，无论这些光源是常规的还是通过奥术手段产生的。

Hambergite is typically colorless or faintly blue. Despite being categorized as a semi-precious gem, it is more valued for its applications in lighting. It is commonly used in lamps to enhance the brightness of candles and other light sources, whether they are conventional or by arcane means.

Button Mushroom.name: 纽扣蘑菇 Button Mushroom
Button Mushroom.description:
一种在森林中很容易找到的蘑菇，因为它们清晰的白色或独特的棕色。它们有时也被称为栗子蘑菇，因为其颜色与栗树相匹配。它主要用于各种烹饪菜肴，包括炖菜、沙拉、汤以及许多其他菜品。

A type of mushroom that can be found easily in the forest, due to their clear white color, or distinctive brown. They are also sometimes referred to as the chestnut mushrooms, due to their coloring matching the chestnut trees. It is mainly used for a wide range of culinary dishes, ranging from, stews, salads, soups, and many others.

Leather Scales.name: 皮革鳞甲 Leather Scales
Leather Scales.description:
皮革工匠通常专门为皮革鳞甲或马用鞍甲制作这些，用来承受并消散最沉重的打击。然而，这个制作过程相当繁琐，而那些倒霉、技艺不精的新雇员会被指派大量制作这些，以磨练精确裁切皮革的工艺流程。

Leatherworkers usually make these specifically for leather scale armor or for equine saddle armors, made to take and dissipate the heaviest of blows. However, the process is quite tedious to make, and the unlucky, unskilled new hires get tasked to make these in huge quantities to hone the process of cutting leather accurately.

Orchid Bream.name: 兰花鲷 Orchid Bream
Orchid Bream.description:
兰花鲂是一种青铜色的鱼，带有紫色鳞片，常成大群聚集于低地池塘、湖泊以及水流缓慢的河流中。尽管资深厨师将其视为备受推崇的食用鱼，野外捕获量仍相对有限，因为其余的普通民众对它并不太熟悉，也不清楚如何最好地烹制。

Orchid Bream is a bronze-colored fish, with purple scales, found gathering in large shoals in lowland ponds, lakes, and slow-flowing rivers. While considered an esteemed food fish by experienced chefs, wild catches remain relatively modest, as the rest of the common folk are not very familiar with it or how best to prepare it.

Left Behind Note.name: 遗留的便条 Left Behind Note
Left Behind Note.description:
我和队伍都认为来这里是个好主意。现在，我被困在这个房间里，而且我不知道门外有什么在等着我——只知道门有很多。

如果有人发现了这个，请让我的家人知道我还活着，尽管我将远行。可能要过一段时代我才能再次触及他们。

若命运不眷顾我，就把这当作我最后的心愿吧。

希望你的运气比我更好。

风落的厄恩

Me and the party thought coming here was a good idea. Now, I’m stuck in this room, and I don’t know what awaits me beyond the door - only that there are many.

If anyone finds this, please let my family know that I am alive, though I’ll be traveling far away. It may be some time before I can reach them again.

Consider this my final wish, should fate not favor me.

I hope your luck is better than my own.

Erne of Windfall

Slate.name: 石板 Slate
Slate.description:
“板岩没有得到它应有的喜爱。大多数书写板都是用它做的，而且如果切成形状并制成屋顶瓦片，它也相当耐用”

板岩有很多种颜色，从不同深浅的灰色到绿色再到紫色，甚至根据其开采地点不同还会有青色。它主要用于书写泥板和屋顶覆盖。

"Slate doesn't get the love it deserves. Most writing boards are made out of it, also, it is quite resistant if cut into shapes and made into shingles"

Slate comes in many colors, from shades of gray to green to purple, even cyan depending on where it was harvested. It's mainly used in writing tablets and roofing.

Onyx.name: 缟玛瑙 Onyx
Onyx.description:
如果你未附魔就佩戴这块宝石，幸运女神必定会对你皱眉。一块重要的阴刻宝石，用作珠宝的一部分，以封缄官方文件。

If you wear this stone unenchanted, Lady Luck is bound to frown upon you. An important intaglio stone, used as part of jewelry to seal official documents.

Idicolite.name: 伊迪科莱特 Idicolite
Idicolite.description:
这种宝石常被误认为蓝宝石，但实际上是电气石的一种变种。尽管一些不法商人试图将其冒充为更昂贵的蓝宝石，但对受过训练的人来说，它可辨识、略微不那么鲜艳的颜色就是明显的破绽。

Often mistaken for sapphire, this gemstone is actually a variant of tourmaline. Despite attempts by unscrupulous merchants to pass it off as the more valuable sapphire, its discernible, slightly less vibrant color serves as a telltale sign to those with a trained eye.

Blackberries.name: 黑莓 Blackberries
Blackberries.description:
它通常是一种用于制作甜点、葡萄酒，甚至利口酒的常见喜爱水果。在药用方面，草药师常用它来减少出血，或作为化妆品使皮肤不那么油腻。 

It is usually a favorite fruit for making desserts, wines, and even liqueurs. Medicinally it is often used by herbalists to reduce bleeding, or as a cosmetic to make the skin less oily.

Horn.name: 号角 Horn
Horn.description:
号角通常被视为小号和短号的前身。虽然它主要由黄铜制成，但也有用骨头制作的变体，尤其在偏远、寒冷或多山的地区更受青睐。它们可用于音乐、战斗号令或警报。

The horn is often regarded as the predecessor to both the trumpet and the cornet. While it is primarily made from brass, there are also variants crafted from bone, which are particularly favored in remote, cold, or mountainous regions. They can be used for music, drive for battles, or alarms.

Amber.name: 琥珀 Amber
Amber.description:
石化的松树树脂，可以打磨并用于装饰用途，例如制作珠宝珠子。炼金术士对琥珀的需求很高，因为它可以困住被遗忘的小生物。

Fossilized pine resin, can be polished and used for ornamental purposes such as jewelry beads. There a is high demand for amber by alchemists as it can trap small forgotten creatures.

Azurite.name: 天蓝石 Azurite
Azurite.description:
蓝铜矿是一种非常受欢迎的矿物，呈天蓝色，通常被切割成珠子或装饰品。由于其对火的抗力，大多数时代它被铁匠用作幸运护符，以避免在工作时受伤。

Azurite is a very popular mineral in an azure-blue color and is usually cut into beads or ornamental objects. Due to its resistance to fire, most of the time it is used by blacksmiths as a lucky charm to avoid injury while working.

Dumplings.name: 饺子 Dumplings
Dumplings.description:
饺子通常是将面粉或粗粉与鸡蛋混合，然后将混合物在水中慢炖，直到达到轻盈、松软的蛋糕状口感。为了增添风味，一些食谱会在烹饪前加入各种配料，例如香草、洋葱、磨碎的奶酪，或与面团混合的切碎肉类。

Dumplings are commonly made by combining flour or meal with egg and then simmering the mixture in water until it reaches a light, cakey texture. To add flavor, some recipes, add various ingredients such as herbs, onions, grated cheese, or chopped meat mixed with the dough before cooking.

Nails.name: 钉子 Nails
Nails.description:
钉子通常由青铜或铁制成，主要用作建筑中的紧固件，从小型屋顶钉到大型铁钉皆有。它们也偶尔会由铜或钢制成，尤其是在耐腐蚀性是关键因素的环境中，例如沿海或河岸地区。

Nails are commonly made out of bronze or iron, and are mainly used as fasteners in construction, from small roofing nails to large iron spikes. They are also occasionally made out of copper or steel, particularly in environments where corrosion resistance is a key factor, such as coastal or riverside areas.

Watchful Gaze.name: 警觉凝视 Watchful Gaze
Watchful Gaze.description:
警惕凝视是一种鸡尾酒，加入了甜化明胶并塑形成眼睛的样子。它主要由冷却的伏特加构成，不过明胶中的糖分以及明胶所析出的脂肪确实赋予了它一种特定且相当有名的味道。尽管外观诡异，这种鸡尾酒制作简单，而且由于配料清单极为精简，价格也相对便宜。

Watchful Gaze is a cocktail with sweetened gelatin shaped to resemble an eye. It is primarily cooled vodka, however, the sugar from the gelatin and the rendered fat from the gelatin, it does provide a specific, quite famous, taste. Despite its eerie aesthetic, the cocktail is simple to make and relatively cheap, due to its minimal ingredient list.

Tungsten Rod.name: 钨棒 Tungsten Rod
Tungsten Rod.description:
钨，有时也被称为“Wolfram”，是用于任何形式工艺制作中最重的金属之一。由于其沉重的特性以及难以塑形，它主要用于与较软的金属（如铼或铝）进行合金化，以提升它们的耐久性和使用寿命。钨的另一种用途是用于制造战斗攻城槌，其名称也由此而来。

Tungsten, sometimes referred to as "Wolfram", is one of the heaviest metals used in any form of crafting. Due to its heavy nature and tough molding, it is primarily used in alloying with softer metals, such as Rhenium or Aluminum all to enhance their durability and shelf life. Another use of tungsten is in the creation of combat battering rams, from which it derives its name.

Duck.name: 鸭子 Duck
Duck.description:
鸭主要是为其肉而饲养的，同时也能产出价值更高的鸭蛋，因为它们非常有营养。与普通母鸡相比，平民往往会把它们在家里养更长时间，因为鸭子不需要复杂的棚舍，抗病能力强，并且能高效清除蜗牛或蛞蝓等小型害虫。

Primarily raised for their meat, ducks also yield eggs of higher value as they are quite nutritious. Commoners often keep them around the house for an extended period compared to regular hens, as ducks don't need elaborate housing, resistant to diseases, and efficiently remove small pests like snails or slugs.

Satin Spar.name: 缎带练习 Satin Spar
Satin Spar.description:
缎光石膏是一种纤维状的石膏变种，以其珍珠般的光泽、闪耀的亮光和丝滑的质地而著称。奔赴战场的战士常常佩戴这些石头，相信它们的光泽能够致盲远处的弓箭手，并保护他们免受投射物的伤害。

Satin Spar, a fibrous variety of gypsum, is distinguished by its pearly luster, sparkling sheen, and silky texture. Warriors heading into battle frequently wear these stones, believing their luster can blind far-away archers and shield them from projectiles.

Danburite.name: 丹布石 Danburite
Danburite.description:
丹布拉石是一种透明至半透明的宝石，颜色从无色到浅黄色，或从淡粉色到浅棕色不等。根据其获得的文化或地区不同，人们相信它具有治疗特性；然而，无论是草药师还是任何宗教人士都无法证实这一点。

Danburite is a transparent to translucent gem that ranges from colorless to light yellow, or pale pink to light brown in color. Depending on the culture or region it is acquired from, it is believed to have healing properties; however, herbalists nor any of the religious folk can confirm it.

Star Anise.name: 八角 Star Anise
Star Anise.description:
八角不仅因其风味而备受珍视，还因其药用与芳香特性而闻名，可帮助患有心脏疾病的人。在烹饪中，整颗果荚会逐渐释放风味，使其成为慢炖菜肴的理想选择；而研磨后的八角则是诸如五香粉等香料混合物的主要成分之一，为菜肴带来甜中带辣的味道。

The Star Anise is not only valued for its flavor but also for its medicinal and aromatic properties, helping with those with heart conditions. In cooking, the whole pods release their flavor gradually, making them ideal for slow-cooked dishes, while ground star anise is a main ingredient in spice mixtures such as the five-spice powder, giving dishes a sweet and spicy taste.

Hyacinth.name: 风信子 Hyacinth
Hyacinth.description:
风信子石（也称为 Jacinth 或 Flamegem，取决于其发现地点）是一种稀有宝石，因其鲜艳、炽烈的橙色而备受珍视。它以其与蓝宝石和红宝石相近的硬度和耐久性而闻名，其对火焰的独特亲和力使其在奥术仪式与应用中具有重要意义。

Hyacinth, alternatively called Jacinth or Flamegem depending on where it's found, is a rare gem prized for its vibrant, fiery orange color. Known for its hardness and durability akin to sapphire and ruby, its unique affinity for fire lends its significance to arcane rituals and applications.

Cabbage.name: 卷心菜 Cabbage
Cabbage.description:
作为大多数沙拉和炖菜的主要食材，它通常需求量很高，旅店和酒馆常为其顾客的晚餐而大量采购。大多数家庭农场都会种上几棵卷心菜，而且它也很常见地用盐腌制保存，以酸菜的形式在冬季食用。

The main ingredient in most salads and stews, it is usually, in high demand by inns and taverns for the dinners of their patrons. Most home farms have a few cabbage heads planted around, and it's very commonly preserved in salt for use over the winter in the form of sauerkraut.

Diasper.name: 戴亚斯珀 Diasper
Diasper.description:
一种主要由亚麻制成的布料，有时为棉，或两者的混合物。主要用作桌布；然而，由于这种织物的吸水性，也用于包裹新生儿，在这种情况下被称为尿布。 

A cloth created mostly with linen, sometimes cotton, or a combination of both. Mainly used as a table cloth, however, due to the absorbent nature of the fabric, it is also used in covering newborns, and in that case it is referred to as a diaper.

Ledger.name: 账本 Ledger
Ledger.description:
商行会使用特定的账簿来追踪采购或销售，或用来存储信息。根据店铺的不同，它也可能包含额外的信息，例如顾客、商人、商路，或最深的洞窟位于何处。探矿者用它们来记录矿石产地的位置。草药师往往用它们来追踪库存，而一个王国则可能用来存储税收信息。账簿有多少种，就有多少种用途。

Businesses use specific ledgers to track purchases or sales or to store information. Depending on the store it can also contain additional information such as customers, traders, trade routes, or where the deepest cave exists. Prospectors use them to keep track of locations for ores. Herbalists tend to use them to track inventory, while a kingdom might store information on tax. As many ledgers exist there are as many uses.

Steel.name: 钢 Steel
Steel.description:
“嗯，生命的基石——至少他们是这么说的。我确实喜欢它在夜里的微光，尤其是卫兵穿着他们擦得锃亮的护甲时，让我很安全，你懂吧？”

由铁矿石板在高温炉中加入木炭冶炼而成，它造就了用于武器的最坚固金属之一。钢主要用于餐具、廉价戒指、护甲和武器。

 

 

"Well, the building block of life, or so they say. I do love its glimmer in the night, especially when guardsmen wear their polished armors, keeps me safe, you know?"

Created from slabs of iron ore in high heat furnaces with added charcoal, it creates one of the sturdiest metals for weaponry. Steel is used mainly in cutlery, inexpensive rings, armor, and weaponry.

Giant's Greens Pie.name: 巨人蔬菜派 Giant's Greens Pie
Giant's Greens Pie.description:
这款馅饼由多种奶酪制成，还加入了洋葱、菠菜和大蒜。由于其美味且饱腹，它在家庭和面包店中都是常见的食谱。传说这馅饼令人满足到甚至能让巨人吃饱。过去，它甚至被作为善意的表示送给这些多少有些被误解的生物。

This pie is made with multiple types of cheese, as well as onions, spinach, and garlic. It is a common recipe in both households and bakeries due to its delicious and filling nature. Legends have it that the pie is so satisfying that it can even sate giants. In the past, it was even given as a gesture of goodwill to these somewhat misunderstood creatures.

Daliumite.name: 达利乌米特 Daliumite
Daliumite.description:
它以其闪烁的金色外观而闻名，常被误认为黄金，并深受铁匠们珍视。他们通常要等待数月，甚至数年，才能得到少量这种矿石；然而，一旦设法获得，他们总能获利。当被加工成锭时，其表面覆有精细、旋涡状的复杂纹路，似乎会随着锭被移动而变化与流动。握在手中时，达利乌米特摸起来感觉温暖，并似乎带有微弱的振动。

It is known for its shimmering, golden appearance, often confused with gold, and is highly prized by blacksmiths. They usually wait months, if not years, for only small amounts of the ore, however, when they manage to obtain it, they will always turn a profit. When worked into bars, its surface is covered in intricate, swirling patterns that seem to change and shift as the ingot is moved. When held in the hand, daliumite feels warm to the touch and seems to have a faint vibration.

Night Fangs.name: 夜之獠牙 Night Fangs
Night Fangs.description:
这些尖牙是所有夜间猎人的现金，用于交换专门的武器。猎人们狩猎夜之生物，而在狩猎之后，即便他们没有杀死被捕获的生物，也会拔除其进食用的尖牙，使其变得无害。 

These fangs are a currency for all the night hunters, traded for specialized weaponry. The hunters hunt the creatures of the night, and after the hunt, even if they don't kill the captured creature, they remove their feeding fangs, rendering them harmless.

Garum.name: 鱼露 Garum
Garum.description:
鱼露是一种主要由鱼制成的酱汁。在某些地区，它有一个简单的名字——鱼酱或liquamen。然而，liquamen在各个时代中逐渐演变为另一种类型的酱汁。最初的鱼露配方是将鱼的残余与粗盐一同发酵制成，得到一种颜色深、香气浓郁且具有重要烹饪意义的酱汁，其中可加入香料，用于大多数肉类或贻贝。

Garum is a sauce made primarily from fish. In some areas, it bears the simple name of fish sauce or liquamen. However, liquamen, throughout the eras, evolved into a different type of sauce. The original garum recipe was created through the fermentation of fish remnants with coarse salt, yielding a dark, aromatic sauce of notable culinary significance, to which spices can be added to most meats or mussels.

Peas.name: 豌豆 Peas
Peas.description:
青豌豆常被煮熟后加黄油或留兰香调味，作为配菜蔬菜食用。为了保存豌豆，干燥法世代沿用，其制品主要用于豌豆汤。新鲜青豌豆也可以清炒，或根据地区不同包进饺子里。 

Garden peas are often eaten boiled and flavored with butter or spearmint as a side dish vegetable. To preserve peas, drying has been used for generations and the product is mainly used in pea soups. Fresh green peas can also be stir-fried or depending on the region, put into dumplings.

Cacoxenite.name: 针铁矿 Cacoxenite
Cacoxenite.description:
文石英更常与铁矿石相关，而非宝石；然而，由于其不自然的金色、橙色或深红色光泽，它也可被珠宝匠用于制作精致而色彩斑斓的首饰，并被铁匠用于打造制作精美的武装。

Cacoxenite is more commonly associated with iron ores than with gemstones; however, due to its unnatural shine of gold, orange, or deep red, it can also be used by jewelers for intricate and colorful jewelry, as well as by blacksmiths to create beautifully crafted armaments.

Moldavite Ring.name: 陨石绿玻陨石戒指 Moldavite Ring
Moldavite Ring.description:
摩尔达维石，一种被认为起源于天体撞击的石头，具有天然的玻璃质结构，使其易于被塑造成各种器具，如戒指或吊坠。一些迷信的平民宣称佩戴摩尔达维石首饰能显著帮助治疗原本无法治愈的疾病，不过这些说法仍未得到草药师或炼金术师的支持。

Moldavite, a stone believed to have originated from celestial impacts, possesses a naturally glassy structure that allows it to be easily shaped into various implements such as rings or pendants. Some superstitious commoners claim that wearing moldavite jewelry significantly aids in healing otherwise incurable diseases, though these assertions remain unsupported by herbalists or alchemists.

Zucchini.name: 西葫芦 Zucchini
Zucchini.description:
西葫芦通常熟食，可用多种技巧烹制。这些包括蒸、煮、烤架烤、填馅并烘烤、烧烤、油炸，或将其加入舒芙蕾和炒菜中。

Zucchini is usually served cooked and can be prepared using a variety of techniques. These include steaming, boiling, grilling, stuffing and baking, barbecuing, frying, or incorporating it into soufflés and stir-fries.

Kornerupine.name: 科纳鲁石 Kornerupine
Kornerupine.description:
Kornerupine 以绿色或棕色的半透明晶体形式存在，其硬度足以被切割成中型（体型）的坚固刻面宝石。绿色品种的 kornerupine 尤其因其奥术能力而闻名，能够记录声音与噪音。

Kornerupine is found in green or brown translucent crystals that are sufficiently hard to be cut into solid faceted gems of medium size. The green variety of kornerupine is particularly notable for its arcane ability to record sounds and noises.

Cherry.name: 樱桃 Cherry
Cherry.description:
“当温暖的季节来临，樱花盛开之时，在某些文化中，人们会在这些树下锻炼心智与身体。他们相信先人的灵魂会指引他们并协助他们修行”

樱桃是各地年轻人最喜爱的水果之一。你可以在果酱、派，甚至自制果汁中找到它们，但大多还是生吃。 

"When the warm seasons hit, and the cherry trees are in bloom, in some cultures, people train their minds and body under these trees. They believe that the spirits of the old guide them and assist them in their training"

Cherries are one of the favorite fruit of young folk everywhere. They can be found in jams, pies, and even homemade juices but are mostly eaten raw.

Longbill Spearfish.name: 长喙枪鱼 Longbill Spearfish
Longbill Spearfish.description:
长嘴旗鱼有时也被称为马林鱼，是一种主要生活在外海的大型鱼类。它因作为战利品渔获而闻名，经常被展示在富人宅邸大厅的匾牌上。厨师们也会在市场上寻找它，因为它的肉同样备受珍视，贵族将其视为珍馐，在金币交易中能卖出不菲的价格。

Longbill Spearfish sometimes referred to as the Marlin, is a large fish primarily found in the open ocean. It is famously sought after as a trophy catch, often displayed on plaques in the halls of the wealthy. The chefs look in the market as it is also prized for its meat, which nobles consider a delicacy, commanding a hefty price in gold.

Rabbit.name: 兔子 Rabbit
Rabbit.description:
这些兔子通常被称为肉兔，主要因其肉而被捕获。然而，在狩猎不易进行的地区，野兔和家兔也会因其皮毛而被捕获。

Commonly referred to as the meat rabbit, these rabbits are primarily harvested for their meat. However, in regions where hunting was not readily available, both wild rabbits and domestic rabbits were also harvested for pelts.

Silver Goblet.name: 银高脚杯 Silver Goblet
Silver Goblet.description:
银制高脚杯，以及盘子、大浅盘、餐具和进食用具等其他物件，在贵族家宅中随处可见。这些物品通常会被成批订制，通常来自专门的铁匠铺或当地铁匠。在大多数情况下，贵族会提供订制所需的银锭，从而对最终成品拥有完全的掌控。

Silver goblets, along with other pieces such as plates, platters, cutlery, and eating utensils, are ever-present in a noble household. These items are often commissioned in bulk, typically from a dedicated smithy or the local blacksmith. In most cases, the noble provides the silver ingots required for the commission, having full control over the final product.

Royal Signet.name: 皇家印戒 Royal Signet
Royal Signet.description:
皇家印戒是一件珠宝，通常为贵族量身定制。最负盛名的珠宝匠通常会受托进行这项精密工艺，因为它在蜡上留下的印记必须尽可能细致清晰。戒环通常由黄金制成，而印章本体则由可轻松更换或在需要时重新加工并嵌入戒指的多种合金组合锻造而成。

Royal Signet is a piece of jewelry, typically custom-made for the nobility. The most renowned jewelers are usually commissioned for this precise work, as the impression it leaves in wax must be as detailed and clear as possible. The band is generally crafted from gold, while the signet itself is forged from a combination of alloys that can be replaced or reworked into the ring with ease if needed.

Pallet.name: 托盘 Pallet
Pallet.description:
由木匠制作、用于一夜好眠的标准床通常由稻草或干草构成，并覆以一张床单。这种床垫被称为草垫或铺垫，这也是它得名的原因。

A standard bed made by carpenters for a good night's sleep usually consists of straw or hay covered with a sheet. This type of mattress is known as a palliasse or pallet, which is how it got its name.

Oak Log.name: 橡木原木 Oak Log
Oak Log.description:
原木通常会被加工成木材，不过，它也常被用作面包房、熔炉或家用壁炉中的引火物。

The logs are usually processed into lumber, however, it's also commonly used in bakeries, furnaces, or home fireplaces as kindle.

Maguey Syrup.name: 龙舌兰糖浆 Maguey Syrup
Maguey Syrup.description:
龙舌兰糖浆（Maguey Syrup），也被称为龙舌兰糖浆（Agave Syrup）或龙舌兰花蜜（Agave Nectar），主要用作甜味剂，并且是蜂蜜的常见替代品。龙舌兰糖浆的种类包括：浅色龙舌兰，用于特定的烹饪菜肴和饮品；琥珀色，以其焦糖风味著称，并常用于风味浓郁的饮品；以及深色龙舌兰糖浆，常作为煎饼或华夫饼的淋酱，例如如此。

Maguey Syrup, also referred to as Agave Syrup or Agave Nectar, is primarily used as a sweetener and is a popular substitute for honey. Varieties of Maguey Syrup include Light agave, used in specific culinary dishes and beverages; Amber, known for its caramel notes and favored in drinks with bold flavors; and Dark agave syrup, often employed as a topping for pancakes or waffles, as a few examples.

Lapis Lazuli.name: 青金石 Lapis Lazuli
Lapis Lazuli.description:
一颗蓝色不透明的宝石，通常用作戒指、手镯、吊坠或护身符的装饰。由于其独特的颜色，它有时会被雕刻成艺术造型，例如狮鹫、圣甲虫，甚至独角兽。

A blue opaque gemstone, it is usually used as ornamentation for rings, bracelets, pendants, or talismans. Due to its specific color sometimes it is carved in artistic shapes, such as griffons, scarabs, or even unicorns.

Distilation Gear.name: 蒸馏道具 Distilation Gear
Distilation Gear.description:
许多炼金术士和酒馆都备有一个，因为它可用于提升药水和饮品的品质。制作最上等的药水或最烈的饮料都需要用到它，但由于该过程需要花费大量时代，最终成品往往会变得非常昂贵。

Many alchemists and taverns keep one because it is used to improve the quality of potions and drinks. Creating the finest potions or strongest beverages require its use, but since the process takes a great deal of time, the final product often becomes very expensive.

Sailing Mast.name: 船桅 Sailing Mast
Sailing Mast.description:
帆桅是一根从船上垂直升起并支撑船帆的杆。较大的帆船通常有不止一根桅杆。桅杆在支撑船帆方面起着关键作用，使风能够推动船只前进。

The sailing mast is a pole that rises vertically from a ship and supports the sails. Larger sailboats often have more than one mast. The mast plays a crucial role in supporting the sails, allowing the wind to propel the ship.

Metal Leaves.name: 金属叶片 Metal Leaves
Metal Leaves.description:
这些被称为试金叶，商人或银行柜员用它们来轻松识别贵金属的种类。叶片本身可以由金、银、铂或琥珀金制成，且纯度各不相同。在测试一个金属物体时，会将叶片与所测试的物体一起在试金石上划擦。根据它们留下的残渣，可以迅速识别金属的纯度，或判断其是否为赝品。

These are known as touchstone leaves, and are used by merchants or bank tellers to easily identify types of precious metals. The leaves themselves can be made out of gold, silver, platinum, or electrum, with various levels of purity. When testing a metal object, the leaves are scratched on a touchstone along with the object in question. Based on the residue they leave behind, it is possible to quickly identify the metal's purity or determine if it is a counterfeit.

Lentils.name: 小扁豆 Lentils
Lentils.description:
扁豆可以浸泡、油炸、烘烤或煮制。带皮的扁豆在适度烹调后仍能保持完整，而去皮的则往往会煮散成浓稠的泥状，适合用于各种菜肴。它们常用于制作经济实惠且营养丰富的汤品，通常与鸡肉或猪肉搭配；煮熟的扁豆也是沙拉中很受欢迎的配料。

Lentils can be soaked, fried, baked, or boiled. Lentils with husks remain whole with moderate cooking, while those without husks tend to disintegrate into thick purees, suitable for various dishes. They are used to prepare inexpensive and nutritious soups, often combined with chicken or pork, and cooked lentils are also a popular addition to salads.

Chromite Ingots.name: 铬铁矿锭 Chromite Ingots
Chromite Ingots.description:
矿石被熔炼成铬铁锭后，通常用于打造适用于极端气候的坚固工具，无论这些气候是自然形成的还是更具魔法性质。炼金术士偶尔会将从矿石中熔炼提纯出的金属用作催化剂，用于调制能提供对元素抗力的药剂。

After the ore is smelted into Chromite Ingots, it is usually used to create sturdy tools for extreme climates, whether natural or more magical in nature. Alchemists occasionally use the purified metal smelted from the ore as a catalyst in brewing potions that provide resistance to the elements.

Cheese and Greens pie.name: 奶酪与绿叶蔬菜派 Cheese and Greens pie
Cheese and Greens pie.description:
如果没有烤箱，这种特定的馅饼可以直接在平底锅里轻松制作。所用材料有鸡蛋、面粉、酵母、咸奶酪、糖和盐；至于绿叶蔬菜，手头有什么都可以加，比如荨麻、滨藜、莳萝或欧芹。把所有东西混合在一起做成一张扁面饼，然后下锅烹调。大多数平民都很喜欢它，因为便宜又容易做。

This specific pie is easily made directly in a pan if an oven is not available. An egg, flour, yeast, salted cheese, sugar, and salt are used, and for the greens, anything available can be added, such as nettles, arrach, dill, or parsley. Everything is mixed together into a flatbread and set to cook. Most common folk love this because it's cheap and easy to make.

Spring Water.name: 泉水 Spring Water
Spring Water.description:
泉水采集自地下泉眼，主要供炼金术士使用。它备受追捧，在施法者的帮助下，这种水会被进一步净化，因为它通常用于制作药水。魔法水流十分罕见，但一旦发现，人们推测使用这种特定类型的水制作的药水会大幅提升其效力。

Spring water is collected from underground springs and is mainly used by alchemists. It is highly sought after, and with the help of magical casters, the water is purified even further as it is generally used to create potions. Magical water streams are rare yet when found it is speculated that the potion created using this specific type of water highly increases its potency.

Saddle Soft Cured Pelt.name: 鞍用软鞣制皮毛 Saddle Soft Cured Pelt
Saddle Soft Cured Pelt.description:
一种特定形式的毛皮，经过鞣制与处理，但未裁切，只需铺在马科动物背上，让鞍具更舒适，并且不会在动物皮肤上造成擦伤或割伤。该毛皮本身在处理完成后，除作为桌面掩蔽的装饰用途外，并无太多其他用途。

An specific form of pelt, cured and processed, but not cut, to simply be put on an equine for the saddle to feel better and not create any scratches or cuts on the skin of the animal. The pelt itself, after the process is complete, does not have many other uses, other than decorative as a table cover.

Zither.name: 齐特琴 Zither
Zither.description:
齐特琴是一种存在于各种形状和尺寸中的乐器，其定义性特征是作为一种拨弦乐器。世界各地都能找到众多地区变体。在一些文化中，齐特琴被誉为一种全能乐器，因其优美而富有共鸣的音色而备受珍视。这种乐器不仅是音乐中的常见乐器，在一些宗教场合也备受推崇，其优美的声音能提升合唱团的演出效果。

The zither is an instrument that exists in various shapes and sizes, with the defining characteristic of being a plucked instrument. Numerous regional variations can be found worldwide. In some cultures, the zither is celebrated as an all-rounded instrument, valued for its beautiful and resonant sound. This instrument is not only a staple in music but is also well-regarded in some religious settings, where its beautiful sound enhances choir performances.

Portobello Mushroom.name: 波托贝洛蘑菇 Portobello Mushroom
Portobello Mushroom.description:
波托贝洛蘑菇被广泛栽培，并因其在沙拉中的多用途性以及作为各种菜肴配料而备受推崇。

Portobello mushrooms are widely cultivated and prized for their versatility in salads and as toppings for various dishes.

Quince.name: 榅桲 Quince
Quince.description:
榅桲是一种大多数家庭花园里常见的水果，通常几乎不费什么心思就能在最寒冷的冬季保存下来。榅桲也可用于治疗花粉热、胃痛以及许多其他病症，不过，它主要因用于制作果冻和果酱而闻名。

A common fruit in most home gardens, it is often preserved over the coldest of winters with little care. Quince can also be used for hay fever, stomach pains, and many other conditions, however, it is mainly known for its use in jellies and jams.

Beet.name: 甜菜 Beet
Beet.description:
它有时被称为甜菜根。据传红色甜菜根被用于能增强饮用者活力的药水中，据认为之所以特别使用它是因为其红色，然而这些传闻并无根据。草药师和炼金术士确实会在药水中使用它们，但并非因为其染色特性，而是因为它们所提供的健康益处。

It is sometimes referred to as beetroot. It is rumored that red beetroot is used in potions that boost the vitality of the consumer, thought to be used specifically because of its red color, however, these rumors are unfounded. Herbalists and alchemists do use them in potions, not for their coloring properties but for the health benefits they provide.

Bedside Chest.name: 床边箱子 Bedside Chest
Bedside Chest.description:
对于那些买不起床头柜或衣柜的平民来说，床头箱为存放各种衣物提供了一种经济实惠的替代方案。

For the commoners who cannot afford a bedside dresser or wardrobe, a Bedside Chest offers a cost-effective alternative for storing all forms of clothing.

Dragon Scales.name: 龙鳞 Dragon Scales
Dragon Scales.description:
这些鳞片没有太多用途，然而，故事在各地旅行，说你可以在需要的时代将这些鳞片用作临时的防御工具，因为它们相当坚固，形状也与盾牌相似，并且它们可以抵抗这些鳞片来自的那条龙所属的元素。

The scales do not have many uses, yet, stories travel the lands, that, you can, in a time of need, use the scales as an improvised defense tool, as they are quite sturdy and have a similar shape to a shield, and they can resist the element from which dragon the scale came from.

Concertina.name: 六角手风琴 Concertina
Concertina.description:
六角手风琴是手风琴的小妹妹，因其紧凑的体型、悦耳的音色以及易于修理而深受航海之人喜爱。它主要由生长在深河岸边的巨型芦苇制成，这种材料在船只航行途中随处可得，确保在需要娱乐时能迅速修补。

The concertina, the smaller sister to the accordion, is a favorite among seafaring folk due to its compact size, pleasing sound, and easy repairs. Made primarily from giant reed, which grows along the shores of deep rivers, this material is readily available during the ship’s travels, ensuring quick fixes when entertainment is needed.

Tiger Hide.name: 虎皮 Tiger Hide
Tiger Hide.description:
虎皮是一大块来自相当威严野兽的毛皮，这种生物往往能战胜大型狩猎队伍，因此在商人处很罕见。这种生物多见于茂密的常绿森林或幽深的丛林，通常不容易找到。

Tiger Hide is a large piece of pelt coming from a quite an majestic beast, which has a tendency to be victorious against large hunting parties, making it a rare find at merchants. The creature can be mostly found in dense evergreen forests or deep jungles, finding one is usually not easy.

Great Forest Rolls.name: 巨森掷表 Great Forest Rolls
Great Forest Rolls.description:
它们填充着新鲜卷心菜、咸香蘑菇和芬芳的莳萝的混合物，而面皮则巧妙地混入了酥脆的咸杏仁，以增加口感和风味。此外，对于那些更喜欢甜味变化的人，还有一种版本，使用蜜瓜、清爽的黄瓜，以及芳香的罗勒和薄荷叶，面皮和杏仁还刷上甜蜂蜜上釉，以增添额外风味。

They are filled with a mixture of fresh cabbage, savory mushrooms, and fragrant dill, while the dough sheet is expertly combined with crunchy salted almonds for added texture and flavor. Additionally, for those who prefer a sweeter twist, a version with honeydew melon, refreshing cucumber, and aromatic basil and mint leaves is available, with the dough sheet and almonds glazed with sweet honey for extra flavor.

Shark Teeth.name: 鲨鱼牙齿 Shark Teeth
Shark Teeth.description:
鲨鱼牙齿非常受欢迎，用于交易、收藏和出售，使其成为一种非常有价值的商品。根据不同地区，鲨鱼牙齿被用作武器或矛头。它们也被用作帮助切割食物、雕刻木材或挖掘的工具。它们还被用来制作首饰，主要是项链和手镯。

Shark teeth are very popular to trade, collect, and sell, making them a very valuable commodity. Depending on the region the shark's teeth are used as weapons or spearheads. They are also used as tools that help to cut food, carve wood, or dig with. They are also used to make jewelry, mainly necklaces and bracelets.

Myrrh.name: 没药 Myrrh
Myrrh.description:
草药师会寻找没药树脂，用来制作香水、熏香和药物。据说如果咀嚼没药的叶子，甚至还能帮助改善口臭。在一些文化中，它也会在酿酒过程中被混入。

Herbalists look for Myrrh resin to use in creating perfume, incense, and medicine. It is believed that if the leaf of the Myrrh is chewed on, it even helps with bad breath. In some cultures, it is also mixed in the process of making wine.

Mishanite.name: 弥珊尼斯人 Mishanite
Mishanite.description:
米沙奈特是一种独特而备受追捧的宝石，类似于哈鲁米特。寻求它的人可以将其塑造成任何想要的形状或颜色，而且多种形态可以共存。尽管它对他人而言没有实际价值，米沙奈特却承载着巨大的情感意义。发现这颗宝石会唤起一种深切的个人温暖与亲近感。

Mishanite is a uniquely sought-after gem, much like Harumite. Those who seek it can mold it into any desired shape or color, and multiple manifestations can coexist. Despite its lack of tangible value to others, Mishanite holds immense sentimental significance. Finding this gem evokes a profound sense of personal warmth and closeness.

Obsidian.name: 黑曜石 Obsidian
Obsidian.description:
熔岩冷却后，会留下巨大的黑曜石块。这种宝石被用来制作短刃武器、工具、饰品、厨房器皿和镜子。一些声名不佳的派系会使用一种由黑曜石制成的锯齿边缘指环，在其预定目标身上制造细小而深的割伤。

Lava when cooling, leaves behind huge lumps of Obsidian. This gem is used to make short-bladed weapons, tools, ornaments, kitchen wares, and mirrors. Some ill-reputed factions use a form of jagged edge rings created from obsidian to create small deep cuts into their intended targets.

Meat of the Hunt.name: 狩猎之肉 Meat of the Hunt
Meat of the Hunt.description:
这道菜以冒险者带来的熟制野味为特色。这些肉类通常不会出现在大多数酒馆的菜单上，专为最勇敢、敢于尝试新奇口味的顾客准备。

This dish features a cooked piece of game brought in by adventurers. The meats are usually not found on most tavern menus and are for the bravest patrons who are not afraid to experiment.

Fly Agaric.name: 毒蝇伞 Fly Agaric
Fly Agaric.description:
毒蝇伞有时在危急时刻被称为“墓园守护者”，因为它具有毒性。然而，即使有警告，仍有人会食用它，因为人们相信它能与神祇建立联系，而结果往往是致命的。这种蘑菇的主要用途是作为杀虫剂，当它与牛奶混合时，会同时吸引并杀死苍蝇，这也让它得名。

Fly Agaric is sometimes called in dire times "The Graveyard Keeper" due to its toxic proprieties. However, even with warning some do still consume it as it is believed that it makes a connection with the deities with often fatal results. The mushroom's primary use is as an insecticide, when it is combined with milk, it both attracts and kills flies, which also gave it its name.

Aradite.name: 阿拉代特 Aradite
Aradite.description:
阿拉戴特宝石具有在黑暗中发光的独特能力，使其成为许多地下文明常用的光源。与霓虹-隆特并列，由于其丰富的储量而经常被使用。

Aradite gemstone has the unique ability to glow in the dark, making it a popular light source for many underground civilizations. Alongside Neon-Ront, it is frequently used due to its abundance.

Microlite.name: 微光 Microlite
Microlite.description:
微光宝石虽小却非常坚硬，适合切割成刻面宝石，用于装饰剑、护甲、盾牌和马具。除了装饰用途外，它们也可作为传统乌贼或章鱼墨汁的实用替代品。

Microlite gems are small yet very hard, suitable for cutting into faceted gems used to adorn swords, armor, shields, and horse tack. Beyond their decorative uses, they also serve as a practical substitute for traditional squid or octopus ink.

Pineapple.name: 菠萝 Pineapple
Pineapple.description:
在一些地区，菠萝被视为奢华的重要文化象征，因为它的稀有度在贵族人群中造成了超现实的需求。在各王国的大多数菜肴中，它主要作为水果或果汁供应。它也常用作火腿和肉类的常见装饰配菜。水果块用于水果沙拉、蛋糕、糖果和烘焙食品等甜点。将其与谷物醋混合后，也可以制成一种醋。

In some regions, the pineapple is considered a significant cultural icon of luxury, as its rarity created a surreal demand with the noble folk. In most cuisines around the realms, it is mainly served as a fruit or as a juice. It is also a common garnish for hams and meats. Chunks of fruit are used in desserts such as fruit salads, cakes, sweets, and baked goods. A form of vinegar can also be created from it after it is combined with grain vinegar.

Wolfsbane Retreat.name: 狼毒撤退 Wolfsbane Retreat
Wolfsbane Retreat.description:
这种药剂以能抑制狼人的变身而闻名。狼毒叶必须保持新鲜，并研磨成一团细粉尘云，然后与几颗颠茄果实及其他一些试剂混合。任何不是狼人的人，只要第一滴滴在舌头上就会丧命。若由刚被咬伤的狼人饮用，据推测它可以将其彻底治愈。若在满月之夜的傍晚开始时饮用，它可以将变身延迟到下一个满月。

This potion is known to keep the Lycanthrope transformation at bay. The Wolf Bane leaves need to be fresh and be ground to a cloud of fine dust, then combined with a couple of Belladonna fruits and some other reagents. Anyone who is not a Lycanthrope will meet his death at the first drop of it on his tongue. If consumed by a Lycanthrope that was just bitten, it is speculated it can fully cure it. When it is consumed at the start of the evening of the full moon it can delay the transformation to the next full moon.

Yam.name: 山药 Yam
Yam.description:
收获山药的过程在体力上要求很高且劳动密集，需要使用木制工具来保护作物。一些农民采用搭架和混作方法，这可能会使收获过程更加复杂。山药可用于多种烹饪准备，例如制成面粉，或将整块蔬菜用于沙拉或炖菜。

The process of harvesting yams is physically demanding and labor-intensive, necessitating the use of wooden tools to protect the crop. Some farmers adopt staking and mixed cropping methods, which can complicate the harvesting process. Yams are utilized in diverse culinary preparations, such as flour or whole vegetable pieces for salads or stews.

Mahogany Log.name: 红木原木 Mahogany Log
Mahogany Log.description:
桃花心木是一种纹理笔直、红褐色的木材，主要为取材而采伐，分布于大多数较温暖的气候中，主要见于热带森林，并且极为稀有。一些地区完全禁止进口这种特定木材，因为它需求量也很高，往往会给该地区带来巨大的经济压力。

Mahogany is a straight-grained, reddish-brown timber that is mainly harvested for the wood, found in most warmer climates, mainly tropical forests, and extremely rare. Some territories, have this specific wood outright banned for import as it tends to put a high economic pressure on the territory as it is also in high demand.

Rubellite.name: 红宝碧玺 Rubellite
Rubellite.description:
红碧玺，电气石的粉红色变种，是其家族中最稀有的宝石。它偶尔会被误认为红宝石，因此成为无良商人牟利剥削的目标。

Rubellite, a pink variant of tourmaline, stands out as the rarest gem in its family. Occasionally mistaken for ruby, it is a target for exploitation by unscrupulous merchants.

Mercury / Cinnabar.name: 水星 / 朱砂 Mercury / Cinnabar
Mercury / Cinnabar.description:
朱砂矿床中含有大量水银，通常也能在与火山活动和温泉相关的地区发现。这种看起来呈银色的金属在室温下会变成液态，使其在其他金属同类中独树一帜。水银主要被炼金术士用来治疗皮肤疾病，不过其效果仍是一个存在争议的话题。

Mercury is found in large quantities within cinnabar deposits and generally found in areas associated with volcanic activity and hot springs. This silvery-looking metal changes into liquid form at room temperature, making it unique among its metallic counterparts. Mercury is primarily used by alchemists to treat skin ailments, though its effects remain a topic of debate.

Laterite.name: 红土 Laterite
Laterite.description:
红土主要用于制砖，但也用于各种涂料、底漆、粉末和涂层等。作为颜料用于屋瓦、地砖、地板产品、陶瓷、陶器，以及许多其他涉及瓦片和陶瓷的物品。

Laterite is mainly used in making bricks, but it is used in all types of paint, primers, powders, and coatings, among other things. Used as a pigment in tiles, floor tiles, flooring products, ceramics, pottery, and many other items involving tiles and ceramics.

Cowhide.name: 牛皮 Cowhide
Cowhide.description:
通过畜牧业收获并提供给皮革工匠作进一步加工的材料，以确保在屠宰牛只时没有任何部分被浪费。兽皮通常以大批量购买，因为这是制作军用装备皮革最常见的皮种。

Material harvested through husbandry and provided to the leatherworkers for further processing, to make sure nothing is wasted from the butchering of the bovine. The hides are bought in large batches, as this is the most common type of hide to make the leather for military equipment.

Ginger.name: 姜 Ginger
Ginger.description:
姜，广泛用作香料和民间药物。它被制成茶提供给胃弱的人，以对抗恶心等症状。

Ginger, is widely used as a spice and folk medicine. It is provided as tea for those who have weak stomachs to combat nausea, among other things.

Pure-Metal Bronze Ingot.name: 纯金属青铜锭 Pure-Metal Bronze Ingot
Pure-Metal Bronze Ingot.description:
纯金属青铜锭由最精炼的铜块和锡块合金制成，二者等量。著名冶炼厂的熟练铁匠通过精确的冶炼技术精炼金属，确保每一锭都保持均匀的成分。由于没有杂质或缺陷，这些铁匠能够锻造出高于常规品质的工具、武器、护甲，以及建筑材料，如用于地面的装饰瓷砖或精细雕塑。

Pure-Metal Bronze Ingots are made from an alloy of the most refined chunks of copper and tin, in equal amounts. Skilled blacksmiths at prestigious smelters refine the metals through precise smelting techniques, ensuring that every ingot maintains a uniform composition. Without impurities or flaws, these blacksmiths can forge higher than normal quality tools, weapons, armor, and building materials such as decorative tiles for flooring or detailed sculptures.

Equipment Order.name: 装备顺序 Equipment Order
Equipment Order.description:
一项要求大量道具（包括护甲与武器）的官方典范通常作为战争准备或为支援持续的冲突而颁布。作为回报，铁匠会提交一份材料订单，估算为满足该请求所需的补给数量。

An official edict calling for a large quantity of gear, including both armor and weapons, is typically issued as a preparation for war or to support an ongoing conflict. In return, blacksmiths submit a material order, estimating the necessary amounts of supplies to fulfill the request.

Platinum Ingot.name: 铂锭 Platinum Ingot
Platinum Ingot.description:
铂锭极难制造，需要由熔岩或奥术火焰驱动的最炽热熔炉才能将铂矿正确熔化并精炼。一旦净化成锭形，只有最熟练的工匠和精英工坊才会用它来制作高品质物品。然而，这些铂锭主要作为高价值商品的交易商品。

Platinum Ingots are extremely difficult to manufacture, requiring the hottest smelters fueled by lava or arcane fire to properly melt and refine platinum ore. Once purified into ingot form, only the most skilled craftsmen and elite workshops use it for the creation of high-quality items. However, the ingots are traded mainly as a commodity for high-value goods.

Deep Blue Spinel.name: 深蓝尖晶石 Deep Blue Spinel
Deep Blue Spinel.description:
一颗深蓝紫色的上等水晶，通常镶嵌在首饰上佩戴。

A superb crystal of deep blue-violet colors, usually worn in jewelry.

D'Ochre Pie.name: 赭黄派 D'Ochre Pie
D'Ochre Pie.description:
这种不同寻常的派以其酸甜口味闻名，是只有少数几家面包店才知道如何制作的特色点心。据说它独特的口感来自一种通过狩猎获得的秘密配料，尽管这种配料的具体内容仍不确定。尽管面包师对配方守口如瓶，但这款派却是喜欢冒险的食客必尝之物。它的酸味对一些人来说可能过于强烈，但喜欢它的人会细细品味其复杂的风味与令人满足的嚼劲，还有人说它尝起来像非常甜的橙子。由于其强烈的酸性，面包师通常每位顾客只卖一块；并且虽然有传言称这种派与一种罕见疾病有关，但面包师会迅速否认任何关联。

This unusual pie, known for its acidic sweetness, is a specialty that only a handful of bakeries know how to make. Its unique texture is said to come from a secret ingredient obtained from hunts, although the specifics of this ingredient remain uncertain. While the bakers are famously tight-lipped about their recipe, the pie is a must-try for adventurous eaters. Its tartness can be overpowering for some, but those who enjoy it savor the complex flavors and satisfying chewiness, and some say that it taste like very sweet oranges. Due to its potent acidity, bakers typically only sell one piece per customer and while there are rumors that the pie is linked to a rare disease, however, the bakers are quickly to deny any links.

Iron Ingot.name: 铁锭 Iron Ingot
Iron Ingot.description:
铁锭可供技艺娴熟的铁匠用来制作钉子、角楔、锁具、燧石、铁剑、镣铐、铲子、鹤嘴锄和斧头。它们还可用于生产铁梁、托架和支撑物，以加固建筑和桥梁，确保其经久耐用。工匠在家具制造中使用铁，而在一些罕见的场合，它也会被用于珠宝制作。

Iron Ingots can be used by skilled blacksmiths to craft nails, corner wedges, locks, flint, iron swords, manacles, shovels, pickaxes, and axes. They also produce iron beams, brackets, and supports to reinforce buildings and bridges, ensuring their longevity. Craftsmen use iron in furniture manufacturing, and on some rare occassion it is incorporated in jewlery.

Oölite.name: 鲕粒岩 Oölite
Oölite.description:
鲕石，常被昵称为洞穴珍珠，通常在洞穴中发现，并会因洞穴的特定生物群系而呈现绿色、白色或棕色等不同颜色。它们的主要用途是装饰，可用作饰品，或碾碎后制成鲜艳的墨水。

Oölites, often nicknamed Cave Pearls, are typically found in caves and vary in colors such as green, white, or brown, depending on the cave's specific biome. Their primary uses are decorative, used either as ornaments or crushed to create vivid inks.

Maple Log.name: 枫木原木 Maple Log
Maple Log.description:
枫树通常在香料行业需求很高，因为它们的树液、糖浆和可制成的糖。

Maple trees are usually in high demand in the spice industry because of their sap, syrup, and sugar that can be made.

Sleep Tincture.name: 睡眠酊剂 Sleep Tincture
Sleep Tincture.description:
当普通工人被不眠之夜所困扰时，解决这一问题最常见的方法之一，就是使用由炼金术士调制的可靠睡眠酊剂。它带有甜味，使用者在服用后，便能获得一整晚的休息。

When the regular work hands are haunted by sleepless nights, one of the most common ways to get the issue resolved, is with a trusty sleep tincture that is brewed by the Alchemists. It does bear a sweetened taste and the users, after consuming it, can get a good night's rest.

White Pearl.name: 白珍珠 White Pearl
White Pearl.description:
这些特定的珍珠通常产自咸水中，由于其稀有度，多为王室与贵族所追捧。最稀有的那种通常有人的头那么大，被用于制作水晶球，然而，它们必须毫无瑕疵。

These specific Pearls are generally found in saltwater and are mostly sought after by royalty and nobility due to their rarity. The rarest ones, usually the size of someone's head are used in crystal balls, however, they mustn't have any imperfections.

Chrysoprase.name: 绿玉髓 Chrysoprase
Chrysoprase.description:
绿玉髓的色泽从海玻璃般的浅绿到深祖母绿不等，有些标本还呈现出黄绿色调，如柠檬绿玉髓。它常被切割成梨形切面风格，水滴形或椭圆形，因此成为用于家具与珠宝的热门宝石。此外，将其碾碎后还可用来制作隐形墨水。

Chrysoprase comes in shades ranging from sea glass to deep emerald green, with some specimens showing yellow-green hues like lemon chrysoprase. Often cut in a briolette style, teardrop or oval, it became a popular gemstone for both furniture and jewelry. Additionally, it is used for creating invisible ink when crushed.

Braided Bread.name: 辫子面包 Braided Bread
Braided Bread.description:
在许多地方都是一种传统食物，其象征意义因地区而异。在一些地区，它与失去挚爱之人有关，会在埋葬地点放置一条编辫面包，以象征与其他界域中的联系。在另一些地区，它代表两位新人的结合，辫子象征交缠的手臂与爱。而在其他地区，它没有任何文化意义。

A traditional food in many places, its symbolism varies greatly by region. In some areas, it is associated with the loss of a loved one, where a loaf of braided bread is placed at the burial site to symbolize a connection in the other realms. In others, it represents the union of two newlyweds, with the braids symbolizing intertwined arms and love. While in other regions, it holds no cultural significance.

Horsetail.name: 马尾草 Horsetail
Horsetail.description:
木贼是一种常见草药，几个世纪以来一直被草药师用来治疗多种病症，包括出血、伤口、感冒和花粉症。它生长于世界许多地区，并被认为对绵羊和牛有毒，尽管普通人少量食用是安全的。

Horsetail is a common herb that has been used by herbalists for centuries to treat a variety of ailments, including bleeding, wounds, colds, and hay fever. It grows in many parts of the world and is considered poisonous to sheep and cattle, although it is safe for the common folk to consume in small amounts.

Red Cherry Sticks.name: 红樱桃棒 Red Cherry Sticks
Red Cherry Sticks.description:
樱桃棒是一种很受欢迎的糖果，由糖、淀粉、小麦粉、明胶和樱桃等简单原料制成。耐嚼的外层与顺滑甜美的内馅相结合，为任何年轻的平民带来令人愉悦的美味。

Cherry sticks are a popular candy made from simple ingredients like sugar, starch, wheat flour, gelatin, and cherries. The combination of the chewy outer layer with the smooth, sweet middle creates a delightful treat for any young commoner.

Cannon.name: 加农炮 Cannon
Cannon.description:
与弩炮不同，加农炮是为进攻用途而设计的，主要因为它们安装在轮子上。这些轮子有多种用途：它们使加农炮更容易经由海路或陆路运输，并吸收其强大后坐力的冲击。较早期的无轮加农炮型号往往会因后坐力而破裂。

Unlike the ballista, cannons are designed for offensive use, largely because they are mounted on wheels. These wheels serve multiple purposes, they make the cannon easier to transport by sea or road and absorb the force of its powerful recoil. Earlier models of cannons without wheels often had a habit of shattering due to the recoil.

Garden Hoe.name: 园艺锄 Garden Hoe
Garden Hoe.description:
园艺锄有多种用途，通过开出用于放置种子的小沟槽来协助播种，并帮助清除杂草。凭借其锋利而宽大的刃口，农民偏爱用园艺锄来切割成排的杂草。它能轻松地在土壤表面下方滑行，切断恼人杂草的根部。

The garden hoe serves multiple purposes, assisting with seeding by creating small trenches for seed placement and aiding in weed removal. With its sharp and wide blade, farmers favor the garden hoe for cutting rows of weeds. It effortlessly slides just beneath the soil's surface, cutting the roots of pesky weeds.

Red Obsidian.name: 红曜石 Red Obsidian
Red Obsidian.description:
红曜石也被称为桃花心木曜石，因为宝石的颜色与木材相似。它是在奥术技艺使熔岩池迅速冷却时形成的。有些戏法师试图以“它具有尚未开发的魔法潜能”为前提，将其作为高级货出售，然而，它们通常的价格接近普通曜石的价格。

Red Obsidian is also referred to as Mahogany Obsidian, due to the color of the gem resembling the wood. This is formed when the arcane arts cool pools of lava quickly. Some legerdemains try to sell these as a premium under the premise that it has untapped magical potential, however, their usual price is close to the one of the regular obsidian.

Squash.name: 压扁 Squash
Squash.description:
葫芦、南瓜和西葫芦都是南瓜属的类型，它们被用于多种烹饪食谱中，南瓜属植物常被烘烤、煮或蒸。它通常与黄油或橄榄油以及咸味调味料一起食用，它也可作为甜面包的配料。

Gourds, Pumpkins, and Zucchini are types of squashes, and they are used in multiple culinary recipes, squash is often roasted, boiled, or steamed. It is usually served with butter or olive oil and savory seasonings, it also counts as an ingredient for sweet bread.

Agave.name: 龙舌兰 Agave
Agave.description:
龙舌兰植物的四个主要可食用部分包括花、叶、茎或基生莲座，以及汁液。饮料可从烘烤过的纤维中挤压出来，而植株的头部可以烘烤或煮熟，捣成薄片，晒干，并储存以备将来使用。烘烤并干燥的头部也会被煮熟并加工成可食用的糊状物，整块食用，或加入汤中。

The agave plant's four major edible parts include flowers, leaves, stalks or basal rosettes, and sap. A beverage is squeezed from baked fibers, and the heads can be baked or boiled, pounded into flat sheets, sun-dried, and stored for future use. The baked, dried heads are also boiled and processed into an edible paste, eaten whole, or incorporated into soups.

Advanced Military Application of the Arc.name: 奥术技艺的高级军事应用 Advanced Military Application of the Arcane Arts
Advanced Military Application of the Arc.description:
一本小册子，深入探讨以战术方式运用奥术技艺的军事策略。它包含多个章节，涵盖诸如战斗主题：群体队形、夹击技巧、在敌后迷失时的生存要诀、必要的生存技能，以及在最后一章中，指挥链的重要性。本手册发给新招募的士兵，期望他们背熟其全部200页内容。

A small manual that delves into military strategies for the tactical use of arcane arts. It contains multiple chapters covering combat topics such as group formations, flanking techniques, tips for surviving when lost behind enemy lines, essential survival skills, and, in the final chapter, the importance of the chain of command. This manual is issued to newly recruited soldiers, who are expected to memorize all 200 pages of it.

Cypher - Text.name: 密文 - 文本 Cypher - Text
Cypher - Text.description:
这个圆筒常常用作安全容器，旨在保护贵重或敏感的物品，确保只有掌握正确知识的人才能打开它。它们通常在圆筒上写有详细内容，这些说明描述了打开并许可其中物品所需的步骤。破解密码具有很高的风险，可能触发保险机制，从而摧毁其中的物品。

This cylinder often serves as a secure container, designed to protect valuable or sensitive items, ensuring that only those with the correct knowledge can open it. They are usually made with written details on a cylinder, the instructions describe the steps required to open and access the item inside. Breaking the cipher open carries a high risk of triggering a fail-safe that could destroy the item within.

Fruit Puree.name: 水果泥 Fruit Puree
Fruit Puree.description:
这种甜点可以使用市面上各种各样的水果制作，例如桃子、苹果和草莓。首先，将水果去皮，并去除种子和果核。然后，将它们煮至足够柔软以便捣成泥。为了提升风味，常在混合物中加入柠檬或橙汁。这种甜点通常作为大多数烘焙食品的配菜端上桌，因为它与它们相得益彰。或者，也可以冷食，以对抗炎热的夏日。

This dessert can be made using a variety of fruits available on the market, such as peaches, apples, and strawberries. First, the fruits are peeled, and their seeds and cores are removed. Then, they are boiled until they become soft enough to be mashed. To enhance the flavor, lemon or orange juice is often added to the mixture. This dessert is usually served as a side for most baked goods, as it complements them perfectly. Alternatively, it can be served cold to combat those hot, summer days.

Didntonite.name: 迪德恩石 Didntonite
Didntonite.description:
迪德顿石是一种观赏石，因其纤维状质地而备受珍视，兼具坚韧与柔软。它主要呈灰粉色，但偶尔也会出现醒目的蓝、绿、白与棕色环纹，使其更具美感。

Didntonite is an ornamental stone prized for its fibrous texture, combining both toughness and softness. While predominantly grayish-pink, it is occasionally found with striking rings of blue, green, white, and brown, adding to its aesthetic appeal.

Prehnite.name: 葡萄石 Prehnite
Prehnite.description:
葡萄石常见于硬化熔岩结构中气孔的内衬。然而，这种材料很少具有达到宝石切割所需的厚度或迷人的色泽。

Prehnite is often found in the lining of gas cavities in hardened lava formations. However, the material rarely possesses the required thickness or attractive coloration to be considered for gemstone cutting.

Ladybug.name: 瓢虫 Ladybug
Ladybug.description:
瓢虫因其斑点而与好运联系在一起，总会伴随丰收而来。平民喜爱它们，因为它们会吃蚜虫和其他植物害虫，保障作物安全。孩子们喜欢看它们，还有一首配套的小歌，用来数瓢虫身上的斑点，相信它们会为自己带来长久的好运。

Ladybugs, associated with luck due to their spots, always follow a plentiful harvest. Common folk love them because they eat aphids and other plant pests, keeping the crops safe. The kids love to look at them and have a small song to accompany it, used to count the spots on the ladybug, believing they bring them long lasting luck.

Sweetsop.name: 释迦果 Sweetsop
Sweetsop.description:
它通常被称为糖苹果，被认为是你能找到的最美味的水果之一，尽管有些罕见。糖苹果有着饱满的绿色鳞片，看起来像一只蜷缩起来的穿山甲。糖苹果通常作为新鲜的甜点水果食用，或用来制作果汁。

It is commonly referred to as Sugar-Apple and is considered one of the most delicious, if not somewhat rare, fruits you can find. With its plump green scales, the sugar apple looks like a curled up pangolin. The sugar apple is usually consumed as a fresh dessert fruit, or used to make juice.

Mandarin.name: 普通话 Mandarin
Mandarin.description:
柑橘类果实较小，通常呈红橙色。果皮相当薄，也比较容易剥开。果皮也可以刨皮屑，这一过程会产生细小的果皮条，通常用于为各种糕点和甜食增添风味，例如派、蛋糕、曲奇、饼干、巧克力，以及许许多多其他食品。

Mandarin orange fruits are small and usually a red-orange color. The skin is quite thin and peels rather easily. The skin can also be zested, a process which creates small strips of peel that are usually used to add flavor to different pastries and sweets such as pies, cakes, cookies, biscuits, chocolate, and many many others.

Gold Bangle.name: 金手镯 Gold Bangle
Gold Bangle.description:
金手镯是一种由纯金打造的手镯，旨在象征最高阶层的贵族身份与社会地位的巅峰。由技艺高超的铁匠使用精密模具锻造而成后，每一件都会交由著名的金匠，以华丽的装饰细节进行精心收尾。这些手镯通常价格高昂，因此常常成为窃贼与骗子觊觎的目标，他们试图从其价值中牟利。

Gold Bangle is a bracelet crafted from pure gold, designed to symbolize the highest class of nobility and the pinnacle of societal status. Forged by skilled blacksmiths using precise molds, each piece is then handed over to renowned goldsmiths who meticulously finish it with ornate detailing. These bangles are typically priced highly, which makes them frequent targets for thieves and swindlers seeking to profit from their value.

Crucible Steel.name: 坩埚钢 Crucible Steel
Crucible Steel.description:
当铁匠获得古老魔法的许可时，熔炉便成为一处神圣之地。在这里打造出最精良的武器与护甲。这些金属中最珍贵的是坩埚钢，以其强度与耐久性而闻名。在久远的年代里，据说坩埚钢是在大地炽热的深处锻造而成，并由千阳之热所淬炼。它强韧到即使面对最锋利的刀刃也能保持刃口不缺。最顶尖的铁匠会花费数小时，甚至数日，来加工坩埚钢，小心翼翼地将其塑造成所需的形状。其成果是一把武器或一件护甲，几乎坚不可摧。

 

When blacksmiths get access to ancient magic, the forge becomes a sacred place. Here the finest weapons and armor are crafted. The most prized of these metals is crucible steel, which is known for its strength and durability. In times long gone it was said that crucible steel was forged in the fiery depths of the earth, tempered by the heat of a thousand suns. It was so strong that it could hold its edge even against the sharpest of blades. The finest blacksmiths would spend hours, if not days, working the crucible steel, carefully shaping it into the desired form. The result was a weapon or piece of armor that was virtually indestructible.

Kala Namak.name: 黑盐 Kala Namak
Kala Namak.description:
卡拉纳马克，或黑盐，既可以开采，也可以由炼金术士制作。制作过程包括将原盐与木炭一起封入陶罐中，并在烧制前加入哈拉德种子、余甘子、巴赫拉、金合欢树皮或天然碱，然后在炉中烧制24小时。制成的盐在未研磨时呈棕粉色至深紫色。

Kala Namak, or black salt, is both mined and crafted by alchemists. The crafting process involves sealing raw salts in ceramic jars with charcoal and adding harad seeds, amla, bahera, babul bark, or natron before firing them in a furnace for 24 hours. The resulting salt is brownish-pink to dark violet in color when ungrounded.

Kyanite.name: 蓝晶石 Kyanite
Kyanite.description:
蓝晶石通常用于制作陶瓷餐具，主要是因为它独特而美丽的蓝色。它是一种在加热时容易与许多其他材料融合的宝石。它也可以被研磨成细粉，用来制作高品质的墨水。

Kyanite is generally used in the creation of ceramic dishware, mainly due to its distinctive beautiful blue colors. It is a gemstone that blends easily with many other materials under heat. It can also be ground into a fine powder to make high-quality inks.

Skewers.name: 烤肉串 Skewers
Skewers.description:
肉类和蔬菜在被一块块串到烤签上之前会先切成片或丁，然后逐个穿起并烹制。肉类与蔬菜之间汁液的交融创造出独特而风味十足的口感。

Meats and vegetables are sliced or cubed before being threaded onto a skewer one by one and cooked. The mingling of juices between the meats and vegetables creates a unique and flavorful taste.

Chisel.name: 凿子 Chisel
Chisel.description:
这种切削工具被各类从事较重材料工作的行业所使用，用于修整、塑形或加工木材、石材或金属等坚实材料。通常会用木槌敲击它以确保精确。

This cutting tool is employed by various trades dealing with heavier materials, serving in dressing, shaping, or working solid materials such as wood, stone, or metal. Typically, it is struck with a mallet to ensure precision.

Lead.name: 领导 Lead
Lead.description:
“我听说过它最离谱的用途是，说来也好笑，化妆品，但我觉得它能有更好的用途。大多数拥有任何管道系统的城市都要感谢铅。”

 

这种特定金属相当沉重，外观呈银色并带有一丝蓝色。它主要用于弹药，因为它又重又耐用；也用于管道与管线，以及钓鱼。

"The weirdest stuff I’ve heard of it being used for is, funny enough, make-up, but I feel it can have better usage. Most cities that have any plumbing have it thanks to lead."

 

This specific metal is quite heavy and has a silvery appearance with a hint of blue. It's mainly used in ammunition due to it being heavy and resistant, plumbing and pipelines, as well as in fishing.

Seeds - Corn.name: 种子 - 玉米 Seeds - Corn
Seeds - Corn.description:
玉米种子是来自玉米植株的小而坚硬的籽粒。它们用于种植玉米——玉米在世界许多地区都是主食——也用于制作饼干、馅料、曲奇、啤酒和艾尔啤酒。这使其成为需求量很高的贸易商品。

Corn seeds are small, hard kernels that come from the corn plant. They are used to grow corn, which is a staple food in many parts of the world, as well as used to create biscuits, fillings, cookies, beer, and ales. Making it a highly demanded trade good.

Bark Tanned Hide.name: 树皮鞣制兽皮 Bark Tanned Hide
Bark Tanned Hide.description:
有些兽皮在收获后会直接用于加工，但也有一些会经历一道额外步骤，主要是为了获得特定的颜色。它们会被放入由多种油混合而成的液体配方中，并加入一种特定的树皮，在加工成皮革之前浸泡数周。整体工艺并不为许多皮革工所知，有时还会被误认为是鞣酸；然而，对那些了解并在工作中使用它的人来说，这确实能为他们多赚一笔，因为最终呈现的颜色往往相当独特。

While some hides, after harvesting, are used as is in processing, some of them go through an extra step, mainly to have a specific color. In a liquid concoction of multiple types of oil, with a specific tree bark, they are left to soak for several weeks prior to processing into leather. The overall process is not known by many leatherworkers, and sometimes confused with tannin, however, for those who know and use it in their work, it does fetch them an extra coin, as the end result color tends to be quite unique.

Mead.name: 蜂蜜酒 Mead
Mead.description:
大多数修道院将酿制蜜酒的传统作为养蜂的副产物延续下来，尤其是在无法种植葡萄的地区；然而，只要有任何形式蜂蜜的许可，蜜酒就可以轻易酿成。大多数酒馆则只是进口蜂蜜，并开始发酵过程，在本地生产蜜酒。

Most monasteries keep up the traditions of mead making as a byproduct of beekeeping, especially in areas where grapes could not be grown, however, as long there's access to any form of honey, mead can be easily made. Most taverns simply import honey and begin the fermentation process to produce mead locally.

Paring Chisel.name: 削切凿 Paring Chisel
Paring Chisel.description:
削刨凿受大多数木匠青睐，旨在精细地削去薄薄的木片。它们的主要用途是在拼接榫卯时小心刨去少量木料，而这些凿子的长长度为木匠提供了最大的控制力。

Paring chisels, favored by most carpenters, are designed for delicately shaving thin slivers of wood. Their primary use is in carefully shaving off thin amounts of wood when fitting joints and the long length of these chisels provides carpenters with maximum control.

Neon-Ront.name: 霓虹-隆特 Neon-Ront
Neon-Ront.description:
霓虹-隆特蘑菇位于最茂密的林地中，在那里阳光无法穿透浓密的树叶。霓虹-隆特蘑菇因其蓝色光芒而易于被发现。这种特定的真菌在许多生活在地下的文明中需求很高，因为它非常坚固，能很好地与岩石地形和墙壁结合，并且可以被切割成任何形状，因此可用于制作搁板。它也用于室内照明。

The Neon-Ront mushroom is located in the densest woodlands, where the light of the sun doesn't protrude from the dense foliage. The Neon-Ront mushroom can be located due to its blue light glow. This specific fungus is in high demand for many civilizations that live underground, as it can be used for shelving as it is quite sturdy, binds well with rocky terrain and walls, and can be cut into any shape. It is also used for indoor illumination.

Archery Target.name: 箭术目标 Archery Target
Archery Target.description:
最初，射箭靶只是简单的土堆，但熟练的弓箭手很快就会因反复命中同一位置而将其磨损。为了解决这个问题，人们开发了木制箭靶，主要由硬木制成，并用粗绳和稻草加固，以承受大量箭矢。更富有的弓箭手还能负担得起贴有彩色纸张的箭靶，用红、蓝、黑标记，打造出著名的靶心设计。

Originally, archery targets were simple mounds of earth, but skilled archers quickly wore them down by hitting the same spots repeatedly. To solve this, wooden archery targets were developed, made primarily of hardwood and reinforced with heavy rope and straw to handle the high amount of arrows. Wealthier archers could afford targets with colored paper, marked in red, blue, and black to create the famous bullseye design.

Djembe.name: 金贝鼓 Djembe
Djembe.description:
Djembe，有时也简称为Jembe，是一种用绳索调音、用赤手演奏的鼓。在一些地区，它的名字可译为“人人和平地聚集在一起”，体现了团结与社区精神。鼓身由硬木雕刻而成，而鼓面传统上由未经处理的山羊生皮制成，反映了其深厚的文化根源。

The djembe, sometimes referred to as simply the jembe, is a rope-tuned drum played with bare hands. Its name, in some areas, translates to 'everyone gathers together in peace', embodying unity and community spirit.
