The drum’s shell is carved from hardwood, while its head is traditionally made from untreated goat rawhide, reflecting its deep cultural roots.

Bearberry.name: 熊果 Bearberry
Bearberry.description:
许多采集者、草药师和炼金术士会在他们的工作场所周围种植熊果莓，因为人们认为它们会吸引蜜蜂和蜂鸟，以帮助授粉和产蜜，并吸引蝴蝶以收集它们的翅膀。熊果莓的果实在医药中用途很宽泛，主要用于药用茶饮。皮革工也会将熊果莓用作鞣制剂，把兽皮加工成皮革。

A lot of gatherers, herbalists, and alchemists grow Bearberries around their workplaces, as it is assumed that they attract bees and hummingbirds, to help with pollination and honey, and butterflies to harvest their wings. The Bearberry fruit is used very loosely in medicine, mainly in medicinal teas. Bearberries are also used by Leatherworkers as a tanning agent to turn hides into leather.

Bitterroot.name: 苦根 Bitterroot
Bitterroot.description:
苦根草是一种因其美丽的花朵而备受珍视的植物，花朵颜色丰富，并且能在大多数气候中存活。然而，受追捧的并不是花，而是这种植物的根。苦根草的根被视为美味佳肴，广受追寻。有些人相信，在旅途前食用苦根草能帮助驱避野兽。

Bitterroot is a plant that is prized for its beautiful flowers, which come in a range of colors and can survive in most climates. However, it is not the flowers that are in demand, but the roots of the plant. Bitterroot roots are considered a delicacy and are widely sought after. Some people believe that consuming bitterroot before a journey will help to keep wild beasts at bay.

Wooden Ladle.name: 木制长柄勺 Wooden Ladle
Wooden Ladle.description:
长柄勺在大多数厨房中都扮演着至关重要的角色。木制长柄勺专门用于昂贵或铸铁锅具，以防止刮伤并延长其使用寿命。

The ladle plays a crucial role in most kitchens. Wooden ladles are specifically used with expensive or cast-iron pots to prevent scratching and extend their lifespan.

Gem Encrusted Crown.name: 宝石镶嵌王冠 Gem Encrusted Crown
Gem Encrusted Crown.description:
一顶适合国王的王冠。通常由具备多样技能的珠宝匠制作，例如银器制作、金器制作和宝石切割，并且常常被民众授予“御用珠宝匠”这一显赫称号。他也负责维护每一件王室珠宝，确保它每次佩戴时都能保持完好无损的状态。

A crown fit for a king. Usually crafted by a jeweler with a diverse set of skills, such as silversmithing, goldsmithing, and gemcutting, and often honored with the distinguished title of Crown Jeweler by the populace. He is also responsible for maintaining each piece of royal jewelry, ensuring it remains in pristine condition every time it is worn.

Wooden Mannequin.name: 木制人体模型 Wooden Mannequin
Wooden Mannequin.description:
木制人体模型，也被称为摆人或人形模型，用途广泛，从艺术家到皮革工匠皆可使用。艺术家将这些人体模型用作雕塑的模具，涂上一层石膏，之后再将其取下以显露最终形态。与此同时，皮革工匠会将皮革围绕这些人形塑形，以制作适合类人形体型的皮甲和其他装备。

Wooden mannequins, also known as laymen or lay figures, have many uses, ranging from artists to leatherworkers. Artists utilize these mannequins as molds for their sculptures, applying a layer of gypsum that is later removed to reveal the final form. Meanwhile, leatherworkers shape leather around these figures to craft hide armor and other equipment tailored to fit a humanoid form.

Lantern Jack.name: 灯笼杰克 Lantern Jack
Lantern Jack.description:
啊，灯笼杰克。红收获节期间，没有一个集市推车或酒馆门阶在没有它对你咧嘴一笑时会显得真正对劲。最简单的情况下，它不过是一只挖空的南瓜，上面刻出眼睛和嘴巴，里面一支蜡烛摇曳欲熄。然而，它们的意义不止于蔬菜与蜡。黄昏时分站在村庄广场上，寒意沉沉降下，那一排排狞笑的面孔看起来几乎活着一般，仿佛一群从黑暗中注视着你的观众。

Ah, the Lantern Jack. No market cart nor tavern stoop feels quite right during Red Harvest without one grinning back at you. At its simplest, it’s just a hollowed pumpkin with eyes and a mouth carved in, a candle guttering inside. Yet there’s something more to them than vegetables and wax. Stand in a village square at dusk, the chill coming down, and those rows of leering faces look near alive, like a crowd watching you from the dark.

White Beans.name: 白豆 White Beans
White Beans.description:
白豆因其浅色和富含淀粉的质地而闻名。存在多种类型，具有各种形状和体型，并且常常因地区不同而拥有不同名称。尽管在烹饪中通常可互换使用，但每个品种都提供独特的体型、形态和风味。

White beans are known for their pale color and starchy texture. Multiple types exist in various shapes and sizes, often bearing different names depending on the region. Though commonly used interchangeably in cooking, each variety offers a distinct size, form, and taste.

Last Will.name: 最后意志 Last Will
Last Will.description:
通常作为财富和土地的转让而制定，由附近的领主或王国强制执行，以便资产按指示分配。有些遗嘱并非用于财富分配，而是作为传达临终想法、希望或遗产的方式，有时会在吟游诗人或神职人员的帮助下带有个人的接触。

Usually made as a transfer of wealth and land, enforced by a nearby lord or kingdom, for the assets to be distributed as instructed. Some wills are not for wealth distribution but serve as a way to communicate final thoughts, hopes, or legacies, sometimes with a personal touch through the aid of a bard or clergy.

Laurel.name: 劳瑞尔 Laurel
Laurel.description:
月桂来自一种常绿灌木或小树，通常以盆栽形式摆放在草药师的店里。月桂的药用特性使其成为所有医药从业者最觊觎的植物之一。它可以用于敷剂、茶饮、擦剂或直接作为药物，用于治疗任何种类的疾病以及任何形式的感染。它也是一种身份地位的象征，在一些地区月桂冠相当常见，或作为胜利或成就的象征。

The Laurel comes from an evergreen shrub or small tree, that is usually kept potted at a herbalist's store. The medicinal properties of the Laurel make it one of the most coveted plants by all medicinal practitioners. It can be used in poultices, teas, as a rub, or direct medicine, for any kind of disease to any form of infection. It is also a symbol of status, in some regions laurel crowns are quite common, or a symbol of victory or achievement.

Grog.name: 格罗格 Grog
Grog.description:
格罗格酒基本上就是用水稀释的朗姆酒。在前往新发现土地的远征期间，船长会把一桶桶朗姆酒兑水，以在延长有限补给的使用时间的同时让船员们保持满意。这种做法有助于在淡水和新鲜给养匮乏的长途航行中维持高昂的士气。

Grog is basically rum diluted with water. During expeditions to newly found lands, ship captains water down barrels of rum to keep the crew content while stretching their limited supplies over an extended period. This approach helped maintain high morale on long voyages where fresh provisions were scarce.

Skipjack Tuna.name: 鲣鱼 Skipjack Tuna
Skipjack Tuna.description:
鲣鱼是金枪鱼物种中最小且数量最多的。作为饵料，更偏好使用鲱鱼、鲭鱼或鱿鱼等活鱼。它们流线型、几乎无鳞的身体使其非常适合通过盐渍、熏制或腌制进行长期保存。

Skipjack are the smallest and most abundant of the tuna species. For bait, live fish such as herring, mackerel, or squid are preferred. Their streamlined, mostly scale-free bodies make them ideal for long-term preservation through salting, smoking, or pickling.

Lake Trout.name: 湖鳟 Lake Trout
Lake Trout.description:
湖鳟生活在凉爽、含氧量高的溪流与湖泊中。它们可以用多种饵料垂钓，包括漂流的整条蚯蚓，以及小鲦鱼和黄粉虫。湖鳟的一个独特特征是其在被捕获前的独特色彩：这条鱼会呈现鲜艳的彩虹般色调，但一旦离开水面，这些颜色就会褪去。

Lake Trout live in cool, well-oxygenated streams and lakes. They can be fished using a variety of baits, with drifting whole earthworms, as well as small minnows and mealworms. A unique feature of the lake trout is its unique coloration before being caught, the fish displays vibrant rainbow-like hues, but these colors fade once it is removed from the water.

Sea Salt.name: 海盐 Sea Salt
Sea Salt.description:
海盐，常被称为海湾盐，是通过蒸发海水来采收的，可通过煮沸，或在称为盐田的专门沿海盐场中让太阳完成这一过程。这种矿物在烹饪、食物保存、炼金术、皮革鞣制以及无数其他用途方面都至关重要。

Sea salt, often known as bay salt, is harvested by evaporating seawater, either through boiling or by allowing the sun to do the work in specialized coastal salt works, known as salterns. This mineral is essential in cooking, food preservation, alchemy, leather tanning, and countless other uses.

Redwood Log.name: 红杉原木 Redwood Log
Redwood Log.description:
一根通用的木材原木，几乎什么都能用得上，但通常见于木工与一般建筑中，可用于室内外家具、木瓦、栅栏桩、护墙板，甚至箭杆。

A universal wood log, it can be used in anything really but usually found in carpentry and general construction, ranging from indoor and outdoor furniture, shingles, fence posts, paneling, and even arrow shafts.

Dung Beetle.name: 蜣螂 Dung Beetle
Dung Beetle.description:
蜣螂的出现确实表明一片牧场相当健康，因为它们擅长分解并掩埋动物排泄物，从而改善土壤。虽然有点具争议性，但在一些地区，它们也被用于烹饪。捕获后会将其清洗、烘烤并脱水，有时还会加入调味料。有些食谱会先修剪蜣螂的翅膀和腿，然后用油与罗勒、辣椒和柠檬草一起翻炒至酥脆。

Dung Beetle their appearance does show that a pasture is quite healthy, as they are perfect in breaking down and burying animal waste, improving the soil. While, a bit controvesial, in some regions, they are used in cooking. After capturing they are cleaned, roasted, and dehydrated, sometimes with added seasonings. Some recipes involve trimming the wings and legs of the beetles, then stir-frying them with oil, basil, chiles, and lemongrass until crispy.

Carbuncle.name: 红玉兽 Carbuncle
Carbuncle.description:
亦称红榴石，是用于各种类型珠宝中最实惠的宝石之一。人们相信，如果将其镶嵌并附魔在武器上，用该武器的打击将杀死任何敌人。

Also known as Red Garnet, is one of the most affordable gemstones used in all types of jewelry. It is believed that if its mounted and enchanted on a weapon the strike with the weapon will kill any enemy.

Cymophane.name: 金绿猫眼石 Cymophane
Cymophane.description:
金绿玉髓在被制成珠子时，会因其能够以一种模仿猫科动物眼睛外观的方式反射光线而获得“猫眼石”这一名称。

Cymophane, when fashioned into beads, earns the name "Cat's Eye" from its ability to reflect light in a manner that mimics the appearance of a feline's eye.

Opuntia.name: 仙人掌 Opuntia
Opuntia.description:
仙人掌果有多种名称，其中最常见的是刺梨果。如果没有正确去除果实的外层，食入果实上的针毛（glochids，果实上的微小刺）会引起喉咙、嘴唇和舌头的不适，因为这些刺很容易刺入皮肤。其种子也可用于制作面粉。

Opuntia is known by various names, with Prickly Pear Fruit being the most common. If the outer layer of the fruit is not properly removed, ingesting glochids, tiny spines from the fruit, can cause discomfort in the throat, lips, and tongue, as these spines easily penetrate the skin. The seeds are also used to produce flour.

Dark River Gold.name: 黑暗河流金币 Dark River Gold
Dark River Gold.description:
这些钱币来源不明，总是由渔夫发现，但当它们出现时，人们将其视为不祥之兆。在河流或海中发现它们之后，与附近城市的贸易与交流会变慢或停止，而有关怪物入侵、海啸与火灾的传闻往往会从该地区传出。这些传闻的来源尚未得到证实。然而，尽管这些钱币稀有度很高，其持有者往往仍会迅速将其交易出去，几乎不求利润，可能是因为人们认为它们带有负面联想。

These coins, of unknown origin, are always discovered by fishermen, but when they appear, they are seen as a bad omen. After they are found in the rivers or seas, trade and communication with nearby cities slows down or stops, and rumors of monster invasions, tsunamis, and fires tend to emerge from the region. The source of these rumors is not yet verified. However, owners of the coins tend to quickly trade them for almost no profit, despite their rarity, possibly due to the perceived negative association.

Wooden Ornamentation.name: 木制装饰品 Wooden Ornamentation
Wooden Ornamentation.description:
在一些地区，普通民众喜欢在他们的房屋、船只，甚至篱笆上进行大量装饰。尽管这通常是一项昂贵的工程，但最终成果在未来几代人中都赏心悦目。

In some regions, common folk enjoy extensive ornamentation on their houses, ships, and even fences. Though it tends to be an expensive project, the end result is visually appealing for generations to come.
Wooden Ornamentation.gmnote:
模组文件夹中存在替代图标

Alternative icons exist in the module's folder

Red Onion.name: 红洋葱 Red Onion
Red Onion.description:
也被称为紫洋葱，它通常新鲜食用，可作为沙拉或混合沙拉的一部分，尤其是作为某些传统豆类与熏火腿汤的必备装饰。

Also referred to as purple onion, it is usually served fresh, as a salad or part of mixed salads, and especially as a compulsory garnish for some traditional bean-and-smoked ham soups.

Sandalwood Lumber.name: 檀香木材 Sandalwood Lumber
Sandalwood Lumber.description:
檀香木极其稀有且珍贵，用于精细雕刻、制作坚固的家具、药物、化妆品，以及宗教仪式。树木的心材因其香气而备受珍视，也是制作精美雕花家具和工具的最优质天然材料之一。

Sandalwood is extremely rare and precious, it is used for intricate carvings, to make sturdy furniture, medicines, cosmetics, and religious rites. The heartwood of the tree is treasured for its aroma and is one of the finest natural materials for making beautifully carved furniture and tools.

Thimble.name: 顶针 Thimble
Thimble.description:
顶针外形类似一顶小帽，通常由金属或骨制成，戴在指尖上，以在缝纫时将针穿过布料时保护手指。它是裁缝和皮革匠珍爱的工具，因为在他们的工具套装中不可或缺。

Resembling a small cap, typically made of metal or bone, the thimble is worn over the fingertip to safeguard it while pushing a needle through cloth during sewing. A cherished tool among tailors and leatherworkers, as it is indispensable in their toolset.

Flat Tongs.name: 平口钳 Flat Tongs
Flat Tongs.description:
这些特定的钳子有多种形状，从一种纤细的设计（用于在金属上制作小凹痕）到更宽大的变体（用于夹持炽热的金属）。它们是最通用的钳子类型之一，用于拾起并夹紧炽热的扁平金属片，是大多数新手铁匠偏好的工具。

These particular tongs are available in various shapes, ranging from a slender design crafted for creating small indentations in metals to broader variants designed for handling firey-hot metals. They stand out as some of the most versatile types of tongs, serving the purpose of picking up and gripping hot pieces of flat metal, preferred by most novice blacksmiths.

Vanadium.name: 钒 Vanadium
Vanadium.description:
钒是诸界中备受渴求的金属，而且理由十分充分。它极其稀有，拥有深邃的绿灰色光泽，在光线下熠熠生辉。一些铁匠和炼金术师能为钒灌注魔法特性，使其价值更高。钒非常轻却比钢更坚固，并且据推测它能够吸收并储存魔法能量。

Vanadium is a desired metal throughout the realms, and for very good reason. It is insanely rare and has a deep, green-gray luster that shines in the light. Some blacksmiths and alchemists can imbue vanadium with magical properties, making it even more valuable. Vanadium is very light yet stronger than steel and is speculated that it can absorb and store magical energy.

Marble.name: 大理石 Marble
Marble.description:
熟练雕塑家的心爱工具，大理石在他们雕刻时将思想与情感化作美丽的雕塑。抛光至光亮后，出售时能为雕塑家带来可观的利润。大理石是能用金钱买到的最沉重、最坚韧的石材之一。其优雅使其成为贵族的热门选择，他们将其用于室内地面铺装和厚重家具。

The favorite tool of skilled sculptors, marble, transforms thoughts and emotions into beautiful sculptures as they carve it. Polished to a shine, it earns the sculptor a hefty profit when sold. Marble is one of the heaviest and most resilient stones that can be bought with coin. Its elegance makes it a popular choice for nobility, who use it for indoor flooring and heavy furnishings.

Teak Log.name: 柚木原木 Teak Log
Teak Log.description:
这些原木通常采自热带地区，并以其耐用性以及对腐烂和腐朽的抗力而闻名。这些原木常用于建造坚固耐用的结构，例如建筑、桥梁和栅栏，也用于制作家具。这种木材还因其对害虫和昆虫的抗力而备受珍视，使其成为家居用品的热门选择。

The logs are typically harvested from tropical regions and are known for their durability and resistance to rot and decay. The logs are often used to create strong and sturdy structures, such as buildings, bridges, and fences, as well as furniture. The wood is also prized for its resistance to pests and insects, making it a popular choice for use in household items.

The Sickener.name: 作呕者 The Sickener
The Sickener.description:
致病菇，或称呕吐红菇，是一种游走在危险与烹饪乐趣之间的蘑菇。食用后可能导致恶心和呕吐，因此得了这个阴森的绰号。然而，一些地区将其作为香料用于匈牙利炖牛肉等传统菜肴中，依靠精心处理来中和其令人不适的特性。

The Sickener, or Vomiting Russula, is a mushroom that walks the line between danger and culinary delight. Its consumption can lead to nausea and vomiting, hence its grim nickname. Yet, some regions use it as a spice in traditional dishes like goulash, relying on careful preparation to neutralize its unpleasant properties.

Chalk Limestone Ashlar.name: 白垩石灰岩方石 Chalk Limestone Ashlar
Chalk Limestone Ashlar.description:
由最优秀的石匠制作，这些瓦片被打造用于建筑外部的装饰风格化，或在少数情况下作为地砖。其浅色使其成为由石材建造的教堂、大教堂或王室庄园装饰的热门选择。尽管如此，作为瓦片其耐久性有限，导致在较近的时代它们被大理石或花岗岩所取代。

Created by the finest masons, tiles were crafted for the exterior stylization of buildings or, in rare cases, as floor tiles. Their light coloring made them a popular choice for the ornamentation of churches, cathedrals, or royal manors constructed from stone. Despite this, their limited durability as tiles led to their replacement with either marble or granite in more recent times.

Safe Balm.name: 安全香膏 Safe Balm
Safe Balm.description:
炼金术师制造的一种用于缓解疼痛的小型药膏。然而，据推测，如果将其涂抹在皮肤上，它也能治疗发烧以及感冒。这是大多数平民所持的信念，通常用来治疗他们的孩子。

A small balm created by alchemists to alleviate pain. It is however speculated that, if it is rubbed on the skin, it can also cure fevers, as well, as colds. This is a belief held by most commonfolk and usually used to treat their children.

Novaculite.name: 诺瓦库莱特石 Novaculite
Novaculite.description:
诺瓦库石，外观类似石英，承担着高度专门化的用途。它最初用于制作箭头和矛尖，后来因成为制造磨刀石的主要材料而声名鹊起，这在生产磨石时至关重要。

Novaculite, resembling quartz, fulfills highly specialized roles. Originally utilized for crafting arrow and spear points, it has since gained prominence as the primary material for manufacturing sharpening stones, essential in the production of whetstones.

Morning Breeze.name: 晨风 Morning Breeze
Morning Breeze.description:
这种不含酒精的饮料相当清爽。主要由冷泡茶制成，以柠檬和薄荷调味，并加入一小勺糖。清晨时饮用，尤其当阳光透过玻璃时，它会呈现出奇妙的金色光辉，而且人们也相信它能治愈所有宿醉。

This non-alcoholic beverage is quite refreshing. Primarily made from cold-brewing tea, it has lemon and mint for flavors, and a single spoonful of sugar. When served in the morning, especially as sunlight filters through the glass, it takes on a wondrous golden glow and is also believed that it can cure all hangovers.

Tannin Leather.name: 鞣酸皮革 Tannin Leather
Tannin Leather.description:
鞣酸指的是一种特定形式的鞣制方法，使用特定类型的树皮来加固皮革；在一些地区，它也被简称为植物鞣制。大多数皮匠都尽量避免这种方法，因为它非常耗时；然而，贵族却很喜欢它，因为他们对其有所误解，认为这是用蔬菜制成的皮革，而实际上，在鞣制过程中只使用了一种特定的树皮。

Tannin refers to the specific form of tanning, using a specific type of bark to strengthen the leather, in some regions, simply known as vegetable tanning. Most leatherworkers attempt to avoid it as it is quite time consuming, however, nobility love it as they misunderstand it and believe that it is leather made out of vegetables, while in reality, only a specific bark is used in the tanning process.

Cerrosafe.name: 塞罗斯安全合金 Cerrosafe
Cerrosafe.description:
Cerrosafe 是模具制造行业中的一种宝贵材料。它以精确捕捉精细细节的能力而闻名，使其成为复杂陶瓷和砖模具的首选。其低熔点也意味着它无法承受高温应用，从而减少了其在金属锻造或高温窑炉与锻炉作业等工艺中的使用。

Cerrosafe is a valuable material in the mold-making industry. Its ability to capture fine details with precision makes it a favorite choice for intricate ceramic and brick molds. Its low melting temperature also means it cannot withstand high heat applications, minimizing its use in processes like metal forging or high-temperature kiln and forge work.

Seed Potato.name: 种子土豆 Seed Potato
Seed Potato.description:
种子马铃薯是为下一个生长周期种植而挑选的马铃薯。与经历过多次收获的成熟马铃薯不同，种子马铃薯在生长过程中较早收获。虽然它们用于种植，但仍然像普通马铃薯一样适合烹饪。

Seed potatoes are potatoes that are chosen for planting in the next growing cycle. Unlike mature potatoes that have been through several harvests, seed potatoes are harvested earlier in the growing process. While they are used for planting, they are still suitable for cooking just like regular potatoes.

Box of Horrors.name: 恐怖之盒 Box of Horrors
Box of Horrors.description:
它们只在红色收获期间出现，那时夜晚变得漫长，空气里充斥着烟与苹果酒的臭味。孩子们一整年都在等它们，因为它们被糖果塞得满满当当，手指黏糊糊、嘴唇被染成紫色，在篝火之间穿梭乱跑。成年的商人假装自己不屑于这些东西，尽管我见过不止一位商队领队在营地搭好之前就把整箱都“检查”了一遍。

They appear only during Red Harvest, when the nights grow long and the air stinks of smoke and cider. Children wait all year for them, as they are filled to the brim with sweets, darting between bonfires with sticky fingers and purple-stained lips. Grown traders pretend they’re above such things, though I’ve seen more than one caravan master “inspect” an entire box before camp is set.

Sanidine.name: 圣丁岩 Sanidine
Sanidine.description:
钠长石是一种宝石，常见于山顶，也零星出现在沙漠地区。沙漠的游牧部族相信将其放入水中有助于净化，尽管若无奥术协助便缺乏确凿证据。

Sanidine is a gemstone commonly found on mountaintops and sporadically in desert areas. Nomadic tribes of the desert believe that placing it in water assists in purification, although definitive evidence is absent without arcane assistance.

Amaranth.name: 苋菜 Amaranth
Amaranth.description:
通常被称为红根苋，它主要用于谷物，然后进一步加工成面粉。由于其快速爆发式生长，使用它们时更偏好“三姐妹”农业方法，在收获时提供混合的产出。

Commonly referred to as redroot pigweed, it is primarily used for grain, and then further processed to flour. Due to its quick explosive growth, the three sisters agricultural method is preferred with them, providing a mixture of yields at the moment of harvest.

Maiden Voyage.name: 处女航 Maiden Voyage
Maiden Voyage.description:
“处女航”是船只下水后首次航行的名称；然而，同名的饮品通常由酒馆老板提供，用来在所爱之人离开生者之境后，作为纪念他们的饮品。该饮品主要由荷兰杜松子酒构成，这是一种以杜松调味的烈性金酒，并混合了玉米酒。

Maiden voyage is the name given to the first trip that a ship makes after it has been launched, however, the drink bearing the same name is usually provided by the tavern-keeps as a drink to commemorate loved ones, after passing from the realm of the living. The drink is primarily jenever, a juniper-flavored strong gin with a mixture of corn wine.

Sinhalite.name: 辛哈莱特石 Sinhalite
Sinhalite.description:
天然形成的辛哈莱特呈现为黄色宝石，外形类似圆润的卵石，由活跃溪流或干涸河床中水流的翻滚作用塑形。

Sinhalite, occurring naturally, manifests as yellow gemstones resembling rounded pebbles, shaped by the tumbling action of water in active streams or dried-up riverbeds.

Broadcloth.name: 宽幅布 Broadcloth
Broadcloth.description:
最常见的布料类型，通常被称为普通布。传统上用于各种形式的服装，也用于室内装饰，例如桌布、窗帘和墙面覆盖物。

The most common type of cloth, it is usually referred to as plain cloth. Traditionally used in any form of clothing, as well, as for interior decoration, such as tablecloths, curtains, and wall covers.

Ferrochrome Aquarum.name: 水之铬铁 Ferrochrome Aquarum
Ferrochrome Aquarum.description:
一种极为稀有的合金，被时代遗忘，其锻造图纸与性质皆不为人知。它在塑形后坚固耐用如同铁一般，然而当金属被移动时，其表面会出现类似雨点溅起的波纹般的小涟漪。曾试图鉴定它的炼金术师与施法者都感到困惑不解，甚至导致危险的后果。然而它本质上并非魔法物品。炼金术师之间有一种常见而沉默的共识：当冒险者请求鉴定时，他们只会将其描述为一种硬化的液态金属。

A very rare alloy, forgotten by time, with unknown schematics and properties. Its strength is as durable as iron when molded into shape, yet when the metal is moved, small ripples similar to rain splatter waves appear on it. Alchemists and casters who tried to identify it have been baffled, leading to dangerous consequences. Yet it is not magical in nature. A common, silent agreement among alchemists is that when adventurers ask for identification, they simply describe it as a hardened liquid metal.

Silver Winter.name: 银色寒冬 Silver Winter
Silver Winter.description:
这枚硬币是吟游诗人学院内部成就与地位的象征。在成功完成学院的最后一年后，学员会获得一枚由艺术系学生打造的铜币，其上刻有精细的季节纹样。这枚硬币也有其他图案可选，例如银日、雪或夏，每一种都对应不同的季节。尽管其名称如此，这枚硬币由铜制成，其价值与一枚银币相近。

This coin is a symbol of achievement and status within the bardic colleges. After successfully completing their last year of college, attendees are given a copper coin crafted by art students, featuring intricate seasonal markings. The coin is also available in other patterns, such as Silver Solar, Snow, or Summer, each corresponding to a different season. Despite its name, the coin is made of copper and holds a value similar to that of a silver piece.

Red Paper Wasp.name: 红纸胡蜂 Red Paper Wasp
Red Paper Wasp.description:
红纸蜂是一种无敌意的黄蜂，只有在其巢穴受到威胁时才会变得具有攻击性。它们的毒液可以被草药师采集用以制作药物，由于这种昆虫温顺的行为，可以安全地采收。

Red Paper is a non-hostile type of wasp that becomes aggressive only when its nest is threatened. Their venom can be collected by herbalists to produce medicine, safely harvested due to the insect’s docile behavior.

Zombie.name: Zombie
Zombie.description:
丧尸（特征）是一种异域鸡尾酒，由果汁制成，例如青柠和葡萄柚汁、肉桂糖浆、利口酒，以及三种不同类型的朗姆酒。通常会配上朗朗上口的短句来上桌，比如“让死者行走与交谈。”或“渴望刺激？很快你就会透过亡灵的双眼凝视！”

Zombie is an exotic cocktail made of fruit juices, such as lime and grapefruit juice, cynnamon syrup, liqueurs, and three different types of rum. Usually served with catchy frazes like "Let's make the dead walk and talk." or "Craving action? Soon you’ll be staring through the eyes of the undead!"

Cedar Plank.name: 雪松木板 Cedar Plank
Cedar Plank.description:
由于雪松木坚固耐用，它是制作框架和建筑其他结构部件的理想材料。雪松木板常用于地板、外墙板、屋顶以及其他对强度和稳定性要求较高的用途。

Because cedar wood is strong and durable, it is an ideal material for creating frames and other structural components of a building. Cedar planks are often used for flooring, siding, roofing, and other applications where strength and stability are important.

Gallows.name: Gallows
Gallows.description:
一根直立的立柱，上方横置一根横梁，构成了绞刑架的基本结构，用于处决因骇人听闻的行为而被判死刑的囚犯。除了惩罚之外，它们还曾作为公开展示正义的场所，或在某些情况下，在动乱之后对民众起到警示作用，往往是在地区上层阶级的指示下。

One single upright post with a beam at the top forms the basic structure of the gallows, designed for executing death row inmates guilty of horrendous acts. Beyond punishment, they have served as public displays of justice or, in some cases, as a warning to the people after the unrest, often at the direction of the regional higher class.

Records.name: 记录 Records
Records.description:
公共记录通常由当地档案管理员创建，用于存储与城镇相关的特定信息。这些信息被保存下来，以追踪在较长时代跨度内发生的变化。记录通常包括诸如建造的建筑、采集与交易的资源、征收的税款、举行的选举，以及许多其他城镇特有的事务等细节。档案管理员确保公共记录井然有序、易于查阅，并为后代保存。

Public records are typically created by the local archivist to store information specific to the town. This information is kept to track changes over extended periods of time. The records usually include details such as buildings constructed, resources harvested and traded, taxes collected, elections held, and many other town-specific matters. The archivist ensures that the public records are well-organized, accessible, and preserved for future generations.

Green Olive.name: 青橄榄 Green Olive
Green Olive.description:
青橄榄在长到完整体型但仍未成熟时采摘。它们通常呈现从绿色到黄色的色调。橄榄通常会经过发酵以便保存更长的时代，并且一般最终会作为健康零食被食用。 

Green olives are picked when they have grown to full size, while still unripe. They can usually be found in shades from green to yellow. Olives are usually fermented to preserve them for a longer period of time and they generally end up being eaten as a healthy snack.

Pure-Metal Brass Ingot.name: 纯金属黄铜锭 Pure-Metal Brass Ingot
Pure-Metal Brass Ingot.description:
纯金属黄铜锭由最优质的精选铜与锌制成。它们在制作烛台、大教堂钟和圣髑匣等宗教物品方面日益流行，往往能卖出高价。尽管比青铜略软，但其抗力使其非常适合用于海军与沿海以及海军军用道具。

Pure-Metal Brass Ingots are manufactured from the finest curated copper and zinc. They have become increasingly popular for crafting religious objects such as candlesticks, cathedral bells, and reliquaries, often fetching a high price. Though slightly softer than bronze, its corrosion resistance makes it ideal for naval and coastal and naval military gear.

Aurichalcum Ore.name: 奥利哈刚矿石 Aurichalcum Ore
Aurichalcum Ore.description:
在大地的矿脉深处蕴藏着奥里哈钢，一种由锌与铜构成的合金，闪耀如黄铜，却与黄金同等珍贵。在最为罕见的条件下，当压力不断累积、时代无尽延展时，这种合金会结晶为奥里哈方解石。由奥里哈钢铸造的钱币曾被视为价值连城的珍宝，在久远的社会中象征着繁荣与权力。

Deep within the veins of the earth lies Aurichalcum, an alloy of zinc and copper, shimmering like brass yet valued as highly as gold. In the rarest of conditions, where pressure mounts and time stretches endlessly, this alloy crystallizes into Aurichalcite. Coins forged from Aurichalcum were considered treasures of great worth, symbolizing prosperity and power in societies long past.

Scarlet.name: 猩红色 Scarlet
Scarlet.description:
最昂贵的羊毛布料材料，通常使用胭脂虫染料染色，由稀有昆虫制成，为织物提供鲜艳的红色，使其成为使用中最昂贵的染料之一。这种材料仅由最优秀的女裁缝或制衣师使用。 

The most expensive woolen cloth material, often dyed with kermes dye, created from rare insects, which provides a bright red color to the fabric making it one the most expensive dyes in use. This type of material is only used by the finest seamstresses or dressmakers.

Radish.name: 萝卜 Radish
Radish.description:
萝卜的根通常生吃，尽管更多时候是蒸着吃。它们多用于沙拉，但也会出现在一些地方菜肴中。萝卜的种子可以被压榨以提取萝卜种子油。

The root of the radish is usually eaten raw, although it is more often than not steamed. They are mostly used in salads but they also appear in some regional dishes. The seeds of radishes can be pressed to extract radish seed oil.

Oak Plank.name: 橡木木板 Oak Plank
Oak Plank.description:
一种易于加工且耐用的木材，可与木工工具一起使用，最适合用于制作家具。

An easy-to-work durable wood that is used with carpentry tools and is best to use when building furniture.

Sushi.name: 寿司 Sushi
Sushi.description:
寿司由醋饭制成，通常用糖和盐调味，并与各种食材（如蔬菜和肉类，主要是海鲜）搭配。它通常用干海苔包裹，可以生食或熟食。

Sushi is made out of vinegared rice, usually seasoned with sugar and salt, combined with various ingredients like vegetables and meats, primarily seafood. It is commonly wrapped in dried seaweed and can be served either raw or cooked.

Brass.name: 黄铜 Brass
Brass.description:
黄铜与青铜相似，后者是另一种含有铜和锡的合金。由于其明亮的金色外观，黄铜是一种相当受欢迎的装饰材料。它的用途范围从锁、铰链和齿轮到管道与阀门，也用于制作诸如号角或钟铃之类的乐器。

Brass is similar to bronze, another alloy containing Copper and Tin. Brass is quite a popular material for decoration due to its bright gold appearance. Its usage ranges from locks, hinges, and gears to plumbing and valves, as well as in the creation of instruments like horns or bells.

Alchemical Brass.name: 炼金黄铜 Alchemical Brass
Alchemical Brass.description:
在炼金术士与铁匠难得合作的情况下，他们能够创造出真正独一无二的东西。其中一项造物便是一块锭，可用于加固武器，使其强大到在精准命中时甚至能劈开山岳。据说，当将炼金黄铜添加到一把普通武器上时，会提高武器的精准度，并提升命中要害部位的几率，使打击更加致命。

On the rare occasions when Alchemists and Blacksmiths collaborate, they are able to create something truly unique. One such creation is an ingot that can be used to reinforce a weapon, making it so powerful that it can even break mountains when it strikes true. It is said that when Alchemical Brass is added to a regular weapon, it increases the weapon's accuracy and increases the chances of striking vital areas, making the strikes even more fatal.

Ticks.name: 蜱虫 Ticks
Ticks.description:
蜱虫是一种会附着在路过的动物和普通人身上以吸食它们血液的昆虫。它们栖息在高草丛和林地区域，等待宿主擦身而过。每当草药师不得不处理一只蜱虫时，由于它们是众所周知的疾病携带者，他也会要求农夫检定他们所拥有的所有牲畜。

Ticks are insects that latch onto passing animals and common folk to feed on their blood. They are found in tall grasses and wooded areas, waiting for a host to brush by. Everytime a herbalist has to handle an tick, as they are known carriers of diseases, it asks the farmers to check all livestock that they own as well.

Crab.name: Crab
Crab.description:
螃蟹在许多气候带都很丰富，而且相当容易捕捉，但其需求使得它们的价格一直居高不下。渔民使用结实的钢丝陷阱，通常以鸡肉或小鱼作饵，引诱它们进入。在美食圈中备受推崇的螃蟹，与黄油、大蒜和芳香香料一同烹饪时，会成为令人无法抗拒的美味佳肴。

Crabs are abundant across many climates and fairly simple to catch, yet their demand keeps their price high. Fishermen use sturdy steel-wire traps, often baited with chicken or small fish, to lure them in. Prized in culinary circles, crabs become an irresistible delicacy when cooked with butter, garlic, and aromatic spices.

Apple.name: 苹果 Apple
Apple.description:
苹果几乎在所有地区都有种植，通常生吃，不过也可以用于不同的菜肴，主要是派，或用于酒精发酵以制作艾尔啤酒或当地苹果酒。

Apples are grown almost in all regions and they are usually eaten raw, however, they can also be used in different dishes mainly pies, or in alcohol fermentation for ales or local ciders.

Gem Encrusted Polyhedral Dice.name: 宝石镶嵌多面骰 Gem Encrusted Polyhedral Dice
Gem Encrusted Polyhedral Dice.description:
一套镶嵌的骰子套装，通常包含多种骰子类型。工匠用发光的钠长石雕刻出优雅的骰子套装，并在每颗骰子上嵌入铜质箍条以加固其边缘。这些套装通常与由平民游玩的故事驱动型游戏一同出现。一些更著名的作品包括“探险者”系列，以及目前已推出到第七版的“职责与神祇”的多个版本。

An encrusted dice set, typically containing multiple die types. Artisans carve elegant dice sets from luminous albite, inlaying each die with copper bindings to fortify its edges. These sets are usually accompanied by story-driven games played by commoners. Some of the more famous titles include the "Explorer" series as well as multiple editions of "Duties and Divinities" currently sitting at it's seventh edition.

Corvus Corax.name: 科拉克斯乌鸦 Corvus Corax
Corvus Corax.description:
Corvus Corax 更常被称为乌鸦头骨。它主要被最迷信的人用作引路护符，或穿在链条或系带上并悬挂作为护身符。对其他人而言，它是智慧、聪慧与洞察力的象征。它也可以代表死亡，并且在不同地区、根源与民间传说中，还是蜕变的象征。

The Corvus Corax is more commonly referred to as a raven skull. It is mainly used by the most superstitious folk as a guiding talisman or threaded upon a chain or lace and hung as a charm. For others is a symbol of wisdom, intelligence, and insight. It can also represent mortality and is a symbol of transformation, depending on the region, tradition, and folklore.

Aragonite.name: 霰石 Aragonite
Aragonite.description:
霰石是最难切割的宝石之一，需要技艺高超的宝石切割师才能将其雕琢成装饰用宝石。有传言说这些宝石在近距离时会干扰魔法物品，但这种说法通常被认为毫无根据。

Aragonite is one of the most challenging gemstones to cut, requiring the expertise of a highly skilled gemstone cutter to shape it into ornamental stones. There are rumors that these stones can interfere with magical items when in close proximity, but such claims are generally considered unfounded.

Eggplants.name: 茄子 Eggplants
Eggplants.description:
这种海绵状、吸水性强的果实最常见为紫色，依据地区不同被用于多种菜系中，也可称为aubergine或brinjal。通常在烹饪中作为蔬菜用于制作茄子沙拉，其中包含葵花籽油、盐，以及在明火上烤制的茄子。

Most commonly purple, the spongy, absorbent fruit is used in several cuisines, depending on the region, and can also be found under the name of aubergine or brinjal. Typically used as a vegetable in cooking eggplant salad which contains sunflower oil, salt, and eggplants roasted over open fire.

Black Pearl.name: 黑珍珠 Black Pearl
Black Pearl.description:
仅作为描述性因素被称为“黑珍珠”，因为众所周知，可以通过染色使珍珠呈现这种特定的深色。在一些宗教中，人们相信如果发现了这些珍珠，它们会根据具体情况显示神祇的眷顾或不悦

Called the Black Pearl only as a descriptor factor, for it is known that it's possible to dye the pearl to achieve this specific dark color. In some religions, it is believed that if these pearls are found, they show the deity's favor or disfavor based on circumstance

Obsidian Ingot.name: 黑曜石锭 Obsidian Ingot
Obsidian Ingot.description:
黑曜石锭是一小块经专家精细凿刻而成的纯黑曜石条。相传它密度与重量都令人难以置信，只能由最娴熟的铁匠打造。这种金属呈现深沉的暗色，仿佛能吸收光线，但当它被敲击时，会以炽烈的内在光芒发亮。

An obsidian ingot is a small, expertly chiseled bar of pure obsidian. It is said to be incredibly dense and heavy, and can only be crafted by the most skilled blacksmiths. The metal has a deep, dark color that seems to absorb light, but when struck, it glows with a fiery inner light.

Weakfish.name: 弱鱼 Weakfish
Weakfish.description:
海鳟以其美味的口感和顽强的搏斗而闻名。它们在较温暖的月份洄游至近岸产卵，并在河口与沿海水域繁衍生息。由于易于处理，海鳟主要用于烹饪，常见做法是烘烤或油炸。或者，其细嫩的质地也使其成为制作鱼肉玉米饼或炸鱼薯条的绝佳选择。

Weakfish are known for their delicious taste and spirited fight. They migrate inshore during the warmer months to spawn and thrive in estuarine and coastal waters. Primarily used in cooking due to its ease of preparation, Weakfish is commonly baked or fried. Alternatively, its delicate texture makes it an excellent option for fish tacos or fish and potato chips.

Capricia Verde.name: 卡普里西亚·韦尔德 Capricia Verde
Capricia Verde.description:
卡普里西亚·维尔德是一种加入朗姆酒的烈性酿饮，通常还会加入橙子、橙叶和肉桂。不论其配料如何，卡普里西亚·维尔德都是友谊的象征。水手们常在庆典、告别之时，或在挺过风暴之后传递它的杯盏，使其成为一种共享团结与情谊的仪式。

Capricia Verde is a strong brew with rum, and usually, orange, orange leaves, and cinnamon. Regardless of its ingredients, Capricia Verde is a symbol of camaraderie. Sailors often pass around mugs of it during celebrations, farewells, or after surviving storms, placing it as a ritual of shared unity and fellowship.

Bear's Trace.name: 熊之踪迹 Bear's Trace
Bear's Trace.description:
闪光独角兽与金鹿钱币在一些人眼中被认为很有价值，但林地住民因其金属特性而拒绝接触它们。为了创造一种替代品，住民将一块土壤注入魔法，而每位铸造者都会用自己动物形态的爪、利爪或蹄在模具中留下独特印记作为签名。这些钱币因其魔法灌注而拥有接近一枚铜币的价值，并且曾有人尝试过多次伪造。然而，熟悉奥秘技艺的人能够看出该钱币是赝品，或者只需加水即可，因为钱币由土壤制成，会直接变得泥泞。魔法灌注还赋予钱币排水特性，使其更难被伪造。

The Gleaming Unicorn and Golden Deer coins are considered valuable by some, but woodland folk refuse to touch them due to their metal properties. To create an alternative, the folk imbue a piece of soil with magic, and each minter uses their own animal form paw, claw, or hoof to create a unique mark in the mold as a signature. These coins have a value close to a copper due to their magical imbue, and multiple forgeries have been attempted. However, those familiar with the arcane arts can realize the coin is a counterfeit, or simply by adding water, as the coin is made of soil and it simply gets muddy. The magical imbuement also gives the coins water-repelling properties, making them harder to counterfeit.

Epidote.name: 绿帘石 Epidote
Epidote.description:
绿帘石是一种在各类矿井中大量出产的装饰性宝石，因其双重用途而备受珍视。它尤其被用作制作旨在驱避不死生物的药水的成分，也被用作书写卷轴的墨水。

The Epidote, an ornamental stone abundant in various mines, is prized for its dual utility. It is notably used as an ingredient in potions designed to ward off the unliving and as ink for inscribing scrolls.

Moonstone.name: 月光石 Moonstone
Moonstone.description:
“有个传说称，狼人在仅仅看到这块石头时，就会被迫变形。确实相当迷人。”

它是流通中最实惠的宝石之一，在某些社会中，人们会将它缝在衣物上作为护身符。

"There's a legend that lycanthropes, just at the mere sight of this stone, are forced to shape-shift. Quite fascinating, indeed."

It is one of the most affordable gemstones in circulation and in some societies it is sewn into garments as a charm.

Brotherhood of the North.name: 北境兄弟会 Brotherhood of the North
Brotherhood of the North.description:
被辨认为一本历史书，其大部分内容尚未被完全翻译。历史学家们在每次修订时都会尝试用最新的发现来更新这本书，然而，它似乎是用一种早在数千年前就已灭绝的语言写成的。从目前可用的译文来看，文本似乎主要由描写争夺北境领土之战的诗歌构成。然而，即便这些解读也存在巨大争议，因为译文的准确性仍不确定。

Identified as a historical book, most of its contents have yet to be fully translated. Historians, with each revision, attempt to update the book with their latest findings, however, it appears to be written in an extinct language from millennia ago. From the currently available translations, the text seems to consist mostly of poems describing battles for Nordic territories. Yet, even these interpretations are heavily debated, as the accuracy of the translations remains uncertain.

Axinite.name: 阿克西尼特 Axinite
Axinite.description:
斧石宝石不幸呈棕色，这种颜色在宝石中并不吃香。尽管如此，它们仍常被用于戒指，因为它们能够保持锋利的棱边，并能经受酒馆斗殴的磕碰与折腾。这也为它们赢得了“指节石”的绰号。

Axinite gemstones have the misfortune of being brown, a color not in high demand for gemstones. Despite this, they are often used in rings because they can maintain a sharp edge and endure the rough and tumble of a tavern brawl. This has earned them the nickname "knuckle stones".

Shrimp.name: 虾 Shrimp
Shrimp.description:
虾通常通过拖网捕捞，这是一种渔业方法，一艘或多艘船在船后拖拽一张大网，将其路径上的任何海洋生物一并扫起。由于虾并非这种捕捞方法的唯一目标，它们的供应可能相当不稳定，导致城镇市场上的价格高昂。

Shrimp are usually captured through trawling, a fishing method in which one or more ships drag a large net behind them, sweeping up any sea creatures in its path. Because the Shrimp is not the sole target of this fishing method, their availability can be quite inconsistent, leading to high prices in town markets.

Birch Log.name: 桦木原木 Birch Log
Birch Log.description:
桦木原木是诸界中常见却不可或缺的物品，因其多用途与实用性而备受珍视。它是一段细长、色泽浅淡的原木，采自遍布各地大量生长的桦树。木材坚韧而富有弹性，使其非常适合用于多种用途。工匠与手艺人都看重桦木原木的可塑性，能够将其加工塑形为各种各样的物件。它常被用来制作从简单工具与家用物品，到精细雕刻以及精巧家具部件在内的各种物品。

The Birch Log is a common yet essential item within the realms, prized for its versatility and utility. It is a thin, pale log harvested from the birch trees that grow in abundance throughout the land. The wood is strong yet pliable, making it perfect for a wide variety of uses. Craftsmen and artisans alike value the Birch Log for its ability to be shaped and molded into a wide range of objects. It is often used to create everything from simple tools and household items to intricate carvings and intricate pieces of furniture.

Cheese Elixir.name: 奶酪灵药 Cheese Elixir
Cheese Elixir.description:
这种药水由多种稀有而奇异的奶酪与一小撮魔法调配而成，每一种都拥有其独特的性质与风味。饮用后，奶酪灵药会赋予饮用者指挥并控制一切形式奶酪的能力，从最柔软的布里奶酪到最坚硬的帕尔马干酪。

This potion is made from a blend of rare and exotic cheeses and a pinch of magic, each with its own unique properties and flavors. When consumed, the Cheese Elixir imbues the drinker with the ability to command and control all forms of cheese, from the softest brie to the hardest parmesan.

Berimbau.name: 贝林巴乌 Berimbau
Berimbau.description:
这种乐器外形类似木制狩猎弓，由称为弓身的弓杆、一根钢弦，以及连接在下端的干燥掏空葫芦组成。它最常由练习卡波耶拉的武术家演奏。这种独特的格斗风格将音乐与舞蹈融入其动作之中。

Resembling a wooden hunting bow, the instrument comprises the verga referred to as the bow, a steel string, and a dried, hollowed calabash attached to its lower end. It is most commonly played by martial artists who practice capoeira. This distinctive fighting style integrates music and dance as part of its movements.

Anatomy Worksheet.name: 解剖学练习表 Anatomy Worksheet
Anatomy Worksheet.description:
解剖学工作表是一种专门的表格，详细列出了生物的所有身体部位。从组织到脑神经，从关节连接到骨骼肌，每个组成部分都以极其详尽的方式进行描述并绘制出来，使读者能够充分理解活体身体如何运作。解剖学工作表不仅用于学术研究，也用于诸如医疗治疗、奥术治疗或生物制作等实际应用。

Anatomy Worksheet is a specialized sheet that details all the body parts of a creature. From tissues to cranial nerves, from articulations to skeletal muscles, each component is described and drawn in extensive detail to give the reader a full understanding of how the living body functions. The Anatomy Worksheet is used not only for academic study but also for practical applications such as medical treatment, arcane healing, or creature crafting.

Expensive Fish & Where to Get Them.name: 昂贵的鱼与获取地点 Expensive Fish & Where to Get Them
Expensive Fish & Where to Get Them.description:
这本书很快就深入到各个钓鱼区域的细节；然而，其中的大量信息似乎不完整或具有误导性。它通常由自称著名渔夫的人在酒馆里出售，经常把缺乏经验的平民当作快速致富骗局的目标。其基本前提鼓励读者只需前往最近的水域，抓到什么就卖什么来获利。全书反复使用一句标语作为诱因：“一次收获就能改变你的人生。方法在这里！”

The book quickly delves into details about various fishing areas; however, much of the information appears incomplete or misleading. It is commonly sold in taverns by self-proclaimed famous fishermen, often targeting unskilled commoners as part of a get-rich-quick scheme. The basic premise encourages readers to simply head to the nearest body of water, catch whatever they can, and sell it for profit. Throughout the book, a recurring tagline is used as an incentive: "One catch can change your life. Here's how!"

Marjoram.name: 马郁兰 Marjoram
Marjoram.description:
墨角兰与牛至相当相似，但味道稍微更温和、更甜，许多厨师用它来烹制肉类、炖菜和酱汁。草药师将其用作任何有助于缓解流鼻涕、咳嗽、普通感冒、其他感染以及各种消化问题的调制品的基底。

Marjoram is quite similar to oregano but is a bit milder and sweeter, a lot of chefs use it for meats, stews, and sauces. Herbalists use it as a primer for any concoctions that help with runny nose, cough, common cold, other infections, and various digestion problems.

Stopwatch.name: 秒表 Stopwatch
Stopwatch.description:
机械秒表由主发条驱动，必须上紧发条，通常通过转动秒表顶部的滚花旋钮来完成。它们主要用于在体育、训练和科学等各个领域测量经过的时代，例如计跑圈或进行实验。

Mechanical stopwatches are powered by a mainspring, which must be wound up, usually by turning the knurled knob at the top of the stopwatch. They are primarily used to measure elapsed time in various fields such as sports, training, and science for activities like running laps or conducting experiments.

Seeds - Hyacinth.name: 种子 - 风信子 Seeds - Hyacinth
Seeds - Hyacinth.description:
风信子植物的小型圆形鳞茎传统上被用来治疗各种疾病，例如皮疹，也被用于烹饪多种菜肴。然而，它们主要作为室内装饰出售，通过将其种植在花盆中来进行观赏。

The small, round bulbs of the hyacinth plant were traditionally used to treat a variety of ailments, such as skin rashes, as well as in cooking in a variety of dishes. However, they are mainly sold for indoor decoration by planting them in flowerpots.

Quartzite.name: 石英岩 Quartzite
Quartzite.description:
石英岩是一种装饰性石材，可用于掩蔽墙面，作为屋顶瓦片、地板和台阶；由于其强度，它也用于建造道路、桥梁和水坝。切割并抛光后，这种岩石既相当美观，也很耐用。

Quartzite is a decorative stone and may be used to cover walls, as roofing tiles, flooring, and stairsteps, due to its strength, it is also used to construct roads, bridges, and dams. When cut and polished, the rock is quite beautiful, as well as durable.

Cleiophane.name: 克莱奥法涅 Cleiophane
Cleiophane.description:
克勒伊欧凡是一种浅色宝石，常见色调为黄色、绿色，有时也无色。除了用于珠宝之外，它也可用于制造黄铜，但其稀缺性和高价格意味着它仅供紧急使用。

Cleiophane is a light-colored gemstone, often seen in hues of yellow, green, or sometimes colorless. Besides its use in jewelry, it can also be utilized in the production of brass, its scarcity and high price mean it is for emergency use only.

Red Dye.name: 红色染料 Red Dye
Red Dye.description:
这种红色染料相对稀有，主要来源于特定的昆虫，这些昆虫大多栖息在仙人掌上。根据气候和领土情况，它们可能不易获得。采集后，将昆虫碾碎成细粉，干燥并过滤以去除任何残渣。剩余的材料可用作织物或颜料的染料。

The red dye is relatively rare and is primarily found in specific insects that are mostly located on cacti. Depending on the climate and territory, they may not be easily accessible. After harvesting, the insects are crushed into a fine powder, dried, and filtered to remove any residue. The remaining material can be used as a dye for fabrics or paints.

Flute.name: 长笛 Flute
Flute.description:
长笛以其适应性著称，可由多种材料制成，例如竹子、玉、玻璃、黑檀木、骨头以及各类金属。它轻盈明亮的音色使其在许多文化中成为备受喜爱的乐器，尤其是在酒馆环境中，它常与鲁特琴和竖琴组成三重奏。除在酒馆中的流行之外，长笛也广泛用于仪式、庆典与民间传统，使其在各个国度的正式与非正式活动中都具有强烈的文化存在感。

The flute is known for its adaptability, being made from a wide range of materials such as bamboo, jade, glass, blackwood, bone, and various metals. Its light, bright sound has made it a beloved instrument in many cultures, especially in tavern settings where it often forms part of a trio with the lute and harp. Beyond its popularity in taverns, the flute is also widely used in rituals, celebrations, and folk traditions, giving it a strong cultural presence in both formal and informal events across the realms.

Potato.name: 土豆 Potato
Potato.description:
这是诸界各地栽培最广泛的蔬菜之一，也因此成为最著名的蔬菜之一。它们可以作为熟蔬菜食用，整颗或捣碎皆可，也常用作馅饼的馅料。在一些较寒冷的地区，人们普遍认为马铃薯可用于酿造非常烈的酒。

One of the most cultivated vegetables throughout the realms, making it one of the most famous ones as well. They can be served as a cooked vegetable, in whole or mashed form, and are also used as pie filling. In some colder regions, it is widely believed that potatoes are used to create very strong alcohol.

Gold Ingot.name: 金锭 Gold Ingot
Gold Ingot.description:
金锭是商人和贵族之间最常见的现金，因其纯度高且便于运输而备受重视。珠宝匠也会寻找它们，因为这种金属不含杂质，更适合用来制作镶嵌宝石的戒圈、手镯或项链。有些王国甚至用金锭来确保条约并资助军事行动，确保他们的军队始终装备精良且忠诚。

Gold Ingots serve as the most common currency among merchants and nobles, valued for their purity and ease of transport. Jewelers also look for them as the metal is without impurities and is preferable to make bands, bracelets, or necklaces encrusted with gems. Some kingdoms even use the ingots to secure treaties and fund military campaigns, ensuring their armies remain well-equipped and loyal.

Tiger's Eye.name: 虎眼石 Tiger's Eye
Tiger's Eye.description:
外面较为常见的宝石之一，平民将其用作身份象征，因为它呈现金色与黑色的组合。由于需求量很高，视地区而定，它可能相当稀有。在大多数迷信团体中，这种宝石被认为能驱退亡灵与不安的游魂。

One of the more common gemstones out there, used as a status symbol among commoners, as it comes in a combination of gold and black. Due to its high demand, depending on the region, it can be quite rare. In most superstitious groups the gemstone is assumed to repel undead and restless spirits.

Grandfather Clock.name: 落地钟 Grandfather Clock
Grandfather Clock.description:
落地钟，也被称为长箱钟、高柜钟、大厅钟或地钟，是一种高大的独立式、重锤驱动的摆钟，摆锤固定在钟壳的塔身或腰部内部。这些由最有经验的木工制作，并在专门工程师的协助下完成。

Grandfather clock, also known as a longcase clock, tall-case clock, hall clock, or floor clock, is a tall, freestanding, weight-driven pendulum clock with the pendulum held inside the tower or waist of the case. These are created by the most experienced woodworkers, with help from specialized engineers.

Kompot.name: 蜜饯饮料 Kompot
Kompot.description:
也更常被称为炖水果，这是一种非常简单的配方，只需要水、糖和水果。把所有材料都丢进锅里，煮沸、装瓶，然后冷饮供应。这种饮料由旅店和面包店一同制作，使用他们剩下的任何水果，因为这种调制品在完成后保质期很长。

Also more commonly known as stewed fruit, this is a very simple recipe that involves only water, sugar, and fruit. Everything is thrown into a pot, boiled, bottled, and served cold. This beverage is made by inns and bakeries alike, using any leftover fruit they have, as the concoction has a very long shelf life when completed.

Drill.name: 操练 Drill
Drill.description:
这款手持式机械钻通过齿轮与机油运作，以稳定的圆周运动旋转，将挖掘深入到单一点上。它需要熟练且懂得摆弄机械的矿工，因为岩石地形经常会磨损钻头，因而需要频繁更换。

This handheld mechanical drill operates through gears and oil, spinning in a steady circular motion to dig deeper into a single point. It requires skilled miners familiar with tinkering, as the rocky terrain often wears down the drill head, demanding frequent replacement.

Dragon’s Heart.name: 巨龙之心 Dragon’s Heart
Dragon’s Heart.description:
根据传说，龙之心是一种稀有宝石，据说由巨龙熔融的核心形成。人们相信它蕴含着巨龙力量与强大的精髓。然而，这种说法尚未得到证实，因为这种宝石通常是在巨龙死亡后留下的残局中被发现，或是在巨龙腾出其巢穴时被发现。龙之心的发现是最近才有的，由冒险者与寻宝者在追寻宝藏与荣耀时深入巨龙巢穴而得知。这种宝石只能在被用作巨龙巢穴的洞穴、岩窟或矿坑中找到。据说经过一段time后，宝石会出现在巢穴的中心，仿佛大地本身将其吐出。由于已发现的此类宝石数量有限，龙之心被认为是可用于交易的最有价值且最昂贵的宝石之一。

According to legends, the Dragon's Heart is a rare gemstone that is said to be formed from the molten core of a dragon. It is believed to contain the essence of the dragon's power and strength. However, this belief is unverified, as the gem is typically discovered in the aftermath of a dragon's death or when a dragon vacates its lair. The discovery of the Dragon's Heart is a recent one, made by adventurers and treasure hunters who ventured into dragon's lairs in search of treasure and glory. The gem can only be found in caves, caverns, or mines that have been used as a dragon's lair. It is said that after a period of time, the gem will appear in the center of the lair, as if the earth itself has spit it out. Due to the limited number of these gems discovered, the Dragon's Heart is considered one of the most valuable and expensive gems available for trade.

Sandwich.name: 三明治 Sandwich
Sandwich.description:
“传闻多年来制作三明治的知识已经消失了。最近，一位名叫Peach的旅行者提到我的汇编中缺少任何三明治食谱，我为这一疏漏感到有些抱歉，尤其是考虑到三明治如此出名。尽管如此，我相信我拥有一位年迈疲惫的老旅行者关于如何准备它的笔记。”

三明治是一种由两片面包夹着中间馅料制成的食物物品，通常作为便餐食用。馅料可以是制作者选择的任何东西，从鸡蛋和培根到果酱和煮熟的豆子。

"Rumor has it that the knowledge of making sandwiches has disappeared over the years. Recently, a traveler named Peach mentioned that my compendium lacked any sandwich recipes, and I felt a bit bad for this oversight, particularly since sandwiches are so well-known. Nevertheless, I believe I possess notes from an old weary traveler on how to prepare one."

A sandwich is a food item made of two pieces of bread with a filling in between, usually consumed as a light meal. The filling can be anything the creator chooses, ranging from eggs and bacon to jams and cooked beans.

Strawberry.name: 草莓 Strawberry
Strawberry.description:
草莓是所有人都喜爱的水果，因为人们相信它们能带来幸福。除了新鲜食用外，草莓还可以制成果酱，也可以干燥后用于烹饪食物。

Strawberries are a favorite fruit among all folk as it is believed they bring happiness. In addition to being consumed fresh, strawberries can be made into jam, as well as dried to be used in cooked foods.

Stones of Mother Earth.name: 大地母亲之石 Stones of Mother Earth
Stones of Mother Earth.description:
这些耳环由透辉石制成，其名称源自德鲁伊对这种特定宝石的崇敬与珍视。这颗美丽的浅绿色宝石镶嵌于黄金之中，营造出优雅的魅力与高贵的气息。价格也体现了这种外观，与其所留下的精致印象相符。

These earrings are made with diopside, and their name is taken from the reverence druids hold for this particular stone in high regard. The beautiful light green gem, set in gold, creates an allure of elegance and an air of nobility. The price reflects this appearance, aligning with the refined impression they leave.

Bean Soup.name: 豆子汤 Bean Soup
Bean Soup.description:
豆子汤是一顿非常丰盛的餐点，含有豆类、用作装饰的蔬菜以及肉类。在一些更具特色的地方，它会盛在面包碗中，或搭配几片面包一同食用。

The bean soup is a very hearty meal with beans, veggies for garnish, and meats. In some more distinctive places, it is served in a bread bowl or with a few slices of bread.

Breathing Aparatus.name: 呼吸器 Breathing Aparatus
Breathing Aparatus.description:
这是一种机械化装置，专为协助从事放松的爱好（如潜水）而设计，但在最深的矿井中也同样有用，在那里呼吸都是一种奢侈。该装置主要由铜制成以避免生锈，但由于材质原因相当沉重，建议仅由受过训练的专业人士使用。

This mechanized device created for the sole purpose of assisting with relaxing hobbies, such as diving, but also useful in the deepest mines where breathing is a luxury. Primarily made out of copper to avoid rust, the device is quite heavy due to its material, and only trained professionals are advised to use it.

The Forest.name: 森林 The Forest
The Forest.description:
“森林”是一条由铜制成并镶嵌有一枚黝帘石器具的项链。虽然铜是一种相对廉价的材料，但黝帘石的存在平衡了其价值，使得这件饰品的价格出奇地高。然而，由于铜有些脆弱，这些项链常常在拥挤的地方被发现——当铜被腐蚀后，它们便从佩戴者的颈间滑落。

The Forest is a necklace crafted from copper and set with a zoisite implement. While copper is a relatively inexpensive material, the presence of the zoisite balances the value, resulting in a piece that has a surprisingly high price. Yet, because copper is somewhat fragile, these necklaces are often found in crowded places, having slipped from their wearers' necks after the copper has corroded.

Hosho.name: 保生 Hosho
Hosho.description:
霍绍是一种响铃乐器，由一种名为丹巴的野橙制成，用木棍将其绑在一起，并填充霍塔种子或小卵石。其独特的形状能产生尖锐而独特的声音，常常能穿透其他乐器的音乐。

The hosho is a rattle instrument crafted from a wild orange known as damba, with sticks used to tie it together and filled with hota seeds or pebbles. Its unique shape produces a sharp, distinctive sound that often cuts through the music of other instruments.

Jasper Ring.name: 碧玉戒指 Jasper Ring
Jasper Ring.description:
碧玉戒指由一整块坚实的碧玉制成，由经验丰富、具备卓越技能与精准度的宝石切割师雕琢成形。得益于其美丽的色泽与鲜亮的抛光，它吸引了许多平民的目光，他们在寻找一枚与自己手指相配的戒指。它以适中的价格出售，使来自各行各业的人都能轻松获得。

The Jasper Ring is crafted from a single solid piece of jasper, shaped by experienced gemcutters with exceptional skill and precision. Thanks to its beautiful coloring and vibrant polish, it attracts the attention of many commoners seeking a ring that match their fingers. It is offered at a modest price, making it highly accessible to people from all walks of life.

Mahogany Lumber.name: 桃花心木木材 Mahogany Lumber
Mahogany Lumber.description:
桃花心木是一种重要的木材，因其美观、耐用和色泽而备受推崇，并且往往是最珍贵的木材种类。它用于墙板镶饰，并用于制作家具、船只、装饰品、乐器及其他物品。 

Mahogany is important lumber prized for its beauty, durability, and color, and tends to be the most prized type of lumber. It is used for paneling and to make furniture, boats, decorative pieces, musical instruments, and other items.

Pumpkin Stew.name: 南瓜炖菜 Pumpkin Stew
Pumpkin Stew.description:
南瓜炖汤的食谱因地区而异，或在一些罕见情况下，在酒馆之间也会有所不同。存在多种食谱，包含各种肉类或仅含蔬菜，提供了广泛的烹饪体验。

The recipe for Pumpkin Stew varies depending on the region or, in some rare cases, among taverns. Multiple recipes exist containing either a variety of meats or solely vegetables, offering a wide range of culinary experiences.

Gravestone.name: 墓碑 Gravestone
Gravestone.description:
墓碑——就红收获节的本质而言，奇怪的是——并不只是装饰。我发现，无论这些墓标被立在何处，其下方的土地都有一种古怪的习惯会蠢动，仿佛在感召。不止一位巴考勒泰亚区的看守发誓，一块廉价的石膏墓标与真家伙一样可能藏着一具不安的尸体。一些学者认为这全是巧合，或者红收获节只是把无数战争在城市中残留的死灵学余烬引了出来。

Gravestones as when it comes with Red Harvest's nature, oddly enough, aren't just decorative. I’ve found that wherever these grave markers are set, the ground beneath has a curious habit of stirring, like it is calling. More than one caretaker in Bacau's Letea District swears that a cheap plaster marker is just as likely to hide a restless corpse as the real thing. Some scholars argue it’s all coincidence or that the Red Harvest festival simply draws out the necromantic residue that lingers in cities from the countless wars.

Rake.name: 耙击 Rake
Rake.description:
耙子有多种类型，但最常见的两种是花园耙和整地耙。花园耙的设计旨在拾起树叶和其他花园碎屑，而不会对草坪及其下方的土壤造成伤害。另一方面，整地耙用于在种植植物和播撒种子之前将土壤整平和整地。

Rakes come in various types, but the two most common are garden rakes and soil rakes. Garden rakes are effectively designed to pick up leaves and other garden debris without causing damage to the lawn and the soil beneath. On the other hand, soil rakes are intended for leveling and grading the soil before plants and seeds are planted.

Rhodochrosite.name: 菱锰矿 Rhodochrosite
Rhodochrosite.description:
亦常被称为玫瑰石，因其粉红色而深受贵族追捧。众所周知，他们通常会不遗余力地获取这种宝石。用于装饰耳环、戒指、项链或手镯。据认为，若将数块玫瑰石正确研碎并与额外的草药混合，便可中和大多数毒素与疾病。

Or commonly named Rosenstone is highly demanded by nobility due to its pink color. It's well known that they usually go out of their way to acquire this type of gem. Used for ornamentation in earrings, rings, necklaces, or bracelets. Several Rosenstone pieces, if correctly crushed and mixed with additional herbs, are assumed to neutralize most poisons and diseases.

MIlk.name: 牛奶 MIlk
MIlk.description:
牛奶是一种畜牧业副产品，通常来自奶牛、山羊和绵羊。它是一种白色、营养丰富的液体，常作为饮品饮用，或用于制作多种乳制品，如奶酪、黄油和酸奶。学者们认为它具有魔法性质，能够将骨骼强化到近乎神明般的程度。

Milk is a husbandry byproduct which usually comes from cows, goats, and sheep. It is a white, nutritious liquid often consumed as a beverage or used to make a variety of dairy products such as cheese, butter, and yogurt. Scholars believe it has magical properties that can strengthen bones to an ungodly degree.

Sausages.name: 香肠 Sausages
Sausages.description:
由多种肉类、蔬菜和香料制成，例如牛肉、猪肉或羊肉，配以胡椒粒、芥末种子、芫荽、红椒粉、辣椒粉、月桂叶等配料。香肠也可以风干或熏制，以延长保质期，并拥有多种多样的风味。

Created from a variety of meats, vegetables, and spices such as beef, pork, or lamb, with ingredients like peppercorns, mustard seed, coriander, paprika, chili powder, bay leaves, and more. Sausages can also be dried or smoked for a longer shelf life and a wide range of varieties of flavors.

Chair.name: 椅子 Chair
Chair.description:
木椅常见于住宅、商店、旅店或酒馆，通常由木板制成，以便于轻松更换部件。这在繁忙的场所尤为有利，因为在诸如斗殴之类的事件之后，椅子可能需要被更换。

Wooden chairs, often found in houses, stores, inns, or taverns, are usually made from planks to allow for easy replacement of parts. This is particularly beneficial in busy venues where chairs may need to be replaced following events like brawls.

Dragon Bones.name: 龙骨 Dragon Bones
Dragon Bones.description:
最常被收集的骨骼来自巨大的巨龙，因此，运输它们通常是一场后勤噩梦。然而，由于它们的体型和轻重量，一些更小、更具部落风格的村落会将其用于建造小屋、栅栏，甚至墙壁。

The most commonly collected bones come from the huge dragons and due to it, the transportation of them is usually a logistic nightmare. However, due to their size and light weight, some of the small more tribal villages can be used in the construction of huts, fences, or even walls.

Leek.name: 韭葱 Leek
Leek.description:
韭葱是夏季沙拉、韭葱土豆汤、韭葱泥和清汤韭葱汤中的必备食材。它们带有温和的、类似洋葱的风味，生食时仍能保持爽脆而结实的口感。韭葱可食用的部分是叶片的白色基部。

Leeks are essential in summer salads, leek and potato soup, leek puree, and plain leek soup. They boast a mild, onion-like flavor and retain a crunchy, firm texture in their raw form. The edible portions of the leek are the white base of the leaves.

Apricot.name: 杏子 Apricot
Apricot.description:
为数不多也会被干制的水果之一，使其在季节之间也能食用。它也用于各种餐点、夏季沙拉、果酱、果汁，甚至在煮沸后还能制成酒精饮品。

One of the few fruits that is also dried, to have it be edible between seasons. It is also used in various meals, summer salads, jams, juices, and even alcohol after boiling.

Sphene.name: 榍石 Sphene
Sphene.description:
榍石以其柔软且脆弱的特性而闻名，颜色从黄色到深绿色不等，其中最受追捧的是珍贵的祖母绿绿色调。其晶体通常被切割成令人目眩的刻面宝石，体积从小到中等。

Sphene is known for its soft and brittle nature, found in shades ranging from yellow to deep green, with the prized emerald green hue being the most sought-after. Its crystals are often cut into dazzling faceted gems of small to medium size.

Serpentine.name: 蛇形 Serpentine
Serpentine.description:
蛇纹石，有时被称为“穷人的翡翠”，是一种相对常见的宝石。它通常被切割成被称为弧面宝石的圆形或椭圆形，然后用于装饰武器、护甲或珠宝。

Serpentine, sometimes referred to as "Poor man's Jade", is a relatively common gemstone. It is typically cut into round or oval shapes known as cabochons, which are then used to adorn weapons, armor, or jewelry.

Sandalwood Log.name: 檀香木原木 Sandalwood Log
Sandalwood Log.description:
檀香木主要因其精油而被采收。檀香木森林被认为是诸国度中最昂贵的木材之一。由这种精油可以制作许多物品，如香水、肥皂、蜡烛和熏香；此外，若将其研磨成细粉，还可用于医疗、宗教或文化用途，也可作为食物与饮料的调味。

Sandalwood is primarily harvested for its oil. The Sandalwood forests are considered one of the most expensive woods within the realms. From the oil, a lot can be crafted such as perfumes, soaps, candles, and incense, as well as, if turned into a fine powder, for medicine, religious or cultural purposes, also, as a flavor for foods and beverages.

Lead Ingot.name: 铅锭 Lead Ingot
Lead Ingot.description:
在诸界之中，铅锭是一种珍贵的商品。技艺娴熟的工匠会寻找它，用来为他们的武器制作强力的子弹。这些子弹随后会被注入魔法能量，使其能够对魔法野兽或无形生物造成大量伤害。炼金术士也会用它来制作药水和灵药。铅锭非常珍贵且用途广泛。

Through the realms, the lead ingot is a valuable commodity. Skilled craftsmen seek it out to make powerful bullets for their weapons. These bullets are then powered by magic so they can inflict a lot of damage on magical beasts or incorporeal beings. They are also used by alchemists to create potions and elixirs. The lead ingot is very valuable and versatile.

Olykoeks.name: 奥利科克斯 Olykoeks
Olykoeks.description:
它们被称为油饼，更常被称为甜甜圈，是许多人喜爱的糕点，也是遍布诸界、为各地人们所享用的热门点心。加糖的面团在热油中浸炸约2分钟后取出，趁热撒上糖粉、果酱、甜可可酱，甚至覆以薄薄的水果片。使其成为大多数面包房产量最高的物品之一；这种糕点常与清晨的饮品相佐，或被年轻人每餐享用。

They are known as oily cakes, or more commonly known as doughnuts, are a beloved pastry enjoyed by many, are a popular treat enjoyed by people all over the planes. The sweetened dough is dipped in hot oil for roughly 2 minutes, then taken out and topped with powdered sugar, jams, sweet cocoa paste, or even thin slices of fruit while still hot. Making this one of the most produced item by most bakeries, this pastry is a popular accompaniment to morning beverages or enjoyed by young folk with every meal.

Mason Hammer.name: 石匠锤 Mason Hammer
Mason Hammer.description:
石匠锤通常被称为砖锤，主要用于精确敲碎砖块、岩石、铺路石，或打入木桩。它们有一面传统的平锤面，而在背面则是一片短或长的凿形刃。此设计使其无需另配凿子，就能有效地凿掉石材边缘或小碎块，并切割砖砌单元。

Commonly called brick hammers, mason's hammers are primarily designed for the precise breaking of bricks, rocks, pavers, or driving stakes. They feature one flat traditional face and, on the back, a short or long chisel-shaped blade. This design allows them to effectively chip off edges or small pieces of stone and cut brick masonry units without the need for a separate chisel.

Pistachio.name: 开心果 Pistachio
Pistachio.description:
切碎的开心果通常会拌入或撒在诸如奶油、蛋糕、松露巧克力和糕点之类的甜点上。在一点面团中，它们可以被揉入快手面包、松饼、纸杯蛋糕或酵母面包中，能带来松脆的口感和黄油般的风味。

Chopped pistachios are commonly mixed into or sprinkled atop desserts like cream, cake, truffles, and pastries. With a bit of dough they can be folded into quick breads, muffins, cupcakes, or yeast breads, they contribute crunch and buttery flavor.

Jade.name: 翡翠 Jade
Jade.description:
它的主要形态被称为硬玉，经过切割后，主要用于装饰性雕刻和小雕像。各种类型的音乐家都相信，如果他们佩戴玉，会提升他们的音乐造诣

Its primary form is called Jadeite, after cutting, it's mainly used in ornamental sculptures and figurines. Musicians of all kinds believed that if they wore Jade, they would improve their musical prowess

Fir Log.name: 冷杉原木 Fir Log
Fir Log.description:
冷杉原木是一种坚固且用途广泛的木材，因其强度与耐久性而备受珍视。这些原木取自生长在雪山中的坚韧冷杉树，蕴含着它们粗犷的精神与力量。由于冷杉木强韧耐用，它是制作框架以及建筑物其他结构部件的理想材料。除了其实用价值之外，冷杉木板也因其美观的外观而备受青睐。这种木材具有独特的浅色、直纹纹理外观，使其成为装饰用途的热门选择。

The Fir Log is a sturdy and versatile piece of wood, prized for its strength and durability. The logs are cut from the resilient fir trees that grow in the snowy mountains, imbued with their rugged spirit and strength. Because fir wood is strong and durable, it is an ideal material for creating frames and other structural components of a building. In addition to their practical uses, fir planks are also prized for their attractive appearance. The wood has a distinctive light-colored, straight-grain appearance, making it a popular choice for decorative purposes.

Tombak.name: 通巴克 Tombak
Tombak.description:
铜锌金是一种由铜和锌制成的合金，用于在廉价首饰中仿制黄金，并用于镀金。它是一种廉价且可锻的合金，主要用于奖章、饰品、装饰以及其他观赏性用途。然而，最为阴险的人往往会大量购买它，并以黄金的名义加价售卖。

Tombak is an alloy of copper and zinc used to imitate gold in cheap jewelry and for gilding. It is a cheap malleable alloy mainly used for medals, ornament, decoration and other ornamental uses. Yet the most nefarious of folk tend to purchase it in bulk to sell it at a premium as gold.

Figworts.name: 无花果草 Figworts
Figworts.description:
玄参是一种备受追捧的草药，因为许多草药师都在寻找它们，它们可用于治疗皮肤炎症、止痛，甚至可作为温和的泻药。大多数玄参通常生长在肥沃的林地中，当采集者进入森林时，他们会试着留意它们，因为草药师往往愿意为它们支付溢价。

Figworts are a coveted herb, as a lot of herbalists look for them as they can be of use in curing skin inflammation, pain reliever, or even as a mild laxative. Most Figworts are usually found in rich woodlands, and when the gatherers go into the forest, they attempt to keep an eye out for them, as herbalists tend to pay a premium for them.

Orange.name: 橙色 Orange
Orange.description:
它主要用于橙汁或烘焙食品或蛋糕的调味，不过也会因地区而异，用果皮制作橙油。果皮也可用于园艺，作为驱赶蛞蝓的驱虫剂。 

It is mainly used for orange juice or flavoring of baked goods or cakes, however, it is also used depending on the region, to create orange oil made from the peels. The peels can be used in gardening as well in the form of slug repellent.

Butter.name: 黄油 Butter
Butter.description:
这种经典乳制品由搅拌奶油制成，是甜味与咸味食谱中不可或缺的原料。无论是在烘焙、酱汁、油炸中利用其脂肪，还是直接涂抹在温热的吐司上，黄油都能让任何菜肴变得美味无比。

This classic dairy product, made by churning cream, is an essential ingredient in sweet and savory recipes. Used for its fat in baking, sauces, frying, or simply spread on warm toast, butter makes any dish taste amazing.

Vertugal.name: 维图加尔 Vertugal
Vertugal.description:
“有人说，当你砍伐这些树时，森林精灵会不高兴。随着时代流逝，越来越多的人目击到这些存在，它们会化作不同的林地动物，从猫到狐狸，从鹿到熊。若你注意到其中一个，而你又打算伤害森林，你就不会在这个领域待太久。”

一种质地柔软、颜色浅淡且纹理笔直的木材，常用于制浆木与纸张生产。这种木材在印刷行业很受欢迎，因为它重量轻且易于加工。它也可以与织物（例如棉布）或动物皮革结合使用，以制造羊皮纸或其他纸制品。

"Some say that the forest spirits don't like it when you cut these trees. As time has passed, more and more sightings of these beings have been made, taking the shape of different woodland creatures, from cats to foxes, deer to bears. If you notice one and you plan to bring harm to the forest, you won't be in this realm for long."

A type of soft, light-colored wood with a straight grain is commonly used in pulpwood and paper production. This wood is popular in the printing industry, as it is lightweight and easy to work with. It can also be used in combination with fabric, such as cotton, or animal leather, to create parchment or other paper products.

Pitchfork.name: 草叉 Pitchfork
Pitchfork.description:
干草叉（通常称为草叉）是一种用于叉起松散材料的工具，包括干草、稻草、粪肥或树叶。它具有长柄，通常有两到五根细长叉齿，专门设计用于高效移动此类材料。

The pitchfork, commonly referred to as a hay fork, is a tool crafted for pitching loose materials, including hay, straw, manure, or leaves. With its long handle and typically two to five thin tines, it is specifically designed for the efficient movement of such materials.

Lime.name: 青柠 Lime
Lime.description:
酸橙的糖分和酸含量都比柠檬更高。酸橙汁可以从新鲜酸橙中榨取，也可以购买瓶装的无糖和加糖两种。根据地区不同，它们也可以被腌制。酸橙是水手们追捧的水果，因为众所周知它能在颠簸的海上航行中安抚不适的胃，更不用说它和朗姆酒混合得相当不错。

Limes have higher contents of sugars and acids than lemons do. Lime juice may be squeezed from fresh limes, or purchased in bottles in both unsweetened and sweetened varieties. Depending on the region they can also be pickled. It is a fruit sought after by sailors as it is known to settle the upset stomach on rough sea voyages, not to mention that it mixes quite well with rum.

Hypersthene.name: 紫苏辉石 Hypersthene
Hypersthene.description:
这种半宝石呈现从绿色、红色和蓝色到银色的色调，并因其完全不透明而著称，这在宝石中属于稀有度。由于其独特特性，它能卖出溢价价格，并主要用于装饰家具和服装。

This semi-precious stone displays hues ranging from green, red, and blue, to silver, and is notable for its complete opacity, a rarity among gemstones. Due to its unique characteristics, it fetches a premium price and is primarily utilized to embellish both furniture and clothing.

Pig Iron.name: 生铁 Pig Iron
Pig Iron.description:
生铁，通常被称为粗铁，是铁匠在生产钢铁过程中使用的中间产品。当与木炭结合并经过精心精炼后，杂质被去除，所得的钢铁便成为一种用于工具、建筑和战争的惊人材料。

Pig Iron, commonly referred to as crude iron, is an intermediate product used by the blacksmiths in the production of steel. When combined with charcoal, through careful refining, impurities are removed, and the resulting steel becomes an amazing material for tools, construction, and warfare.

Pistachio Pie.name: 开心果派 Pistachio Pie
Pistachio Pie.description:
用奶油奶酪、浓奶油和大量开心果制成的这款派，是最柔软的派之一。由于大多数配方无需烹饪，它是面包店和酒馆都常备的物品。

Made with cream cheese, heavy cream, and plenty of pistachios, this pie is one of the softest. Since most recipes require no cooking, it is a constant item in stock for both bakeries and taverns.

Rutile Powder.name: 金红石粉末 Rutile Powder
Rutile Powder.description:
金红石被研磨成细粉时，会变成一种美丽的颜料，为画布和陶瓷带来色彩。在医学领域，它的强度和耐腐蚀性使其成为一种主要材料，保护植入物并确保其使用寿命。

Rutile when ground into a fine powder, it turns into a beautiful pigment, bringing color to canvases and ceramics alike. In the world of medicine, its strength and resistance to corrosion make it a primary material, protecting implants and ensuring their longevity.

Laudanum.name: 鸦片酊 Laudanum
Laudanum.description:
鸦片酊是一种由技艺高超的炼金术师调制、备受珍视的酊剂。它呈红褐色，味道苦涩。其主要成分包括罂粟、藏红花、碾碎的珍珠以及烈性酒精。人们相信它能有效治疗一系列疾病，包括严重的咳嗽和疼痛。

Laudanum is a highly prized tincture created by skilled alchemists. It has a reddish-brown color and a bitter taste. Its main ingredients include breadseed poppy, saffron, crushed pearls, and a strong alcohol. It is believed to be effective in treating a range of ailments, including severe coughs and pains.

Centipede.name: 蜈蚣 Centipede
Centipede.description:
蜈蚣和普通人一样，会进入家中寻找食物、水和庇护所，尤其是在潮湿和阴暗的环境中。它们会被地下室、爬行空间和浴室等高湿度区域吸引，并以捕食其他昆虫为食。虽然蜈蚣能够咬人并注入毒液，但通常不被认为会对普通人构成危险。

Centipedes enter homes seeking food, water, and shelter, same as the common folk, particularly in damp and dark environments. They are attracted to areas with high humidity, such as basements, crawl spaces, and bathrooms, and they hunt other insects for food. While centipedes can bite and inject venom, they are generally not considered dangerous to common folk.

Samson Fish.name: 参孙·菲什 Samson Fish
Samson Fish.description:
军曹鱼因其大型（体型）而很少被称为“王鱼”，但它并不被认为适合烹饪，因为其体内常常含有各种寄生虫。相反，它主要在许多体育钓鱼比赛中作为战利品渔获而备受追捧，而非用于食用。

Samson Fish, rarely referred to as the Kingfish due to its large size, is not considered ideal for cooking as it often contains various parasites. Instead, it is primarily sought after as a trophy catch in many sports fishing competitions rather than for consumption.

Creamatory.name: 火葬场 Creamatory
Creamatory.description:
市集上有句说法：如果你第一口喝下去后，奶油留下一个完美的螺旋，你这一年会以财富收尾。可要是它反倒凝结了，那最好别离家太远去旅行，因为厄运在等着。很久以前，我无视了那套迷信，把它当笑话，甚至还嘲弄过，结果在黑暗的沼泽里弄断了一根车轴，困了好几天，直到它修好为止。从那以后，我总会盯着奶油的形状。你可以说我傻，可当你见过奶油只在那一个特定的夜晚结成那种形状，你就会学会对这杯饮料保持敬意。

There’s a saying on the market, if the cream leaves a perfect spiral after your first sip, your year will end in fortune. If it curdles instead, best not travel far from home, as bad luck awaits. A long time ago, I had ignored that superstition, laughed it off, even mocked it, and ended up breaking an cart axle in the dark swamps, and got stranded for a few days 'till, it got fixed. Since then, I always watch the cream's shape. Call me foolish, but when you’ve seen cream clump into a shapes only on that specific evening, you learn to give the drink its respect.

Gooseberry.name: 醋栗 Gooseberry
Gooseberry.description:
醋栗植物虽然深受野生动物喜爱，却同时作为食物来源与疾病传播媒介而发挥关键作用。其浆果为许多动物（包括鸟类和熊）提供必需营养，它们在夏季依赖这些果实维持生计。然而，其快速扩散也意味着它常被视为对本地植物群的入侵性威胁，尤其是松树等针叶树——这些树木可能因其携带的疱锈菌而遭受长期伤害。

The gooseberry plant, while adored by wildlife, plays a critical role as both a food source and a vector for disease. Its berries provide essential nutrients for many animals, including birds and bears, who rely on the fruit for sustenance during the summer months. However, its rapid spread also means that it is often seen as an invasive threat to local flora, particularly coniferous trees like pines, which can suffer long-term damage from the blister rust fungus it harbors.

Stool.name: 凳子 Stool
Stool.description:
许多酒馆中使用的标准木凳，常在斗殴时被当作临时武器重新利用。

A standard wooden stool used in many taverns is often repurposed as an improvised weapon in the event of a brawl.

Dragon's Skull.name: 龙之颅骨 Dragon's Skull
Dragon's Skull.description:
收藏家喜爱这类头骨主要是因为它们的稀有度。他们会不遗余力地从冒险者手中弄到这些头骨，通常会以相当公道的价格收购。然而，根据巨龙的年代和体型，这些头骨的价格可能会大幅波动；有时，一具头骨的价格甚至会超过世上最为精雕细琢的魔法宝石。至于它们的用途，主要是装饰性的，通常陈列在当地博物馆中。

Collectors love these types of skulls mainly due to their rarity. They go above and beyond just to get their hands on the skulls from adventurers, usually at a very fair price. However, based on the age and size of the dragon, these can vary wildly in price; sometimes, the price of one can exceed that of the most polished magical gemstones in existence. When it comes to their uses, they are mainly ornamental in nature, usually displayed in local museums.

Birch Plank.name: 桦木木板 Birch Plank
Birch Plank.description:
木板极其坚固耐用，却又出奇地轻便且易于加工。它是制作从精致珠宝与复杂雕刻到优雅家具和强大奇物等各种物品的完美材料。据推测，大多数交易这种木板的城镇锯木厂中，都有技艺高超的工匠与手艺人。

The plank is incredibly strong and durable, yet surprisingly light and easy to work with. It is the perfect material for creating everything from delicate jewelry and intricate carvings to elegant furniture and powerful artifacts. Most towns' sawmills that trade in it, are speculated to have highly skilled craftsmen and artisans in their midst.

Dreamfreezer's Draft.name: 无梦冰匣的草稿 Dreamfreezer's Draft
Dreamfreezer's Draft.description:
这种药水通常由牧师、草药师或任何形式的医师使用，用于从皮下取出小生物，或协助进行危及生命的手术。药水会使使用者进入类似昏迷的状态；在其作用期间，人们相信被遗忘的与现今的神祇会前来闲聊，不过这一点从未被证明达到任何准确程度。该药水的缺点在于，不同使用者对其具有不同的抗力；而一旦手术开始，被指派为该情境主治的医师必须迅速行动，因为并不存在恒定而明确的时代范围。根据饮用药水者的不同，可能持续数分钟甚至数小时。森林族对这种药水完全免疫。

This potion is normally used by clerics, herbalists, or medics of any form, for under-the-skin extraction of critters, or helping with life-threatening surgeries. The potion causes the user to go into a comatose-like state, and when under it, it is believed that forgotten and current deities come to chitchat, however, this has never been proven to any degree of accuracy. The downside of the potion is that different users have different resistance to it, and once the surgery starts, the lead assigned medic for that situation needs to move quickly, as there is no constant clear time-frame. It can be minutes or even hours depending on who consumed the potion. Forrest folk are fully immune to this potion.

Certificate Holder Cylinder.name: 证书持有者圆筒 Certificate Holder Cylinder
Certificate Holder Cylinder.description:
用于容纳大量文书的简单圆筒。它通常由税吏或信使携带，用于在旅途中运输大量纸张或文件。在档案馆中，圆筒用于存放记录，帮助占用更少空间并更利于整理。这些圆筒通常由耐用的材料制成，例如厚皮革、金属或加固羊皮纸，以承受磨损并在运输过程中保护重要文件。

Simple cylinder designed to hold a large amount of documentation. It is usually carried by tax collectors or couriers to transport a large quantity of papers or documents while traveling. In archives, cylinders are used to store records, helping to occupy less space and be better for organization. These cylinders are often made from durable materials, such as thick leather, metal, or reinforced parchment, to withstand wear and protect important documents during transit.

Macaw.name: 金刚鹦鹉 Macaw
Macaw.description:
金刚鹦鹉是较为稀有的鹦鹉种类之一，深受航海盗贼的青睐。这些鸟儿会警惕地监视船员，传达命令，并在船长休息时向他汇报船上的动向。

The Macaw, one of the rarer types of parrots, is highly favored by seafaring rogues. These birds keep a watchful eye on the crew, relay commands, and update the captain on the ship's activities while he rests.

Brooch.name: 胸针 Brooch
Brooch.description:
胸针是一种装饰性的珠宝物品，设计用于别在衣物上，将其扣合在一起。它通常由金属、银或金或其他材料（如黏土）制成。胸针常以银丝或宝石装饰，可能仅用于点缀，也可以作为衣物扣具发挥功能。

Brooch is a decorative jewelry item designed to be attached to garments, to fasten them together. It is usually made of metal, silver or gold or some other material, like clay. Brooches are frequently decorated with silver strands or with gemstones and may be solely for ornament and it can also serve a function as a clothes fastener.

Demontoid.name: 恶魔类人 Demontoid
Demontoid.description:
翠榴石是最稀有的石榴石品种之一，呈现出堪比祖母绿的鲜艳色彩，且闪耀程度甚至超过钻石。翠榴石深受宝石鉴赏家与珠宝爱好者追捧，通常以远高于其所在地区价格的溢价出售。

Demantoid, one of the scarcest garnet types, exhibits a vivid color comparable to emerald and sparkle that exceeds even diamonds. Highly sought after by both gem connoisseurs and jewelry aficionados, demantoids are typically sold at a premium way above their regional price.

Fangs Necklace.name: 獠牙项链 Fangs Necklace
Fangs Necklace.description:
啊，尖牙项链。每年，就在点燃红色收获之火之前，从船坞港到荆棘刺山丘集市的珠宝匠都会开始一打打地切割制作这些。它大多是一件富有戏剧性的装饰品。尖锐、如牙齿般的坠饰从金属丝或链条上垂下，通常由红色玻璃或烟晶制成。有些宝石匠会把真正的石榴石切磨成尖点，但你在市集摊位上看到的那些闪闪发亮的，大多只是用彩色玻璃做出的巧妙工艺。佩戴在火把光下时，这些饰件会捕捉到一抹红色微光，令人不安地像新鲜的血，旨在模仿夜之尖牙。

Ah, the Fangs Necklace. Every year, just before the Red Harvest fires are lit, jewelers from Dockhaven to the hill markets of Bristlethorn start cutting these out by the dozen. It’s a mostly dramatic piece, for decoration. Quite sharp, toothlike pendants dangling from a wire or chain, usually fashioned from red glass or smoky quartz. Some gemmasters will cut actual garnets into points, but most of what you’ll see glittering in the market stalls is mostly clever work with colored glass. When worn in torchlight, the pieces catch a red glimmer that looks unsettlingly like fresh blood, aimed to resemble the night fangs.

Byrne.name: 拜恩 Byrne
Byrne.description:
这些腰带通常由皮革、编织绳带、刺绣织物或整块金属工艺制成。平民女性更偏爱由皮革或紧密编织的羊毛制成、更结实且更实用的款式，因为她们多将其作为束身衣的替代品。大多数腰带除扣环外保持朴素，而男性则常选择用腰带来展示地位与个人自豪感。

These belts were typically made from leather, woven braid, embroidered fabric or solid metalwork. Commoner women favored sturdier and more practical versions made from leather or tightly woven wool, as they mostly used them as a stand-in for a corset. Most belts remained plain apart from the buckle, while men often chose theirs to display status and personal pride.

Good Luck Potion No. 12.name: 好运药剂 12号 Good Luck Potion No. 12
Good Luck Potion No. 12.description:
一种据说只需啜饮一口就能让人相当走运的药水配方。尽管这种药水的实际效果有待商榷，但该配方已经历经了十一次不同的修订。在贵族之中相当受欢迎。

A potion recipe that supposedly makes one quite lucky with just one sip. While the actual effectiveness of the potion is debatable, the recipe has already undergone eleven different revisions. It's rather popular among the nobility.

Garlic Scapes.name: 蒜薹 Garlic Scapes
Garlic Scapes.description:
蒜薹是一种比普通细香葱具有更浓郁蒜香风味的香草。它们主要用于腌制或留种，很少用于烹饪，或作为炒蛋的炒菜底料。在一些地区，蒜薹被视为时令珍馐，每到春天便令人翘首以待。当地市场里摆满了一捆捆这些卷曲的绿色茎秆，预示着温暖月份的到来，并激励厨师为传统食谱增添独特的变化。

Garlic scapes are an herb with a stronger garlicky flavor than common chives. They are primarily used for pickling or seeding and are rarely used in cooking or as a stir-fry base for scrambled eggs. In some regions, garlic scapes are considered a seasonal delicacy, eagerly awaited each spring. Local markets fill with bundles of these curly green stalks, signaling the start of warmer months and inspiring cooks to add a unique twist to traditional recipes.

Date Fruit.name: 椰枣 Date Fruit
Date Fruit.description:
它们生长在海枣树上，而不是香蕉树或椰子树，想象一下数百颗海枣。它们可以用于多种菜肴，从饼干到加盐的海枣焦糖。

They grow on date palm trees, instead of bananas or coconuts, imagine hundreds of dates. They can be used in multiple dishes from cookies to salted date caramel.

Dragon Scale.name: 龙鳞 Dragon Scale
Dragon Scale.description:
一片真正的龙鳞，用一根绳子系着，更多是一种象征性的战利品，表明其持有者是屠龙者。然而，由于龙鳞在诸界中十分稀有度——尤其是在不附着于那些龙身上的情况下——收藏家，以及在某些情况下更为阴险的势力，可能会为获取它而支付可观的溢价，具体取决于鳞片的颜色。

An actual dragon scale, attached to a piece of string, serves more as a symbolic trophy indicating that the owner is a dragon slayer. However, due to the rarity of dragon scales in the realms, not attached to the said dragons, collectors, and in some cases, more nefarious parties, may offer a significant premium to acquire it, depending on the color of the scale.

Maple Sap.name: 枫树汁 Maple Sap
Maple Sap.description:
作为最甜的树液品种之一，它可以被酿酒师用来酿造艾尔啤酒，或被酒馆老板用来给水增甜，作为糖浆，甚至用来泡茶。炼金术士用它来制造能让你的瞄准更精准的药水。

Being one of the sweetest variants of sap, it can be used by brewmasters to create ales, or by tavern keeps to sweeten water, as a syrup, or even tea. Alchemists use it to create potions that make your aim true.

Oil Lamp.name: 油灯 Oil Lamp
Oil Lamp.description:
它们的工作方式与蜡烛相同，但使用在室温下为液体的燃料，因此需要一个盛放灯油的容器。一根纺织品灯芯垂入油中，并在末端点燃，随着油沿灯芯被吸上来而燃烧。油灯的燃料来源包括各种各样的植物，例如坚果和种子，但也广泛使用动物脂肪。

They work in the same way as a candle but with fuel that is liquid at room temperature, so that a container for the oil is required. A textile wick drops down into the oil, and is lit at the end, burning the oil as it is drawn up the wick. Sources of fuel for oil lamps include a wide variety of plants such as nuts and seeds but also widely used are animal fats.

Dragon Eyes.name: 龙之眼 Dragon Eyes
Dragon Eyes.description:
龙之眼是简单却华美的珠宝饰品。这些耳环通常成对制作，与一条项链相配，并且只会赐予王室成员，传统上是在加冕仪式期间。制作这些耳环所需的精湛工艺只会交托给最负盛名的宝石切割师与珠宝匠。当光线恰到好处地照射其上，宝石闪烁的光辉中，有人猜测或许能瞥见一条真正巨龙警惕的眼睛。

Dragon's Eyes are simple, yet gorgeous pieces of jewelry. These earrings are typically crafted as a pair that accompany a necklace and are bestowed exclusively upon royalty, traditionally during coronation ceremonies. The intricate craftsmanship required for these earrings is entrusted only to the most renowned gem cutters and jewelers. In the glint of the jewels, when light strikes them just so, some speculate that the watchful eye of an actual dragon might be glimpsed.

Gear.name: 道具 Gear
Gear.description:
一种常规道具部件，可适用于从时钟到门再到压力阀的一切机械装置，它是用于所有机械化物品与结构的专门工具。没有它，它们将无法存在。主要由铜、黄铜或青铜制成，耐锈且可使用数十年。

An regular gear piece that fits into everything mechanized, from clocks to doors to pressure valves, it is a specialized tool for all mechanized items and structures. Without it, they would not exist. Primarily made out of copper, brass, or bronze, it resists rust and lasts for decades.

Homemade Counteractant.name: 自制反制剂 Homemade Counteractant
Homemade Counteractant.description:
一些平民在制作这些溶液时会使用相当多的柠檬，并搭配他们能找到的其他材料，而这反过来可能会引发一些不良反应。有时在混合物爆炸或出现其他未预见且不幸的副作用后，会导致失明或皮肤疾病；然而，自行制作仍然是常见做法，因为商店购买的价格通常超出普通平民所能负担。炼金术士会试图就这些问题发出警告，但这些警告大多无人理会。

Some of the commoners use quite a bit of lemon in creating these solutions, with other materials that they can find, which in return might have some adverse reactions. Sometimes leading to blindness or skin diseases after the concoction explodes or has other unforeseen and unfortunate side-effects, however, it's still common practice to create your own as the price for a store bought one is usually outside what a regular commoner can afford. Alchemists try to provide warnings of these issues, however, they mostly fall on deaf ears.

Tea.name: 茶 Tea
Tea.description:
茶有多种类型，例如绿茶、红茶、根茎茶、草本茶或果茶，每一种都用热水冲泡以达成不同的预期效果。草药师常推荐薄荷或洋甘菊茶以发挥其镇静效果，而姜茶则因缓解胃部不适而备受青睐。红茶是咖啡的常见替代品，而绿茶或果茶则作为清爽饮品而广受喜爱。无论类型或用途如何，茶都被广泛饮用且需求量很高。

Tea comes in various types such as green, black, root, herbal, or fruity, each served with hot water to achieve different desired effects. Herbalists often recommend peppermint or chamomile tea for its calming effects, while ginger tea is favored for alleviating stomach ailments. Black tea serves as a popular substitute for coffee, while green or fruity teas are enjoyed as refreshing beverages. Regardless of the type or purpose, tea is widely consumed and in high demand.

Green Pepper.name: 青椒 Green Pepper
Green Pepper.description:
甜椒通常有多种颜色，主要是绿色、黄色和红色，但紫色、粉色或白色也并不少见。它们主要被称为甜椒。它们可以作为多种菜肴的装饰，不过最常见的用途是作为沙拉中的一种配料

The bell pepper usually comes in multiple colors, mainly green, yellow, and red, but purple, pink or white are not uncommon either. They are mainly referred to as sweet peppers. They can be garnished on multiple dishes, however, the most common use they have is in salads as an ingredient

Nerium.name: 夹竹桃 Nerium
Nerium.description:
最常见的名字是夹竹桃，它是一种用于园艺观赏的小型灌木。当由技艺高超的草药师使用时，他们可以制作催眠酊剂，并治愈某些类型的皮肤刺激。

Most commonly known as Oleander, it is a small shrub used for gardening ornamentation. When used by highly skilled herbalists, they can make sleeping tinctures and cure some types of skin irritations.

Golden Encrusted Goblet.name: 镀金镶嵌高脚杯 Golden Encrusted Goblet
Golden Encrusted Goblet.description:
纵观历史以及在诸界的某些偏远地区，酒杯一直是地位与雅致的象征。炼金术士和草药师长期以来警告不要用金制酒杯饮酒，因为金属可能与杯中之物发生反应并产生毒性效果。如今，这类酒杯最常在被遗忘的古墓中发现，或出现在异国收藏家——有翼或其他——的珍藏之中。

Throughout history and in certain fringe regions of the realms, goblets served as a symbol of status and refinement. Alchemists and herbalists have long warned against drinking alcohol from gold goblets, as the metal can react with the contents and produce toxic effects. Today, such goblets are most often discovered in forgotten tombs or among the hoards of exotic collectors, winged or otherwise.

Faded Map.name: 褪色地图 Faded Map
Faded Map.description:
褪色的地图指向一个未知地点，文字过于难以辨认，无法分辨任何城市、地区或森林名称。技艺高超的制图师或许能就地图本身的细节提供一些见解，例如根据所用纸张或墨水判断它的制作时间。

Faded map which points to an unknown location, the text is too indecipherable to distinguish any cities, regions, or forest names. A highly skilled cartographer might provide some insight on the specifics of the map itself, such as when it was made based on the paper or ink used.
