Purple Vampire Crab.name: 紫色吸血鬼（特征）螃蟹 Purple Vampire Crab
Purple Vampire Crab.description:
我从一位老三角洲捕蟹人那里听说过一件令人惊奇的事：它们甲壳上紫色的浓淡可以预示即将到来的冬天有多严酷。紫色越深，霜冻越重。他还发誓说，如果你把一只养在水槽里，只有每个月加入一小撮来自它故乡三角洲的淤泥，它才会茁壮成长。他称之为“思乡病”，我觉得他可能是对的。

A an amazing thing I have heard, from an old delta crabber, is that the intensity of the purple on their shells predicts the severity of the coming winter. The deeper the purple, the harder the frosts. He also swore that if you keep one in a tank, it will only thrive if you add a pinch of silt from its home delta each month. He called it "homesickness," and I think he might be right.

Bolt.name: 箭矢 Bolt
Bolt.description:
螺栓、螺母和螺钉在生活的各个方面都不可或缺，它们在工具、锁具、时钟、家具的制作中扮演着重要角色，甚至用于将坚固的金属装备部件牢固地固定在一起。贵族人士，尤其是那些身着耐磨重型护甲的人，常常会雇用一名专职护甲匠的服务，让其时刻随行。这位技艺娴熟的护甲匠携带着行当所必需的工具，包括锤子、替换用螺栓、钢丝钳和拔钉器，确保无论旅途将他们带往何处，贵族的护甲都能保持在最佳状态。

Bolts, nuts, and screws are indispensable in various aspects of life, serving roles in the construction of tools, locks, clocks, furniture, and even in fastening together robust pieces of metal equipment. Noble individuals, particularly those clad in heavy-wearing armor, often retain the services of a dedicated armorer who accompanies them at all times. This skilled armorer carries essential tools of the trade, including a hammer, replacement bolts, wire cutter, and nail puller, ensuring that the noble's armor remains in optimal condition wherever their journey takes them.

Fish Soup.name: 鱼汤 Fish Soup
Fish Soup.description:
鱼汤的风味和角色取决于当地可获得的鱼类种类。这道菜因其清淡和令人愉悦的味道而成为平民中的热门选择。

The flavor and character of fish soup are influenced by the type of fish available locally. This dish is a popular choice among commoners for its lightness and delightful taste.

Citrine.name: 黄水晶 Citrine
Citrine.description:
“这种宝石通常用来代替黄玉，因为它们有着非常相似的光泽。正如你所能想象的那样，没有受过训练的眼睛很容易被蒙骗，这种情况在时代一次又一次地发生”

 

这种石头在色调上与帝国黄玉或黄色蓝宝石非常相似，然而，它的价值要低得多。它主要用于珠宝和艺术装饰。

"This gem is usually a substitute for Topaz, as they have a very similar shine. As you can imagine someone with an untrained eye could be easily fooled, as it happens time and time again" 

 

This stone bears a close resemblance to an Imperial Topaz or Yellow Sapphire in its hues, however, its value is significantly lower. It is mainly used in jewelry and art ornamentation.

Vermilion Snapper.name: 朱红咬鱼 Vermilion Snapper
Vermilion Snapper.description:
朱红笛鲷是一种相对较大的鱼，通常使用活饵（如鱿鱼或虾）进行底钓来捕获。捕捉朱红笛鲷的最佳时代是在初夏到深秋之间，此时它们栖息在坚硬的海底和礁区上方。

Vermilion Snapper is a relatively large fish, typically caught by bottom fishing with live bait, such as squid or shrimp. The best time to catch Vermilion Snapper is between early summer and late fall when they are found over hard bottoms and reefs.

Silver Ring.name: 银戒指 Silver Ring
Silver Ring.description:
银戒往往主要作为时尚宣言，常被挑选用以通过视觉协调来搭配特定服装。它们也会被对某些金属过敏的人佩戴，或被那些在购买新首饰时寻求更实惠选择的人佩戴。

Silver rings tend to serve primarily as fashion statements, often chosen to complement specific outfits through visual coordination. They are also worn by individuals who are allergic to certain metals or by those seeking a more affordable option when purchasing new jewelry.

Sugar Pumpkin.name: 糖南瓜 Sugar Pumpkin
Sugar Pumpkin.description:
糖南瓜是一种冬南瓜，以其甜美的风味以及坚实、光滑、致密的果肉而闻名，使其非常适合制作南瓜派以及其他烘焙食品，如饼干和面包条。

Sugar pumpkins are a type of winter squash recognized for their sweet flavor and firm, smooth, dense flesh, making them perfect for pumpkin pies and other baked goods like cookies and loaves of bread.

Boar Cranium.name: 野猪头骨 Boar Cranium
Boar Cranium.description:
在更为传统的地区，野猪象征着健康与惊人的力量。由于大多数人负担不起剥制师的价格来把头部制成标本挂在墙上，另一种选择是直接获得头骨，因为它相当容易取得，并且在一些乡间住宅中是受青睐的装饰品。

The boar, in more traditional regions, represents good health and incredible strength. As most cannot afford the price of a taxidermist to have the head mounted on a wall, an alternative is to obtain the skull directly, as it is quite easy to acquire and a favored decoration in some country homes.

Hard Candy.name: 硬糖 Hard Candy
Hard Candy.description:
硬糖传统上一直被视为一种药物，由草药师提供，用以缓解胃痛或减轻喉咙痛。然而，在更近的时代，更多的糖和水果被加入其配方中，使其迅速成为年轻平民的最爱。

Hard candy has traditionally been regarded as a form of medicine, provided by herbalists to soothe stomach pains or alleviate sore throats. However, in more recent times, additional sugar and fruit have been incorporated into its recipe, quickly making it a favorite among young commoners.

Cauliflower.name: 菜花 Cauliflower
Cauliflower.description:
最常见的花椰菜品种有绿色或白色两种，不过也存在更为奇特的颜色，例如黄色、橙色和紫色。根据地区不同，它们可以生吃、油炸、蒸制，甚至水煮；它是一种非常常见的蔬菜。然而，农民常说它相当难以养护，因此他们会避免种植它。

The most common Cauliflower types come in either green or white, however, more exotic colors such as yellow, orange, and purple also exist. Depending on the region they can be eaten raw, fried, steamed, or even boiled, it is a very common vegetable, however, farmers often say that it is rather hard to maintain, and so they avoid growing it.

Spider Silk.name: 蜘蛛丝 Spider Silk
Spider Silk.description:
蜘蛛丝尽管相对丰富，却依然备受重视且价格昂贵。由于其中涉及的挑战，很少有人尝试采集。尽管它能以高价格售出，但来自更大型蜘蛛的丝通常会稍微便宜一些。采集过程包括击晕蜘蛛，并使用专门的提取器来收集蛛丝。

Spider silk is highly valued and expensive, despite being a relatively abundant resource. Few people attempt to gather it due to the challenges involved. Although it sells for a high price, silk from larger spiders is usually a bit less costly. The harvesting process involves stunning the spiders and using a specialized extractor to collect the silk.

Cashmere wool.name: 开司米羊毛 Cashmere wool
Cashmere wool.description:
通常简称为羊绒，它是一种主要从特定品种的山羊身上收获的纤维。羊绒可以用来制作任何形式的服装，不过最常见的是长袍，这种服装开始被中产阶级平民用作地位的象征。

Simply known as cashmere, it is a fiber harvested mainly from specific breeds of goats. Cashmere can be used to create any form of clothing, however, the most common are frocks, which started to be used by middle-class commoners as a representation of status.

Quark Balls.name: 夸克球 Quark Balls
Quark Balls.description:
夸克球是一种由奶酪、鸡蛋、面粉、糖、柠檬皮屑和香草精混合制成的糕点，烹制后再撒上肉桂和糖。这些烘焙食品多在大型活动中供应，例如节日、季节集市以及嘉年华会。

Quark balls are a type of pastry made from a mixture of cheese, eggs, flour, sugar, lemon zest, and vanilla extract and after cooking, sprinkled with cinnamon and sugar. These baked goods are mostly served at major events, like festivals, season markets, as well as, carnivals.

Huni Guitar.name: 胡尼吉他 Huni Guitar
Huni Guitar.description:
与普通吉他不同，这种乐器具有方形外观，会影响其声学效果。音孔会在琴弦上产生轻微的混响效果，使这把吉他与其他弦乐器相比拥有独特的音色。吟游诗人经常因为其独特的声音而将这些吉他纳入音乐合奏中。

Unlike a regular guitar, this instrument has a square shape that affects its acoustics. The sound hole creates a slight reverb effect on the strings, giving the guitar a distinctive tone compared to other stringed instruments. Bards often include these guitars in musical ensembles because of their unique sound.

Ancient Gold.name: 远古黄金 Ancient Gold
Ancient Gold.description:
这些金币可以在最深处的陵墓或墓室中找到。国王或皇帝下葬时，会随葬装满这类钱币的罐子。然而，未经训练的冒险者很快会认为它们与普通金币具有相同价值。然而，这些钱币是100%纯金，收藏家愿意为任何数量的已找到的古代金币支付高昂的价格。

These gold coins can be found in the deepest tombs or burial chambers. Kings or emperors were buried with jars filled with these types of coins. However, untrained adventurers quickly believe that they have the same value as a regular gold coin. Yet, these coins are 100% pure gold, and collectors will pay a high price for any amount of the ancient gold coins located.

Dobsonfly.name: 石蝇 Dobsonfly
Dobsonfly.description:
鱼蛉是一种非常大的昆虫，这种昆虫由一种被称为地狱幼虫的幼虫孵化而成。它以水栖昆虫、花蜜、糖水、蠕虫，甚至小鱼为食。尽管它的超大型（体型）可能令人生畏，但鱼蛉短暂的寿命约为一周以及其夜行习性意味着许多平民可能终其一生都不会遇到一只。

Dobsonfly is a very large insect, insect that is born from a larva known as the hellgrammite. It feeds on aquatic insects, nectar, sugar water, worms, and even small fish. While the huge size of it, can be intimidating. Dobsonfly’s brief lifespan of about a week and its nocturnal habits mean that many commoners may go their whole lives without encountering one.

Cheese.name: 奶酪 Cheese
Cheese.description:
奶酪是一种由牛奶凝固并熟成制成的乳制品。它有各种风味和质地，常被用作调味品或烹饪配料，用于诸如派、糕点和其他烘焙食品等。

Cheese is a dairy product made from milk that has been curdled and aged. It comes in a variety of flavors and textures and is often used as a condiment or ingredient in cooking in things like pies, pastries and other baked goods.

Fir Plank.name: 冷杉木板 Fir Plank
Fir Plank.description:
冷杉木板是一种常见且用途广泛的建筑材料，在诸国各地用于各种目的。它取自生长在北方土地凉爽、多雾森林中的高大挺直冷杉树。其木材坚固耐用，却又轻便且易于加工。

The Fir Plank is a common and versatile building material, used throughout the realms for a wide variety of purposes. It is harvested from tall, straight fir trees that grow in the cool, misty forests of the northern lands. The wood is strong and durable, yet light and easy to work with.

Iol.name: Iol Iol
Iol.description:
一种紫色的宝石，有时也被称为堇青石。通常被切割成宝石刻面，用于各种类型的珠宝首饰，尤其是戒指。

A violet color stone, sometimes referred to as Iolite. Is usually cut into gemstone facets and is used in all types of jewelry, especially rings.

Agate.name: 玛瑙 Agate
Agate.description:
它通常在岩石中被发现，并呈现出各种惊人的颜色。数千年来被用于各类艺术与手工艺形式。根据地区不同，它可能有不同的名称或颜色。常见的好例子是“火玛瑙”，其颜色为深红色；或“苔藓玛瑙”，其外观类似苔藓，并呈现出深绿色色调。

It is usually found in rocks and comes a variety of amazing colors. Used for millennia in forms of arts and crafts. Based on the region it can have different names or colors. Good common examples are "Fire agate" which is a deep red or "Moss Agate" which has a moss-like appearance and gas a deep green shade.

Thousand Yes.name: 千次是 Thousand Yes
Thousand Yes.description:
这本书共有500页，每一页的正反两面都反复写着“是”。许多人相信这本书并非表面所见那般简单，但至今无人能辨明其真正用途。手持此书会感到一种不祥而令人不安的感觉，而若长时间凝视其页面，仿佛连这个词本身也开始扭曲变形、游移不定。关于其来历的唯一线索，是一张小字条上写着其作者之名为“壹”。

This book contains 500 pages, with the word "Yes" written repeatedly on both sides of every page. Many believe there is more to this book than what meets the eye, but no one has yet identified its true purpose. Holding the book gives an ominous, unsettling feeling, and staring into its pages for too long makes it seem as if the word itself begins to warp and shift. The only clue to its origin is the name of its author is a small note stating "One."

Transport Cage.name: 运输笼 Transport Cage
Transport Cage.description:
这个木制笼子专为便捷运输小型家畜而设计，例如母鸡、鸡和小野兔，使它们能够轻松地往返于当地市场。

This wooden cage is designed for the easy transportation of small livestock, such as hens, chickens, and small hares, facilitating their movement to and from local markets with ease.

Chitin.name: 几丁质 Chitin
Chitin.description:
在地下村庄和城市中，几丁质是一种宝贵的商品，因为它坚固且轻便。这来自于特意猎杀的、在黑暗中游荡的类昆虫生物。一些农场专门产出几丁质；然而，任何由自称冒险者的人带来的额外几丁质总是受欢迎的，因为技艺娴熟的工匠可以将其制成有价值的工具、武器、衣物，甚至护甲。

In underground villages and cities, chitin is a valuable commodity, as it is sturdy and lightweight. This comes from specifically slain insect-like creatures that roam in the darkness. Some farms exist for chitin; however, anything extra brought in by wannabe adventurers is always welcomed, as skilled crafters can turn it into valuable tools, weapons, clothing, or even armor.

Coconut.name: 椰子 Coconut
Coconut.description:
椰子棕榈的可食用果实。椰子的果肉，有时也被称为椰肉，因从中提取的椰子油而备受重视。果肉有时也会生吃，并与旅行者的日常口粮混合食用。

The edible fruit of the coconut palm. The pulp or sometimes referred to as the meat of the coconut, is valued for the coconut oil extracted from it. The pulp is also sometimes eaten raw and combined with the daily rations of travelers.

Rhodonite.name: 蔷薇辉石 Rhodonite
Rhodonite.description:
蔷薇辉石是一种迷人的宝石，主要因其装饰用途而受到珍视，具有鲜艳的粉红色泽。它常被制成珠宝，通常以珠子或弧面宝石的形式呈现。

Rhodonite is an attractive gemstone primarily valued for its ornamental use, featuring vivid pink coloring. It is frequently incorporated into jewelry, typically in the form of beads or cabochons.

Boiled Corn.name: 煮玉米 Boiled Corn
Boiled Corn.description:
嫩玉米在完全成熟前，可以用盐烤制或水煮。这种时令美味仅在玉米收获前且极短的时代内供应。由于其美味的定时代道，它往往需求很高。

Young corn, before it fully matures, can be grilled or boiled with salt. This seasonal delicacy is available only before the corn's harvest and for a very limited time. It tends to be in high demand due to its delicious timed flavor.

Coco-Loco.name: 可可-洛可 Coco-Loco
Coco-Loco.description:
椰子狂饮的制作方法是打开一个新鲜椰子并保留其中的椰汁。在加入几滴利口酒、几滴朗姆酒、菠萝汁和糖之后，将其冷藏后供应。这种热带混合饮品在炎热季节备受喜爱，既甜美又清凉。

Coco-loco is made by opening a fresh coconut and preserving the juice within. After adding a few drops of liqueur, a few drops of rum, pineapple juice, and sugar it is served chilled. This tropical blend is loved during hot seasons, being both sweet and cooling.

Tektite.name: 晶岩石胎 Tektite
Tektite.description:
当天外巨石坠落并粉碎群山时，那些被烧焦的小块岩石被称为玻璃陨石。然而，大多数炼金术士对撞击瞬间的整体过程更感兴趣，因为它会将这些小石块变成玻璃。玻璃陨石主要用作家具装饰品，因为其蓝色调相当赏心悦目。

When rocks fall from the heavens and smash mountains, the small-sized rocks that are charred are called tektites. However, most alchemists are curious about the overall process at the moment of impact, as it turns the small rocks into glass. Tektite is mainly used as furniture ornamentation as its shade of blue is quite pleasant to the eye.

Hand Drill.name: 手钻 Hand Drill
Hand Drill.description:
手摇钻作为一种手动工具，将曲柄的圆周运动转换并放大为钻夹头的旋转。该工具包含一个用于摇动的手柄，带动主轴上的小齿轮转动，末端的夹头用于固定钻头。这种多用途工具常见于石匠、木匠、皮匠，甚至铁匠使用，便于在木材、硬皮革、石头、软金属，甚至骨头等坚硬材料上钻出细孔。

Functioning as a manual tool, a hand drill transforms and magnifies the circular motion of the crank into the rotation of a drill chuck. The tool includes a cranking handle that turns pinion gears on the main shaft, with a chuck at the end designed to secure a drill bit. This versatile tool finds common use among masons, carpenters, leatherworkers, and even blacksmiths, facilitating the drilling of fine holes in hard materials such as wood, hard leather, stone, soft metals, or even bones.

Banana.name: 香蕉 Banana
Banana.description:
一种大多数人都喜爱的水果；草药师建议在你胃部不适时食用，旅店老板会将其捣碎制成甜饮料供应，而平民则常常生吃，因为它相当美味。

A fruit favored by most folk, herbalists recommend it if your stomach is upset, innkeepers provide it mushed as sweet beverages, and commoners eat it raw as it is quite tasty.

Hellgrammite.name: 地狱蝇幼虫 Hellgrammite
Hellgrammite.description:
地狱蝇蛆是各界最完美的钓鱼饵料，以能吸引包括太阳鱼、鲈鱼、狗鱼、沟鲶，尤其是黑鲈在内的多种鱼类而闻名。在更深的水域或靠近沉没原木、树根、大岩石或船坞等密集结构处垂钓时，它们被认为尤其擅长引来大鱼收获，不过外观相当吓人。

Hellgrammites are the perfect fishing bait across the realms, known to attract a wide range of fish including panfish, perch, pickerel, channel catfish, and especially bass. When fishing in deeper water or near heavy structures like submerged logs, tree roots, large rocks, or boat docks, they are thought to be particularly successful at drawing in the big catches, however, quite intimidating to look at.

Rock Salt.name: 岩盐 Rock Salt
Rock Salt.description:
盐在烹饪中作为关键成分被广泛使用，并用于腌制多种食物，如猪肉和鱼。采集者会调配盐和水的混合物，用作珍贵作物田地里的除草剂。

Salt is used extensively in cooking as a key ingredient, and to cure a wide variety of foods such as pork and fish. Gatherers create a mixture of salt and water to use as a weed killer in fields of valuable crops.

Invitation.name: 邀请 Invitation
Invitation.description:
请柬常用于婚礼、官方活动，或用来获得进入伯爵宫廷的许可。它们在风格上差异很大，从极其正式到私人化，从奢华到公文式不等。通常很难在打开请柬之前确切知道将会面对何种活动。

Invitations are often used for weddings, official events, or to gain access to the count's court. They vary greatly in style, ranging from highly formal to personal, and from luxurious to official. It’s typically difficult to know exactly what kind of event awaits until the invitation is opened.

Gauze.name: 纱布 Gauze
Gauze.description:
主要由亚麻制成，其主要用途是清洁伤口。为此，这些用于包扎的布料会配合蜂蜜或醋等一些防腐剂使用，有时还会加入药草以加快治疗过程。大多数旅人都会随身携带几份预先制作好的。

Primarily made out from linen, its main purpose is cleaning injureies. To help in this, some antiseptics like honey or vinegar are used with these cloths for bandaging, and sometimes medicinal herbs are incorporated to speed up the healing process. Most travelers have a few premade with them at all times.

Seafinder Coin.name: 寻海者硬币 Seafinder Coin
Seafinder Coin.description:
一种为海上船长制作的钱币，用于长途航行，主要出于迷信用途。在启航进行漫长旅程之前，船长会将其中一枚钱币抛入海中，以安抚神祇或海本身，取决于他的信仰。该钱币通常由白银制成，并镶嵌一颗宝石，宝石可能从蓝色黄玉到较为廉价的硅孔雀石不等。

A coin made for sea captains, for long trips, mainly used for superstition. Prior to setting sail on a lenghty journey, the captain will throw one of these coins into the waters to appease the gods or the sea itself depending on his beliefs. The coin is usually made out of silver with an gem that can range from Blue Topaz to the inexpensive Chrysocolla.

Aspen Lumber.name: 白杨木材 Aspen Lumber
Aspen Lumber.description:
白杨木材是一种柔软但相当坚固的木材，颜色最接近白色。它纹理细密、质地均匀，且缺乏明显的花纹。由于其浅色，它非常适合制作纸张、火柴棒、家具、门和窗框。

Aspen Lumber is a wood that is soft but fairly strong, and it is closest to white in color. It has a fine-grained, uniform texture and lacks a distinctive pattern. Due to its light color, it is perfect for making paper, matchsticks, furniture, doors, and window frames.

Seeds - Wheat.name: 种子 - 小麦 Seeds - Wheat
Seeds - Wheat.description:
小麦种子是来自小麦植株的小型棕色种子。它们用于种植小麦——一种谷物，磨成粉后可用于制作面包、意大利面以及其他烘焙食品。它也是交易最频繁的货物之一，与玉米种子并列。

Wheat seeds are small, brown seeds that come from the wheat plant. They are used to grow wheat, a grain that, when ground, is used to make bread, pasta, and other baked goods. It is also one of the most traded goods, along with corn seeds.

Mole Rat Hide.name: 裸鼹鼠皮 Mole Rat Hide
Mole Rat Hide.description:
有人说这是来自另一个世界的藏身处，然而，鼹鼠鼠在沙漠地区相当常见。既不是鼹鼠也不是老鼠，鼹鼠鼠是这个领域最不寻常的啮齿动物之一，不过，由于其区域独有性，它们的毛皮确实能卖个好价钱。

Some say that this is a hide out from another world, however, mole rats are quite common around desert areas. Not a mole and not a rat, the mole-rat is one of the realm's most unusual rodents, however, their pelts do fetch quite a pretty penny due to their regional exclusivity.

Pill Woodlouse.name: 药丸潮虫 Pill Woodlouse
Pill Woodlouse.description:
它有许多名称，包括普通球潮虫、石鳖虫、普通球鼠妇、滚滚虫、土豆虫、涂鸦虫和木匠鼠妇。有些农民会在丰收后饲养它们来清理土壤，因为它们以枯死植物为食，并防止杂草蔓延。

It goes by many names, including common pill-bug, slaters, common pill woodlouse, roly-poly, potato bug, doodle bug, and carpenter woodlouse. Some farmers keep them after a successful harvest to clean the soil, as they feed on dead plants and prevent the spread of weeds.

Table.name: 表 Table
Table.description:
标准桌子用于为旅店和酒馆的室内与室外空间配置家具。它们通常由木板制成，便于更换与维护，为顾客提供享用饮品与食物的桌面。

Standard tables are used to furnish both indoor and outdoor spaces of inns and taverns. They are usually made from planks for easy replacement and maintenance, providing surfaces for patrons to enjoy drinks and food.

Copper Ring.name: 铜戒指 Copper Ring
Copper Ring.description:
这个简单的金属戒指由铜制成。由于铜易于塑形、坚固耐用，并拥有独特的红棕色外观，因此是制作珠宝的绝佳金属。与灵性修行相契合的平民常常怀着强烈的信念佩戴它，觉得它能主动引导正能量，并将好运吸引到他们的生活中。

This simple metal ring is made out of copper. It's a great metal for making jewelry due to its ease of molding, durability, and unique reddish-brown color. Commoners attuned to spiritual practices often wear it with a strong belief, feeling it actively channels positive energy and attracts good fortune into their lives.

Pink Waxcaps.name: 粉红蜡伞 Pink Waxcaps
Pink Waxcaps.description:
粉红蜡伞菇也被称为“芭蕾舞者”，因为粉红色的菌盖看起来像芭蕾舞者的短裙。这种蘑菇可食用，且有一种独特的味道，确实类似上等的酸奶油。由于相当稀有，主要被厨师用来为餐点点缀装饰。草药师则倾向于将它们研磨成糊状，用以驱除任何魔法疾病。

Pink wax caps are also referred to as "ballerinas" because the pink cap looks like a ballerina's tutu. The mushrooms are eatable and have a unique taste, that does resemble a fine sour cream. Primarily used by chefs for garnishing meals as they are quite rare. Herbalists tend to use them as a ground paste, to ward off any magical diseases.

Mixed Jellied Fruits.name: 混合水果冻 Mixed Jellied Fruits
Mixed Jellied Fruits.description:
明胶由鱼胶制成，主要从鱼类中采集，也可以由动物骨骼制成。将水果和糖加入混合物中，冷却后切成各种形状，然后供食用。

Gelatin is created from isinglass, mainly harvested from fish, or it can also be made from animal bones. Fruits and sugar are added to the mixture and after cooling, it is cut into shapes and then served.

Nickel Ingot.name: 镍锭 Nickel Ingot
Nickel Ingot.description:
镍锭是一小块完美成型的纯镍锭条。据说它密度极高、重量惊人，只有技艺最精湛的铁匠才能锻造出来。这种金属呈闪亮的银色，在光线下熠熠生辉，并且极其坚韧，甚至能够承受最猛烈的打击。许多传说与传奇围绕着这种稀有而珍贵的金属流传，有人声称它蕴含魔法特性，能够赋予物品惊人的强度与耐久性；然而在大多数地区，它的主要用途是用于制造多种类型的货币。

A nickel ingot is a small, perfectly formed bar of pure nickel. It is said to be incredibly dense and heavy, and can only be forged by the most skilled blacksmiths. The metal has a shiny, silver color that glimmers in the light, and is an incredibly resilient metal, able to withstand even the strongest blows. Many tales and legends surround this rare and valuable metal, with some claiming that it holds magical properties and can bestow objects with incredible strength and durability, however in most regions it’s main purpose is for the creation of multiple types of coinage.

Sky Blue.name: 天蓝色 Sky Blue
Sky Blue.description:
这种小蘑菇呈现出独特的全蓝色，在一些地方因其与鸻鸫鸟相似的配色而被称为Werewere-kokako。它的美丽具有欺骗性，因为它的毒素会给胆敢食用它的人带来迅速的死亡。对技艺娴熟的工匠而言，它却提供了不同的东西：一种蓝色染料，浓郁而稀有，普通布料也能因之而化作艺术品。

The small mushroom is a distinctive all-blue color, in some places called Werewere-kokako, due to its similar coloring to the Kokako bird. Its beauty is deceptive, for its poison brings swift death to those who dare to eat it. For the skilled artisan, it offers something different, a blue dye so rich and rare to be used for ordinary cloth to transform it into a work of art.

Rhenium.name: 铼 Rhenium
Rhenium.description:
铼，有时被称为“炼金术士之金属”，主要用于与钨制成合金。对经验丰富的炼金术士而言，铼象征着一切物质在肉体、心智与灵性层面的完美。在许多药剂中，会加入一滴液态铼以增强其效力。

Rhenium, sometimes referred to as the "Alchemist's Metal," is primarily used in the making of alloys with tungsten. To experienced alchemists, Rhenium symbolizes the perfection of all matter physical, mental, and spiritual. In many potions, a single drop of liquid Rhenium is added to strengthen their potency.

Winter Kept Pelt.name: 冬藏皮毛 Winter Kept Pelt
Winter Kept Pelt.description:
用于制造极北皮革护甲与衣物的首选皮毛类型，能够为抵御风雨提供极佳的保温效果。尽管在更寒冷的气候中需求很高，但凡是遇到过这种特定皮毛的皮匠都对它深恶痛绝，因为没有合适的工具，它们几乎不可能被切割。

The preferred type of pelt used to manufacture the Far North leather armor and clothing provides very good insulation from the elements. While in high demand in the colder climates, this specific type of pelt is outright detested by leatherworkers who have ever come across it, as without the right tools, they are close to impossible to cut.

Jargoon.name: 贾尔贡 Jargoon
Jargoon.description:
锆石因其深红色与璀璨光泽而备受珍视，外观酷似红宝石。据传这种特定宝石要么能够投射奥术弹体，要么能够阻止夜行生物从其人类形态变形而出，但仍需进一步研究以证实这些说法。

Jargoons are highly valued for their deep red color and radiant shine, resembling rubies. There are rumors that this specific gem can either project arcane projectiles or prevent creatures of the night from shifting out of their human form, but further research is required to confirm these claims.

Wood Lily.name: 木百合 Wood Lily
Wood Lily.description:
采自多山地区，据说它们对小型家养动物毒性很强，然而，草药师会将它们的鳞茎捣碎敷在肿胀和瘀伤处，或将其制成药用茶提供给抱怨胃痛或咳嗽发热的病人。

Gathered from mountainous regions, they are said to be quite toxic for small home animals, however, herbalists use their bulbs crushed on swellings and bruises, or provide them as medicinal teas for patients who complain of stomachaches or coughs and fevers.

Mackerel.name: 鲭鱼 Mackerel
Mackerel.description:
鲭鱼可以生吃、烤箱烹制、油炸、熏制，或用醋腌制加盐。酒馆通常会提供多种烹饪选择，以迎合不同顾客的口味。

Mackerel can be enjoyed raw, oven-cooked, fried, smoked, or salted with vinegar. Taverns often provide a variety of cooking options to cater to different clientele tastes.

Kurnarac.name: 库尔纳拉克 Kurnarac
Kurnarac.description:
在洞穴深处，Kurnarac 种子被小心地种下。通过弹弓或改装弩的精准射击，它落在洞顶上并牢牢黏附。岁月流逝，曾经微小的种子开始生长，它倒挂的树状形态逐渐成形，尖刺般的树皮也逐步增厚。寒冷、潮湿的洞穴成为稳定且几乎难以察觉的生长的完美环境。数十年间，它的根向下延伸，如同钟乳石的形成一般，直到 Kurnarac 成熟，此时它的树皮已成为厚实的保护性外壳。对采收的需求逐渐消退，因为这株植物会自然地在体内保存它的 Wall Meat，提供能够无限期持续的养分。

Deep within the cave, the Kurnarac seed is carefully planted. With a precise shot from the slingshot or a modified crossbow, it lands against the ceiling, sticking fast. Years pass, and once a small seed begins to grow, its upside-down tree-like form takes shape as its spiky bark gradually thickens. The cold, damp cave becomes the perfect environment for a steady, almost imperceptible growth. Over the decades, its roots stretch downward, like a stalactite forming, until the Kurnarac matures, its bark now a thick, protective shell. The need for harvesting fades, as the plant naturally preserves its Wall Meat within, offering sustenance that will last indefinitely.

Gneiss.name: 片麻岩 Gneiss
Gneiss.description:
片麻岩作为建筑材料有许多用途，例如地板、装饰石、墓碑、建筑物的饰面石，以及工作台面。根据其产地不同，它可能具有美丽的纹理，使其成为装饰性建筑中最受追捧的材料类型之一。

Gneiss has many uses as a building material such as flooring, ornamental stones, gravestones, facing stones on buildings, and work surfaces. Depending on where is acquired, it can have beautiful patterns making it one of the most sought-after types of materials for ornamental construction.

Albite.name: 阿尔比特 Albite
Albite.description:
钠长石被用作宝石，虽为半宝石，但主要用于制造玻璃器皿。大多数陶工和玻璃匠在制作玻璃或陶瓷时会使用这种特定的宝石。成品随后以溢价出售，因为成品纯白的颜色相当醒目。

Albite is used as a gemstone, albeit semiprecious, and has mainly been use in the manufacturing of glassware. Most potters and glassblowers use this specific gemstone in the manufacturing of glass or ceramics. The completed product is then sold at a premium, as the pure white color of the completed product is quite eye-catching.

Green Shadow.name: 绿影 Green Shadow
Green Shadow.description:
一种因错误混合任何提供某种隐形形式的药水而产生的拙劣产物。皮肤开始变得像变色龙一样，改变颜色以匹配其周围环境；然而，该效果生效很慢，需要一点时代才能让你完全与自己的背景“融合”。

A butchered product of incorrectly mixing any potion that provides a form of invisibility. The skin starts to go chameleonic to a form, changing color to match its suroundings, however, the effect is slow to set in and it takes a bit of time up until you're fully "blended" with your background.

Owl.name: Owl
Owl.description:
猫头鹰是财富、繁荣、智慧、好运与福运的象征，许多贵族以及涉足奥术艺术的个人都渴望将其作为宠物饲养。那些从事畜牧的人在成功驯化猫头鹰后，很快便意识到它们在控制鼠类侵扰方面的有效性。

Owls, symbols of wealth, prosperity, wisdom, good luck, and fortune, are sought after as pets by many nobles and individuals dabbling in the arcane arts. Those engaged in animal husbandry, successfully domesticating owls, soon realize their effectiveness in controlling rodent infestations.

The Last Veiled Widow.name: 最后的蒙纱寡妇 The Last Veiled Widow
The Last Veiled Widow.description:
这种高酸性的蘑菇因其周围环绕的磷光网状结构而得名。与更常见的同类——面纱女士——相比，这种特定蘑菇的致命性并不常见；一旦被摄入，它会转化为酸，并开始从内而外吞噬不幸之人，最终只留下骨头。几个月后，这些骨头会孕育出更多的面纱寡妇。

This highly acidic mushroom gets its name from the phosphorescent mesh that surrounds it. Compared to its more common counterpart, the Veiled Lady, the lethality of this specific mushroom is uncommon, as when ingested it turns to acid and starts consuming the unfortunate folk from the inside out, only leaving bones behind. A few months later, the bones give rise to more Veiled Widows.

Finger Claw.name: 指爪 Finger Claw
Finger Claw.description:
它们并非武器，尽管有几个趾高气扬的小伙子喜欢挥着它们在空气里划拉。它们只是装饰服饰，纯粹而简单，但人们却以一种奇异的郑重对待它们。在河地，染着莓果汁的爪子会分发给孩子，用以标志季节的更迭；而在港口城镇，你会找到镶嵌着彩色玻璃碎片的爪子，以高价卖给来访的商人——那些想与古怪的贵族融为一体的人。

They’re not weapons, despite the way a few swaggering lads like to scratch the air with them. They’re costume, pure and simple, but folk treat them with a strange seriousness. In the riverlands, berry stained claws are handed out to children to mark the turning of the season, while in the port towns you’ll find claws inlaid with bits of colored glass, sold at a premium to visiting merchants who want to blend in with the eccentric nobility.

Papaya.name: 木瓜 Papaya
Papaya.description:
成熟的木瓜果实通常生吃，不带皮或籽。木瓜果实也可用来嫩化肉类，因为它们会提供一种非常特殊的风味。草药师会提供木瓜叶供人吸食，因为人们相信它们有助于呼吸；或者将木瓜叶捣成糊状作为泻药。

The ripe fruit of the papaya is usually eaten raw, without skin or seeds. The Papaya fruit is also used to tenderize meats as they provide a very specific taste. Herbalists provide the leaves to be smoked as it is believed that they help with breathing, or have the leaves turned into a paste as a laxative.

Spider's Silk.name: 蜘蛛丝 Spider's Silk
Spider's Silk.description:
这种钱币主要由黄金制成，但其颜色可能会因开采地区而有所不同。它可能呈现红色或绿色，并分别通常被称为红金或绿金。用于铸造这些钱币的黄金主要由地下族民获取，主要用于地表的贸易。这种钱币两面都有精细的蜘蛛雕刻，因此得名“蜘蛛金”或“蜘蛛丝”。

This coin is predominantly made of gold, but its color may vary depending on the region where it was mined. It can appear either red or green and is commonly known as Red Gold or Green Gold, respectively. The gold used to create these coins is primarily sourced by underground folk and is mainly used for trade on the surface. The coin features intricate spider carvings on both sides, which has led to its nickname, "Spider Gold" or "Spider Silk."

Sardonyx.name: 红缟玛瑙 Sardonyx
Sardonyx.description:
一种玛瑙的形态，价格更高，通常只由两种颜色组合而成，并带有横贯其上的黑色条带。佩戴这种特定宝石作为装饰品被认为能抵御一个法术，然而其细节已随时代流失。

A form of agate, higher in price, usually only in a combination of two colors with black bands across. Wearing this specific gemstone as an adornment is assumed to ward off a spell, however, the details of it were lost to time.

Algae.name: 藻类 Algae
Algae.description:
其质地如石英般坚实，光滑如玛瑙，这种宝石是家具最上等的装饰石材之一。据民间传说，人们相信这种宝石能够防止法术的变形属性；在一些边缘信仰中，甚至能防止活体家具。

With a consistency similar to quartz and the smoothness of agate, this gem is one of the finest ornamental stones for furniture. According to folklore, it is believed that this gem can prevent the shape-shifting attributes of spells and, in some fringe beliefs, even the living furniture.

Blueberry.name: 蓝莓 Blueberry
Blueberry.description:
大多数人会采集大量蓝莓，用于生食或晒干以备后用。干燥的浆果会整颗加入布丁和蛋糕中，或磨碎后加入面粉、汤和肉类中作为调味。蓝莓也常与干燥的碎肉混合，用来制作肉干饼。

Most folks collect large quantities of blueberries to be eaten raw or dried for later use. Dried berries were added whole to puddings and cakes or ground and added to flour, soups, and meat as flavoring. Blueberries were also commonly mixed with dry, ground meat to make pemmican.

Sewing Needle.name: 缝衣针 Sewing Needle
Sewing Needle.description:
缝衣针用于手工缝纫，由钢或骨制成，是一种细长的工具，一端有尖头，另一端有孔，即针眼，用于穿入缝纫线。

A sewing needle, utilized for hand-sewing and crafted from steel or bone, is a long slender tool with a pointed tip at one end and a hole, or eye, designed to hold the sewing thread.

Copper Ore.name: 铜矿石 Copper Ore
Copper Ore.description:
铜矿石通常在多条矿脉中与各种其他金属一同发现。它很容易通过其红褐色的颜色辨认。它是多种合金的基础，例如黄铜或青铜，并且也是所有地区铸币中重要的金属。奥术施法者会在附魔装置中试验铜金属棒，认为它能增强奥术能量的流动。

Copper ore is commonly found in multiple veins alongside a variety of other metals. It is easily identified by its reddish-brown color. It serves as the foundation for multiple alloys, such as brass or bronze, and is also an important metal in coin minting in all regions. Arcane casters experiment with copper metal rods in enchanted devices, believing it enhances the flow of arcane energy.

Murder Cake.name: 谋杀蛋糕 Murder Cake
Murder Cake.description:
我第一次遇见这款蛋糕是在锡比乌的一场化装舞会上，当时正值赤色收获期间；贵族们嗜好的一些游戏，足以让一名老实渔夫看了都脚趾蜷缩。谋杀蛋糕绝非寻常甜点，它是一场戏剧化夜晚的核心——宾客们扮演侦探与凶手。这蛋糕本身是一场盛大的多层杰作，常常黑得如同无星之夜，糖霜颜色像陈旧的血，或被塑造成一座哥特式庄园的模样；但它也可以简单到只是，一层夹着果酱的蛋糕，上面插着一把刀。

These I first encountered this cake at a masquerade in Sibiu, during Red Harvest, where the nobility have a taste for games that would curl the toes of a honest fisher. A Murder Cake is no simple dessert, it's the centerpiece of a theatrical evening where guests play at being detectives and killers. The cake itself is a grand, multi-tiered affair, often dark as a starless night with frosting the colour of old blood or fashioned to look like a gothic manor, but it also can be as simple as, a layer of cake with jam and a knife sticking out of it.

Bloodstone.name: 血石 Bloodstone
Bloodstone.description:
一种深色宝石，带有细小的红色或棕色斑点，有时这些也会看起来像条纹或纹理。它主要用作石质地板的封固石，或用于华丽的小型雕刻或雕像等，其他特性还包括其作为药剂的用途。若放置在开放性伤口上，它能帮助血液更快凝固。

A dark-colored gemstone with small speckles of red or brown spots, on occasion these can also look similar to stripes or veins. It's mainly used as a seal stone for stone flooring or used in ornate small carvings or figures, and other proprieties include its use as a medicinal agent. If placed on an open wound it helps the blood coagulate faster.

Cobalt.name: 钴 Cobalt
Cobalt.description:
钴是最常被误认为宝石的矿石之一，因为它的形状与光泽。一些海军舰队更偏好为他们的船只使用镀钴护甲，因为它比任何其他金属都更能抵御海水的腐蚀作用。一些炼金术士利用它的导电特性，而在边缘圈子里，人们相信由钴制成的容器可以储存闪电，但这些传闻仍未得到证实。

Cobalt is one of the most mistaken ores for a gemstone, due to it’s shape and luster. Some naval fleets prefer cobalt-plated armor for their ships, as it resists the corrosive effects of saltwater far better than any other metal. Some alchemists utilize it for its conductive properties, and it is believed in fringe circles, that containers made from cobalt can store lightning, but these rumors remain unfounded.

Midnight Crappie.name: 午夜黑斑太阳鱼 Midnight Crappie
Midnight Crappie.description:
午夜克拉皮鱼在白天很少见，因为它更喜欢夜晚的清凉黑暗来捕食。想要钓到这种特定鱼获的渔民会依靠策略性照明，使用灯笼来模拟月光在水面上的光辉。这些光源会把克拉皮鱼从它们藏身的地方——浸没的树木与岩石露头之间——引诱出来，使它们更容易被捕获。

Midnight Crappie is a rare sight during the day, as it prefers the cool darkness of night to hunt for food. Fishermen seeking this specific catch rely on strategic lighting, using lanterns to mimic the glow of moonlight on the water. These sources of illumination lure the crappie out from their hiding spots among submerged trees and rocky outcrops, making them easier to catch.

Carpenters Plane.name: 木工刨子 Carpenters Plane
Carpenters Plane.description:
刨子具有巧妙安装的切削刃，经过精心设计，用于削皮或刨削木材表面。它用于精加工与找平表面，能熟练地抹去先前工具如斧、锤或锯留下的痕迹，使木材光滑、平整且笔直

A plane, featuring a cleverly hafted cutting edge, is meticulously designed to skin or shave the surface of wood. Employed for finishing and leveling surfaces, it adeptly erases marks left by earlier tools such as an ax, hammer, or saw, leaving the wood smooth, flat, and straight

Timed Explosive.name: 定时爆炸物 Timed Explosive
Timed Explosive.description:
定时炸药是在预定延迟后引爆的装置，通常使用计时器来触发爆炸，给人们留出刚好足够的时代离开危险区域。延迟爆炸使破碎的岩石能在下一次装药引爆前移动，从而最大化爆炸的效果，并减少可能损坏矿井结构的振动。

Timed explosives are devices that detonate after a predetermined delay, often using a timer to trigger the explosion, giving just enough time to get out of harm's way. The delayed explosions allow fragmented rock to move before the next charge detonates, maximizing the blast's effectiveness and reducing vibrations that could damage the structure of the mines.

White Grub.name: 白蛆 White Grub
White Grub.description:
白蛴螬是多种甲虫的幼虫形态，通常在土壤表层下方发现。它们以草类和植物的根为食，导致牧场和花园出现枯死斑块。尽管对大多数农场来说是祸害，钓鱼者却将它们视为异常有效的鱼饵。

White Grubs are the larvae form of multiple beetles, found just beneath the soil. They feed on the roots of grasses and plants, causing dead patches in pastures and gardens. Though a bane to most farms, anglers value them as exceptionally effective bait.

Drayweight Leather.name: 德雷维特皮革 Drayweight Leather
Drayweight Leather.description:
这块皮革基本上是个骗局，商人出售时会使用“Drayweight”这个名字，因为听起来更具奇幻色彩。然而，皮革本身相当常见，但非常沉重。小贩们往往开玩笑说它值其重量的白银，但对优质道具稍有了解的人很快就会看出，这块皮革并没有什么特别之处。

This cut of leather is mostly a scam, and when merchants sell it, they use the name of Drayweight, as it sounds a bit more fantastical, however, the leather itself is rather common, but quite heavy. The peddlers tend to joke around as it is worth its weight in silver, but someone with some familiarity with quality gear will quickly identify that this cut isn't anything special.

Crimson Lady.name: 绯红女士 Crimson Lady
Crimson Lady.description:
猩红女士是一种鸡尾酒饮品，由伏特加、柠檬和番茄汁制成，并加入辛辣的红辣椒粉以增添些许辣味。它通常会大批量调制并冷藏保存。上面可以加腌制蔬菜、大蒜、辣根、芹菜、橄榄和黑胡椒。通常会大批量制作以便快速供应。

Crimson Lady is a cocktail drink, made from vodka, lemon, and tomato juice, spicy ground red pepper for a bit of spice. It is usually prepared in large batches and kept cold. It can be topped with pickled vegetables, garlic, horseradish, celery, olives, and black pepper. Usually made in large batches for quick servings.

Tungsten Ingot.name: 钨锭 Tungsten Ingot
Tungsten Ingot.description:
钨锭是一种稀有度很高的产品，只有经验丰富的铁匠使用一些最炽热的熔炉才能锻造出来。纯钨锭的主要用途在于炼金研究，尤其是在开发能够溶解一切的全新强酸方面。由于其稀有度以及锻造它们的巨大难度，找到一块精炼得当的钨锭就如同大海捞针。

Tungsten Ingots are a rare product, crafted only by experienced blacksmiths using some of the hottest smelters. The pure Tungsten Ingot’s primary use lies in alchemical research, particularly in the development of new, powerful acids capable of dissolving everything. Due to their rarity and the immense difficulty in forging them, locating a properly refined one is akin to finding a needle in a haystack.

Drinking Horn.name: 饮用角杯 Drinking Horn
Drinking Horn.description:
饮酒角通常由动物角或大型獠牙制成。已知也有由玻璃、木材、陶器制成的变体，甚至由技艺高超的银匠用金属打造。根据地区不同，这些角可能具有仪式用途，用于承认一对新人的婚姻，或纪念一位朋友的逝去。 

A drinking horn is usually made from either animal horns or large tusks. Variants are known to be made from glass, wood, ceramics, or even metal by skilled silversmiths. Depending on the region, these horns can have ceremonial purposes, either acknowledging two newly-weds marriage, or a friend's passing.

Bucket.name: 桶 Bucket
Bucket.description:
虽然水桶通常用于将井水运送到家中或用于清洁任务，但在极端情况下，或在某些无法使用户外厕所的牢房里，它们也可以被改作临时便桶。

While buckets are commonly used to transport water from wells to homes or for cleaning tasks, they can also be repurposed as makeshift latrines in extreme situations or certain jail cells where outhouses are not an option.

Mule.name: Mule
Mule.description:
骡子在诸国度中被广泛用作役用动物，因其坚韧与温顺的天性而备受珍视。它们以其体型而言拥有强大的力量，相较于大多数马匹具备更优越的体能耐力，再加上能在极端天气中生存、更高的耐心以及更长的寿命，使其成为进行超长距离旅行时的首选。

Mules, widely used as working animals in the realms, are highly prized for their hardiness and docile nature. Their strength for their size and superior physical endurance compared to most horses, coupled with the ability to survive extreme weather, increased patience, and longer lifespan, make them a favorite choice for traveling very long distances.

God's Wrath.name: 神之怒 God's Wrath
God's Wrath.description:
有时被称为硫磺石，更常见的名字是硫黄。炼金术士通常使用硫黄块来制造强效酸液，能够烧穿任何东西。它常常是炼金与宗教团体争端的焦点，因为在某些宗教中，人们认为它是神圣的——由于它燃烧时会呈现独特的颜色，火焰带有浓郁的紫色光泽。然而炼金术士建议不要燃烧这些块状硫黄，因为他们认为这样做会对人的健康造成不可修复的伤害。草药师用它来制作多种绿色染料。

Sometimes called Brimstone, and more commonly known as Sulfur. Alchemists usually use blocks of sulfur in creating potent acids that can burn through anything. It is often at the center of disputes between alchemical and religious groups, as by some religions it is believed to be sacred, given how it burns in a unique color with the flames a rich purple shade. Alchemists however advise against burning the blocks as they believe that doing so can inflict irreparable damage to one's health. Herbalists use it to create multiple types of green dyes.

Horseshoe.name: 马蹄铁 Horseshoe
Horseshoe.description:
在某些地区，马蹄铁被视为好运的预兆，而在另一些地区，它们象征着先进的工业。通常由钢制成，但材料的选择可能会因特定地区的金属供应情况而有所不同，包括青铜、铜或铁等选项。在极其罕见的情况下，也会考虑使用皮、皮革，甚至木材等材料。

In certain regions, horseshoes are seen as a harbinger of good luck, while in others, they symbolize advanced industry. Typically crafted from steel, the choice of material may vary depending on metal availability in specific areas, including options like bronze, copper, or iron. In exceptionally uncommon cases, materials such as hide, leather, or even wood are considered.

Samite.name: 细麻布 Samite
Samite.description:
诸界之中最为奢华厚重的丝绸之一，主要用于宗教长袍、礼服、装饰织物与室内装潢。对于皇室血统之人，通常认为其衣着会使用由金线织物与锦缎相结合制成的布料。

One of the most luxurious and heavy silks throughout the realms, mainly used in ecclesiastical robes, vestments, ornamental fabrics, and interior decoration. For those of royal blood it is assumed that a combination of cloth made out of gold and samite is used for their clothing.

Latratite.name: 拉拉特泰特石 Latratite
Latratite.description:
在最罕见的情况下，它被称为“神圣宝石”，而纵观历史，类似的宝石并未被发现多少。有人推测，若将其吞服，服用者将获得说服其所经之路上所有人的能力。然而，我们对拉托拉特石所掌握的有限知识，并未提供关于其潜在副作用的任何信息。传闻吞服此宝石会使你的皮肤散发出微弱的蓝色光芒，你的眼睛与头发会不断变换色调，直到最终变为纯金色。与吞服拉托拉特石之人接触的任何人，只会说出真相，或很容易被胁迫。然而，当该效果消散后，使用者将不会记得此事，但其他人会记得他们对其所说的话。

On the rarest of occasions, it is referred to as the "Gem of the Divines," and not many of its kind have been discovered throughout history. It is speculated that, if ingested, the consumer will gain the ability to persuade everyone in their path. However, the limited knowledge we have of Latratite does not provide any information on its potential side effects. Rumor has it that ingesting this gem will make your skin emanate a faint blue glow, your eyes and hair perpetually change shades until they reach a pure gold color. Those coming with contact with someone who has ingested Latratite will only tell the truth or be easily coerced. However, when the effect dissipates, the user will not remember the event, but others will remember what was said to them.

Faction Earrings.name: 派系耳环 Faction Earrings
Faction Earrings.description:
作为一种象征性的姿态，当加入某些非常特定且声名显赫的派系时，会提供一枚戒指或一对耳环作为欢迎赋礼，同时还会提供其他带有相同标志的周边物品，例如钢笔或笔记本。这有助于快速识别成员，也会带来最初的归属幻象。

As a symbolic gesture, when joining very specific and well-renowned factions, a ring or a pair of earrings is provided as a welcome gift, along with other paraphernalia such as pens or notebooks bearing the same symbol. This helps quickly identify members and also gives the initial illusion of belonging.

Moleskin.name: 鼹鼠皮 Moleskin
Moleskin.description:
一种厚重的棉织物，因其接触时柔软的触感而得名，与鼹鼠的皮毛相似。鼹鼠皮最常见的用途是制作裤子，不过它通常也是包扎的优质材料。

A heavy cotton fabric which got its name due to the soft feeling to the touch, which bears similarity to mole's fur. The most common use of moleskin is for creating trousers, however, it is also usually a prime material for bandaging.

Cucumber.name: 黄瓜 Cucumber
Cucumber.description:
黄瓜通常要么生吃，做成沙拉，或者有时会被烹饪，用于非常特定的菜肴。它们也可以在冬天用盐、野生莳萝和水，或醋调制的腌制液来保存。

Cucumbers are usually either eaten raw, in salads or sometimes cooked, in very specific dishes. They can also be preserved over winter in a concoction of salt, wild dill and water, or vinegar.

Buckle.name: 扣环 Buckle
Buckle.description:
皮革工匠通常会大量订购这些物品，因为它们会用于多件道具上，无论是冒险者还是平民皆是如此。它们的一些用途包括钱包、袋子、背包、腰带、护甲、肩章、鞋子等等。它们主要由铁或钢制成，并浇铸入模具中。

Leatherworkers usually order these in large quantities, as they go on several pieces of gear, for both adventurers and commoners alike. Some of their additions are in purses, bags, backpacks, belts, armors, epaulets, shoes, and many more. They are primarily made out of iron or steel and poured into molds.

Permits.name: 许可 Permits
Permits.description:
通常它们并不被正式称为许可，而是以各种不同的称谓出现，例如敕令、特许状、执照或公开特许状。例子包括“持械执照”，允许个人在贵族在场时携带武器；或“旅行许可”或“安全通行执照”，常授予受命递送信息或货物的使者。另一个例子是“资源采伐执照”，授予从某位贵族森林的指定区域采伐木材的权利。矿石、肉类以及其他资源也同样属于这种执照，具体取决于所采集的材料。

Usually not officially named as permits, they go by various titles such as writs, charters, licenses, or letters patent. Examples include a License to Bear Arms, which allows individuals to carry weapons in the presence of nobility, or a Permit to Travel or Safe Conduct license, often granted to envoys tasked with delivering messages or goods. Another example is a Resource Extraction license, which grants rights to harvest timber from a designated area of a noble’s forest. Ore, meat, and other resources also fall under the same type of license, depending on the material being gathered.

Walnut Log.name: 胡桃木原木 Walnut Log
Walnut Log.description:
胡桃木因其浓郁的色泽和良好的可加工性，常用于制作家具、地板、橱柜和装饰品。其叶子在被草药师加工成敷剂后，也可用于治疗晒伤、止痒以及头皮屑。 

Walnut wood is commonly used for furniture, flooring, cabinetry, and decorative items due to its rich color and workability. The leaves can be used for sunburns, itching as well, and dandruff, when processed by the herbalists in poultrices.

Stone Brick.name: 石砖 Stone Brick
Stone Brick.description:
石砖的生产往往成本高昂，因为它需要专门的工具以及技艺娴熟的工匠或石匠来塑形和抛光，而且必须从地底深处开采或从岩层中采石，因此通常只用于最负盛名的建筑项目，例如城堡、城墙、要塞和堡垒。

The stone brick is often expensive to produce, as it requires specialized tools and skilled craftsmen or masons to shape and polish, as well, and must be mined from deep within the earth or quarried from rock formations, making it often reserved for the most prestigious building projects, such as castles, walls, forts, and fortresses.

Schematics.name: 设计图 Schematics
Schematics.description:
这些设计图似乎很古老，不过大部分细节仍然保留，只是已经褪色。首先，需要一位历史学家为这些页面断代，推测使用了哪些材料，并评估其来源。要完全恢复缺失的信息，则需要一位技艺精湛的大师，因为只有他们才具备完成彻底修复所需的专业知识。

The schematics appear to be old, though most of the details remain, albeit faded. First, a historian is needed to date the pages, approximate what materials were used, and assess their origin. To fully restore the missing information, a master of their craft is required, as only they would possess the expertise necessary for a complete restoration.

Shorthorn Beef.name: 短角牛肉 Shorthorn Beef
Shorthorn Beef.description:
这种特定的牛肉切片有许多名称，而那些品味精致的人往往会深入追溯这块肉的产地以及牛的谱系树，以便将其高价出售。

This particular beef slice is known by many names, and those with a refined taste often delve into tracing the meat's location and the bovine's genealogical tree to sell it at a premium.

Wheel of Cheese.name: 奶酪之轮 Wheel of Cheese
Wheel of Cheese.description:
尽管有些人可能会争辩有什么能胜过一片奶酪，但在大多数情况下，答案确实是一整轮奶酪，而且幸运的是，大多数市场和酒馆都提供出售。

While some may argue that what beats a slice of cheese, in most scenarios, the answer is indeed a wheel of cheese, and fortunately, most markets and taverns offer it for sale.

Pewter.name: 白镴 Pewter
Pewter.description:
白镴是一种以锡为基础的合金，包含铜、锑，有时还含铅，是铁匠们用来制作餐具（如盘子、杯子和器皿）的流行材料，也用于装饰性物品，主要是可收藏的小雕像和人偶、游戏模型、船只及其他模型、（复制）钱币、吊坠、镀层首饰等。

Pewter, a tin-based alloy that includes copper, antimony, and sometimes lead, is a popular material among blacksmiths for crafting tableware such as plates, cups, and utensils but also for decorative objects, mainly collectible statuettes and figurines, game figures, ship and other models, (replica) coins, pendants, plated jewellery and so on.

Aquamarine.name: 海蓝宝石 Aquamarine
Aquamarine.description:
海蓝宝石是最受欢迎的浅蓝色宝石之一，并被广泛用于珠宝制作。戒指、耳环和手镯都由海蓝宝石制成，而它作为吊坠宝石尤为重要，相当大的吊坠也会被切割成刻面。人们还相信，在某个时期，它曾是某种稀有而秘密的法术的施法材料。 

Aquamarine is one the most popular light-blue gemstone and is extensively used in jewelry. Rings, earrings, and bracelets are made from Aquamarine, and it is especially important as a pendant stone, with fairly large pendants being faceted. It is also believed, that it was at some point a spell component for a rare and secret spell.

Claw Cup.name: 利爪杯 Claw Cup
Claw Cup.description:
这些年来，我喝过许多奇怪的器皿，用原牛角雕成的酒角、还带着窑炉余温的陶杯，甚至在海岸边用过一只打磨光滑的龟壳，但没有任何东西能比得上在红收获把手环住一只爪杯的感觉。想象一只高脚杯，杯柄是锻铁打造，颜色发暗、粗粝得像陈旧的血，并塑成一只利爪。它黑色的爪子紧紧抓住一只烟灰色玻璃杯碗，仿佛在拼命死抓不放。有些铁匠甚至会刻意添上划痕与缺口，让它看起来像是这只爪子为此搏斗过。

I’ve drunk from many strange vessels in my years, horns carved from aurochs, clay mugs still warm from the kiln, even a polished turtle shell on the coast, but nothing feels quite like wrapping your hand around a Claw-Cup at Red Harvest. Picture a goblet where the stem is forged iron, darkened and rough as old blood, and shaped into a talon. Its black claws grip a bowl of smoky glass as if it’s holding on for dear life. Some smiths even add scratches and nicks so it looks as though the claw fought for it.

Peridot.name: 橄榄石 Peridot
Peridot.description:
橄榄石是一种受欢迎且价格亲民的宝石，可被切割成多种刻面式样，并用于各种形式的珠宝，尤其是戒指、耳环、项链和手镯。魔法可用于建造不同的结构，然而，取决于建筑的体型，可能需要大量这种宝石。

Peridot is a popular and affordable gemstone and is faceted into many cuts, and used in all forms of jewelry, especially rings, earrings, necklaces, and bracelets. Magic can be used to build different structures, however, depending on the size of the building, a vast amount of the gemstone might be required.

Waxed Thread.name: 上蜡线 Waxed Thread
Waxed Thread.description:
虎皮是一大块皮毛，来自一只相当威严的野兽，这种生物往往能在对抗大型狩猎队伍时取得胜利，因此在商人处很罕见。这种生物大多可在茂密的常绿森林或深邃的丛林中找到，找到一只通常并不容易。

Tiger Hide is a large piece of pelt coming from a quite an majestic beast, which has a tendency to be victorious against large hunting parties, making it a rare find at merchants. The creature can be mostly found in dense evergreen forests or deep jungles, finding one is usually not easy.

Scorpionfish.name: 蝎子鱼 Scorpionfish
Scorpionfish.description:
鲉鱼的锐利棘刺中含有极其强效的毒液，使其成为海洋中最具毒性的生物之一。然而，尽管其毒性强烈，它们大多仍被视为美味佳肴，常被称赞为现有最美味的鱼类之一。正确的处理方式至关重要，因为不当处理这类鱼可能导致严重中毒，甚至死亡。草药师常常直接向渔民下单，采集其毒液用于药用与炼金用途。

Scorpionfish have extremely potent venom in their sharp spines, making them one of the most poisonous creatures in the ocean. However, despite their toxicity, they are mostly considered a delicacy, often praised as one of the most delicious fish available. Proper preparation is crucial, as incorrectly handling the fish can lead to severe poisoning or even fatalities. Herbalists frequently place direct orders with fishermen to harvest the venom for medicinal and alchemical purposes.

Jet.name: 喷气 Jet
Jet.description:
煤玉是一种深黑色的宝石，硬度足以被切割成刻面，常用于简洁的吊坠，或作为服装与家具中的组成部分。在各个地区的文化习俗中，穿戴镶有煤玉的服装象征着悲伤与哀悼的主题。

Jet, a deep black gemstone, is sufficiently hard to be faceted and is often utilized in straightforward pendants or as a component in clothing and furniture. In cultural practices across various regions, wearing Jet-adorned clothing signifies themes of sorrow and mourning.

Adder Venom.name: 蝰蛇毒液 Adder Venom
Adder Venom.description:
蝰蛇即使是一种毒蛇，对普通平民而言也很少致命；不过，炼金术师确实会把它们养在玻璃笼里，以采集其毒液来制作药剂和毒药。很久以前，蛇的鳞片曾被用来制作一些漂亮的蛋形炸弹——正如我们从卷轴中所知——威力相当惊人。

Adders even if it is a poisonous snake, it is rarely fatal for the regular commoner, however, alchemists do keep them in glass cages to harvest their venom for potions and poisons. Long ago, scales of the snakes were used to create some beautiful egg-shaped bombs - which as we have learned from scrolls - were quite destructive.

Purple Berries.name: 紫色浆果 Purple Berries
Purple Berries.description:
紫色浆果甜味明显，采集者和草药师建议少量食用，因为可能会出现健康并发症。酿酒师用它们为艾尔酒增添更有趣的色泽，并使饮品更甜。

Purple berries are palpably sweet, Gatherers and Herbalists recommend eating them in small quantities, as health complications may occur. Brewmasters use them to give their ales more interesting colors, as well as make their beverages sweeter.

Manganese Chips.name: 锰碎片 Manganese Chips
Manganese Chips.description:
锰碎片在开采后，很少被炼金术士或草药师用于调制药水或药物，也用于制作除草剂和棕色颜料。它们的主要用途是在锻造多种重要合金时加入，使其更具韧性。

Manganese Chips, after being mined, are rarely used by alchemists or herbalists in the production of potions or medicine, as well as in the creation of herbicides and brown paint. Their primary use is in the forging of a variety of important alloys to make them more resilient.

Plum Seeds.name: 李子种子 Plum Seeds
Plum Seeds.description:
种植李子树的过程与种植桃树有许多相似之处。然而，它对温度控制的要求更高。种子需要一段时间的低温暴露来打破休眠期，而时机必须恰到好处，以确保种子不会暴露在过多的温暖或冰冻温度之下。这个关键时期正是为什么只有最有经验的农场工人或草药师才会承担这项任务，以确保李子种子拥有成功播种的理想条件。

The process of planting plum trees shares many similarities with that of peaches. However, it requires even more attention to temperature control. The seeds need a period of cold exposure to break dormancy, and the timing must be just right to ensure that the seeds are not exposed to too much warmth or freezing temperatures. This critical period is why only the most experienced farmhands or herbalists take on the task, ensuring that the plum seeds have the ideal conditions for successful seeding.

Scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
Scarecrow.description:
稻草人根植于流行传统，是一种通常塞满稻草的人偶。其主要目的是吓阻鸟类或其他动物啃食种子、作物和水果。

The scarecrow, rooted in popular tradition, is a mannequin typically stuffed with straw. Its primary purpose is to deter birds or other animals from consuming seeds, crops, and fruit.

Sextant.name: 六分仪 Sextant
Sextant.description:
六分仪是一种导航仪器，旨在测量两个可见物体之间的角距离。它主要用于测量天体（如恒星或月亮）与地平线之间的夹角，这对航海导航至关重要。

The sextant is a navigation instrument designed to measure the angular distance between two visible objects. Primarily, it is used to measure the angle between an astronomical body, such as a star or a moon, and the horizon, which is crucial for nautical navigation.

Hot Spiced Raspberry Cider.name: 热香料覆盆子苹果酒 Hot Spiced Raspberry Cider
Hot Spiced Raspberry Cider.description:
大多数人认为这是一种传统的冬季饮品，并加入了水果的甜味。它诱人的香气会弥漫酒馆，而温热的苹果酒能让大家在寒冷季节的夜晚都感到舒适。虽然制作时可以使用多种配料，但有两样始终不变，主要是朗姆酒和覆盆子苹果酒。加入枫糖浆、豆蔻、生姜、胡椒粒、丁香或肉桂等配料也很常见，这些常见的添加物会赋予它更浓郁的风味与季节魅力。

Considered by most a traditional winter drink with the sweet addition of fruit. Its inviting aroma will fill the taverns, while the warm cider keeps everyone cozy during cold season evenings. Although multiple ingredients can be used in its making, two remain constant, mainly rum and raspberry cider. Additions such as maple syrup, cardamom, ginger, peppercorns, cloves, or cinnamon are common additions that give it a stronger flavor and seasonal charm.

Foraging Backpack.name: 采集背包 Foraging Backpack
Foraging Backpack.description:
由稻草编织并以柳木等轻质木材加固，这只结实的篮子非常适合采集者和草药师。它专为在林地、河畔或开阔田野中觅食而设计，提供一种轻便却耐用的工具，用于收集食物和草药。

Crafted from straw and reinforced with light wood like willow, this sturdy basket is perfect for gatherers and herbalists. It’s designed for foraging in woodland areas, by the rivers, or across open fields, providing a lightweight yet durable tool for collecting food and herbs.

Sugar Beet.name: 甜菜 Sugar Beet
Sugar Beet.description:
这些甜菜品种主要由农民种植，并在草药师的帮助下转化为糖。

These types of beets are mainly cultivated by farmers, and with the help of herbalists turned into sugar.

Hickory Log.name: 山核桃原木 Hickory Log
Hickory Log.description:
最受追捧的木材类型之一。用于大多数建筑工程。

One of the most sought after types of wood. Used in most construction projects.

Witherite.name: 枯萎石 Witherite
Witherite.description:
凋萎石是一种独特的宝石，以其对特定坐骑的要求而闻名。无论用于珠宝、护甲，还是任何装饰性物品，它都必须镶嵌在一件银金合金（由金与银构成）的饰件上，否则就有脱落的风险。

Witherite is a distinctive gemstone known for its requirement of a specific mount. Whether used in jewelry, armor, or any decorative item, it must be mounted on an electrum piece, a gold and silver alloy, otherwise, it risks becoming dislodged.

Goldilocks.name: 金发姑娘 Goldilocks
Goldilocks.description:
Goldilocks 以明亮的果香与柔和的麦芽底调相互交织，牢牢吸引着味蕾。每一口都呈现出逐渐展开的多层风味，吸引那些追求深度与细腻变化、而非单一熟悉口感的啤酒爱好者。

Goldilocks captivates the palate with a harmony of bright fruit notes and gentle malt undertones. Each sip reveals layers of flavor that unfold gradually, appealing to beer enthusiasts who seek depth and nuance rather than a simple, familiar taste.

Silphium.name: 塞尔菲乌姆 Silphium
Silphium.description:
锡尔菲乌姆，又称激光草，是一种稀有而异域的植物，被娴熟的炼金术士与草药师用于多种用途。其用途包括作为香料、香水的成分、催情剂以及药用疗法。它可治疗咳嗽、喉咙痛、发热、消化不良、一般疼痛和疣等病症，同时也可作为避孕剂。

Silphium, also known as laserwort, is a rare and exotic plant utilized by expert alchemists and herbalists for various purposes. Its uses include functioning as a spice, a component in perfumes, an aphrodisiac, and a medicinal remedy. It treats ailments such as coughs, sore throats, fevers, indigestion, general pain, and warts, and it also acts as a contraceptive.

Monel.name: 莫内尔 Monel
Monel.description:
蒙乃尔是通过结合镍和铜制成的，并且其铁含量极低。它具有卓越的耐腐蚀性，使其适用于广泛的用途。无论是用于狗牌、管道、金属板材，还是用于咸水船只的钉子，由这种合金制成的物品通常都具有更长的耐用性。

Monel is created by combining nickel and copper, and it has minimal iron content. It boasts exceptional corrosion resistance, making it suitable for a wide range of applications. Whether it's for dog tags, piping, metal sheets, or nails used in saltwater ships, objects made from this alloy typically exhibit extended durability.

To-do list.name: 待办清单 To-do list
To-do list.description:
平民做的基本事项清单。

  1. 趁太阳还没升太高之前，从井里打点水

  2. 去看看山羊，确保那只灰的别又走丢了

  3. 把芜菁地旁边那根坏掉的篱笆桩修好

  4. 去集市，看看老马可拉还有没有不长虫的面粉

  5. 给爹的靴子打补丁，要是我能找到我把针放哪了

  6. 再劈些柴火，因为还是冷，我也不信那天色

  7. 祈祷今年庄稼别像去年那样烂掉

  8. 把那些在母猪下崽时沾了血的破布搓洗干净

  9. 别忘了问问乔伦，他有没有在十字路口附近见过那些强盗

  10. 喂鸡，然后再确认没被狐狸又叼走几只

Basic list of things made by a commoner.

  1. Fetch water frum tha well ‘fore sun gets too high

  2. Check on the goats, make sure that gray one ain’t wandered off again

  3. Fix that busted fence post near tha turnip patch

  4. Go to market, see if Ol’ Markla still got flour what don’t got bugs in it

  5. Patch Pa’s boots, if I can find where the I put the needle

  6. Chop more firewood, cause it’s still cold an I don’t trust that sky none

  7. Say prayers so the crops don’t rot this year like last

  8. Scrub them rags what got blood on ‘em from the hog birthing

  9. Don’t forget to ask Jorren if he seen them bandits near the crossroads

  10. Feed the chickens, then make sure none got took by foxes again

Glider Wings.name: 滑翔翼 Glider Wings
Glider Wings.description:
虽然很少有人了解空气动力学的复杂运作，但有些了解的人会使用一对半机械化的翅膀来旅行，比步行更快。它们通常由非常轻的铝制框架和加固布料制成，类似于最大船帆上使用的那种。

While few understand the intricate workings of aerodynamics, some who do use a pair of semi-mechanized wings to travel faster than on foot. They are usually made from a very light aluminum frame with strengthened cloth, similar to that used on the largest ship sails.

Sunset Walk.name: 日落漫步 Sunset Walk
Sunset Walk.description:
日落漫步是一种在大多数杂货店都能买到的普通葡萄酒。它之所以得名，更像是一种广告手法，用来灌输这样一种观念：在傍晚散步之前先来一杯葡萄酒，因为它能促进血液循环，让生活更健康。大多数草药师和炼金术士都强烈反对。它算不上好酒，但它能温暖胸口，柔和一天的锋利棱角。

Sunset Walk is a generic wine found in most general stores. It got the name, more of an advertising technique to induce the idea that prior to going for the evening walk, have a glass of wine, as it boosts blood flow, for a more healthier life. Most herbalists and alchemists vehemently disagree. It’s not fine wine, but it warms the chest and softens the day’s sharp edges.

Oligoclase.name: 奥长石 Oligoclase
Oligoclase.description:
奥长石作为一种半宝石，通常需求量很高，因为它是较为实惠的宝石之一，深受大多数平民欢迎。它通常呈白色、灰色、绿色或红色。由于颜色的广泛范围

Oligoclase being a semi-precious stone is usually in high demand by most commoners as it is one of the more affordable gems. It usually comes in either white, grey, green or red. Due to the wide range of colors

Carriage Safety Guide.name: 车厢安全指南 Carriage Safety Guide
Carriage Safety Guide.description:
小型安全告示卷轴，包含下一段车厢旅程的信息，包含如下要点：

  • 吸烟区域：尽管我们理解由此产生的困惑，此区域并非用于吸食异域草药。此处专为元素性质的人型生物指定。请勿在此区域进行任何形式的熄灭操作。

  • 金属、沉重与大型生物：若你是由金属构成的生物、体型显著，或是会使用魔法且在紧凑空间中携带大量物品（例如：异次元储存）的使用者，请在登车前告知我们。可能需要专门的马匹。未提前告知将导致延长的行李费用。

  • 有爪人型生物：请勿抓挠任何座椅或车厢的木质部件。

  • 有角人型生物：除非你的角向内弯向自身，否则所有有角个体必须始终用软木塞封住角尖。

  • 变化系施法者：不得将任何液体嬗变为酒精。鉴于先前发生的一起事件，旅途中严禁一切酒精。此外，请无视旅途中遇到的任何尖叫的岩石。

  • 满月提示：出现狼人症状的乘客建议不要在满月期间订票出行。若你选择无视此警告，请注意：你可能会被永久雇佣，以替换旅途中损失的任何马匹。

  • 灵光携带者：拥有正在生效的灵光之乘客必须停留在特定核准的区域。我们理解你的宗教、神祇或庇护者的重要性，但我们必须顾及所有旅客的舒适度，包括来自其他文化者，或近期自来世归来者。不遵从将被报告至最近的守卫岗哨。

  • 石化生物：若你的物种能够通过视线或其他手段使他人石化，你必须在登车前通知工作人员。未如此做将导致在旅途持续时间内于你的座位周围安装镜子。

  • 进食规定：旅途中不得食用任何食物。将提供多次休息停靠点供你用餐。无论文化习俗如何，其他乘客不被视为食物。

  • 安全告示：任何时候请将所有肢体保持在车厢内。对于旅途中遭受的任何伤害，我们概不负责。

Small safety scroll that contains information of the next carriage trip, with points such as:

  • Smoking Area: While we acknowledge the confusion, this area is not intended for the consumption of exotic herbs. It is specifically designated for humanoids of elemental nature. Please refrain from any form of extinguishing in this area.

  • Metal, Heavy, and Large Creatures: If you are a creature composed of metal, of significant size, or a magic user who carries extensive inventory in compact spaces (e.g., extra-dimensional storage), please inform us prior to boarding. Specialized equines may be required. Failure to notify us will result in extended baggage fees.

  • Clawed Humanoids: Please refrain from scratching any seats or wooden parts of the carriage.

  • Horned Humanoids: Horned individuals must keep their horns corked at all times unless their horns curve inward toward themselves.

  • Transmutation Casters: Do not transmute any liquids into alcohol. Following a previous incident, all alcohol is strictly forbidden during the trip. Additionally, please ignore any screaming rocks encountered during the journey.

  • Full Moon Advisory: Passengers with lycanthropy symptoms are advised not to book trips during a full moon. Should you choose to ignore this warning, be aware that you may be permanently hired to replace any equines lost during the journey.

  • Aura Bearers: Passengers with an active aura must remain in the specifically sanctioned areas. We understand the importance of your religion, deity, or patron, but we must consider the comfort of all travelers, including those from other cultures, or those recently returned from the afterlife. Noncompliance will be reported to the nearest guard post.

  • Petrifying Creatures: If your species can petrify others through sight or other means, you must notify staff before boarding. Failure to do so will result in the installation of mirrors around your seat for the duration of the trip.

  • Food Consumption: No food may be consumed during the journey. Multiple rest stops will be provided where you may eat. Other passengers are not considered food, regardless of cultural practices.

  • Safety Notice: Keep all limbs inside the carriage at all times. We are not responsible for any injuries sustained during the journey.

Stitch-me-up Pie.name: 缝合派 Stitch-me-up Pie
Stitch-me-up Pie.description:
这些派最常出现在秋季集市上，那时面包师既想炫耀他们的技能，也想展示自家果园的丰收。“缝线”越精巧，价格就越高。在我旅行时，前些日子我曾见过一位面包师接受冒险者队伍的委托，把派塑造成带有裂口的样子，与他们的战斗伤疤相呼应。愚蠢吗？当然。但行会成员出手阔绰，每个人都黏着手指、笑容满面地离开。

These pies show up most often in autumn markets, when bakers want to flaunt their skill as much as their orchard’s bounty. The more intricate the “stitching,” the higher the price. In my travels, a while back, I once saw a baker take commissions from adventuring companies, shaping pies with gashes that matched their battle scars. Silly? Absolutely. But the guildsmen paid handsomely, and everyone left sticky-fingered and grinning.

Pillory.name: 枷锁 Pillory
Pillory.description:
枷刑架是一种用于公开惩罚惯犯的装置。它由一个带孔的木制框架组成，用于固定头部和双手。

The pillory was a device used for publicly punishing repeat offenders. It features a wooden frame with holes to secure the head and hands.

Rhubarb.name: 大黄 Rhubarb
Rhubarb.description:
最稀有的春季水果之一，通常用于馅饼和果馅挞，或有时用于制作糖。草药师常将其作为治疗消化不良相关问题的药方，或在强烈情绪介入时用来安抚神经。在魔法中，它在极少数情况下被用作法术成分。

One of the rarest spring fruits, usually used in pies and tarts, or sometimes used to create sugars. Herbalists often prescribe it as a remedy for issues related to indigestion, or to calm the nerves when strong emotions are involved. In magic, it is used, on rare occasions, as a spell component.

Gleaming Unicorn.name: 闪耀独角兽 Gleaming Unicorn
Gleaming Unicorn.description:
当森林住民试图建立新的森林环时，他们会使用一种原初魔法将地下的所有金属提取出来，并用他们挖出的贵金属铸造钱币。这些钱币是铂金与白银的合金，使其成为相当有价值的商品，并在他们进入文明社会时用于交易。其价值大约相当于铂金币的25%。

When forest folk attempt to create new forest circles, they use a form of primal magic to extract all the metals from the ground, and with the precious metals they dig out, they create coins. These coins are an alloy between platinum and silver making them a quite valuable commodity and used for trade when they go into civilization. Their value is roughly 25% of platinum.

Siltstone Slabs.name: 粉砂岩板 Siltstone Slabs
Siltstone Slabs.description:
粉砂岩块主要用作尺寸石材，可以切割成块或板材，用于建筑用途，或用于抛光某些金属，例如钢。在高密度地区，它们通常用于室内地板、景观装饰和花园墙。

Siltstone blocks are primarily used as dimension stones, where they can be cut into blocks or slabs for architectural purposes or for polishing certain metals, such as steel. In high-density areas, they are commonly used for indoor flooring, landscape decoration, and garden walls.

Grapefruit.name: 西柚 Grapefruit
Grapefruit.description:
草药师通常会警告在服用药物时不要食用葡萄柚或饮用葡萄柚汁，因为所提供的药物可能无法按预期发挥作用。葡萄柚也是贵族中一种众所周知的受欢迎早餐水果。 

Herbalists usually warn against consuming grapefruit or grapefruit juice, when taking medicines, as the medicine provided might not work as intended. The grapefruit is also a known popular breakfast fruit for the nobility.

Poplar Log.name: 白杨原木 Poplar Log
Poplar Log.description:
杨木是最常见的木材类型之一。由于其易得性带来了较低的价格，它是大多数初学者到中级木工的绝佳选择。它的用途也十分广泛，例如建筑、细木工或雕刻。

Poplar is one of the most available types of wood. Due to its lower price due to its accessibility, it is an excellent choice for most beginners to intermediate carpenters. It also has a wide range of uses, such as construction, joinery, or carving.

Pomegranate.name: 石榴 Pomegranate
Pomegranate.description:
石榴是一种甜中带酸的水果，外皮厚实且呈红色。虽然外皮不能食用，但它包裹着数百颗多汁的籽粒，你可以直接食用，或撒在沙拉、燕麦粥和其他菜肴上。

Pomegranate is a sweet, tart fruit with thick, red skin. While the skin is not edible, it holds hundreds of juicy seeds that you can eat plain or sprinkle on salads, oatmeal, and other dishes.

Sour Cherry.name: 酸樱桃 Sour Cherry
Sour Cherry.description:
酸樱桃直接从树上采摘下来，用勺子送入口中时也能十分美味。然而，有些人可能会觉得这是需要慢慢习惯的味道。这种浓郁多汁的成果非常适合搭配酒精饮料、蛋奶糊、馅饼或布丁。

Directly harvested from the tree, Sour Cherries can be delicious when spooned into one's mouth. However, some may find it an acquired taste. The concentrated and juicy result is perfect for pairing with alcoholic beverages, custard, pies, or pudding.

Star Rose Quartz.name: 星蔷薇石英 Star Rose Quartz
Star Rose Quartz.description:
或简称为蔷薇石英，是一种主要用于珠宝的粉色宝石。大型石板可以被切割成多种形状，从用于节日和周年纪念的心形，到用于法师水晶球的巨大圆形。它也可以用作魔法材料，用于偏转法术。

Or simply known as Rose Quartz, is a pink gemstone mainly used in jewelry. The large slabs can be cut into multiple shapes from hearts, for holidays and anniversaries to huge round shapes, for wizards' crystal balls. It can also be used as a magical material, to deflect spells.

Turnip.name: 芜菁 Turnip
Turnip.description:
芜菁深受农民喜爱，因为它们不需要漫长的生长季节。其根部可烹煮后整颗上桌或捣成泥食用，也可用于炖菜。它们还可以用作牛的饲料。

Turnips are a favorite for farmers as they do not require a long growing season.  The roots are cooked and served whole or mashed and are used in stews. They can also be used as fodder for cattle.

Olive Pomace.name: 橄榄果渣 Olive Pomace
Olive Pomace.description:
橄榄被压榨取油后，残渣会再次压榨以提取任何残余的油，然后干燥成细粉。为便于运输，粉末被塑造成小颗粒或圆柱形砖块。这些砖块在面包房中用作燃料，因为它们独特的燃烧气味与烘焙食品的香气相结合，会吸引大量顾客以及其他商家。由于燃烧时间长，庄园、城堡和要塞常常为他们的火盆大量订购它们。然而，它们高度易燃，并且在阳光直射下可能自燃，因此需要特定的储存方式。它们需要储存在装有盐水的桶中以防止发霉并降低火灾风险。

After olives are crushed for oil, the remnants are pressed again to extract any remaining oil and then dried into a fine powder. For ease of transportation, the powder is shaped into small pellets or cylindrical bricks. These bricks are used as fuel in bakeries, as their unique burning smell, combined with the aroma of baked goods, attracts considerable clientele and other establishments. Manors, castles, and forts often order them in large quantities for their braziers due to their long burn time. However, they are highly flammable and can ignite in direct sunlight, necessitating specific storage. They require storage in barrels with salted water to prevent mold and mitigate the fire risk.

Eggs, Rice, and Green Beans.name: 鸡蛋、米饭和四季豆 Eggs, Rice, and Green Beans
Eggs, Rice, and Green Beans.description:
一顿非常丰盛的餐点，鸡蛋与米饭相得益彰，而米饭又与豆子完美搭配。这道菜受到了大多数旅店老板的强烈推荐。

A very hearty meal, the eggs complement the rice well, and the rice pairs wonderfully with the beans. This dish comes highly recommended by most tavern keepers.

Darmouth Bass.name: 达莫斯·巴斯 Darmouth Bass
Darmouth Bass.description:
达特茅斯鲈鱼偏好池塘与湖泊中清澈、浅水的水域，常见于水栖（特征）植被附近、沉没木材或岩石露头周边。学者们专门撰写了整本书来探讨达特茅斯鲈鱼垂钓之道。在更为成熟的领地中，当地渔业部门要求必须持有专门的钓鱼执照才能捕获这种珍贵鱼类。若无执照，任何捕获的达特茅斯鲈鱼都必须放生，否则垂钓者除了承担高额罚款外，甚至可能面临监禁。

Dartmouth Bass prefer clear, shallow waters in ponds and lakes, often found near aquatic vegetation, submerged timber, or rocky outcroppings. Scholars have dedicated entire books to the art of Dartmouth Bass fishing. In more established territories, local fisheries require a dedicated fishing license to catch this prized fish. Without one, any captured Dartmouth Bass must be released, or the fisher might even face jail time, on top of a hefty fine.

Geelbeck Croaker.name: 吉尔贝克·克罗克尔 Geelbeck Croaker
Geelbeck Croaker.description:
吉尔贝克呱呱鱼通常栖息在近海水域，聚集在礁石、沉船残骸以及沙质海底附近。它们很容易用沙丁鱼或鲱鱼等小鱼作饵成群捕获。其肉质温和鲜美，深受厨师喜爱，可采用多种烹饪方式，从烘烤到爆炒皆宜。

Geelbeck Croakers are commonly found in offshore waters, gathering around reefs, wrecks, and sandy bottoms. They are easy to catch in large numbers using small fish like sardines or herring as bait. Their mild, flavorful meat makes them a favorite by chefs, prepared in various ways from baking to stir-frying.

Rockfish.name: 石斑鱼 Rockfish
Rockfish.description:
岩鱼，也被称为岩鳕或岩鲷，栖息于岩礁和海底，从近岸浅水到深海皆有分布。在海面之下，岩鱼悬停在岩石露头附近，它们带刺的背鳍与崎岖的地形融为一体。有些岩鱼栖息在水体中层，而另一些则在巨型海带森林的海带冠层下保持静止不动。

Rockfish, also known as Rock Cod or Rock Snapper, inhabit rocky reefs and seafloors, ranging from shallow nearshore waters to the deep ocean. Beneath the ocean’s surface, Rockfish hover near rocky outcrops, their spiny dorsal fins blending well into the rugged terrain. Some Rockfish dwell in the water column, while others remain motionless beneath the kelp canopy in the giant kelp forests.

Alchemist's Counteractant.name: 炼金术士的反制剂 Alchemist's Counteractant
Alchemist's Counteractant.description:
更常被称为炼金漂白剂，它有助于为普通平民清洁或消毒表面。由于要安全地制作相当棘手，只有少数炼金术士确实会着手制造清洁用品，因此其价格相当高。

More commonly known as Alchemist Bleach, which helps with cleaning or sterilizing surfaces for regular commoners. As it is tricky to do safely, only a few alchemists do actually tackle creating cleaning supplies, and due to it, the price is quite high.

Freshwater Pearl.name: 淡水珍珠 Freshwater Pearl
Freshwater Pearl.description:
淡水蚌分布在从湖泊、池塘到河流的大多数水域中，能够产出珍珠。由于既可用于珠宝制作，也可用于装饰衣物，因此备受追捧。在某些地区，珍珠被视为神圣之物，任何施法者若使用会消耗它们的法术，一旦被发现便会很快遭遇死亡。

Freshwater mussels, located in most bodies of water from lakes and ponds to rivers, can produce Pearls. Highly sought after as they can be used for both jewelry and to adorning clothing. In some regions, the Pearls are considered sacred, and any caster that uses  spells that consume them will quickly meet his demise if found out.

Ravenar.name: 拉文纳尔 Ravenar
Ravenar.description:
这颗宝石的光泽与乌鸦的眼睛极为相似，而那些精通施展魔法的人推测它拥有容纳活人灵魂的能力。人们坚信它蕴含着黑暗能量，能协助不死生物的技艺；其光滑、光亮的表面似乎以类似缓慢心跳的节奏脉动

The luster of this gem closely resembles the eyes of a raven, and those who are well-versed with magic casting speculate that it has the ability to hold the souls of the living. It is strongly believed that it possess a dark energy, to help with with the arts of the undead, and its smooth, glossy surface seems to pulse similarity to a slow heartbeat

Hickory Plank.name: 山核桃木板 Hickory Plank
Hickory Plank.description:
这种特定的浅色木材被广泛用于制造锤子、鹤嘴锄、斧头、车轮、梯子、地板和家具等工具。

This specific light-colored wood is widely used for tools like hammers, picks, axes, wheels, ladders, flooring, and furniture.

Olivine.name: 橄榄石 Olivine
Olivine.description:
广泛分布于许多地区，这种宝石由于其脆弱的成分而很少用于珠宝制作，因为它容易碎裂。相反，它经常被研磨成细粉，在铁匠工艺领域中作为沙子的替代品使用。

Found widely across many regions, this gemstone sees little use in jewelry due to its brittle composition, which makes it prone to shattering. Instead, it is frequently pulverized into fine dust, serving as a substitute for sand in the realm of blacksmithing.

Yellowfin Tuna.name: 黄鳍金枪鱼 Yellowfin Tuna
Yellowfin Tuna.description:
黄鳍金枪鱼是一种大型且强壮的远洋鱼类，以其发光的黄色鳍和流线型的鱼雷状身体而著称，这种身体为速度和耐力而生，使其成为最难捕获的鱼之一。它主要分布在僻静岛屿附近温暖的热带水域，需要使用配备专用滑车的特殊渔船来处理其巨大的重量。

Yellowfin tuna is a large and powerful oceanic fish distinguished by its glowing yellow fins and sleek, torpedo-shaped body built for speed and endurance, making it a most difficult catch. Found mostly in warm tropical waters near secluded islands, it demands the use of specially equipped fishing boats with trolleys to handle its immense weight.

Reed Plant.name: 芦苇植物 Reed Plant
Reed Plant.description:
常见的芦苇生长在湖泊、沼泽、湿地与溪流的边缘，从最北方的地区一直到最温暖的地方。干燥的芦苇茎自远古以来便被用作茅草屋顶与建筑材料、编篮材料、制作箭矢与笔，以及用于乐器之中。

The common water reed occurs along the margins of lakes, fens, marshes, and streams, from the most Nordic regions to the warmest places. Dried reed stems have been used for aeons as thatching and construction material, in basketry, for arrows and pens, and in musical instruments.

Garlic.name: 大蒜 Garlic
Garlic.description:
在大多数菜肴中使用最广泛的香料。烹调、切片、切丁、剁碎，甚至水煮，只要是熟食，很可能都会放上一小撮大蒜。

The most used spice in the majority of dishes. Cooked, sliced, diced, minced, or even boiled, if it is a cooked dish, it most likely has a pinch of garlic in it.

Fustian.name: 粗呢 Fustian
Fustian.description:
一种用于制作衣物的厚重织物，通常用于给衣物做衬垫、用于较冷季节，或用于诸如建筑等重体力工作。

A heavy cloth woven for clothing, usually used for padding clothes, for colder seasons, or heavy-duty work like building.

Catfish.name: 鲶鱼 Catfish
Catfish.description:
鲶鱼因其独特的胡须状须而得名，是垂钓者梦寐以求的渔获。鲶鱼最好用活饵捕捉，不过鲱鱼块和鸡肝也同样能带来成功。在厨师手中，鲶鱼在海鲜料理中大放异彩，无论是油炸至金黄完美，还是配以多种香草与香料煎烙，例如柠檬、莳萝和大蒜。

Catfish, named for its distinctive whisker-like barbels, is a prized catch among anglers. Catfish are best caught using live bait, though herring chunks and chicken livers also yield success. In the hands of a chef, the catfish shines in seafood dishes, whether deep-fried to golden perfection or pan-seared with a medley of herbs and spices, such as lemon, dill, and garlic.

Pike.name: Pike
Pike.description:
狗鱼这种独居的猎手，会一动不动地潜伏在水中，或藏身于茂密的水栖（特征）杂草丛里。当猎物进入触及范围时，它们会以突然、迅捷的猛冲发动攻击，用锋利如刀的牙齿咬住它们的目标。它们不仅会抓鱼，还会叼走水禽，甚至是小型农场动物。狗鱼是一种可怕的捕食者，既贪婪又不知疲倦。凭借其巨大的嘴巴与永不满足的食欲，狗鱼能长到惊人的体型，使大多数其他淡水鱼都相形见绌。

Pikes, solitary hunters, lie motionless in the water or lurk within dense clusters of aquatic weeds. When prey comes within reach, they strike with a sudden, rapid lunge, seizing their target with razor-sharp teeth. They are known to snatch not just fish but also waterfowl and even small farm animals. The pike is a fearsome predator and is as relentless as they are voracious. With their large mouths and insatiable appetites, pike can grow to astonishing sizes, dwarfing most other freshwater fish.

Fruit Jam.name: 水果果酱 Fruit Jam
Fruit Jam.description:
果酱是通过将压碎或切碎的水果与糖混合制成的。各种类型的水果，包括无花果、葡萄、桃子、李子，甚至柠檬，都可以制成果酱。它的用途非常广泛，可以与乳制品混合，用作面包、饼干或蛋糕的配料，甚至还可以加入沙拉酱中。

Fruit jam is created by combining crushed or chopped fruits with sugar. Various types of fruits, including figs, grapes, peaches, plums, and even lemons, can be transformed into jam. Its versatility is vast, as it can be mixed with dairy products, used as a topping for bread, biscuits, or cakes, or even incorporated into salad dressings.

Duralumin.name: 硬铝 Duralumin
Duralumin.description:
硬铝是一种耐用且轻质的铝合金，在最先进的地区被用于与飞行相关的应用。只有少数精选的大师铁匠能够制造并塑造这种合金。它也被用来为能够飞行的生物制作护甲。

Duralumin, a durable and lightweight aluminum alloy, is employed in the most advanced territories for flight-related applications. Only a select few master blacksmiths can create and mold this alloy. It is also used to make armor for creatures that can fly.

Exoskeleton.name: 外骨骼 Exoskeleton
Exoskeleton.description:
当这些巨大的蛛形纲动物蜕皮时，确实会留下它们的外骨骼。蜘蛛壳的碎片需求量很高，因为它们很柔韧，并且可以轻易塑造成多种形状。传闻说，穿着由外骨骼碎片制成的护甲的人，其内在力量会提升十号倍。

When the huge arachnids shed they do leave behind their exoskeletons. The pieces of the spider's shell are in high demand, as they are flexible and can be easily molded in multiple shapes. Rumors say that someone wearing armor made of exoskeleton pieces has his internal strength increased ten-fold.

Strawberry Blakewell.name: 草莓布莱克韦尔 Strawberry Blakewell
Strawberry Blakewell.description:
草莓布莱克韦尔塔是一种塔，使用酥皮外壳制作，内层铺有果酱、杏仁奶油馅（frangipane），并在顶部撒上杏仁片和糖渍水果。尽管它主要与草莓相关，但也可以使用其他糖渍水果，例如樱桃、猕猴桃、梨和桃子。由于其甜美且果香浓郁的风味，这种塔是各个年龄段人们都喜爱的受欢迎零食。

The Strawberry Blakewell is a type of tart made with a shortcrust pastry shell layered with jam, frangipane, and a topping of flaked almonds and candied fruit. Although it is mostly associated with strawberries, other candied fruits such as cherries, kiwis, pears, and peaches can be used as well. This tart is a popular snack among people of all ages due to its sweet and fruity flavor.

Cedar Log.name: 雪松原木 Cedar Log
Cedar Log.description:
它通常采自生长在林区的雪松树，并以其耐用性和对腐朽的抗力而闻名。雪松原木常用于建造坚固耐用的结构，例如建筑物、桥梁和围栏，以及家具和其他木制物品。

It is typically harvested from cedar trees that grow in forested areas and is known for its durability and resistance to decay. Cedar logs are often used to create strong and sturdy structures, such as buildings, bridges, and fences, as well as furniture and other wooden objects.

Wulfenite.name: 钨铁矿 Wulfenite
Wulfenite.description:
钨铅矿异常柔软，由于其扁平的矩形晶体而容易破裂。尽管如此，其鲜艳的红色与橙色色调仍极具吸引力，使得宝石切割师会制作小巧、闪耀的刻面宝石，适合用于尽量减少触碰的镶嵌环境，例如家具镶嵌与王室陈列品之中。

Wulfenite is exceptionally soft and prone to breaking due to its flat, rectangular crystals. Despite this, its vibrant red and orange hues are captivating, leading gem cutters to produce small, sparkling, faceted gems ideal for settings with minimal handling, like inlays on furniture and royal displays.

Grilled Ribs.name: 烤肋排 Grilled Ribs
Grilled Ribs.description:
骨肉轻易脱落的肋排，裹上甜酸可口的自制酱汁，是大多数酒馆里备受喜爱的经典美食，常在活动或庆典时供应，也总会被刚完成任务或使命、凯旋归来的冒险者们迫不及待地大快朵颐。

Fall-off-the-bone ribs, coated in sweet and tangy homemade sauces, are a beloved favorite at most taverns, often served for events or celebrations, and eagerly enjoyed by adventurers returning triumphant from their quests or missions.

Pandean Pipe.name: 潘迪亚笛 Pandean Pipe
Pandean Pipe.description:
潘笛，通常被称为排箫或排管，由逐渐加长的封闭管子制成。当空气吹入其管中时会产生声音，使其共鸣并发出独特的音色。这种乐器广泛用于音乐和传统表演中。

The Pandean pipe, often referred to as the pan flute or panpipe, is made from closed tubes of increasing lengths. Sound is produced when air is blown in its tubes, causing them to resonate and produce a unique sound. This instrument is widely used in music and traditional performances.

Chick.name: 小鸡 Chick
Chick.description:
在其生命的这个阶段，小鸡没有太多用处。然而，管理鸡舍的人往往会将它们分开以备将来使用，要么用于肉食，要么用于产蛋。为了赚取一点收入，农夫会把一些小鸡带到市场上出售。

The chick does not have many uses at this point in its lifespan. However, those who manage the coops tend to separate them for future use, either for meat or for eggs. To earn a little income, the farmer will take some of the chicks to the market for sale.

Violet Garnet.name: 紫罗兰石榴石 Violet Garnet
Violet Garnet.description:
或者说铑榴石，主要被白铁匠、珠宝匠、玻璃工匠使用，有时甚至连铁匠也会用于装饰用途。在一些文化与信仰中，石榴石被认为是该宗教特定神圣化身凝固的血液。

Or Rhodolite, is mainly used by whitesmiths, jewelers, gaffers, and sometimes even blacksmiths for ornamentation purposes. In some cultures and faiths, garnets were thought to be the solidified blood of the religion's specific divine avatar.

Blewits.name: 紫褶菇 Blewits
Blewits.description:
紫蘑菇是一种结实且美味的蘑菇，很容易通过其淡淡的紫色外观辨认出来。秋季时在覆盖物堆中寻找它们，然后把它们炒来当晚餐。它们经常被误认成另一种叫作“紫水晶欺骗菌”的蘑菇，不过两者都可以食用。

Blewits are strong and delicious mushrooms, quickly identified by their faint purple coloring. Look for them in the fall in mulch piles, and sauté them for dinner. Quite often they are mistaken for a different mushroom called "Amethyst Deceiver", however, both are edible.

Chalk.name: 粉笔 Chalk
Chalk.description:
粉笔是一种土质的石灰岩，主要呈浅色，并且非常受欢迎，因为它有多种用途。它可用于在石板桌上书写或在野外留下信息，也可在粉末形态下用于在野外运动中划定地形。它还可供裁缝及其他织物工人使用，在皮革或布料上描绘线条与图案，帮助他们以精确且准确的方式裁剪与缝制材料。它也用于占卜，或在地面或表面（如墙壁或门）上绘制魔法符号与法术，以阻挡不受欢迎的入侵者，或束缚被召唤的生物。

Chalk is an earthy type of limestone, found mainly in light colors, and is highly sought after, as it can have multiple uses. It is used for writing on slate tables or leaving messages in the wild, to delimit terrain in field sports, in its powder form. It can also be used by tailors and other fabric workers to draw lines and patterns on leather or fabric, to help them cut and sew the material in a precise and accurate way. It is also used in scrying or to create magical symbols and spells on the ground or surfaces, such as walls or doors, to keep out unwanted intruders or to contain a summoned creature.

Tomato.name: 番茄 Tomato
Tomato.description:
它们有多种颜色，从绿色到白色，再从黄色到红色。绿色番茄通常会和腌黄瓜一起储存过冬，因为它们有一种非常独特的味道。红色的甜酸番茄在各种咸味菜肴中都十分美味，使其成为大多数平民与酒馆老板的必备之物。

They come in multiple colors ranging from green to white, to yellow to red. Green tomatoes are usually stored over the winter with pickled cucumbers, as they have a very specific taste. The Red sweet, tangy tomatoes are delicious in all sorts of savory dishes, making it a must-have for most commoners and tavern keeps.

Silver Ore.name: 银矿石 Silver Ore
Silver Ore.description:
银矿石是最受追捧的矿石之一，因其在冶金与铸币中的用途而备受珍视。它通常与其他金属制成合金，并且是铸造流通最广的币种的主要材料。不同于常被权贵囤积的黄金，白银在各地广泛流通，推动了横跨辽阔帝国的贸易。它也可以被研磨成细粉，用于制造镜子与武器，因为它以能猎杀夜行生物而闻名。

Silver Ore is one of the most sought-after ores, valued for its use in metallurgy and coinage. It is commonly made as an alloy with other metals and is the primary material for minting the most circulated type of coin. Unlike gold, which is often hoarded by the elite, silver circulates widely, fueling trade across vast empires. It can also be ground into fine dust for use in the making of mirrors and weaponry, as it is known to hunt down creatures of the night.
