Fried Fish.name: 炸鱼 Fried Fish
Fried Fish.description:
炸鱼通常是在油炸和上桌之前，将鱼裹上面糊、面包屑、面粉或香草与香料来制作。它通常会搭配一片柠檬或绿叶蔬菜一起享用。

Fried fish is often prepared by coating the fish in batter, breadcrumbs, flour, or herbs and spices before frying and serving. It is commonly accompanied by a slice of lemon or greens.

Morion.name: 莫里昂 Morion
Morion.description:
也被称为烟晶。石英中较为罕见的形态之一。由于其近乎不透明，它确实具有一些与玫瑰石英相似的性质。它通常被邪恶之人追求，因为它主要用于死灵术。当骨骼被墨璃欧姆灌注后，它们会变得如钢铁般坚硬。

Also known as Smoky Quartz. One of the rarer forms of quartz. Due to it being almost opaque, it does have some similar proprieties to the Rose Quartz. It's usually sought after by nefarious people as it is mainly used in necromancy. When bones are infused with Moriom they become as hard as steel.

Ochre Fish.name: 赭黄鱼 Ochre Fish
Ochre Fish.description:
赭色鱼是一种透明的鱼类，略带酸性，接触时黏腻，因被捕获时会腐蚀大多数鱼钩而闻名。通常栖息于未受船只航行干扰的海域与海洋中。对更有经验的渔民而言，捕获这种鱼与不祥之兆相关，因为整群赭色鱼往往会把自己黏在渔船船腹上，缓慢腐蚀船体材料并使其沉没。炼金术士已进行实验，试图将其酸性分泌物提炼为强效溶剂，甚至制成武器。

Ochre Fish is a transparent type of fish, somewhat acidic and sticky to the touch, known to corrode most hooks when captured. Usually found in seas and oceans that are not disturbed by ship traffic. Capturing this fish is associated with bad omens, for more experienced fishermen, as whole schools of the Ochre Fish have a tendency to stick themselves to the belly of fishing boats, slowly corroding the material and sinking them. Experiments have been conducted to refine its acidic secretion into potent solvents or even weapons by alchemists.

Hand Truck.name: 手推车 Hand Truck
Hand Truck.description:
手推车，也称为手推货车，配有长把手，非常适合搬运桶和家具等重物。它常被旅店、酒馆和面包店使用，以便于从市场进行日常补货。

A hand truck, also referred to as a hand cart, comes with long handles is perfect for moving heavy items like barrels and furniture. It is frequently used by inns, taverns, and bakeries to facilitate daily restocking from the market.

Daer-Kron.name: 戴尔-克隆 Daer-Kron
Daer-Kron.description:
要种下暗影-克隆种子，矿工会挖一个小圆孔，将种子放入其中，并使用掺有蜡的研磨骨粉作为养分来源，或用木材、木炭与胶水的混合物将孔洞封住。三天后，在种下戴尔-克隆种子的墙面开始散发出柔和的光。随后，一朵蘑菇缓缓舒展开来，在整个洞室投下诡异却令人安心的光辉，被称为霓虹-隆特。对于在地下深处行进的人来说，这些真菌不仅是照明，更是信标，引导他们安全穿越黑暗的隧道。

To plant the Dark-Kron seed, a miner picks a small round hole, places the seed inside, and uses either ground bones mixed with wax as a nutrient source, or a combination of wood, charcoal, and glue to plug the hole. After three days, a soft light begins to emanate from the wall where the Daer-Kron seed was planted. Slowly, a mushroom unfurls, casting an eerie but comforting glow throughout the chamber, called Neon-Ront. For those navigating the underground depths, these fungi are not just lights but beacons, guiding them safely through dark tunnels.

Wooden Wheel.name: 木制轮子 Wooden Wheel
Wooden Wheel.description:
车轮是一项至关重要的发明，在社会中有着广泛的应用。它被用作手推车、货车和马车的主要部件，也曾被用于处决，例如使用车轮刑。它的重要性在平民生活的各个方面都显而易见。

The wheel is a vital invention with widespread applications in society. It is used as a main component in carts, wagons, and carriages, and it is also been used in executions, such as with the breaking wheel. Its importance is evident in various aspects of a commoner's life.

Exploding Stick.name: 爆炸棒 Exploding Stick
Exploding Stick.description:
爆破棒通常因其钻孔用途而得名，用来在坚硬的岩石或矿石中制造细小裂缝，以便镐或钻头可以随后继续作业。通常会有一名专门的机械师使用最优质的火药制作它们并负责安装。它们不会产生巨大的爆炸声，但在清理岩石方面会把活干完。

Exploding sticks are usually named that way for drilling purposes, to create small cracks in heavy solid rock or ore so that a pickaxe or a drill can follow up. There is usually a specialized machinist who makes them using the finest gunpowder and also sets them up. They will not produce a big bang, but they will get the job done in clearing rocks.

Firework Slime Potion.name: 烟花史莱姆药水 Firework Slime Potion
Firework Slime Potion.description:
清晰标注“请勿食用”，并在标签上以小字备注“开启时请佩戴防护”。它通常为特殊庆典或城镇活动而制作。液体相当黏稠，瓶盖一取下便开始硬化，可被塑造成任何形状。打开并硬化后，可将其抛向空中，它会加速至最多500英尺，然后以绚丽的景象爆炸，并保持与原始模具相同的形状。

Labeled clearly "Do not consume" and wear protection when opening on as a small note on the label. It is usually created for special celebrations or for town events.The liquid is quite viscous and as the cap is taken off it starts to harden, it can be molded in any shape. After being opened and having hardened it can be thrown in the air and will accelerate up to 500 feet and then explode in a colorful spectacle that keeps the same shape as the original mold.

Ship Log.name: 航海日志 Ship Log
Ship Log.description:
由船长撰写的详细日志，包含按日期分类的信息。其中包括船长当时的想法，以及航行过的地点、船只状态与维修记录、星图、船上事件、剩余配给、航行方向和货物。大多数船长主要将其作为当前航程的航海日志。

A detailed log written by the captain of a vessel that contains information categorized by date. It includes the captain's thoughts at the time, as well as the locations traveled, ship status and repairs, star charts, onboard incidents, rations remaining, direction headed, and cargo. Most captains primarily use it as a journal for their current voyage.

Carbon Steel.name: 碳钢 Carbon Steel
Carbon Steel.description:
由于颜色相近，这种合金常被误认为是暗钢，但它缺乏暗钢的奥术性质。这种合金是钢的一种非常坚固的变体，但更容易生锈。它主要用于制造切削工具、弹簧、扳手、锤子以及其他用于建筑的各类工具。

Commonly mistaken for dark steel due to its similar coloring but lacking its arcane properties, this alloy is a very strong variant of steel. However, it is more prone to rusting. It is primarily used to create cutting tools, springs, wrenches, hammers, and other types of tools used in construction.

Pennyroyal.name: 普列尼罗亚尔 Pennyroyal
Pennyroyal.description:
草药师正高度警惕地寻找佩尼罗亚尔植物，当它被研磨成油时，可用于可靠的四足或两足伙伴作为跳蚤驱避剂。它也通常用于肥皂和香水的香料中，因为它被压碎时闻起来非常类似绿薄荷。

Herbalists are on a high lookout for the Pennyroyal plant, when ground down into oils it is used for the trusty four, or two-legged companions as a flea replant. Its also usually used in soaps and fragrances for perfumes as it smells very similar to spearmint when crushed.

Vial of the Forgotten.name: 遗忘之瓶 Vial of the Forgotten
Vial of the Forgotten.description:
据说这种神秘的调合物能在生者与死者之间锻造出强大的联系。饮用后，饮用者获得与已逝亲友互动或从过往的灵体中获取洞见的能力。然而，一旦饮下，这种药水永远不会失效，会缓慢地耗损那些胆敢与来世建立联系之人的理智。从现存的少量关于此药水的记录来看，还有说法称即使仍然活着，你也能看见自己的幽灵（特征），因此无法确定这种药水是否致命。

This mysterious concoction is said to forge a powerful connection between the living and the dead. When consumed, the drinker gains the ability to interact with loved ones who have passed on or to gain insights from the spirits of the past. However, once consumed, this potion never wears off, slowly draining the sanity of those who dare to connect with the afterlife. From the few records that exist on this potion, it is also stated that you can see your own ghost, even while alive, making it uncertain if the potion is lethal.

Mugwort.name: 艾草 Mugwort
Mugwort.description:
一种常见的草药，深受各地草药师的喜爱。作为植物，它很容易获得，因为它在所有生物群系中都有生长，并被用于缓解消化问题、用于镇静，甚至可作为治疗胃部不适的泻药。 

A common herb that is a favorite by herbalists everywhere. As a plant, it is easy to come-by as it grows in all biomes, and is used to resolve digestive problems, used for sedation, even as a laxative for the upset stomach.

Stargazer Lily.name: 观星百合 Stargazer Lily
Stargazer Lily.description:
“当暮色降临，夜空开始变得昏暗时，空气中弥漫着一种期待感。知晓这则传说的人会紧盯天空，等待流星雨最初的征兆。就在那一刻，观星百合开始绽放，花瓣舒展开来，仿佛在回应头顶的天象盛景。甜美的香气充盈四周，携带着星辰的魔法，仿佛这朵花本身已被苍穹所触碰。”

观星百合以其芬芳闻名，在各个地区被种植与采收，用以制作香水。有些人相信，这种花只会在流星雨期间绽放，为其本就迷人的本性增添了一抹神秘色彩。

"As dusk falls and the night sky begins to darken, there’s a sense of anticipation in the air. Those who know the legend watch the sky closely, waiting for the first signs of a meteor shower. At that very moment, the Stargazer Lily begins to bloom, its petals unfolding as if responding to the celestial display above. The sweet scent fills the air, carrying with it the magic of the stars as if the flower itself has been touched by the heavens."

The Stargazer Lily, known for its fragrance, is grown and harvested in various regions to create perfumes. Some believe that the flower blooms only during a meteor shower, adding a mystical element to its already enchanting nature.

Shovel.name: Shovel
Shovel.description:
铲子是一种用于挖掘以及将松散的泥土、砾石、谷物或积雪从一处搬运到另一处的工具。它也可用于开挖沟渠，以及连根拔除深根杂草和植物。

The Shovel is a tool used to dig as well as to move loose dirt, gravel, grain, or snow, from one spot to another. It can also be used for making trenches and uprooting deep-rooted weeds and plants.

Screamsickle Shake.name: 尖啸镰刀摇晃 Screamsickle Shake
Screamsickle Shake.description:
围绕尖叫冰棒奶昔萦绕着一个小小的迷信：小孩子们被告知，如果你在木地板上洒出一滴，明年的庄稼就会歉收。我觉得这八成是疲惫的母亲们编出来的，她们不想在干净的地板上留下黏糊糊的脚印。不过，我从来不敢在母亲家里把自己那杯洒出来，而我现在也不打算去考验那些精魂的耐心。

A small superstition clings to the Screamsicle Shake, young children are told that if you spill a drop on the wooden floor, will make next year crop fail. I have a feeling this was invented by tired mothers who didn’t want sticky footprints on their clean floors. Still, I never dared spill my own cup at my mother's house, and I’m not about to test the spirits patience now.

Lover's Embrace.name: 恋人的拥抱 Lover's Embrace
Lover's Embrace.description:
几块甜味明胶挞通常是通过煮沸骨头制成的，将骨头从所得液体中捞出并让其冷却，形成一种类似明胶的物质。随后用水果、柑橘和糖的混合物为明胶调味，直到骨头残留的味道消散为止。由于其味道非常甜，通常只在周年纪念日或为新婚夫妇作为甜点招待。

A couple of sweet gelatin tarts are usually made by boiling bones, removing them from the resulting liquid, and allowing it to cool, making it a gelatin like substance. The gelatin is then flavored with a mixture of fruits, citrus, and sugar until the taste from the bone residue dissipates. Due to its very sweet nature, it is only served as a treat for anniversaries or for newlywed couples.

Chicken Egg.name: 鸡蛋 Chicken Egg
Chicken Egg.description:
鸡蛋被广泛用于许多类型的菜肴中，无论甜味还是咸味，包括许多烘焙食品。一些最常见的制备方法包括炒蛋、煎蛋、水波蛋、煮老蛋、溏心蛋、煎蛋卷，甚至腌制蛋。

Chicken eggs are widely used in many types of dishes, both sweet and savory, including many baked goods. Some of the most common preparation methods include scrambled, fried, poached, hard-boiled, soft-boiled, omelets, and even pickled.

Sugarcane.name: 甘蔗 Sugarcane
Sugarcane.description:
甘蔗主要种植于热带地区，主要用于生产食糖。糖厂从新鲜收割的甘蔗中提取原糖，而“磨坊白糖”有时会在这些糖厂的初次提取阶段后立即生产，通常供应本地市场。

Sugarcane, predominantly grown in tropical regions, is primarily cultivated for sugar production. Sugar mills extract raw sugar from freshly harvested cane, and 'mill-white' sugar is occasionally produced right after the initial extraction phase at these mills, often for local markets.

Opal Earrings.name: 欧泊耳环 Opal Earrings
Opal Earrings.description:
由经验丰富的宝石切割师切割，并以银质配件连接的欧泊，作为色彩最为绚丽的宝石之一，当被如此精确地切割以展现出美丽的色彩光谱时，便成为中上阶层市民的心头好。有些奥术施法者通常会佩戴这种耳环，因为它们可以作为其法术库中某些魔法法术的导体。

Cut by experienced gemcutters and connected with silver implements, opal, being one of the most colorful gems, when cut so precisely and in such a way that it provides a beautiful array of colors, becomes a favorite among the middle to higher classes of citizens. Some arcane casters usually wear the earrings, as they can be used as a conduit for some magical spells in their repertoire.

Pink Salmon.name: 粉红鲑鱼 Pink Salmon
Pink Salmon.description:
粉红鲑鱼常用于盐渍和烟熏准备，甚至用于寿司。其温和的味道很适合搭配柑橘糖浆、香草黄油，甚至辛辣调味料，使其成为厨房里的绝佳选择。由于与其他鲑鱼品种相比其质地更柔软，它也常常更受用于汤品和浓汤的青睐。

Pink Salmon is often used in salted and smoked preparations, and even sushi. Its mild taste pairs well with citrus glazes, herb butter, or even spicy rubs, making it an amazing choice in the kitchen. Because of its softer texture compared to other salmon varieties, it is often preferred in soups and chowders as well.

Humanoid Skull.name: 人形生物头骨 Humanoid Skull
Humanoid Skull.description:
类人生物的头骨只有有限的边缘用途。它们通常受到医务从业者的需求，以便更好地理解医学。仪式性需求方面，主要用作材料组件，或者作为装饰添加在法杖末端。或者被魔法从业者用于一些人可能认为极端的奥术技艺。另一种更罕见的用途，是用于装点某些更古怪的领主在其宽广宅邸中的装饰。 

The humanoid skulls have limited fringe uses. They usually are in demand by medical practitioners for better a understanding of medicine. Ritualistic needs, are mainly used as components, or, added at the end of staves for ornamental purposes. Or, by the magical practitioners for what some might consider extreme arcane arts. Another rare usage is for the decoration of some more eccentric lords in their expansive manors.

No Backsies.name: 不许反悔 No Backsies
No Backsies.description:
No Backsies 是一款独特的金色小麦啤酒，由 The Dead Deer Company 独家酿造。这是一款金色小麦啤酒，带有丁香与香蕉的风味，依照传统且独特的酿造技法制成，但这些技法并不会向普通平民公开。只能在最为高档的酒馆或旅店中找到，使其成为难得一见的珍品。

No Backsies is a distinct golden wheat beer brewed exclusively by The Dead Deer Company. It is a golden wheat beer with notes of clove and banana, made according to traditional and unique brewing techniques, that are not disclosed to the regular commoner. Can only be found in the most distinguished taverns or inns, making it a rare find.

Dragon Talons.name: 龙爪 Dragon Talons
Dragon Talons.description:
龙的利爪锋利无比，甚至能切开最精工打造的钢铁。考虑到它们的体型，它们有时会被重新加工成手工武器；根据体型的不同，可以制成坚固而锋利的短剑，或最轻盈的长剑。

The sharpness of the dragon's talons can cut through the most finely crafted steel. Considering their size, they are sometimes repurposed into handcrafted weapons, depending on the size, can make either the sturdy-sharp shortswords or the lightest longswords.

Nettle.name: 荨麻 Nettle
Nettle.description:
或者荨麻，它主要被医疗从业者用来帮助治疗疲惫冒险者的肌肉疼痛或老年人的关节疼痛。经验丰富的炼金术师会将它作为基础成分之一用于治疗药水中

Or Stinging Nettle, it is used mainly by practitioners of medicine to help treat muscle pains of the weary adventurers or the joints of the elderly. Experienced Alchemists use them in potions of healing as one of the base ingredients

Wooden Pipes.name: 木制管道 Wooden Pipes
Wooden Pipes.description:
木制烟斗或烟草烟斗专为吸食烟草和草药而设计。它们通常由坚固的硬木制成，如石楠木或玉米芯，每种材料都具有耐用性和独特的吸烟风味等优点。

Wooden pipes, or tobacco pipes, are specifically designed for smoking tobacco and herbs. They are typically constructed from strong, hardwoods like briar or corn cob, each offering benefits such as durability and a unique smoking flavor.

Apatite.name: 磷灰石 Apatite
Apatite.description:
磷灰石主要在被研磨成细粉后用于制造肥料、染料和油漆。在罕见的情况下它会被切割成宝石；它是一种柔软的宝石，宝石切割师无需专用工具或丰富经验便可轻松加工。

Apatite is primarily used in the manufacture of fertilizer, dyes, and paint after being ground into fine dust. On rare occasions it is cut into a gem, it is a soft stone that can be easily worked by gem cutters without the need for specialized tools or extensive experience.

Peach Pits.name: 桃核 Peach Pits
Peach Pits.description:
桃树在种植方面以格外挑剔而闻名，需要耐心与知识。它们的种子在准备好播种之前，必须在冷藏条件下存放较长一段时期。这段休眠期确保当时代到来进行播种时，种子会发芽并成长为一棵健康的树。即便在时机或储存上出现一点小差错也可能导致失败，这也是为什么只有最有经验的农场帮工与草药师才会承担种植桃核的责任。

Peach trees are notoriously finicky when it comes to planting, demanding patience and knowledge. Their seeds need to be kept in cold storage for an extended period before they’re ready for planting. This period of dormancy ensures that when the time comes to plant, the seed will sprout and grow into a healthy tree. Even a small mistake in timing or storage can result in failure, which is why only the most experienced farmhands and herbalists take on the responsibility of planting the pits.

Silk.name: 丝绸 Silk
Silk.description:
它是最稀有的材料之一。它主要由奇幻野兽或不同体型的昆虫产出。据推测，只有最训练有素的采集者才能制造出一种名为“纯丝”的东西，然而，他们之中有些人有时会因此丧命，因为从某些八条腿的怪物那里遭遇了超出预期的麻烦。

It is one of the rarest materials to find. It is mainly produced by either fantastical beasts or insects of different sizes. It is speculated that only the most trained gatherers can create something called "Pure Silk", however, some of them end up losing their lives sometimes, getting more than they bargained for from some eight-legged monsters.

Chicken.name: 鸡 Chicken
Chicken.description:
被称为家禽的鸡通常由平民饲养，以其可靠的鸡蛋供应来养活整个家庭。鸡肉主要留作生日或节日等特殊场合食用，因为它确实会成为一顿非常饱腹的大餐的主菜。

Known as poultry, chickens are typically kept by commoners for their reliable supply of eggs to sustain the entire household. The meat is mainly reserved for special occasions like birthdays or holidays, as it does become the centerpiece for a very filling meal.

Celery.name: 芹菜 Celery
Celery.description:
一簇围绕着中央嫩心的又长又粗、鲜嫩多汁的茎秆。芹菜的颜色从白色到绿色不等——颜色越深，味道越浓。茎秆主要用于生食做沙拉、清炒和煮汤。有时也会榨汁。

A collection of long, thick, juicy stalks around a central, tender heart. Celery ranges in color from white to green - the darker its color, the stronger its flavor. The stalks are mainly eaten raw in a salad, stir-fried foods, and soups. Occasionally they are also made into juices.

Clay Brick.name: 黏土砖 Clay Brick
Clay Brick.description:
黏土通过将其压入木制模具塑形成砖块，然后在窑炉中加热烧制。它们也可以施以色彩鲜艳的釉面或用复杂的图案装饰，使其成为装饰性建筑材料的热门选择。

The clay was shaped into bricks by pushing it into a wooden mold, then heating it in kilns. They can also be glazed with colorful finishes or decorated with intricate patterns, making them a popular choice for decorative building materials.

Manganese Brick.name: 锰砖 Manganese Brick
Manganese Brick.description:
锰砖不仅因其破坏性的火焰而被使用，也用于心理战。当被投射进敌方建筑物和墙体时，它们会产生强烈的热量和浓厚的烟雾，迫使防守者离开他们的据点。那可怕的令人窒息的恶臭来自烧焦的砖块，可能会萦绕许多小时，使得几乎不可能夺回该区域。

Manganese Bricks are not only used for their destructive flames but also for psychological warfare. When launched into enemy buildings and walls, they create intense heat and thick smoke, forcing defenders out of their strongholds. The horrible choking stench, coming from the charred brick, can linger for many hours, making it nearly impossible to reclaim the area.

Watcher Cake.name: 守望者蛋糕 Watcher Cake
Watcher Cake.description:
以一种既稀有又神秘的配料制成，主要来源于冒险者的探索或任务。据传这种蛋糕会在食用后的接下来一年里将衰老过程减缓一半。然而，这些传闻从未得到证实。

Crafted with a topping that's as rare as it is enigmatic, sourced mainly from the quests or missions of adventurers. This cake is rumored to slow down the aging process by half for the year following consumption. However, such rumors have never been confirmed.

Grinder.name: 研磨者 Grinder
Grinder.description:
一台木制装置，使用精工打造且耐用的铁制齿轮制成，旨在将材料研磨成细粉。曲柄便于操作。尽管它最初作为传统研钵与杵的替代品，如今主要被酒馆用于快速研磨干胡椒。

A wooden contraption made with finely crafted and durable iron cogwheels is designed to reduce materials into a fine powder. A crank allows for easy operation. Though it originally served as an alternative to the traditional mortar and pestle, it is now primarily used by taverns to quickly grind dried pepper.

Thyme.name: 百里香 Thyme
Thyme.description:
百里香有新鲜和干燥两种形式。尽管它通常是夏季香草，但新鲜的温室百里香全年都能买到。新鲜品种风味更佳，但需要更小心的处理，储存期通常不超过一周。不过，如果冷冻得当，它可以保存很多个月。

Thyme is available in both fresh and dried forms. Although it's typically a summer-season herb, fresh greenhouse thyme can be found year-round. The fresh variety offers superior flavor but requires more careful handling, with a storage life usually not exceeding a week. However, it can be preserved for many months when frozen properly.

Rose.name: 玫瑰 Rose
Rose.description:
玫瑰是一种对普通民众有许多用途的花卉。从象征意义上说，它作为永恒的爱情信物，常在第一次约会或纪念日时赠送。从实用角度看，玫瑰灌木被用作园艺工具，以提升公园和花园的视觉吸引力。在一些独特的地区，玫瑰果酱因其独特的风味而备受青睐。

Rose is a flower with many purposes for the regular folk. Symbolically, it serves as a timeless token of love, often shared on first dates or anniversaries. Practically, rose bushes are used as a gardening tool to enhance the visual appeal of parks and gardens. In some distinct regions, rose jam is coveted for its distinctive flavor.

Calamine.name: 炉甘石 Calamine
Calamine.description:
炉甘石是一种非普通宝石，通常呈现半透明的蓝绿色，并带有美丽的光泽。世界上偏远地区普遍相信，如果你把这种特定宝石的一小片直接作为透镜放在某人的眼睛上，随着时代推移，人们相信它可以恢复视力。

Calamine is an uncommon gemstone and typically exhibits a semi-transparent bluish-green color with beautiful luster. Widely believed in remote regions of the world that if you place a small shard of this specific gem directly on top of someones eye as a lens, over time, it is believed that it can restore the eyesight.

Blood Potion.name: 血液药水 Blood Potion
Blood Potion.description:
每年在红收获的阴影周里，当田地休耕、人们点亮用芜菁雕成的灯笼时，你都会看到一桶桶血药水从地窖与储藏洞穴中被搬出。尽管名字如此，这饮料里并没有一滴真正的血。它是一种浓稠、宝石般的红色酿饮，由樱桃或深林浆果制成，熬煮成糖浆般的康波特，再用丁香、肉桂皮调味，有时还会加一小抹醋来增添辛辣的刺激，锋利得足以唤醒亡者。

Every year in the shadowed weeks of the Red Harvest, when the fields lie fallow and folk light lanterns carved from turnips, you’ll find barrels of blood potion hauled out from cellars and cellared caves. Despite its name, there’s not a drop of true blood in the drink. It’s a thick, jewel-red brew made from cherries or dark forest berries, boiled down into a syrupy kompot and spiced with cloves, cinnamon bark, and sometimes a splash of vinegar to give it a bite sharp enough to wake the dead.

Scallop.name: 扇贝 Scallop
Scallop.description:
扇贝主要分布在浅水区的海草丛中，位于沙质或泥质海底，常在深河口、潮汐河流和港湾附近，使其成为新手渔民的绝佳目标。它们主要被捕捞用于食用，常被裹面包屑后油炸，并与凉拌卷心菜、薯条或土豆泥一同上桌。

Scallops are primarily found in shallow waters among seagrasses on sandy or muddy seabeds, often near deep estuaries, tidal rivers, and harbors, making them an excellent target for novice fishermen. They are primarily harvested for food and are often breaded, deep-fried, and served with coleslaw, potato fries, or mashed potatoes.

Bay Leaf.name: 月桂叶 Bay Leaf
Bay Leaf.description:
月桂叶是一种芳香叶片，常作为烹饪用香草使用。它能为菜肴增添细腻的草本风味，可整片使用，既可干用也可鲜用。通常在食用前会从菜肴中取出。月桂叶也可以研磨成粉末使用，不过较不常见。

The bay leaf is an aromatic leaf frequently used as a herb in cooking. It imparts a subtle, herbal flavor to dishes and can be used whole, either dried or fresh. Typically, it is removed from the dish before consumption. Bay leaves can also be used in ground form, though this is less common.

Red Cabbage.name: 红甘蓝 Red Cabbage
Red Cabbage.description:
红甘蓝通常生吃，用于沙拉和凉拌卷心菜，是烤鹅或火鸡的完美配菜。红甘蓝是农民的最爱，因为它能原样保存一整个冬天，不需要为了保存而制成酸菜。

The red cabbage is often used raw for salads and coleslaw, a perfect side dish for roast goose or turkey. The red cabbage is a farmer's favorite as it lasts winters, as is, not needing to be turned into sauerkraut in order to be preserved.

Pressurized Container.name: 加压容器 Pressurized Container
Pressurized Container.description:
专门制造用来容纳最易挥发的材料并将其保持在压力之下，例如特定气体、空气、神话野兽的吐息或奥术化合物。通常情况下，如果出现其中一道裂缝，即使是由坚固的材料制成，灾害也会降临。

Created specifically to contain the most volatile materials and keep them under pressure, such as specific gases, air, breaths of mythical beasts, or arcane compounds. Usually, if one of these fissures occurs, even though made from sturdy materials, disaster strikes.

Spade.name: 铲子 Spade
Spade.description:
铁锹非常适合播种和移栽，铁锹具有平头设计，特别适合挖洞或将植物从地里挖出。

The spade is perfect for planting and transplanting, spades feature a flat head design that is particularly effective for digging holes or extracting plants from the ground.

Green Apple.name: 青苹果 Green Apple
Green Apple.description:
旅店老板会用青苹果来装饰他们的一些饮品，同时也会把它作为一种健康的甜点替代品提供。各地都有用青苹果酿造的著名苹果酒，因此旅店与酒馆老板对青苹果的需求很高。

Innkeepers use green apples to garnish some of their beverages, as well as, provide it as a healthy desert variant. Famous ciders are made from green apples throughout the realms, therefore inn and tavern keepers have green apples in high demand.

Benitoite.name: 贝尼托石 Benitoite
Benitoite.description:
贝尼托石晶体以其相对柔软而闻名，经常以碎片而非完整晶体的形式被发现。它们通常被用作保险箱、装饰盒和小雕像的镶嵌物。

Benitoite crystals are known for their relative softness and are often found as fragments rather than intact crystals. They were commonly used as inlays for coffers, ornamental boxes, and statuettes.

Smith's Coin.name: 铁匠的硬币 Smith's Coin
Smith's Coin.description:
当顾客在专门商店（例如珠宝店或铁匠铺）下定制订单或委托时，会获得一枚刻有店铺标志的硬币。顾客的名字会被刻在硬币背面，并被要求在账册上签名。一旦物品被制作完成或已购得，持有人便可用该硬币进行交换来取回物品。该硬币的价值等同于所委托物品的费用。若硬币遗失或被盗，它将变得一文不值，并且只有合法所有者才能使用原始硬币取回该物品。

When a customer places a custom order or commission at a specialty shop, such as a jewelry store or blacksmith, a coin bearing the shop's symbol is provided. The customer's name is etched on the back of the coin, and they are asked to sign a ledger. Once the item has been crafted or procured, the owner can retrieve it by trading in the coin. The value of the coin is equivalent to the cost of the commissioned item. If the coin is lost or stolen, it becomes worthless, and only the rightful owner can retrieve the item using the original coin.

Goat.name: Goat
Goat.description:
在大多数疆域中，山羊一直被用来获取奶、肉、毛皮和皮革。羊奶常被加工成羊奶酪，农民会以高价出售。其皮革与织物非常适合制作手套、鞋子和其他配饰，因此深受皮革工匠喜爱。

Goats have been utilized for milk, meat, fur, and skins across most of the realms. Goat milk is often processed into goat cheese, and farmers sell it at a premium. The hide and fabric are perfect for making gloves, shoes, and other accessories, making it a favorite for leatherworkers.

Carpet Beetle.name: 地毯甲虫 Carpet Beetle
Carpet Beetle.description:
地毯甲虫几乎无处不在，很可能每个农家炉边都有几只。作为食腐者，它们会吃死去的昆虫、毛皮、毛发、皮肤以及其他腐烂的有机物。它们对活物没有威胁，既不咬也不蜇；在更抽象的科学中，草药师往往用它们来估算死亡的时代。

Carpet Beetles are almost everywhere, and it is likely that every farmer hearth has a few. As scavengers, they consume dead insects, fur, hair, skin, and other decaying organic matter. They pose no threat to living beings and neither bite nor sting, in the more abstract sciences, herbalists tend to use them to estimate the time of death.

Scallions.name: 葱 Scallions
Scallions.description:
细香葱在一些地区也被称为青葱，因其温和的风味而备受珍视，这使其有别于其他类型的洋葱。它们常见于沙拉和各种烹饪菜肴中。

Scallions, also known as green onions in some regions, are prized for their mild flavor, which distinguishes them from other types of onions. They are prevalent in salads and various culinary dishes.

Topaz.name: 黄玉 Topaz
Topaz.description:
有多种颜色，其中最常见的一种是浅蓝色，然而，最珍贵的是一种明亮的黄色，也被称为帝王黄玉。深受贵族珍视，因为它们通常会在国事集会上作为礼物赠送。这些宝石只由技艺最精湛的大师级宝石切割师进行切割。

Comes in many colors, one of the most common ones, is light blue, however, the most prized one is a bright yellow also known as Imperial Topaz. Highly valued by nobility as they usually are offered as gifts at state gatherings. The gems are cut only by the most skilled master gem cutters.

Hair Pin.name: 发夹 Hair Pin
Hair Pin.description:
一枚用小宝石打造、象征高地位的设计师发簪。它的制作方式使其在固定头发时散发优雅与风格，或仅用于表明自己属于高贵的贵族职业阶层。这些主要由经验丰富的珠宝匠制作，并且只接受价格极高的委托。

A designer hairpin crafted with small gemstones to represent high status. It is made in such a way that, when it holds the hair, it exudes elegance and style, or to simply signal membership in the high noble class. These are primarily made by experienced jewelers and only on very high-priced commissions.

Cutting Board.name: 砧板 Cutting Board
Cutting Board.description:
砧板由剩余木料制成，这些木料经过粘合与塑形，成为实用的厨房工具。由于顾客很少购买新砧板，木匠会通过提供定制徽标或名字并将其烙印在表面上来增添个人风格，使每一件作品都独一无二。

Cutting boards are made from leftover lumber, which is glued and shaped into practical kitchen tools. As customers quite rarely purchase new boards, carpenters add a personal touch by offering custom logos or names burned into the surface, making each piece unique.

Cocoa Beans.name: 可可豆 Cocoa Beans
Cocoa Beans.description:
可可豆生长在可可荚内，可被研磨成细粉或切碎成小块，用于多种烹饪用途，从沙拉酱到蛋糕配料，再到制作巧克力。可可豆经过干燥处理，因而保质期很长，使其成为领地之间贸易的绝佳商品。

Cocoa beans, found inside cocoa pods, can be crushed to a fine powder or chopped into small pieces for a variety of culinary uses, from salad dressings to cake toppings to making chocolate. The beans are dried, giving them a long shelf life, and making them an excellent commodity for trade between territories.

Arpa Doppia.name: 双竖琴 Arpa Doppia
Arpa Doppia.description:
阿尔帕·多皮亚（双竖琴）以其复杂的双排琴弦而闻名，能带来独一无二的音色，深受社会上层上流阶层成员的珍爱，并且经常出现在诸界中充满活力、熙熙攘攘的城市里。

The Arpa Doppia, or double harp, renowned for its intricate double strings, delivers a one-of-a-kind sound, cherished by the upper high-class members of society and frequently gracing the vibrant, bustling cities across the realms.

Monstrous Monsters.name: 巨型怪物 Monstrous Monsters
Monstrous Monsters.description:
《怪物怪兽》是一本由旅店老板提供给旅人、冒险者、商队成员与商人等人的小手册。它提供了在该区域出没的怪物详尽清单、可采取的避开它们的步骤，以及一旦交战如何在战斗中取胜的建议，或是在援助到来之前应采取哪些动作。人们对旅店老板的功劳往往重视不足；他们经常能听到最新的消息与传闻，并将其整理、编写成这些手册，以帮助保护他们的顾客并维持安全的贸易路线。

Monstrous Monsters is a small manual offered by tavernkeepers to travelers, adventurers, caravaners, and merchants alike. It provides a detailed list of monsters found in the area, steps that can be taken to avoid them, and advice on how to succeed in combat if engaged, or what actions to take until help arrives. Not enough credit is provided to tavernkeepers, who often hear the latest news and rumors and compile and write these manuals to help protect their patrons and maintain safe trade routes.

Pine Log.name: 松木原木 Pine Log
Pine Log.description:
林地地区采伐最多的木材种类之一。它们适合用来制作小屋原木、围栏或标牌。

One of the most harvested types of wood in woodland areas. They are good for making cabin logs, fencing, or signs.

Carrot.name: 胡萝卜 Carrot
Carrot.description:
坐骑在长途旅行后最喜欢的零食。通常为橙色，不过也会因地区不同而存在紫色、黑色、红色、白色和黄色的变种。用于大多数菜肴中。草药师有时会用胡萝卜来制作食用染料。

The steeds' favorite treat after a long trip. Usually, orange in color, though purple, black, red, white, and yellow variants exist depending on the region. Used in most dishes of food. Herbalists sometimes use carrots to create food dyes.

Water Opal.name: 水蛋白石 Water Opal
Water Opal.description:
水蛋白石，有时被称为果冻蛋白石，是一种以其透明外观和缺乏底色而闻名的珍贵蛋白石。与典型的蛋白石不同，水蛋白石具有一种独特的性质，似乎能够消散奥术法术。

Water Opal, sometimes referred to as jelly opal, is a precious opal known for its transparent appearance and absence of body color. Unlike typical opals, water opals have a unique property of seemingly dissipating arcane spells.

Pear.name: 梨 Pear
Pear.description:
一种在各地广泛栽培的常见水果。它们通常鲜食或储存为自制果汁。它们也用于制作梨酒（perry，一种发酵的梨汁）以及大量的苹果酒。

A common fruit cultivated all over. They are usually eaten fresh or stored as homemade juice. They are also used to create perry, a fermented pear juice, and a plethora of ciders.

Green Salad.name: 绿色沙拉 Green Salad
Green Salad.description:
这份绿色沙拉由当地可获得的蔬菜制成，包括洋葱、黄瓜、萝卜、生菜、菠菜和卷心菜等。

The green salad is made from locally available vegetables, including onions, cucumbers, radishes, lettuce, spinach, and cabbage, among others.

Green Soldier Bug.name: 绿兵蝽 Green Soldier Bug
Green Soldier Bug.description:
绿兵虫，通常被称为臭虫，被压碎时会散发出恶臭，并对茄子和西红柿等作物构成严重威胁。幸运的是，与绿夏甲虫不同，这种小生物可以被母鸡和鸭子有效管理，它们有助于控制其数量而不会伤害任何作物。

Green Soldier Bug, commonly referred to as the stink bug, emits a foul odor when crushed and poses a serious threat to crops like aubergines and tomatoes. Fortunately, unlike the Green Summer beetle, this critter can be managed effectively by hens and ducks, which help control their numbers without harming any of the crop.

Datolite.name: 硅硼钙石 Datolite
Datolite.description:
历史记录表明，硅硼钙石曾一度被用作现金的一种形式。然而，它易于磨损的弱点促使人们用更耐用的金属钱币取而代之，后者随后被普遍认可。尽管它仍然有价值，这种宝石的历史意义已逐渐淡去。

Historical records indicate that Datolite was once utilized as a form of currency. However, its vulnerability to wear and tear prompted its replacement with more durable metal coins, which became universally recognized. While still valued, the gemstone's historical significance has gradually faded.

Ruby Spinel.name: 红宝石尖晶石 Ruby Spinel
Ruby Spinel.description:
“他们说，如果你吞下这些，虽然我一点也不推荐，你就能记住法术。现在我倒想知道，一个人怎么会忘记呢？”

尖晶石是一种稀有矿物，并因此被用来替代更为稀有的宝石，例如红宝石。蓝色变种是市场上最昂贵的宝石之一。

"They say, if you ingest these, although, I wouldn't recommend it one bit, you can remember spells. Now I wonder, how can someone forget?" 

Spinel is a rare mineral, and due to it, used to substitute even rarer ones like rubies. The blue variant is one of the most expensive gemstones on the market.

Dragon Fruit.name: Dragon Fruit
Dragon Fruit.description:
根据地区不同，有时也被称为火龙果。其果实外皮鲜红，带有绿色鳞片，略微类似龙，因此得名。

Depending on the region, sometimes also called a Pitaya. The fruit has bright red skin and green scales that slightly resemble a dragon, hence the name.

Gloves of Working.name: 劳作手套 Gloves of Working
Gloves of Working.description:
手套被户外工人出于实用目的而佩戴，例如园艺或繁重的户外工作。这些工作手套通常由皮革制成并衬以毛皮，或作为替代，由羊皮制成且羊毛面朝内。

Gloves were worn by outdoor workers for practical purposes, such as gardening or heavy outdoor work. These working gloves were often made of leather and lined with fur, or alternatively, made of sheepskin with the fleece on the inside.

Diamond Arcana.name: 钻石奥秘 Diamond Arcana
Diamond Arcana.description:
由最娴熟的奥术大师与宝石切割师打造。由一颗完美无瑕的单一钻石制成，整枚戒圈都直接从宝石本体上雕琢而成，通过失传的奥术技艺塑形，而非使用常规工具。每枚戒指都成为更大奥术经济体系的一部分，在强者之间流转，以换取极其昂贵的法术。

Created by the most skilled arcane masters and gem cutters. Formed from a single flawless diamond, the entire band is carved directly from the stone itself, shaped through forgotten arcane techniques rather than conventional tools. Each ring becomes part of a greater arcane economy, moving between powerful hands for very expensive spells.

Ramen.name: 拉面 Ramen
Ramen.description:
拉面是一种用面条和猪肉制作的风味浓郁的汤品，通常用酱油和味噌调味。它常常配上各种配料，包括切片培根、葱花，有时还会有鱼、干海苔或鸡蛋。

Ramen is a flavorful soup made with noodles and pork, typically seasoned with soy sauce and miso. It is often served with a variety of toppings, including sliced bacon, scallions, and sometimes fish, dried seaweed, or eggs.

Petalite.name: 透锂长石 Petalite
Petalite.description:
这些装饰性宝石硬度适中但很脆，颜色从粉红到无色不等。透锂长石有一个奇特现象：当珠宝匠切割这颗抛光宝石时，最小的碎片会在瞬间失去所有反光。这一效果引发了其具有奥术起源的猜测，尽管它也可能只是视觉错觉。不幸的是，要从稳定来源获得足够数量的透锂长石以进行严格的奥术研究仍然难以实现。

These ornamental stones are moderately hard yet brittle, with colors ranging from pink to colorless. A curious event with Petalite occurs when a jeweler cuts the polished gem, the smallest piece momentarily loses all reflections. This effect has sparked speculation of arcane origins, though it may simply be an optical illusion. Unfortunately, a significant quantity of Petalite from a consistent source remains elusive for rigorous arcane investigation.

Hugger of Faces.name: 抱脸者 Hugger of Faces
Hugger of Faces.description:
根据一些罕见的研究，这种生物的身体会紧紧包裹在面部，而它的尾巴会缠绕在颈部，其目的未知。然而，由于关于它们的记录有限，其目的仍不确定。从未发现过活体标本，只有偶尔出现的外骨骼壳。对这些壳的分析引出了这样一种理论：这种生物的血液具有强酸性，因为它能够溶解大多数物质。

According to some rare studies, the creature’s body wraps tightly to the face, while its tail coils around the neck, to an unknown purpose. However, due to limited documentation of them, their purpose remains uncertain. No living specimens have ever been discovered, only the ocassional exoskeleton shells. Analysis of these shells has led to the theory that the creature's blood is highly acidic as it is capable of dissolving most substances.

Emerald.name: 翡翠 Emerald
Emerald.description:
半透明祖母绿被切割并抛光成用于珠宝的宝石切工。主要作为礼物赠予王室或贵族。过去它与健康、生育和成长相关，并被用来装饰能提升治疗技艺的魔法物品。

Translucent Emeralds are cut and polished in gem cuts for jewelry. Mainly provided as gifts for royalty or nobility. In the past it was associated with health, fertility, and growth and used to adorn magical items that improved the healing arts.

Velvet.name: 天鹅绒 Velvet
Velvet.description:
最知名的材料之一。它是在特殊类型的织机上织成的，这些织机有一种独特的方式将布料缝合在一起。天鹅绒通常与贵族联系在一起，然而，在近代它被羊绒毛料所取代。

One of the most well known materials. It is woven on special types of looms that have a distinct way of seaming the cloth together. Velvet is often associated with nobility, however, in more recent times it got replaced with Cashmere wool.

Jasper.name: 碧玉 Jasper
Jasper.description:
每一颗碧玉宝石都被认为是独一无二的，因为每颗宝石都有独特的纹理，从斑点纹到环状纹，或条纹纹理不等。往昔它被视为珍贵的宝石，如今主要被炼金术士和草药师用来制作解毒剂和魔法毒药，因为这种宝石的特性有助于中和并防护毒素。

Each Jasper gemstone is assumed to be unique, as every gemstone has singular pattern, ranging from spotted patterns to ringed, or stripped. In days past it was regarded as a valuable stone, now is mainly used by alchemists and herbalists to create antidotes and magical poisons, because the stones proprieties assist in neutralizing and protecting from poison.

Canary Diamond.name: 金丝雀钻石 Canary Diamond
Canary Diamond.description:
“在过去，钻石被用于一种称为宝石魔法的魔法形式，施法者会将法术唤入钻石之中，以便在之后的某个时间使用。如今这已被魔法卷轴所取代，因为它更具成本效益。根据你所施加的法术，你可以实现特定的触发条件，并制造一些非常具体而复杂的陷阱，这是用普通法术卷轴无法做到的。那份知识尽管很有趣，却已失落于时代。”

 

深黄色钻石是最昂贵的变种之一，其价格通常接近其常规无色对应品的两倍。 

"In the past, diamonds were used for a form of magic called gemstone magic, the casters would call upon the spell into the diamond to be used at a later time. This has been replaced with magical scrolls nowadays as it is more cost-effective. Depending on the spell you implement certain triggers, and create some very specific and intricate traps, which is not achievable with regular spell scrolls. That knowledge as interesting as it was, is lost to time." 

 

A deep yellow diamond, one of the most expensive variants, is usually close to double in price of its regular non-colored counterpart.

Plum.name: 李子 Plum
Plum.description:
一种椭圆形的肉质果实，成熟时呈紫色、红色或黄色，内含一枚扁平且尖端突出的核。它们被认为是诸界中最多汁的水果之一。它们主要被面包师用来制作各式甜点，从李子挞到杏仁蛋糕不等。一些酒馆老板会用它们酿造一种烈性酒，风味极其浓烈。

An oval fleshy fruit that is purple, reddish, or yellow, in color, when ripe and contains a flattish pointed stone. They are considered one of the juiciest fruits across the realms. They are used mainly by bakers to create a variety of sweets from plum tarts to almond cakes. Some tavern keeps use them to make a strong alcohol with a very powerful flavor.

Wall Meat.name: 墙肉 Wall Meat
Wall Meat.description:
墙肉，从库纳拉克身上采收而来，由于其漫长而繁重的种植与采收过程，在地下居民中是一种备受珍视的美味佳肴。尽管名为墙肉，墙肉并非真正的肉类，而是一种外壳坚韧、质地坚硬的蘑菇。它的烹制方法很简单，但对不习惯地下料理的人来说可能令人却步，因为它在地下环境中度过了漫长的时间，因而带有强烈的、类似霉味的气味。只有体质强健的人才适合烹调它。不过，一旦处理得当，它的风味浓郁，融合了嫩牛肉与煎炒蘑菇的最佳特质。

Wall Meat, harvested from the Kurnarac, is a prized delicacy among the subterranean folk, due to the long and laborious process of planting and harvesting it. Despite its name, Wall Meat is not actual meat but a type of mushroom with a tough, hard exterior. Its preparation is simple but can be off-putting to those unaccustomed to underground cuisine, as it has a strong, mold-like odor from its lengthy time spent in the subterranean environment. Only those with a robust constitution are fit to cook it. Once prepared, however, it has a rich flavor, blending the best qualities of tender beef and sautéed mushrooms.

Goulash.name: 匈牙利炖牛肉汤 Goulash
Goulash.description:
古拉什是一种丰盛的炖菜，由各种部位的肉、洋葱和红椒粉制成，在大锅中以小火慢慢炖煮。通常会做得相当辛辣，非常适合搭配土豆泥之类的配菜一起享用。

Goulash is a hearty stew made with various cuts of meat, onions, and paprika, simmered slowly in a cauldron over low heat. Typically, it is prepared to be quite spicy, perfect for enjoying with a side dish like mashed potatoes.

Liquid Solid Slate.name: 液态固体板岩 Liquid Solid Slate
Liquid Solid Slate.description:
人们对液化的过程知之甚少，然而，当它与另一种金属作为合金使用时，据说坚不可摧。当被武器击中时，会产生一道不可穿透的冲击波，将武器推回。由于它的重量，这使得试图潜行移动的人们很困难。

Little is known about the process of liquefaction, however, when used as an alloy with another metal, it is said to be unbreakable. When struck by a weapon, an impenetrable shock-wave is created, pushing the weapon back. Due to its weight, it makes it difficult for people trying to move stealthily.

Travel Horse.name: 旅行马 Travel Horse
Travel Horse.description:
骑乘马，或鞍马，是一种供骑乘者用于娱乐或交通的马。它提供自由与移动，并能实现一些令人惊叹的运动壮举。与您的坐骑步调一致地驰骋穿越开阔的原野，是一种彻底的刺激。

A riding horse, or a saddle horse, is a horse used by mounted riders for recreation or transportation. It offers freedom, and movement, and enables some amazing feats of athleticism. There is a total thrill in galloping across an open field, in tune with your mount.

Lombart Wine.name: 隆巴特葡萄酒 Lombart Wine
Lombart Wine.description:
隆巴特葡萄酒是一种著名的饮品，由罗克拉斯·隆巴特酒庄在诸国各地生产并分销。它以稳定的品质与亲民的价格而闻名，位列市面上较好的葡萄酒之中。它的供应范围极广，即便在最偏远、最与世隔绝的地区也能买到，这往往引发人们对其分销背后物流的好奇，甚至超过了对葡萄酒本身的兴趣。

Lombart Wine is a renowned drink, manufactured and distributed across the realms by the Roklas Lombart winery. Known for its consistent quality and approachable price, it stands among the better wines available on the market. Its widespread availability, even in the most remote and secluded regions, often sparks more curiosity about the logistics behind its distribution than the wine itself.

Carp Steak.name: 鲤鱼排 Carp Steak
Carp Steak.description:
想象一块刚切好的鲤鱼排在烤架上滋滋作响，烟熏的香气与香草和香料交织，或是一片烤鱼片从烤箱里端出，金黄焦香，准备配上烤蔬菜和一抹柠檬汁上桌。这就是鲤鱼的精髓：简单却美味，每一餐都以新鲜烹制。

Imagine a fresh-cut carp steak sizzling on the grill, the smoky aroma mixing with herbs and spices, or a baked fillet coming out of the oven golden brown, ready to be served with a side of roasted vegetables and a splash of lemon. This is the essence of carp: simple yet delicious, prepared fresh for every meal.

Copper Ingot.name: 铜锭 Copper Ingot
Copper Ingot.description:
铜锭一旦在熔炉中提纯后，就被用于生产家用器具、武器、护甲、农具以及家具装饰。由于其熔点较低，与许多坚固金属相比可减少燃料消耗，因此它们常被新手铁匠用作训练金属。

Copper Ingot, once purified in the smelter, are used in the production of household utensils, weapons, armor, agricultural tools, and furniture ornamentation. They are often used by rookie blacksmiths as a training metal since their lower melting point reduces fuel consumption compared to many sturdy metals.

Blue Quartz.name: 蓝色石英 Blue Quartz
Blue Quartz.description:
玻璃匠或吹玻璃工偏爱它，用来制作不同类型的杯子和花瓶，并在铁匠的帮助下用于装饰啤酒杯。魔法使用者用这种宝石来眺望各地，或看穿某人的欺骗。

Preferred by glassmiths or gaffers, to make different types of cups and vases and with help from the blacksmiths it is used to ornate tankards. Magic wielders use this gemstone to see across the lands or through someone's deceit.

Mania potion.name: 狂躁药水 Mania potion
Mania potion.description:
小瓶散发出纯金色的光辉，仿佛在吸引你将其饮下。若将其饮下，你会感觉神祇立誓要保护你且仅保护你一人，而所有人都应在羞耻与恐惧中在你面前畏缩。然而，这种药水并没有任何强力效果，它只会给予宏伟壮丽的错觉。

The vial gives off a solid gold glow, as it attracts you to consume it. If consumed you feel that the gods made a vow to protect you and you alone, and all should cower before you in shame and fear, however, this potion does not have any powerful effects it only gives the impression of grandeur.

Agate Ring.name: 玛瑙戒指 Agate Ring
Agate Ring.description:
玛瑙戒指据传能吸引财富与繁荣。这种信念可能源自德鲁伊传统，其认为玛瑙石与周围大地之间共享着强烈的联系与纽带。然而，在平民之中地位最高的阶层里，关于应将玛瑙宝石戴在哪根手指和哪只手上存在一套严格的行为准则，而且这种做法会随日子而改变。

The agate ring is rumored to attract wealth and prosperity. This belief may stem from Druidic traditions, which hold that the agate stone shares a strong connection and bond with the surrounding earth. Among the highest class of commoners, however, there exists a strict code of conduct regarding which finger and hand the agate gem should be worn on, a practice that changes depending on the day.

Aurichalcum Ingot.name: 星铂金锭 Aurichalcum Ingot
Aurichalcum Ingot.description:
当杂质被去除并产出纯净的锭块时，奥利哈钢锭在齿轮、船舶部件、叶轮、轴承、金属套筒以及其他机械部件等关键组件中有多种用途。奥利哈钢也仍与其古老的根源相连，人们铸造钱币以延续这一悠久的根源。

When impurities are removed and clear ingots are produced, Aurichalcum Ingots finds several uses in essential components such as gears, ship parts, impellers, bearings, metallic sleeves, and other mechanical parts. Aurichalcum also remains tied to its ancient roots, with coins being minted to continue this long-standing tradition.

Murum.name: 穆鲁姆 Murum
Murum.description:
Murum适用于各种重型作业，例如基座填充、道路路面、沟槽回填以及基础坑。它不含有机质且易于压实，从而形成耐久的表面，使其成为建筑用途的理想土壤。

Murum finds application in various heavy-duty tasks such as plinth filling, road pavements, backfilling in trenches, and footing pits. Its absence of organic matter and ease of compaction, leading to the formation of durable surfaces, make it an ideal soil for construction purposes.

Seleneium.name: 硒硒鎓 Seleneium
Seleneium.description:
硒是一种稀有而珍贵的矿物，因其独特的性质而备受追捧。据说它具有深邃、虹彩般的光泽，闪烁着彩虹的每一种颜色。当它被锤子或凿子敲击时，会发出纯净、清澈的音调，据说对听到它的人具有舒缓的效果。尽管拥有许多奇妙的性质，硒也据说极其难以获得，许多勇敢而无畏的冒险者踏上了寻找它的旅程，却只遭遇了失败或走向毁灭。

Selenium is a rare and precious mineral that is highly sought after for its unique properties. It is said to have a deep, iridescent luster that shimmers with every color of the rainbow. When it is struck with a hammer or chisel, it gives off a pure, clear tone that is said to have a soothing effect on those who hear it. Despite its many wondrous properties, Selenium is also said to be incredibly difficult to obtain, and many brave and daring adventurers have set out in search of it, only to be met with failure or their demise.

Fried Pumpkin Seeds.name: 油炸南瓜籽 Fried Pumpkin Seeds
Fried Pumpkin Seeds.description:
秋季节庆和集市结束后，酒馆往往会剩下许多南瓜，而其中的种子可以派上用场。种子会被加盐、油炸，并作为可口的小吃端给酒馆的客人。

After fall festivals and fairs, taverns often have leftover pumpkins, and the seeds can be put to good use. The seeds are salted, fried, and served as a tasty snack for tavern patrons.

Dragon Touch.name: 巨龙接触 Dragon Touch
Dragon Touch.description:
“龙之接触”戒指是一件骗局戒指配件，被故意包装成缺失的第三个组件，用以补全那套声名显赫的套装——其中包括“龙之眼”耳环与“龙之心”吊坠。它主要由黄铁矿和廉价玛瑙制成，确实也有一些价值。然而，一旦这件首饰被证明并非其所宣称的那样，那位能言善辩的骗子就早已不见踪影。

Dragon Touch ring is a scam ring piece, deliberately marketed as the missing third component to complete the prestigious set featuring 'Dragon's Eyes' earrings and the 'Dragon Heart' pendant. Primarily manufactured from Iron Pyrite and a cheap Agate, it does posses some value. However, the moment the piece of jewelry proves not to be what it was sold as, the silver-tongued scammer is nowhere to be seen.
